GE07mbh_13_u:0: 13,001.000*0001_01 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam 13,001.000*0001_02 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:1: 13,001.000*0002_01 yaḥ śvetatvam upāgataḥ kṛtayuge tretāyuge raktatāṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:2: 13,001.000*0002_02 yugme yaḥ kapilaḥ kalau sa bhagavān kṛṣṇatvam abhyāgataḥ 13,001.000*0002_03 yaṃ vedāntavido vadanti munayo yo yogibhir gīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:3: 13,001.000*0002_04 sa brahmā yadi vā haro yadi hariḥ pāyāj jagad durgateḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:4: 13,001.000*0002_05 kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ viddhi nārāyaṇaṃ svayam 13,001.000*0002_06 ko 'nyo hi puṇḍarīkākṣān mahābhāratakṛd bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5: 13,001.000*0003_01 lakṣmīmaṭhanivāso 'haṃ gopālākhyo dvijottamaḥ 13,001.000*0003_02 śrīkṛṣṇaṃ tu namaskṛtya likhyāmi muktikāmyayā 13,001.000*0004_01 śibirād dhāstinapuraṃ prāpya bhārata saṃjayaḥ 13,001.000*0004_02 praviveśa mahāprājño dhṛtarāṣṭraniveśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:7: 13,001.000*0004_04 cintayan vaiśasaṃ ghoraṃ sūtaputrasya pāṇḍavaiḥ 13,001.000*0005_00 vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:10: 13,001.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,001.001a śamo bahuvidhākāraḥ sūkṣma uktaḥ pitāmaha 13,001.001c na ca me hṛdaye śāntir asti kṛtvedam īdṛśam 13,001.002a asminn arthe bahuvidhā śāntir uktā tvayānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:11: 13,001.002c svakṛte kā nu śāntiḥ syāc chamād bahuvidhād api 13,001.003a śarācitaśarīraṃ hi tīvravraṇam udīkṣya ca 13,001.003c śamaṃ nopalabhe vīra duṣkṛtāny eva cintayan
GE07mbh_13_u:13: 13,001.004c tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣavyāghra sīde varṣāsv ivāmbujam
GE07mbh_13_u:14: 13,001.005a ataḥ kaṣṭataraṃ kiṃ nu matkṛte yat pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15: 13,001.005c imām avasthāṃ gamitaḥ pratyamitrai raṇājire 13,001.005e tathaivānye nṛpatayaḥ sahaputrāḥ sabāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16: 13,001.005f*0006_01 matkṛte nidhanaṃ prāptāḥ kiṃ nu kaṣṭataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17: 13,001.006a vayaṃ hi dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca kālamanyuvaśānugāḥ 13,001.006c kṛtvedaṃ ninditaṃ karma prāpsyāmaḥ kāṃ gatiṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:18: 13,001.006d*0007_01 idaṃ tu dhārtarāṣṭrasya śreyo manye janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:19: 13,001.006d*0007_02 imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaṃ yad asau tvāṃ na paśyati 13,001.007a ahaṃ tava hy antakaraḥ suhṛdvadhakaras tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:20: 13,001.007c na śāntim adhigacchāmi paśyaṃs tvāṃ duḥkhitaṃ kṣitau
GE07mbh_13_u:21: 13,001.007d*0008_01 duryodhano hi samare sahasainyaḥ sahānujaḥ 13,001.007d*0008_02 nihataḥ kṣatradharme 'smin durātmā kulapāṃsanaḥ 13,001.007d*0008_03 na sa paśyati duṣṭātmā tvām adya patitaṃ kṣitau 13,001.007d*0008_04 ataḥ śreyo mṛtaṃ manye neha jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:22: 13,001.007d*0008_05 ahaṃ hi samare vīra gamitaḥ śatrubhiḥ kṣayam
GE07mbh_13_u:23: 13,001.007d*0008_06 abhaviṣyaṃ yadi purā saha bhrātṛbhir acyuta
GE07mbh_13_u:24: 13,001.007d*0008_07 na tvām evaṃ suduḥkhārtam adrākṣaṃ sāyakārditam
GE07mbh_13_u:25: 13,001.007d*0008_08 nūnaṃ hi pāpakarmāṇo dhātrā sṛṣṭāḥ sma he nṛpa 13,001.007d*0008_09 anyasminn api loke hi yathā mucyema kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_13_u:26: 13,001.007d*0008_10 tathā praśādhi māṃ rājan mama ced icchasi priyam 13,001.008 bhīṣma uvāca 13,001.008a paratantraṃ kathaṃ hetum ātmānam anupaśyasi 13,001.008c karmaṇy asmin mahābhāga sūkṣmaṃ hy etad atīndriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:29: 13,001.010a gautamī nāma kaunteya sthavirā śamasaṃyutā 13,001.010c sarpeṇa daṣṭaṃ svaṃ putram apaśyad gatacetanam
GE07mbh_13_u:30: 13,001.011a atha taṃ snāyupāśena baddhvā sarpam amarṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:32: 13,001.012a tāṃ cābravīd ayaṃ te sa putrahā pannagādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:33: 13,001.012c brūhi kṣipraṃ mahābhāge vadhyatāṃ kena hetunā
GE07mbh_13_u:34: 13,001.013a agnau prakṣipyatām eṣa cchidyatāṃ khaṇḍaśo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:35: 13,001.013c na hy ayaṃ bālahā pāpaś ciraṃ jīvitum arhati 13,001.014 gautamy uvāca 13,001.014a visṛjainam abuddhis tvaṃ na vadhyo 'rjunaka tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:36: 13,001.014c ko hy ātmānaṃ guruṃ kuryāt prāptavye sati cintayan 13,001.015a plavante dharmalaghavo loke 'mbhasi yathā plavāḥ 13,001.015c majjanti pāpaguravaḥ śastraṃ skannam ivodake 13,001.015d*0009_01 yadi vāsmiṃs tu nihate pannage 'rjunaka tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:37: 13,001.015d*0009_02 jīved ayaṃ bālako me tan na me 'rjunaka priyam
GE07mbh_13_u:38: 13,001.016a na cāmṛtyur bhavitā vai hate 'smin; ko vātyayaḥ syād ahate
GE07mbh_13_u:40: 13,001.016b*0010_01 hatvā cainaṃ nāmṛtaḥ syād ayaṃ me
GE07mbh_13_u:41: 13,001.016b*0010_02 jīvaty asmin ko 'tyayaḥ syād ayaṃ te
GE07mbh_13_u:43: 13,001.016b*0011_02 jīvaty asmin ko vyasuḥ syād anante
GE07mbh_13_u:44: 13,001.016c asyotsarge prāṇayuktasya jantor; mṛtyor lokaṃ ko nu gacched anantam
GE07mbh_13_u:45: 13,001.017 lubdhaka uvāca 13,001.017a jānāmy evaṃ neha guṇāguṇajñāḥ; sarve niyuktā guravo vai bhavanti 13,001.017c svasthasyaite tūpadeśā bhavanti; tasmāt kṣudraṃ sarpam enaṃ haniṣye 13,001.018a samīpsantaḥ kālayogaṃ tyajanti; sadyaḥ śucaṃ tv arthavidas tyajanti 13,001.018c śreyaḥ kṣayaḥ śocatāṃ nityaśo hi; tasmāt tyājyaṃ jahi śokaṃ hate 'smin
GE07mbh_13_u:46: 13,001.019 gautamy uvāca 13,001.019a na caivārtir vidyate 'smadvidhānāṃ; dharmārāmaḥ satataṃ sajjano hi 13,001.019c nityāyasto bālajano na cāsti; dharmo hy eṣa prabhavāmy asya nāham
GE07mbh_13_u:47: 13,001.020a na brāhmaṇānāṃ kopo 'sti kutaḥ kopāc ca yātanā
GE07mbh_13_u:48: 13,001.020c mārdavāt kṣamyatāṃ sādho mucyatām eṣa pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:49: 13,001.021 lubdhaka uvāca 13,001.021a hatvā lābhaḥ śreya evāvyayaṃ syāt; sadyo lābho balavadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:51: 13,001.021c kālāl lābho yas tu sadyo bhaveta; hate śreyaḥ kutsite tvīdṛśe syāt 13,001.022 gautamy uvāca 13,001.022a kārthaprāptir gṛhya śatruṃ nihatya; kā vā śāntiḥ prāpya śatruṃ namuktvā
GE07mbh_13_u:52: 13,001.022c kasmāt saumya bhujage na kṣameyaṃ; mokṣaṃ vā kiṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsya kuryām
GE07mbh_13_u:53: 13,001.023 lubdhaka uvāca 13,001.023a asmād ekasmād bahavo rakṣitavyā; naiko bahubhyo gautami
GE07mbh_13_u:55: 13,001.023c kṛtāgasaṃ dharmavidas tyajanti; sarīsṛpaṃ pāpam imaṃ jahi tvam 13,001.024 gautamy uvāca 13,001.024a nāsmin hate pannage putrako me; saṃprāpsyate lubdhaka jīvitaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:57: 13,001.024c guṇaṃ cānyaṃ nāsya vadhe prapaśye; tasmāt sarpaṃ lubdhaka
GE07mbh_13_u:58: muñca jīvam 13,001.025 lubdhaka uvāca 13,001.025a vṛtraṃ hatvā devarāṭ śreṣṭhabhāg vai; yajñaṃ hatvā bhāgam
GE07mbh_13_u:59: avāpa caiva 13,001.025c śūlī devo devavṛttaṃ kuru tvaṃ; kṣipraṃ sarpaṃ jahi mā bhūd
GE07mbh_13_u:60: 13,001.026 bhīṣma uvāca 13,001.026a asakṛt procyamānāpi gautamī bhujagaṃ prati 13,001.026c lubdhakena mahābhāgā pāpe naivākaron matim 13,001.027a īṣad ucchvasamānas tu kṛcchrāt saṃstabhya pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:61: 13,001.027c utsasarja giraṃ mandāṃ mānuṣīṃ pāśapīḍitaḥ 13,001.028a ko nv arjunaka doṣo 'tra vidyate mama bāliśa
GE07mbh_13_u:62: 13,001.028c asvatantraṃ hi māṃ mṛtyur vivaśaṃ yad acūcudat
GE07mbh_13_u:63: 13,001.029a tasyāyaṃ vacanād daṣṭo na kopena na kāmyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:64: 13,001.029c tasya tat kilbiṣaṃ lubdha vidyate yadi kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:65: 13,001.030 lubdhaka uvāca 13,001.030a yady anyavaśagenedaṃ kṛtaṃ te pannagāśubham 13,001.030c kāraṇaṃ vai tvam apy atra tasmāt tvam api kilbiṣī
GE07mbh_13_u:66: 13,001.031a mṛtpātrasya kriyāyāṃ hi daṇḍacakrādayo yathā 13,001.031c kāraṇatve prakalpyante tathā tvam api pannaga
GE07mbh_13_u:67: 13,001.032a kilbiṣī cāpi me vadhyaḥ kilbiṣī cāsi pannaga
GE07mbh_13_u:68: 13,001.032c ātmānaṃ kāraṇaṃ hy atra tvam ākhyāsi bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_13_u:69: 13,001.033 sarpa uvāca 13,001.033a sarva ete hy asvavaśā daṇḍacakrādayo yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:70: 13,001.033c tathāham api tasmān me naiṣa hetur matas tava 13,001.034a atha vā matam etat te te 'py anyonyaprayojakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:72: 13,001.035a evaṃ sati na doṣo me nāsmi vadhyo na kilbiṣī
GE07mbh_13_u:73: 13,001.035c kilbiṣaṃ samavāye syān manyase yadi kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:74: 13,001.035d*0012_01 kilbiṣaṃ manyase hi tvaṃ vadhyam evaṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_13_u:75: 13,001.036 lubdhaka uvāca 13,001.036a kāraṇaṃ yadi na syād vai na kartā syās tvam apy uta 13,001.036c vināśe kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ ca tasmād vadhyo 'si me mataḥ 13,001.037a asaty api kṛte kārye neha pannaga lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:76: 13,001.037c tasmān nātraiva hetuḥ syād vadhyaḥ kiṃ bahu bhāṣase 13,001.038 sarpa uvāca 13,001.038a kāryābhāve kriyā na syāt saty asaty api kāraṇe 13,001.038c tasmāt tvam asmin hetau me vācyo hetur viśeṣataḥ 13,001.039a yady ahaṃ kāraṇatvena mato lubdhaka tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:77: 13,001.039c anyaḥ prayoge syād atra kilbiṣī jantunāśane
GE07mbh_13_u:78: 13,001.040 lubdhaka uvāca 13,001.040a vadhyas tvaṃ mama durbuddhe bālaghātī nṛśaṃsakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:79: 13,001.040c bhāṣase kiṃ bahu punar vadhyaḥ san pannagādhama
GE07mbh_13_u:80: 13,001.041 sarpa uvāca 13,001.041a yathā havīṃṣi juhvānā makhe vai lubdhakartvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:81: 13,001.041c na phalaṃ prāpnuvanty atra paraloke tathā hy aham 13,001.042 bhīṣma uvāca 13,001.042a tathā bruvati tasmiṃs tu pannage mṛtyucodite
GE07mbh_13_u:82: 13,001.042c ājagāma tato mṛtyuḥ pannagaṃ cābravīd idam
GE07mbh_13_u:83: 13,001.043a kālenāhaṃ praṇuditaḥ pannaga tvām acūcudam 13,001.043c vināśahetur nāsya tvam ahaṃ vā prāṇinaḥ śiśoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:84: 13,001.044a yathā vāyur jaladharān vikarṣati tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:85: 13,001.044c tadvaj jaladavat sarpa kālasyāhaṃ vaśānugaḥ 13,001.044d*0013_01 tadvidhas tadvaśe cāhaṃ kālasya vaśagaś ciram
GE07mbh_13_u:86: 13,001.045a sāttvikā rājasāś caiva tāmasā ye ca ke cana 13,001.045c bhāvāḥ kālātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:87: 13,001.046a jaṅgamāḥ sthāvarāś caiva divi vā yadi vā bhuvi 13,001.046c sarve kālātmakāḥ sarpa kālātmakam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:88: 13,001.047a pravṛttayaś ca yā loke tathaiva ca nivṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:89: 13,001.047c tāsāṃ vikṛtayo yāś ca sarvaṃ kālātmakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:90: 13,001.048a ādityaś candramā viṣṇur āpo vāyuḥ śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:91: 13,001.048c agniḥ khaṃ pṛthivī mitra oṣadhyo vasavas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:92: 13,001.049a saritaḥ sāgarāś caiva bhāvābhāvau ca pannaga
GE07mbh_13_u:93: 13,001.049c sarve kālena sṛjyante hriyante ca tathā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:94: 13,001.050a evaṃ jñātvā kathaṃ māṃ tvaṃ sadoṣaṃ sarpa manyase 13,001.050c atha caivaṃgate doṣo mayi tvam api doṣavān
GE07mbh_13_u:95: 13,001.051 sarpa uvāca 13,001.051a nirdoṣaṃ doṣavantaṃ vā na tvā mṛtyo bravīmy aham 13,001.051c tvayāhaṃ codita iti bravīmy etāvad eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:96: 13,001.052a yadi kāle tu doṣo 'sti yadi tatrāpi neṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:97: 13,001.052c doṣo naiva parīkṣyo me na hy atrādhikṛtā vayam 13,001.053a nirmokṣas tv asya doṣasya mayā kāryo yathā tathā 13,001.053c mṛtyo vidoṣaḥ syām eva yathā tan me prayojanam 13,001.054 bhīṣma uvāca 13,001.054a sarpo 'thārjunakaṃ prāha śrutaṃ te mṛtyubhāṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:98: 13,001.054c nānāgasaṃ māṃ pāśena saṃtāpayitum arhasi 13,001.055 lubdhaka uvāca 13,001.055a mṛtyoḥ śrutaṃ me vacanaṃ tava caiva bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_13_u:99: 13,001.055c naiva tāvad vidoṣatvaṃ bhavati tvayi pannaga
GE07mbh_13_u:100: 13,001.056a mṛtyus tvaṃ caiva hetur hi jantor asya vināśane 13,001.056c ubhayaṃ kāraṇaṃ manye na kāraṇam akāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:101: 13,001.057a dhiṅ mṛtyuṃ ca durātmānaṃ krūraṃ duḥkhakaraṃ satām
GE07mbh_13_u:102: 13,001.057c tvāṃ caivāhaṃ vadhiṣyāmi pāpaṃ pāpasya kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:103: 13,001.058 mṛtyur uvāca 13,001.058a vivaśau kālavaśagāv āvāṃ tad diṣṭakāriṇau 13,001.058c nāvāṃ doṣeṇa gantavyau yadi samyak prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:104: 13,001.059 lubdhaka uvāca 13,001.059a yuvām ubhau kālavaśau yadi vai mṛtyupannagau
GE07mbh_13_u:105: 13,001.059c harṣakrodhau kathaṃ syātām etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:106: 13,001.060 mṛtyur uvāca 13,001.060a yāḥ kāś cid iha ceṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvāḥ kālapracoditāḥ 13,001.060c pūrvam evaitad uktaṃ hi mayā lubdhaka kālataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107: 13,001.061a tasmād ubhau kālavaśāv āvāṃ tad diṣṭakāriṇau
GE07mbh_13_u:108: 13,001.061c nāvāṃ doṣeṇa gantavyau tvayā lubdhaka karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:109: 13,001.062 bhīṣma uvāca 13,001.062a athopagamya kālas tu tasmin dharmārthasaṃśaye 13,001.062c abravīt pannagaṃ mṛtyuṃ lubdham arjunakaṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_13_u:110: 13,001.063 kāla uvāca 13,001.063a naivāhaṃ nāpy ayaṃ mṛtyur nāyaṃ lubdhaka pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:111: 13,001.063c kilbiṣī jantumaraṇe na vayaṃ hi prayojakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112: 13,001.064a akarod yad ayaṃ karma tan no 'rjunaka codakam
GE07mbh_13_u:114: 13,001.065a yad anena kṛtaṃ karma tenāyaṃ nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:115: 13,001.065c vināśahetuḥ karmāsya sarve karmavaśā vayam 13,001.066a karmadāyādavāṃl lokaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:116: 13,001.066c karmāṇi codayantīha yathānyonyaṃ tathā vayam 13,001.067a yathā mṛtpiṇḍataḥ kartā kurute yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_13_u:117: 13,001.067c evam ātmakṛtaṃ karma mānavaḥ pratipadyate 13,001.068a yathā chāyātapau nityaṃ susaṃbaddhau nirantaram 13,001.068c tathā karma ca kartā ca saṃbaddhāv ātmakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:118: 13,001.069a evaṃ nāhaṃ na vai mṛtyur na sarpo na tathā bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:119: 13,001.069c na ceyaṃ brāhmaṇī vṛddhā śiśur evātra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:120: 13,001.070a tasmiṃs tathā bruvāṇe tu brāhmaṇī gautamī nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:122: 13,001.071a naiva kālo na bhujago na mṛtyur iha kāraṇam 13,001.071c svakarmabhir ayaṃ bālaḥ kālena nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:123: 13,001.072a mayā ca tat kṛtaṃ karma yenāyaṃ me mṛtaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:124: 13,001.072c yātu kālas tathā mṛtyur muñcārjunaka pannagam
GE07mbh_13_u:125: 13,001.073 bhīṣma uvāca 13,001.073a tato yathāgataṃ jagmur mṛtyuḥ kālo 'tha pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127: 13,001.074a etac chrutvā śamaṃ gaccha mā bhūś cintāparo nṛpa 13,001.074c svakarmapratyayāṃl lokāṃs trīn viddhi manujarṣabha 13,001.075a na tu tvayā kṛtaṃ pārtha nāpi duryodhanena vai 13,001.075c kālena tat kṛtaṃ viddhi vihatā yena pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128: 13,001.076 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 13,001.076a ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā babhūva vigatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129: 13,001.076c yudhiṣṭhiro mahātejāḥ papracchedaṃ ca dharmavit 13,002.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,002.001a pitāmaha mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśārada
GE07mbh_13_u:130: 13,002.001c śrutaṃ me mahad ākhyānam idaṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:131: 13,002.002a bhūyas tu śrotum icchāmi dharmārthasahitaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:132: 13,002.002c kathyamānaṃ tvayā kiṃ cit tan me vyākhyātum arhasi 13,002.003a kena mṛtyur gṛhasthena dharmam āśritya nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133: 13,002.003c ity etat sarvam ācakṣva tattvena mama pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:134: 13,002.004 bhīṣma uvāca 13,002.004a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:135: 13,002.004c yathā mṛtyur gṛhasthena dharmam āśritya nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:136: 13,002.005a manoḥ prajāpate rājann ikṣvākur abhavat sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:137: 13,002.005c tasya putraśataṃ jajñe nṛpateḥ sūryavarcasaḥ 13,002.006a daśamas tasya putras tu daśāśvo nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:138: 13,002.006c māhiṣmatyām abhūd rājā dharmātmā satyavikramaḥ 13,002.007a daśāśvasya sutas tv āsīd rājā paramadhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139: 13,002.007c satye tapasi dāne ca yasya nityaṃ rataṃ manaḥ 13,002.008a madirāśva iti khyātaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ 13,002.008c dhanurvede ca vede ca nirato yo 'bhavat sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:140: 13,002.009a madirāśvasya putras tu dyutimān nāma pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142: 13,002.010a putro dyutimatas tv āsīt suvīro nāma pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143: 13,002.010a*0014_01 rājā paramadhārmikaḥ 13,002.010a*0014_02 sarvalokeṣu vikhyātaḥ 13,002.010c dharmātmā kośavāṃś cāpi devarāja ivāparaḥ 13,002.011a suvīrasya tu putro 'bhūt sarvasaṃgrāmadurjayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145: 13,002.011d*0015_01 sudurjaya iti khyātaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ 13,002.012a durjayasyendravapuṣaḥ putro 'gnisadṛśadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146: 13,002.012c duryodhano nāma mahān rājāsīd rājasattama 13,002.012d*0016_01 ikṣvākos tu śataṃ putrā daśāśvo daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148: 13,002.012d*0016_03 tasya ca dyutimān nāma suvīras tasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:149: 13,002.012d*0016_04 durjayas tasya tasyāpi duryodhana iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:151: 13,002.013c viṣayaś ca prabhāvaś ca tulyam evābhyavartata
GE07mbh_13_u:152: 13,002.013d*0017_01 viṣaye vāsavas tasya samyag eva pravarṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:153: 13,002.014a ratnair dhanaiś ca paśubhiḥ sasyaiś cāpi pṛthagvidhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:154: 13,002.014c nagaraṃ viṣayaś cāsya pratipūrṇaṃ tadābhavat 13,002.015a na tasya viṣaye cābhūt kṛpaṇo nāpi durgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:155: 13,002.015c vyādhito vā kṛśo vāpi tasmin nābhūn naraḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:156: 13,002.015d*0018_01 vyādhito durgataś caiva puruṣaḥ pratyadṛśyata 13,002.016a sudakṣiṇo madhuravāg anasūyur jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:158: 13,002.017a yajvā vadānyo medhāvī brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ 13,002.017c na cāvamantā dātā ca vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ 13,002.018a taṃ narmadā devanadī puṇyā śītajalā śivā
GE07mbh_13_u:159: 13,002.018c cakame puruṣaśreṣṭhaṃ svena bhāvena bhārata 13,002.019a tasya jajñe tadā nadyāṃ kanyā rājīvalocanā
GE07mbh_13_u:160: 13,002.019c nāmnā sudarśanā rājan rūpeṇa ca sudarśanā
GE07mbh_13_u:161: 13,002.020a tādṛgrūpā na nārīṣu bhūtapūrvā yudhiṣṭhira 13,002.020c duryodhanasutā yādṛg abhavad varavarṇinī
GE07mbh_13_u:162: 13,002.021a tām agniś cakame sākṣād rājakanyāṃ sudarśanām
GE07mbh_13_u:165: 13,002.021b*0019_03 tasyā manoramaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā devo hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:167: 13,002.021b*0019_04 manmathena samāviṣṭaḥ patnītve yatate mithaḥ 13,002.021b*0019_05 bhaja mām anavadyāṅgi kāmāt kamalalocane 13,002.021b*0019_06 rambhoru mṛgaśāvākṣi pūrṇacandranibhānane
GE07mbh_13_u:168: 13,002.021b*0019_07 tavedaṃ padmapatrākṣaṃ mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā manoharam 13,002.021b*0019_08 bhrūlatālalitaṃ kāntam anaṅgo bādhate hi mām
GE07mbh_13_u:170: 13,002.021b*0019_10 dṛṣṭvā te patralekhāṅkam anaṅgo bādhate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:171: 13,002.021b*0019_11 bālātapenākulitaṃ sasvedapulakodgamam 13,002.021b*0019_12 bimbādharoṣṭhaṃ vadanaṃ vibuddham iva paṅkajam 13,002.021b*0019_13 atīva cāruvibhrāntaṃ mudam āvahate mama 13,002.021b*0019_14 dantaprākāraniyatā vāṇī tava surakṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:173: 13,002.021b*0019_16 samāḥ snigdhāḥ sujātāś ca sahitāś ca dvijās tava 13,002.021b*0019_17 dvijapriye prasīdasva bhaja māṃ subhagā hy asi
GE07mbh_13_u:174: 13,002.021b*0019_18 manojñaṃ sukṛtāpāṅgaṃ mukhaṃ tava manoharam 13,002.021b*0019_19 stanau te saṃhatau bhīru hārābharaṇabhūṣitau 13,002.021b*0019_20 pakvabilvapratīkāśau karkaśau saṃgamakṣamau
GE07mbh_13_u:177: 13,002.021b*0019_22 saivam uktā virahite pāvakena mahātmanā 13,002.021b*0019_23 īṣad ākampihṛdayā vrīḍitā vākyam abravīt 13,002.021b*0019_24 nanu nāma kulīnānāṃ kanyakānāṃ viśeṣataḥ 13,002.021b*0019_25 mātā pitā prabhavataḥ pradāne bāndhavāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:178: 13,002.021b*0019_26 pāṇigrahaṇamantraiś ca hute caiva vibhāvasau 13,002.021b*0019_27 satāṃ madhye niviṣṭāyāḥ kanyāyāḥ śaraṇaṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:179: 13,002.021b*0019_28 sāhaṃ nātmavaśā deva pitaraṃ varayasva me
GE07mbh_13_u:180: 13,002.021b*0019_29 atha nāticirāt kālād rājā duryodhanaḥ kila
GE07mbh_13_u:182: 13,002.021b*0019_31 yajñaṃ yakṣye 'ham iti vai saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu me 13,002.021b*0019_32 tataḥ samāhitas tasya yajño brāhmaṇasattamaiḥ 13,002.021c bhūtvā ca brāhmaṇaḥ sākṣād varayām āsa taṃ nṛpam 13,002.021d*0020_01 viprarūpī hutavaho nṛpaṃ kanyām ayācata 13,002.021d*0021_01 na tu rājā pradānāya tasmai bhāvam akalpayat
GE07mbh_13_u:183: 13,002.022a daridraś cāsavarṇaś ca mamāyam iti pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:184: 13,002.022c na ditsati sutāṃ tasmai tāṃ viprāya sudarśanām
GE07mbh_13_u:185: 13,002.022d*0022_01 iti tasmai na vai kanyāṃ ditsāṃ cakre narādhipaḥ 13,002.023a tato 'sya vitate yajñe naṣṭo 'bhūd dhavyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:186: 13,002.023c tato duryodhano rājā vākyam āhartvijas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:187: 13,002.024a duṣkṛtaṃ mama kiṃ nu syād bhavatāṃ vā dvijarṣabhāḥ 13,002.024c yena nāśaṃ jagāmāgniḥ kṛtaṃ kupuruṣeṣv iva
GE07mbh_13_u:188: 13,002.025a na hy alpaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ no 'sti yenāgnir nāśam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:189: 13,002.025c bhavatāṃ vātha vā mahyaṃ tattvenaitad vimṛśyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:190: 13,002.026a etad rājño vacaḥ śrutvā viprās te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:191: 13,002.026c niyatā vāgyatāś caiva pāvakaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:192: 13,002.027a tān darśayām āsa tadā bhagavān havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:193: 13,002.027b*0023_01 atha dīkṣām upetasya yajñe tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:194: 13,002.027b*0023_02 āhito havanārthāya vedyām agniḥ praṇaśyata 13,002.027b*0023_03 tataḥ sa bhīto nṛpatir bhṛśaṃ pravyathitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:195: 13,002.027b*0023_04 mantriṇo brāhmaṇāṃś caiva papraccha kim idaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:196: 13,002.027b*0023_05 yajñe samiddho bhagavān naṣṭo me havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:197: 13,002.027b*0023_06 saṃmantrakuśalais tais tu brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ 13,002.027b*0023_07 amānuṣo vikāro 'yam iti tair eva bodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:198: 13,002.027b*0023_08 dharmavighnakaraṃ vīra naitat tvayy upapadyate 13,002.027b*0023_09 stūyatāṃ bhagavān vahnir brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ 13,002.027b*0023_10 ṛtvigbhir mantrakuśalair gīyatāṃ vai hutāśanaḥ 13,002.027b*0023_11 atha ṛksāmayajuṣāṃ pāragair vedapāragaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:201: 13,002.027c svaṃ rūpaṃ dīptimat kṛtvā śaradarkasamadyutiḥ 13,002.028a tato mahātmā tān āha dahano brāhmaṇarṣabhān
GE07mbh_13_u:202: 13,002.028c varayāmy ātmano 'rthāya duryodhanasutām iti 13,002.029a tatas te kālyam utthāya tasmai rājñe nyavedayan
GE07mbh_13_u:203: 13,002.029c brāhmaṇā vismitāḥ sarve yad uktaṃ citrabhānunā
GE07mbh_13_u:204: 13,002.030a tataḥ sa rājā tac chrutvā vacanaṃ brahmavādinām
GE07mbh_13_u:205: 13,002.030c avāpya paramaṃ harṣaṃ tatheti prāha buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:206: 13,002.031a prāyācata nṛpaḥ śulkaṃ bhagavantaṃ vibhāvasum 13,002.031c nityaṃ sāṃnidhyam iha te citrabhāno bhaved iti
GE07mbh_13_u:207: 13,002.031e tam āha bhagavān agnir evam astv iti pārthivam 13,002.032a tataḥ sāṃnidhyam adhyāpi māhiṣmatyāṃ vibhāvasoḥ 13,002.032c dṛṣṭaṃ hi sahadevena diśo vijayatā tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:208: 13,002.033a tatas tāṃ samalaṃkṛtya kanyām ahatavāsasam 13,002.033c dadau duryodhano rājā pāvakāya mahātmane 13,002.034a pratijagrāha cāgnis tāṃ rājaputrīṃ sudarśanām 13,002.034c vidhinā vedadṛṣṭena vasor dhārām ivādhvare 13,002.035a tasyā rūpeṇa śīlena kulena vapuṣā śriyā
GE07mbh_13_u:209: 13,002.035c abhavat prītimān agnir garbhaṃ tasyāṃ samādadhe
GE07mbh_13_u:210: 13,002.036a tasyāṃ samabhavat putro nāmnāgneyaḥ sudarśanaḥ 13,002.036b*0024_01 sudarśanas tu rūpeṇa pūrṇendusadṛśopamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:211: 13,002.036c śiśur evādhyagāt sarvaṃ sa ca brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:212: 13,002.037a athaughavān nāma nṛpo nṛgasyāsīt pitāmahaḥ 13,002.037c tasyāpy oghavatī kanyā putraś caugharatho 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:213: 13,002.038a tām oghavān dadau tasmai svayam oghavatīṃ sutām
GE07mbh_13_u:215: 13,002.039a sa gṛhasthāśramaratas tayā saha sudarśanaḥ 13,002.039c kurukṣetre 'vasad rājann oghavatyā samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:216: 13,002.040a gṛhasthaś cāvajeṣyāmi mṛtyum ity eva sa prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:217: 13,002.040c pratijñām akarod dhīmān dīptatejā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:219: 13,002.041c atitheḥ pratikūlaṃ te na kartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:220: 13,002.042a yena yena ca tuṣyeta nityam eva tvayātithiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:221: 13,002.042c apy ātmanaḥ pradānena na te kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:222: 13,002.043a etad vrataṃ mama sadā hṛdi saṃparivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:223: 13,002.043c gṛhasthānāṃ hi suśroṇi nātither vidyate param
GE07mbh_13_u:224: 13,002.044a pramāṇaṃ yadi vāmoru vacas te mama śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:225: 13,002.044c idaṃ vacanam avyagrā hṛdi tvaṃ dhārayeḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:227: 13,002.045c nātithis te 'vamantavyaḥ pramāṇaṃ yady ahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:228: 13,002.046a tam abravīd oghavatī yatā mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:229: 13,002.046c na me tvadvacanāt kiṃ cid akartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana 13,002.047a jigīṣamāṇaṃ tu gṛhe tadā mṛtyuḥ sudarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:231: 13,002.048a idhmārthaṃ tu gate tasminn agniputre sudarśane
GE07mbh_13_u:232: 13,002.048c atithir brāhmaṇaḥ śrīmāṃs tām āhaughavatīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:233: 13,002.049a ātithyaṃ dattam icchāmi tvayādya varavarṇini 13,002.049c pramāṇaṃ yadi dharmas te gṛhasthāśramasaṃmataḥ 13,002.050a ity uktā tena vipreṇa rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:234: 13,002.050c vidhinā pratijagrāha vedoktena viśāṃ pate 13,002.051a āsanaṃ caiva pādyaṃ ca tasmai dattvā dvijātaye
GE07mbh_13_u:235: 13,002.051c provācaughavatī vipraṃ kenārthaḥ kiṃ dadāmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:236: 13,002.052a tām abravīt tato vipro rājaputrīṃ sudarśanām
GE07mbh_13_u:237: 13,002.052c tvayā mamārthaḥ kalyāṇi nirviśaṅke tad ācara
GE07mbh_13_u:238: 13,002.053a yadi pramāṇaṃ dharmas te gṛhasthāśramasaṃmataḥ 13,002.053c pradānenātmano rājñi kartum arhasi me priyam
GE07mbh_13_u:239: 13,002.054a tathā saṃchandyamāno 'nyair īpsitair nṛpakanyayā 13,002.054c nānyam ātmapradānāt sa tasyā vavre varaṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:240: 13,002.055a sā tu rājasutā smṛtvā bhartur vacanam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:241: 13,002.055c tatheti lajjamānā sā tam uvāca dvijarṣabham
GE07mbh_13_u:242: 13,002.056a tato rahaḥ sa viprarṣiḥ sā caivopaviveśa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:244: 13,002.057a athedhmān samupādāya sa pāvakir upāgamat 13,002.057c mṛtyunā raudrabhāvena nityaṃ bandhur ivānvitaḥ 13,002.058a tatas tv āśramam āgamya sa pāvakasutas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:245: 13,002.058c tām ājuhāvaughavatīṃ kvāsi yāteti cāsakṛt 13,002.059a tasmai prativacaḥ sā tu bhartre na pradadau tadā 13,002.059c karābhyāṃ tena vipreṇa spṛṣṭā bhartṛvratā satī
GE07mbh_13_u:246: 13,002.060a ucchiṣṭāsmīti manvānā lajjitā bhartur eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:247: 13,002.060c tūṣṇīṃbhūtābhavat sādhvī na covācātha kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:248: 13,002.061a atha tāṃ punar evedaṃ provāca sa sudarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:249: 13,002.061c kva sā sādhvī kva sā yātā garīyaḥ kim ato mama
GE07mbh_13_u:250: 13,002.062a pativratā satyaśīlā nityaṃ caivārjave ratā 13,002.062c kathaṃ na pratyudety adya smayamānā yathā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:251: 13,002.063a uṭajasthas tu taṃ vipraḥ pratyuvāca sudarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:252: 13,002.063c atithiṃ viddhi saṃprāptaṃ pāvake brāhmaṇaṃ ca mām
GE07mbh_13_u:254: 13,002.064c tais tair atithisatkārair ārjave 'syā dṛḍhaṃ manaḥ 13,002.065a anena vidhinā seyaṃ mām arcati śubhānanā
GE07mbh_13_u:255: 13,002.065c anurūpaṃ yad atrādya tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:256: 13,002.066a kūṭamudgarahastas tu mṛtyus taṃ vai samanvayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:258: 13,002.067a sudarśanas tu manasā karmaṇā cakṣuṣā girā
GE07mbh_13_u:260: 13,002.068a surataṃ te 'stu viprāgrya prītir hi paramā mama 13,002.068c gṛhasthasya hi dharmo 'gryaḥ saṃprāptātithipūjanam
GE07mbh_13_u:261: 13,002.069a atithiḥ pūjito yasya gṛhasthasya tu gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:262: 13,002.069b*0025_01 hīnapratijñam atraikaṃ saṃprāptasya tu gacchati 13,002.069c nānyas tasmāt paro dharma iti prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:263: 13,002.070a prāṇā hi mama dārāś ca yac cānyad vidyate vasu
GE07mbh_13_u:264: 13,002.070c atithibhyo mayā deyam iti me vratam āhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:265: 13,002.071a niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ mayā vākyam etat te samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:266: 13,002.071c tenāhaṃ vipra satyena svayam ātmānam ālabhe
GE07mbh_13_u:267: 13,002.072a pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_13_u:268: 13,002.072c buddhir ātmā manaḥ kālo diśaś caiva guṇā daśa 13,002.073a nityam ete hi paśyanti dehināṃ dehasaṃśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:269: 13,002.073c sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi karma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:270: 13,002.074a yathaiṣā nānṛtā vāṇī mayādya samudāhṛtā 13,002.074c tena satyena māṃ devāḥ pālayantu dahantu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:271: 13,002.075a tato nādaḥ samabhavad dikṣu sarvāsu bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:272: 13,002.075c asakṛt satyam ity eva naitan mithyeti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:273: 13,002.076a uṭajāt tu tatas tasmān niścakrāma sa vai dvijaḥ 13,002.076c vapuṣā khaṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca vyāpya vāyur ivodyataḥ 13,002.077a svareṇa vipraḥ śaikṣeṇa trīṃl lokān anunādayan
GE07mbh_13_u:274: 13,002.077c uvāca cainaṃ dharmajñaṃ pūrvam āmantrya nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:275: 13,002.078a dharmo 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te jijñāsārthaṃ tavānagha 13,002.078c prāptaḥ satyaṃ ca te jñātvā prītir me paramā tvayi
GE07mbh_13_u:276: 13,002.079a vijitaś ca tvayā mṛtyur yo 'yaṃ tvām anugacchati 13,002.079c randhrānveṣī tava sadā tvayā dhṛtyā vaśīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:277: 13,002.080a na cāsti śaktis trailokye kasya cit puruṣottama
GE07mbh_13_u:278: 13,002.080c pativratām imāṃ sādhvīṃ tavodvīkṣitum apy uta
GE07mbh_13_u:279: 13,002.081a rakṣitā tvadguṇair eṣā pativrataguṇais tathā 13,002.081c adhṛṣyā yad iyaṃ brūyāt tathā tan nānyathā bhavet 13,002.082a eṣā hi tapasā svena saṃyuktā brahmavādinī
GE07mbh_13_u:280: 13,002.082c pāvanārthaṃ ca lokasya saricchreṣṭhā bhaviṣyati 13,002.083a ardhenaughavatī nāma tvām ardhenānuyāsyati
GE07mbh_13_u:281: 13,002.083c śarīreṇa mahābhāgā yogo hy asyā vaśe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:282: 13,002.084a anayā saha lokāṃś ca gantāsi tapasārjitān
GE07mbh_13_u:283: 13,002.084c yatra nāvṛttim abhyeti śāśvatāṃs tān sanātanān
GE07mbh_13_u:284: 13,002.085a anena caiva dehena lokāṃs tvam abhipatsyase
GE07mbh_13_u:285: 13,002.085c nirjitaś ca tvayā mṛtyur aiśvaryaṃ ca tavottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:286: 13,002.086a pañca bhūtāny atikrāntaḥ svavīryāc ca manobhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:287: 13,002.086c gṛhasthadharmeṇānena kāmakrodhau ca te jitau 13,002.087a sneho rāgaś ca tandrī ca moho drohaś ca kevalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:288: 13,002.087c tava śuśrūṣayā rājan rājaputryā vinirjitāḥ 13,002.088 bhīṣma uvāca 13,002.088a śuklānāṃ tu sahasreṇa vājināṃ ratham uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:289: 13,002.088c yuktaṃ pragṛhya bhagavān vyavasāyo jagāma tam
GE07mbh_13_u:290: 13,002.089a mṛtyur ātmā ca lokāś ca jitā bhūtāni pañca ca
GE07mbh_13_u:291: 13,002.089c buddhiḥ kālo mano vyoma kāmakrodhau tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:292: 13,002.090a tasmād gṛhāśramasthasya nānyad daivatam asti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:294: 13,002.091a atithiḥ pūjito yasya dhyāyate manasā śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:295: 13,002.091c na tat kratuśatenāpi tulyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:296: 13,002.092a pātraṃ tv atithim āsādya śīlāḍhyaṃ yo na pūjayet 13,002.092c sa dattvā sukṛtaṃ tasya kṣapayeta hy anarcitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:297: 13,002.093a etat te kathitaṃ putra mayākhyānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:298: 13,002.093c yathā hi vijito mṛtyur gṛhasthena purābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:299: 13,002.094a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam idam ākhyānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:300: 13,002.094c bubhūṣatābhimantavyaṃ sarvaduścaritāpaham 13,002.095a ya idaṃ kathayed vidvān ahany ahani bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:301: 13,002.095c sudarśanasya caritaṃ puṇyāṃl lokān avāpnuyāt 13,003.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,003.001a brāhmaṇyaṃ yadi duṣprāpaṃ tribhir varṇair narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:302: 13,003.001c kathaṃ prāptaṃ mahārāja kṣatriyeṇa mahātmanā 13,003.002a viśvāmitreṇa dharmātman brāhmaṇatvaṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:303: 13,003.002c śrotum icchāmi tattvena tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:304: 13,003.003a tena hy amitavīryeṇa vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ 13,003.003c hataṃ putraśataṃ sadyas tapasā prapitāmaha 13,003.004a yātudhānāś ca bahavo rākṣasās tigmatejasaḥ 13,003.004c manyunāviṣṭadehena sṛṣṭāḥ kālāntakopamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:306: 13,003.005c sthāpito naraloke 'smin vidvān brāhmaṇasaṃstutaḥ 13,003.006a ṛcīkasyātmajaś caiva śunaḥśepo mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:311: 13,003.008c putrāḥ pañcaśatāś cāpi śaptāḥ śvapacatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:313: 13,003.009c avākśirā divaṃ nīto dakṣiṇām āśrito diśam
GE07mbh_13_u:317: 13,003.011c rambhā nāmāpsarāḥ śāpād yasya śailatvam āgatā
GE07mbh_13_u:318: 13,003.012a tathaivāsya bhayād baddhvā vasiṣṭhaḥ salile purā
GE07mbh_13_u:319: 13,003.012c ātmānaṃ majjayām āsa vipāśaḥ punar utthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:320: 13,003.013a tadāprabhṛti puṇyā hi vipāśābhūn mahānadī 13,003.013c vikhyātā karmaṇā tena vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ 13,003.014a vāgbhiś ca bhagavān yena devasenāgragaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:321: 13,003.014c stutaḥ prītamanāś cāsīc chāpāc cainam amocayat
GE07mbh_13_u:323: 13,003.015c madhye jvalati yo nityam udīcīm āśrito diśam
GE07mbh_13_u:324: 13,003.016a tasyaitāni ca karmāṇi tathānyāni ca kaurava
GE07mbh_13_u:325: 13,003.016c kṣatriyasyety ato jātam idaṃ kautūhalaṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:326: 13,003.017a kim etad iti tattvena prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:328: 13,003.018a etat tattvena me rājan sarvam ākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:329: 13,003.018c mataṃgasya yathātattvaṃ tathaivaitad bravīhi me 13,003.019a sthāne mataṃgo brāhmaṇyaṃ nālabhad bharatarṣabha 13,003.019c caṇḍālayonau jāto hi kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:330: 13,004.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,004.001a śrūyatāṃ pārtha tattvena viśvāmitro yathā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:331: 13,004.001c brāhmaṇatvaṃ gatas tāta brahmarṣitvaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:333: 13,004.002c babhūva bharataśreṣṭha yajvā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ 13,004.003a tasya putro mahān āsīj jahnur nāma nareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:334: 13,004.003c duhitṛtvam anuprāptā gaṅgā yasya mahātmanaḥ 13,004.004a tasyātmajas tulyaguṇaḥ sindhudvīpo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:335: 13,004.004c sindhudvīpāc ca rājarṣir balākāśvo mahābalaḥ 13,004.005a vallabhas tasya tanayaḥ sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:337: 13,004.006a kuśikasyātmajaḥ śrīmān gādhir nāma janeśvaraḥ 13,004.006c aputraḥ sa mahābāhur vanavāsam udāvasat 13,004.007a kanyā jajñe sutā tasya vane nivasataḥ sataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:338: 13,004.007c nāmnā satyavatī nāma rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi 13,004.008a tāṃ vavre bhārgavaḥ śrīmāṃś cyavanasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:339: 13,004.008c ṛcīka iti vikhyāto vipule tapasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:340: 13,004.009a sa tāṃ na pradadau tasmai ṛcīkāya mahātmane
GE07mbh_13_u:341: 13,004.009c daridra iti matvā vai gādhiḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:342: 13,004.010a pratyākhyāya punar yāntam abravīd rājasattamaḥ 13,004.010c śulkaṃ pradīyatāṃ mahyaṃ tato vetsyasi me sutām
GE07mbh_13_u:343: 13,004.011 ṛcīka uvāca 13,004.011a kiṃ prayacchāmi rājendra tubhyaṃ śulkam ahaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:344: 13,004.011c duhitur brūhy asaṃsakto mātrābhūt te vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:346: 13,004.012c ekataḥ śyāmakarṇānāṃ sahasraṃ dehi bhārgava 13,004.013 bhīṣma uvāca 13,004.013a tataḥ sa bhṛguśārdūlaś cyavanasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥ 13,004.013c abravīd varuṇaṃ devam ādityaṃ patim ambhasām
GE07mbh_13_u:348: 13,004.014c sahasraṃ vātavegānāṃ bhikṣe tvāṃ devasattama 13,004.015a tatheti varuṇo deva ādityo bhṛgusattamam 13,004.015c uvāca yatra te chandas tatrotthāsyanti vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:351: 13,004.017a adūre kanyakubjasya gaṅgāyās tīram uttamam 13,004.017c aśvatīrthaṃ tad adyāpi mānavāḥ paricakṣate 13,004.018a tat tadā gādhaye tāta sahasraṃ vājināṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:352: 13,004.018c ṛcīkaḥ pradadau prītaḥ śulkārthaṃ japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:353: 13,004.019a tataḥ sa vismito rājā gādhiḥ śāpabhayena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:354: 13,004.019c dadau tāṃ samalaṃkṛtya kanyāṃ bhṛgusutāya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:355: 13,004.020a jagrāha pāṇiṃ vidhinā tasya brahmarṣisattamaḥ 13,004.020c sā ca taṃ patim āsādya paraṃ harṣam avāpa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:356: 13,004.021a sa tutoṣa ca viprarṣis tasyā vṛttena bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:357: 13,004.021c chandayām āsa caivaināṃ vareṇa varavarṇinīm 13,004.021d*0025_01 sā ca vavre varaṃ tasmāt putraṃ brahmarṣisattamam
GE07mbh_13_u:358: 13,004.022a mātre tat sarvam ācakhyau sā kanyā rājasattamam
GE07mbh_13_u:359: 13,004.022c atha tām abravīn mātā sutāṃ kiṃ cid avāṅmukhīm 13,004.023a mamāpi putri bhartā te prasādaṃ kartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:360: 13,004.023c apatyasya pradānena samarthaḥ sa mahātapāḥ 13,004.024a tataḥ sā tvaritaṃ gatvā tat sarvaṃ pratyavedayat
GE07mbh_13_u:361: 13,004.024c mātuś cikīrṣitaṃ rājann ṛcīkas tām athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:362: 13,004.025a guṇavantam apatyaṃ vai tvaṃ ca sā janayiṣyathaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:363: 13,004.025c jananyās tava kalyāṇi mā bhūd vai praṇayo 'nyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:364: 13,004.026a tava caiva guṇaślāghī putra utpatsyate śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:365: 13,004.026c asmadvaṃśakaraḥ śrīmāṃs tava bhrātā ca vaṃśakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:366: 13,004.027a ṛtusnātā ca sāśvatthaṃ tvaṃ ca vṛkṣam udumbaram
GE07mbh_13_u:367: 13,004.027c pariṣvajethāḥ kalyāṇi tata iṣṭam avāpsyathaḥ 13,004.028a carudvayam idaṃ caiva mantrapūtaṃ śucismite 13,004.028c tvaṃ ca sā copayuñjīthāṃ tataḥ putrāv avāpsyathaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:368: 13,004.029a tataḥ satyavatī hṛṣṭā mātaraṃ pratyabhāṣata 13,004.029c yad ṛcīkena kathitaṃ tac cācakhyau carudvayam
GE07mbh_13_u:369: 13,004.029d*0026_01 atha mātā sutā cāpi vyatyāsena carudvayam
GE07mbh_13_u:370: 13,004.029d*0026_02 bhuktavatyau mahārāja tato garbham upeṣyataḥ 13,004.029d*0026_03 dṛṣṭvā kadā cit svāṃ bhāryām ṛcīkas tv abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:371: 13,004.030a tām uvāca tato mātā sutāṃ satyavatīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:372: 13,004.030c putri mūrdhnā prapannāyāḥ kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:373: 13,004.031a bhartrā ya eṣa dattas te carur mantrapuraskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:374: 13,004.031c etaṃ prayaccha mahyaṃ tvaṃ madīyaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇa ca 13,004.032a vyatyāsaṃ vṛkṣayoś cāpi karavāva śucismite 13,004.032b*0027_01 vṛkṣayor api vyatyāsaṃ kuryāva varavarṇini 13,004.032c yadi pramāṇaṃ vacanaṃ mama mātur anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:375: 13,004.032d*0028_01 svam apatyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ hi sarva icchaty anāvilam
GE07mbh_13_u:376: 13,004.033a vyaktaṃ bhagavatā cātra kṛtam evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:377: 13,004.033c tato me tvaccarau bhāvaḥ pādape ca sumadhyame
GE07mbh_13_u:378: 13,004.033e kathaṃ viśiṣṭo bhrātā te bhaved ity eva cintaya 13,004.034a tathā ca kṛtavatyau te mātā satyavatī ca sā 13,004.034c atha garbhāv anuprāpte ubhe te vai yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:379: 13,004.035a dṛṣṭvā garbham anuprāptāṃ bhāryāṃ sa ca mahān ṛṣiḥ 13,004.035c uvāca tāṃ satyavatīṃ durmanā bhṛgusattamaḥ 13,004.036a vyatyāsenopayuktas te carur vyaktaṃ bhaviṣyati 13,004.036c vyatyāsaḥ pādape cāpi suvyaktaṃ te kṛtaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:380: 13,004.037a mayā hi viśvaṃ yad brahma tvaccarau saṃniveśitam
GE07mbh_13_u:381: 13,004.037c kṣatravīryaṃ ca sakalaṃ carau tasyā niveśitam
GE07mbh_13_u:383: 13,004.038c sā ca kṣatraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ vai tata etat kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:384: 13,004.039a vyatyāsas tu kṛto yasmāt tvayā mātrā tathaiva ca 13,004.039c tasmāt sā brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ mātā te janayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:385: 13,004.040a kṣatriyaṃ tūgrakarmāṇaṃ tvaṃ bhadre janayiṣyasi 13,004.040c na hi te tat kṛtaṃ sādhu mātṛsnehena bhāmini 13,004.041a sā śrutvā śokasaṃtaptā papāta varavarṇinī 13,004.041c bhūmau satyavatī rājaṃś chinneva rucirā latā
GE07mbh_13_u:386: 13,004.042a pratilabhya ca sā saṃjñāṃ śirasā praṇipatya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:387: 13,004.042c uvāca bhāryā bhartāraṃ gādheyī brāhmaṇarṣabham 13,004.043a prasādayantyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ mayi brahmavidāṃ vara 13,004.043c prasādaṃ kuru viprarṣe na me syāt kṣatriyaḥ sutaḥ 13,004.044a kāmaṃ mamograkarmā vai pautro bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:388: 13,004.044c na tu me syāt suto brahmann eṣa me dīyatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:389: 13,004.045a evam astv iti hovāca svāṃ bhāryāṃ sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:390: 13,004.045c tataḥ sā janayām āsa jamadagniṃ sutaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:391: 13,004.046a viśvāmitraṃ cājanayad gādher bhāryā yaśasvinī 13,004.046c ṛṣeḥ prabhāvād rājendra brahmarṣiṃ brahmavādinam 13,004.047a tato brāhmaṇatāṃ yāto viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ 13,004.047c kṣatriyaḥ so 'py atha tathā brahmavaṃśasya kārakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:393: 13,004.048c tapasvino brahmavido gotrakartāra eva ca 13,004.049a madhucchandaś ca bhagavān devarātaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:394: 13,004.049c akṣīṇaś ca śakuntaś ca babhruḥ kālapathas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:395: 13,004.050a yājñavalkyaś ca vikhyātas tathā sthūṇo mahāvrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:396: 13,004.050c ulūko yamadūtaś ca tatharṣiḥ saindhavāyanaḥ 13,004.051a karṇajaṅghaś ca bhagavān gālavaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:397: 13,004.051c ṛṣir vajras tathākhyātaḥ śālaṅkāyana eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:398: 13,004.052a lālāṭyo nāradaś caiva tathā kūrcamukhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:399: 13,004.052c vādulir musalaś caiva rakṣogrīvas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:400: 13,004.053a aṅghriko naikabhṛc caiva śilāyūpaḥ sitaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:402: 13,004.054a śyāmāyano 'tha gārgyaś ca jābāliḥ suśrutas tathā 13,004.054c kārīṣir atha saṃśrutyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:403: 13,004.055a mahān ṛṣiś ca kapilas tatharṣis tārakāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:406: 13,004.056c sūtir vibhūtiḥ sūtaś ca suraṅgaś ca tathaiva hi 13,004.057a ārāddhir nāmayaś caiva cāmpeyojjayanau tathā 13,004.057c navatantur bakanakhaḥ śayonaratir eva ca 13,004.058a śayoruhaś cārumatsyaḥ śirīṣī cātha gārdabhiḥ 13,004.058c ujjayonir adāpekṣī nāradī ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:407: 13,004.058d*0029_01 ete cānye ca bahavo mahātmāno jitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:409: 13,004.059a tan naiṣa kṣatriyo rājan viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:410: 13,004.059c ṛcīkenāhitaṃ brahma param etad yudhiṣṭhira 13,004.060a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:412: 13,004.061a yatra yatra ca saṃdeho bhūyas te rājasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:413: 13,004.061c tatra tatra ca māṃ brūhi cchettāsmi tava saṃśayān 13,005.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,005.001a ānṛśaṃsasya dharmasya guṇān bhaktajanasya ca 13,005.001c śrotum icchāmi kārtsnyena tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:414: 13,005.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,005.002*0030_01 atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:415: 13,005.002*0030_02 vāsavasya ca saṃvādaṃ śukasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:416: 13,005.002a viṣaye kāśirājasya grāmān niṣkramya lubdhakaḥ 13,005.002c saviṣaṃ kāṇḍam ādāya mṛgayām āsa vai mṛgam
GE07mbh_13_u:418: 13,005.003c avidūre mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāṇaḥ pratisamāhitaḥ 13,005.004a tena durvāritāstreṇa
GE07mbh_13_u:419: 13,005.004c mahān vanatarur viddho mṛgaṃ tatra jighāṃsatā
GE07mbh_13_u:421: 13,005.005c utsṛjya phalapatrāṇi pādapaḥ śoṣam āgataḥ 13,005.006a tasmin vṛkṣe tathābhūte koṭareṣu ciroṣitaḥ 13,005.006c na jahāti śuko vāsaṃ tasya bhaktyā vanaspateḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:422: 13,005.007a niṣpracāro nirāhāro glānaḥ śithilavāg api 13,005.007c kṛtajñaḥ saha vṛkṣeṇa dharmātmā sa vyaśuṣyata
GE07mbh_13_u:425: 13,005.009a tataś cintām upagataḥ śakraḥ katham ayaṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:427: 13,005.010a atha vā nātra citraṃ hīty abhavad vāsavasya tu 13,005.010c prāṇinām iha sarveṣāṃ sarvaṃ sarvatra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:428: 13,005.011a tato brāhmaṇaveṣeṇa mānuṣaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ 13,005.011c avatīrya mahīṃ śakras taṃ pakṣiṇam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:429: 13,005.012a śuka bhoḥ pakṣiṇāṃ śreṣṭha dākṣeyī suprajās tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:430: 13,005.012c pṛcche tvā śuṣkam etaṃ vai kasmān na tyajasi drumam
GE07mbh_13_u:431: 13,005.013a atha pṛṣṭaḥ śukaḥ prāha mūrdhnā samabhivādya tam
GE07mbh_13_u:432: 13,005.013c svāgataṃ devarājāya vijñātas tapasā mayā 13,005.014a tato daśaśatākṣeṇa sādhu sādhv iti bhāṣitam

GE07mbh_13_u:461: 13,006.001c daive puruṣakāre ca kiṃ svic chreṣṭhataraṃ bhavet

GE07mbh_13_u:466: 13,006.004d*0036_01 bījato hy aṅkurotpattir aṅkurāt parṇasaṃbhavaḥ 13,006.004d*0036_02 parṇān nālāḥ prasūyante nālāt skandhaḥ prasūyate

GE07mbh_13_u:469: 13,006.005a nābījaṃ jāyate kiṃ cin na bījena vinā phalam 13,006.005c bījād bījaṃ prabhavati bījād eva phalaṃ smṛtam

GE07mbh_13_u:471: 13,006.006c sukṛte duṣkṛte vāpi tādṛśaṃ labhate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:472: 13,006.007a yathā bījaṃ vinā kṣetram uptaṃ bhavati niṣphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:473: 13,006.007c tathā puruṣakāreṇa vinā daivaṃ na sidhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:474: 13,006.008a kṣetraṃ puruṣakāras tu daivaṃ bījam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:476: 13,006.009a karmaṇaḥ phalanirvṛttiṃ svayam aśnāti kārakaḥ 13,006.009c pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate loke kṛtasyāpy akṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:477: 13,006.010a śubhena karmaṇā saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ pāpena karmaṇā

GE07mbh_13_u:480: 13,006.013a tathā svargaś ca bhogaś ca niṣṭhā yā ca manīṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:482: 13,006.014a jyotīṃṣi tridaśā nāgā yakṣāś candrārkamārutāḥ 13,006.014c sarve puruṣakāreṇa mānuṣyād devatāṃ gatāḥ 13,006.015a artho vā mitravargo vā aiśvaryaṃ vā kulānvitam
GE07mbh_13_u:483: 13,006.015c śrīś cāpi durlabhā bhoktuṃ tathaivākṛtakarmabhiḥ 13,006.016a śaucena labhate vipraḥ kṣatriyo vikrameṇa ca

GE07mbh_13_u:488: 13,006.020a akṛtvā mānuṣaṃ karma yo daivam anuvartate

GE07mbh_13_u:492: 13,006.022a kṛtaḥ puruṣakāras tu daivam evānuvartate 13,006.022c na daivam akṛte kiṃ cit kasya cid dātum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:493: 13,006.023a yadā sthānāny anityāni dṛśyante daivateṣv api

GE07mbh_13_u:500: 13,006.027a ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:502: 13,006.028a kṛtaṃ ca vikṛtaṃ kiṃ cit kṛte karmaṇi sidhyati 13,006.028c sukṛte duṣkṛtaṃ karma na yathārthaṃ prapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:503: 13,006.029a devānāṃ śaraṇaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ puṇyair avāpyate

GE07mbh_13_u:522: 13,006.041c kiṃ te daivabalāc chāpam utsṛjante na karmaṇā

GE07mbh_13_u:527: 13,006.045c*0037_01 puruṣa iha mahātmā prāpnute nityayuktaḥ 13,006.046a bhavati manujalokād devaloko viśiṣṭo; bahutarasusamṛddhyā mānuṣāṇāṃ gṛhāṇi

GE07mbh_13_u:536: 13,007.002c yā gatiḥ prāpyate yena pretyabhāve cirepsitā
GE07mbh_13_u:537: 13,007.003a yena yena śarīreṇa yad yat karma karoti yaḥ 13,007.003c tena tena śarīreṇa tat tat phalam upāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:538: 13,007.004a yasyāṃ yasyām avasthāyāṃ yat karoti śubhāśubham

GE07mbh_13_u:544: 13,007.008a sthaṇḍile śayamānānāṃ gṛhāṇi śayanāni ca 13,007.008c cīravalkalasaṃvīte vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca

GE07mbh_13_u:551: 13,007.013c akṣayās tasya vai lokāḥ sarvakāmagamās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:552: 13,007.014a dhanaṃ labheta dānena maunenājñāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:553: 13,007.014c upabhogāṃś ca tapasā brahmacaryeṇa jīvitam 13,007.015a rūpam aiśvaryam ārogyam ahiṃsāphalam aśnute 13,007.015c phalamūlāśināṃ rājyaṃ svargaḥ parṇāśināṃ tathā 13,007.016a prāyopaveśanād rājyaṃ sarvatra sukham ucyate 13,007.016c svargaṃ satyena labhate dīkṣayā kulam uttamam

GE07mbh_13_u:559: 13,007.020a adhītya sarvavedān vai sadyo duḥkhāt pramucyate

GE07mbh_13_u:561: 13,007.020c mānasaṃ hi caran dharmaṃ svargalokam avāpnuyāt

GE07mbh_13_u:563: 13,007.021a yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:565: 13,007.022a yathā dhenusahasreṣu vatso vindati mātaram 13,007.022c evaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karma kartāram anugacchati 13,007.023a acodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:566: 13,007.023c svakālaṃ nātivartante tathā karma purākṛtam 13,007.024a jīryanti jīryataḥ keśā dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:567: 13,007.024c cakṣuḥśrotre ca jīryete tṛṣṇaikā tu na jīryate
GE07mbh_13_u:568: 13,007.025a yena prīṇāti pitaraṃ tena prītaḥ prajāpatiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:571: 13,007.026a sarve tasyādṛtā dharmā yasyaite traya ādṛtāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:573: 13,007.027 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 13,007.027a bhīṣmasya tad vacaḥ śrutvā vismitāḥ kurupuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:575: 13,007.028a yan mantre bhavati vṛthā prayujyamāne; yat some bhavati
GE07mbh_13_u:577: 13,007.028c yac cāgnau bhavati vṛthābhihūyamāne; tat sarvaṃ bhavati
GE07mbh_13_u:579: 13,007.029a ity etad ṛṣiṇā proktam uktavān asmi yad vibho 13,007.029c śubhāśubhaphalaprāptau kim ataḥ śrotum icchasi 13,008.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,008.001a ke pūjyāḥ ke namaskāryāḥ kān namasyasi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:580: 13,008.001c etan me sarvam ācakṣva yeṣāṃ spṛhayase nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:581: 13,008.001d*0040_01 yathaiva te namaskāryāḥ proktāḥ śakreṇa mānada
GE07mbh_13_u:582: 13,008.001d*0040_02 tathaiva mayi cācakṣva yeṣāṃ spṛhayase nṛpa

GE07mbh_13_u:2161: 13,014.001d*0073_27 yasmāt parataraṃ caiva nānyaṃ paśyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:2162: 13,014.001d*0073_28 vyākhyātuṃ devadevasya śakto nāmāny aśeṣataḥ 13,014.001d*0073_29 eṣa śakto mahābāhur vaktuṃ bhagavato guṇān
GE07mbh_13_u:2163: 13,014.001d*0073_30 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 13,014.001d*0073_30 vibhūtiṃ caiva kārtsnyena satyāṃ māheśvarīṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:2164: 13,014.001d*0073_31 evam uktvā tadā bhīṣmo vāsudevaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2166: 13,014.001d*0074_01 dhyānenātha japaiḥ kāryā svadharmam ucitā sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:2167: 13,014.001d*0074_02 deve nārāyaṇe bhaktaḥ śaṃkaraṃ sādhu pūjaya
GE07mbh_13_u:2168: 13,014.001d*0075_01 vāsudevaṃ mahātmānam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 13,014.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,014.002a surāsuraguro deva viṣṇo tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:2169: 13,014.002c śivāya viśvarūpāya yan māṃ pṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2170: 13,014.003a nāmnāṃ sahasraṃ devasya taṇḍinā brahmayoninā 13,014.003c niveditaṃ brahmaloke brahmaṇo yat purābhavat 13,014.004a dvaipāyanaprabhṛtayas tathaiveme tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2171: 13,014.004c ṛṣayaḥ suvratā dāntāḥ śṛṇvantu gadatas tava
GE07mbh_13_u:2174: 13,014.006 vāsudeva uvāca 13,014.006a na gatiḥ karmaṇāṃ śakyā vettum īśasya tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2176: 13,014.007c na vidur yasya nidhanam ādiṃ vā sūkṣmadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2177: 13,014.007e sa kathaṃ naramātreṇa śakyo jñātuṃ satāṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2178: 13,014.008a tasyāham asuraghnasya kāṃś cid bhagavato guṇān
GE07mbh_13_u:2180: 13,014.009 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 13,014.009a evam uktvā tu bhagavān guṇāṃs tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2181: 13,014.009c upaspṛśya śucir bhūtvā kathayām āsa dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2182: 13,014.010 vāsudeva uvāca 13,014.010a śuśrūṣadhvaṃ brāhmaṇendrās tvaṃ ca tāta yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:2183: 13,014.010c tvaṃ cāpageya nāmāni niśāmaya jagatpateḥ 13,014.011a yad avāptaṃ ca me pūrvaṃ sāmbahetoḥ suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:2184: 13,014.011c yathā ca bhagavān dṛṣṭo mayā pūrvaṃ samādhinā
GE07mbh_13_u:2185: 13,014.012a śambare nihate pūrvaṃ raukmiṇeyena dhīmatā 13,014.012c atīte dvādaśe varṣe jāmbavaty abravīd dhi mām
GE07mbh_13_u:2187: 13,014.013c putrārthinī mām upetya vākyam āha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:2188: 13,014.014a śūraṃ balavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kāntarūpam akalmaṣam 13,014.014c ātmatulyaṃ mama sutaṃ prayacchācyuta māciram 13,014.015a na hi te 'prāpyam astīha triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana 13,014.015c lokān sṛjes tvam aparān icchan yadukulodvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:2189: 13,014.016a tvayā dvādaśa varṣāṇi vāyubhūtena śuṣyatā 13,014.016c ārādhya paśubhartāraṃ rukmiṇyā janitāḥ sutāḥ 13,014.017a cārudeṣṇaḥ sucāruś ca cāruveṣo yaśodharaḥ 13,014.017c cāruśravāś cāruyaśāḥ pradyumnaḥ śaṃbhur eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:2190: 13,014.018a yathā te janitāḥ putrā rukmiṇyāś cāruvikramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2191: 13,014.018c tathā mamāpi tanayaṃ prayaccha balaśālinam 13,014.019a ity evaṃ codito devyā tām avocaṃ sumadhyamām
GE07mbh_13_u:2192: 13,014.019c anujānīhi māṃ rājñi kariṣye vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:2193: 13,014.019e sā ca mām abravīd gaccha vijayāya śivāya ca 13,014.020a brahmā śivaḥ kāśyapaś ca nadyo devā manonugāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2194: 13,014.020c kṣetrauṣadhyo yajñavāhāc chandāṃsy ṛṣigaṇā dharā 13,014.021a samudrā dakṣiṇā stobhā ṛkṣāṇi pitaro grahāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2195: 13,014.021c devapatnyo devakanyā devamātara eva ca 13,014.022a manvantarāṇi gāvaś ca candramāḥ savitā hariḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2196: 13,014.022c sāvitrī brahmavidyā ca ṛtavo vatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2197: 13,014.023a kṣaṇā lavā muhūrtāś ca nimeṣā yugaparyayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2198: 13,014.023c rakṣantu sarvatra gataṃ tvāṃ yādava sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_13_u:2199: 13,014.023e ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānam apramatto bhavānagha 13,014.024a evaṃ kṛtasvastyayanas tayāhaṃ; tām abhyanujñāya kapīndraputrīm
GE07mbh_13_u:2200: 13,014.024c pituḥ samīpe narasattamasya; mātuś ca rājñaś ca tathāhukasya 13,014.025a tam artham āvedya yad abravīn māṃ; vidyādharendrasya sutā bhṛśārtā
GE07mbh_13_u:2201: 13,014.025c tān abhyanujñāya tadātiduḥkhād; gadaṃ tathaivātibalaṃ ca rāmam
GE07mbh_13_u:2204: 13,014.026a prāpyānujñāṃ gurujanād ahaṃ tārkṣyam acintayam 13,014.026c so 'vahad dhimavantaṃ māṃ prāpya cainaṃ vyasarjayam 13,014.026d*0077_01 prāpyānujñāṃ gurumukhād ājamīḍha
GE07mbh_13_u:2208: 13,014.026d*0078_01 tato mayā hy anusṛṣṭaḥ khagendro 13,014.026d*0078_02 vitatya pakṣau divam utpapāta
GE07mbh_13_u:2214: 13,014.026d*0079_02 nivedya mātuś ca pituḥ samīpe 13,014.026d*0079_03 tathābhyanujñāya gurūṃś ca sarvān
GE07mbh_13_u:2216: 13,014.026d*0079_05 so 'haṃ himavataḥ pārśvaṃ prāpya tārkṣyaṃ vyasarjayam 13,014.027a tatrāham adbhutān bhāvān apaśyaṃ girisattame 13,014.027c kṣetraṃ ca tapasāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paśyāmy āśramam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:2218: 13,014.028c pūjitaṃ devagandharvair brāhmyā lakṣmyā samanvitam 13,014.029a dhavakakubhakadambanārikelaiḥ;
GE07mbh_13_u:2220: 13,014.030a badarīkundapunnāgair aśokāmrātimuktakaiḥ 13,014.030c bhallātakair madhūkaiś ca campakaiḥ panasais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:2221: 13,014.031a vanyair bahuvidhair vṛkṣaiḥ phalapuṣpapradair yutam 13,014.031c puṣpagulmalatākīrṇaṃ kadalīṣaṇḍaśobhitam 13,014.032a nānāśakunisaṃbhojyaiḥ phalair vṛkṣair alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:2224: 13,014.032d*0080_02 supuṣpaiś ca latāgulmair nirbhayaiś ca mṛgair yutam
GE07mbh_13_u:2231: 13,014.034a nānāpuṣparajomiśro gajadānādhivāsitaḥ 13,014.034c divyastrīgītabahulo māruto 'tra sukho vavau 13,014.035a dhārāninādair vihagapraṇādaiḥ; śubhais tathā bṛṃhitaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2233: 13,014.035c gītais tathā kiṃnarāṇām udāraiḥ; śubhaiḥ svanaiḥ sāmagānāṃ ca vīra 13,014.036a acintyaṃ manasāpy anyaiḥ sarobhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam 13,014.036c viśālaiś cāgniśaraṇair bhūṣitaṃ kuśasaṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:2234: 13,014.037a vibhūṣitaṃ puṇyapavitratoyayā; sadā ca juṣṭaṃ nṛpa jahnukanyayā 13,014.037c mahātmabhir dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhair; maharṣibhir bhūṣitam agnikalpaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2235: 13,014.038a vāyvāhārair ambupair japyanityaiḥ; saṃprakṣālair yatibhir dhyānanityaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2236: 13,014.038c dhūmāśanair ūṣmapaiḥ kṣīrapaiś ca; vibhūṣitaṃ brāhmaṇendraiḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_13_u:2238: 13,014.039a gocāriṇo 'thāśmakuṭṭā dantolūkhalinas tathā 13,014.039c marīcipāḥ phenapāś ca tathaiva mṛgacāriṇaḥ 13,014.039d*0083_01 aśvatthaphalabhakṣāś ca tathā hy udakaśāyinaḥ 13,014.039d*0083_02 cīracarmāmbaradharās tathā valkaladhāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2239: 13,014.040a suduḥkhān niyamāṃs tāṃs tān vahataḥ sutaponvitān
GE07mbh_13_u:2241: 13,014.041a supūjitaṃ devagaṇair mahātmabhiḥ; śivādibhir bhārata puṇyakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2242: 13,014.041c rarāja tac cāśramamaṇḍalaṃ sadā; divīva rājan ravimaṇḍalaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:2244: 13,014.042a krīḍanti sarpair nakulā mṛgair vyāghrāś ca mitravat
GE07mbh_13_u:2249: 13,014.044c praviśann eva cāpaśyaṃ jaṭācīradharaṃ prabhum 13,014.045a tejasā tapasā caiva dīpyamānaṃ yathānalam 13,014.045c śiṣyamadhyagataṃ śāntaṃ yuvānaṃ brāhmaṇarṣabham
GE07mbh_13_u:2250: 13,014.045e śirasā vandamānaṃ mām upamanyur abhāṣata 13,014.046a svāgataṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa saphalāni tapāṃsi naḥ 13,014.046c yat pūjyaḥ pūjayasi no draṣṭavyo draṣṭum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:2251: 13,014.046d*0084_01 manuṣyatānuvṛttyā tvāṃ jñātvā tiṣṭhāma sarvagam 13,014.047a tam ahaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā mṛgapakṣiṣv athāgniṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:2252: 13,014.047c dharme ca śiṣyavarge ca samapṛccham anāmayam
GE07mbh_13_u:2253: 13,014.048a tato māṃ bhagavān āha sāmnā paramavalgunā
GE07mbh_13_u:2254: 13,014.048c lapsyase tanayaṃ kṛṣṇa ātmatulyam asaṃśayam 13,014.049a tapaḥ sumahad āsthāya toṣayeśānam īśvaram 13,014.049c iha devaḥ sapatnīkaḥ samākrīḍaty adhokṣaja 13,014.050a ihaiva devatāśreṣṭhaṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā 13,014.050c tapasā brahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:2255: 13,014.050e toṣayitvā śubhān kāmān prāpnuvaṃs te janārdana
GE07mbh_13_u:2256: 13,014.051a tejasāṃ tapasāṃ caiva nidhiḥ sa bhagavān iha
GE07mbh_13_u:2257: 13,014.051c śubhāśubhānvitān bhāvān visṛjan saṃkṣipann api 13,014.051e āste devyā sahācintyo yaṃ prārthayasi śatruhan
GE07mbh_13_u:2258: 13,014.052a hiraṇyakaśipur yo 'bhūd dānavo merukampanaḥ 13,014.052c tena sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ śarvāt prāptaṃ samārbudam 13,014.053a tasyaiva putrapravaro mandaro nāma viśrutaḥ 13,014.053c mahādevavarāc chakraṃ varṣārbudam ayodhayat
GE07mbh_13_u:2259: 13,014.054a viṣṇoś cakraṃ ca tad ghoraṃ vajram ākhaṇḍalasya ca 13,014.054c śīrṇaṃ purābhavat tāta grahasyāṅgeṣu keśava 13,014.054d*0085_01 yat tad bhagavatā pūrvaṃ dattaṃ cakraṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:2260: 13,014.054d*0085_02 jalāntaracaraṃ hatvā daityaṃ ca balagarvitam 13,014.054d*0085_03 utpāditaṃ vṛṣāṅkena dīptajvalanasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_13_u:2261: 13,014.054d*0085_04 dattaṃ bhagavatā tubhyaṃ durdarśaṃ tejasādbhutam 13,014.054d*0085_05 na śakyaṃ draṣṭum anyena varjayitvā pinākinam
GE07mbh_13_u:2262: 13,014.054d*0085_06 sudarśanaṃ bhavety evaṃ bhavenoktaṃ tadā tu tat
GE07mbh_13_u:2263: 13,014.054d*0085_07 sudarśanaṃ tadā tasya loke nāma pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:2264: 13,014.054d*0085_08 taj jīrṇam abhavat tāta grahasyāṅgeṣu keśava
GE07mbh_13_u:2266: 13,014.054d*0085_10 na śastrāṇi vahanty aṅge cakravajraśatāny api
GE07mbh_13_u:2267: 13,014.054d*0086_01 sadṛśaṃ bhavatety uktaṃ darśanena tathāstu tat
GE07mbh_13_u:2268: 13,014.055a ardyamānāś ca vibudhā graheṇa subalīyasā 13,014.055c śivadattavarāñ jaghnur asurendrān surā bhṛśam 13,014.056a tuṣṭo vidyutprabhasyāpi trilokeśvaratām adāt
GE07mbh_13_u:2271: 13,014.057a tathā putrasahasrāṇām ayutaṃ ca dadau prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2272: 13,014.057c kuśadvīpaṃ ca sa dadau rājyena bhagavān ajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2273: 13,014.058a tathā śatamukho nāma dhātrā sṛṣṭo mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2275: 13,014.058e taṃ prāha bhagavāṃs tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ karomīti śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2276: 13,014.059a taṃ vai śatamukhaḥ prāha yogo bhavatu me 'dbhutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2277: 13,014.059c balaṃ ca daivataśreṣṭha śāśvataṃ saṃprayaccha me
GE07mbh_13_u:2278: 13,014.059d*0087_01 tatheti bhagavān āha tasya tad vacanaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2279: 13,014.060a svāyaṃbhuvaḥ kratuś cāpi putrārtham abhavat purā
GE07mbh_13_u:2280: 13,014.060c āviśya yogenātmānaṃ trīṇi varṣaśatāny api 13,014.061a tasya devo 'dadat putrān sahasraṃ kratusaṃmitān
GE07mbh_13_u:2281: 13,014.061c yogeśvaraṃ devagītaṃ vettha kṛṣṇa na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2282: 13,014.061d*0088_01 yājñavalkya iti khyāta ṛṣiḥ paramadhārmikaḥ 13,014.061d*0088_02 ārādhya sa mahādevaṃ prāptavāñ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:2283: 13,014.061d*0088_03 vedavyāsaś ca yogātmā parāśarasuto muniḥ 13,014.061d*0088_04 so 'pi śaṃkaram ārādhya prāptavān atulaṃ yaśaḥ 13,014.062a vālakhilyā maghavatā avajñātāḥ purā kila 13,014.062c taiḥ kruddhair bhagavān rudras tapasā toṣito hy abhūt 13,014.063a tāṃś cāpi daivataśreṣṭhaḥ prāha prīto jagatpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2285: 13,014.063d*0089_01 atrer bhāryā sutaṃ dattaṃ somaṃ durvāsasaṃ prabhoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2286: 13,014.064a mahādevasya roṣāc ca āpo naṣṭāḥ purābhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:2287: 13,014.064c tāś ca saptakapālena devair anyāḥ pravartitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2288: 13,014.064d*0090_01 tataḥ pānīyam abhavat prasanne tryambake bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:2289: 13,014.065a atrer bhāryāpi bhartāraṃ saṃtyajya brahmavādinī 13,014.065c nāhaṃ tasya muner bhūyo vaśagā syāṃ kathaṃ cana 13,014.065e ity uktvā sā mahādevam agacchac charaṇaṃ kila
GE07mbh_13_u:2290: 13,014.066a nirāhārā bhayād atres trīṇi varṣaśatāny api
GE07mbh_13_u:2291: 13,014.066c aśeta musaleṣv eva prasādārthaṃ bhavasya sā
GE07mbh_13_u:2292: 13,014.067a tām abravīd dhasan devo bhavitā vai sutas tava 13,014.067b*0091_01 vinā bhartrā carudreṇa bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2293: 13,014.067b*0092_01 vikarṇaś ca mahādevaṃ tathā bhaktasukhāvaham 13,014.067b*0092_02 prasādya bhagavān siddhiṃ prāptavān madhusūdana 13,014.067c vaṃśe tavaiva nāmnā tu khyātiṃ yāsyati cepsitām
GE07mbh_13_u:2294: 13,014.068a śākalyaḥ saṃśitātmā vai nava varṣaśatāny api
GE07mbh_13_u:2295: 13,014.068c ārādhayām āsa bhavaṃ manoyajñena keśava 13,014.069a taṃ cāha bhagavāṃs tuṣṭo granthakāro bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:2296: 13,014.069c vatsākṣayā ca te kīrtis trailokye vai bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:2297: 13,014.069e akṣayaṃ ca kulaṃ te 'stu maharṣibhir alaṃkṛtam 13,014.069f*0093_01 bhaviṣyati dvijaśreṣṭha sūtrakartā sutas tava 13,014.070a sāvarṇiś cāpi vikhyāta ṛṣir āsīt kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_13_u:2298: 13,014.070c iha tena tapas taptaṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣaśatāny atha
GE07mbh_13_u:2299: 13,014.071a tam āha bhagavān rudraḥ sākṣāt tuṣṭo 'smi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:2301: 13,014.071d*0094_01 śakreṇa tu purā devo vārāṇasyāṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_13_u:2303: 13,014.071d*0094_03 ārādhya sa mahādevaṃ devarājyam avāptavān 13,014.071d*0094_04 nāradena tu bhaktyāsau bhava ārādhitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:2304: 13,014.071d*0094_05 tasya prīto mahādevo jagau devagurur guruḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2305: 13,014.071d*0094_06 tejasā tapasā kīrtyā tvatsamo na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:2306: 13,014.071d*0094_07 gītenaiva ca divyena nityaṃ mām anuyāsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:2307: 13,014.071d*0095_01 śākalyo granthakartā ca sāvarṇiś ca tathābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:2308: 13,014.071d*0095_02 bāṇaḥ skandasamatvaṃ ca kāmo darpavimokṣaṇam 13,014.071d*0095_03 lavaṇo 'vadhyatām anyair daśāsyaś ca punar balam 13,014.071d*0095_04 antako 'ntam anuprāptas tasmāt ko 'nyo 'paraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2309: 13,014.072a mayāpi ca yathā dṛṣṭo devadevaḥ purā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:2310: 13,014.072c sākṣāt paśupatis tāta tac cāpi śṛṇu mādhava
GE07mbh_13_u:2311: 13,014.073a yadarthaṃ ca mahādevaḥ prayatena mayā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:2312: 13,014.073c ārādhito mahātejās tac cāpi śṛṇu vistaram
GE07mbh_13_u:2315: 13,014.074a yad avāptaṃ ca me pūrvaṃ devadevān maheśvarāt

GE07mbh_13_u:3273: 13,018.042a anujñāto bhagavatā gṛhaṃ gatvā yudhiṣṭhira 13,018.042c apaśyaṃ pitaraṃ tāta iṣṭiṃ kṛtvā viniḥsṛtam

GE07mbh_13_u:3276: 13,018.044a praṇamantaṃ pariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya pāṇḍava 13,018.044c diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si me putra kṛtavidya ihāgataḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:3296: 13,018.047a ādityacandrāv anilānalau ca; dyaur bhūmir āpo vasavo 'tha
GE07mbh_13_u:3298: 13,018.047c dhātāryamā śukrabṛhaspatī ca; rudrāḥ sasādhyā varuṇo
GE07mbh_13_u:3300: 13,018.048a brahmā śakro māruto brahma satyaṃ; vedā yajñā dakṣiṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:3302: 13,018.048c somo yaṣṭā yac ca havyaṃ haviś ca; rakṣā dīkṣā niyamā ye ca ke
GE07mbh_13_u:3304: 13,018.049a svāhā vaṣaḍ brāhmaṇāḥ saurabheyā; dharmaṃ cakraṃ kālacakraṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:3305: caraṃ ca 13,018.049c yaśo damo buddhimatī sthitiś ca; śubhāśubhaṃ munayaś caiva
GE07mbh_13_u:3307: 13,018.050a agryā buddhir manasā darśane ca; sparśe siddhiḥ karmaṇāṃ yā ca siddhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3308: 13,018.050c gaṇā devānām ūṣmapāḥ somapāś ca; lekhāḥ suyāmās tuṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:3310: 13,018.051a ābhāsvarā gandhapā dṛṣṭipāś ca; vācā viruddhāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:3312: 13,018.051c śuddhāś ca nirvāṇaratāś ca devāḥ; sparśāśanā darśapā ājyapāś
GE07mbh_13_u:3314: 13,018.052a cintāgatā ye ca deveṣu mukhyā; ye cāpy anye devatāś cājamīḍha 13,018.052c suparṇagandharvapiśācadānavā; yakṣās tathā pannagāś cāraṇāś ca 13,018.053a sūkṣmaṃ sthūlaṃ mṛdu yac cāpy asūkṣmaṃ; sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaduḥkhāntaraṃ ca 13,018.053c sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ yat parāṇāṃ paraṃ ca; śarvāj jātaṃ viddhi yat kīrtitaṃ me
GE07mbh_13_u:3315: 13,018.054a tatsaṃbhūtā bhūtakṛto vareṇyāḥ; sarve devā bhuvanasyāsya gopāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3316: 13,018.054c āviśyemāṃ dharaṇīṃ ye 'bhyarakṣan; purātanīṃ tasya devasya
GE07mbh_13_u:3318: 13,018.055a vicinvantaṃ manasā toṣṭuvīmi; kiṃ cit tattvaṃ prāṇahetor nato 'smi
GE07mbh_13_u:3319: 13,018.055c dadātu devaḥ sa varān iheṣṭān; abhiṣṭuto naḥ prabhur avyayaḥ sadā 13,018.056a imaṃ stavaṃ saṃniyamyendriyāṇi; śucir bhūtvā yaḥ puruṣaḥ paṭheta 13,018.056c abhagnayogo niyato 'bdam ekaṃ; sa prāpnuyād aśvamedhe phalaṃ yat 13,018.057a vedān kṛtsnān brāhmaṇaḥ prāpnuyāc ca; jayed rājā pṛthivīṃ cāpi kṛtsnām 13,018.057c vaiśyo lābhaṃ prāpnuyān naipuṇaṃ ca; śūdro gatiṃ pretya tathā sukhaṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:3320: 13,018.058a stavarājam imaṃ kṛtvā rudrāya dadhire manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3321: 13,018.058c sarvadoṣāpahaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca yaśasvinam 13,018.059a yāvanty asya śarīreṣu romakūpāṇi bhārata 13,018.059c tāvad varṣasahasrāṇi svarge vasati mānavaḥ 13,019.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,019.001a yad idaṃ sahadharmeti procyate bharatarṣabha 13,019.001c pāṇigrahaṇakāle tu strīṇām etat kathaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:3322: 13,019.002a ārṣa eṣa bhaved dharmaḥ prājāpatyo 'tha vāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3323: 13,019.002c yad etat sahadharmeti pūrvam uktaṃ maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3324: 13,019.003a saṃdehaḥ sumahān eṣa viruddha iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3325: 13,019.003c iha yaḥ sahadharmo vai pretyāyaṃ vihitaḥ kva nu 13,019.004a svarge mṛtānāṃ bhavati sahadharmaḥ pitāmaha 13,019.004c pūrvam ekas tu mriyate kva caikas tiṣṭhate vada 13,019.005a nānākarmaphalopetā nānākarmanivāsinaḥ 13,019.005c nānānirayaniṣṭhāntā mānuṣā bahavo yadā
GE07mbh_13_u:3326: 13,019.006a anṛtāḥ striya ity evaṃ sūtrakāro vyavasyati
GE07mbh_13_u:3327: 13,019.006c yadānṛtāḥ striyas tāta sahadharmaḥ kutaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3328: 13,019.007a anṛtāḥ striya ity evaṃ vedeṣv api hi paṭhyate 13,019.007c dharmo 'yaṃ paurvikī saṃjñā upacāraḥ kriyāvidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3330: 13,019.008c niḥsaṃdeham idaṃ sarvaṃ pitāmaha yathā śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3331: 13,019.009a yad etad yādṛśaṃ caitad yathā caitat pravartitam
GE07mbh_13_u:3332: 13,019.009c nikhilena mahāprājña bhavān etad bravītu me
GE07mbh_13_u:3333: 13,019.010 bhīṣma uvāca 13,019.010a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:3334: 13,019.010c aṣṭāvakrasya saṃvādaṃ diśayā saha bhārata 13,019.011a niveṣṭukāmas tu purā aṣṭāvakro mahātapāḥ 13,019.011c ṛṣer atha vadānyasya kanyāṃ vavre mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3335: 13,019.012a suprabhāṃ nāma vai nāmnā rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:3337: 13,019.013a sā tasya dṛṣṭvaiva mano jahāra śubhalocanā
GE07mbh_13_u:3338: 13,019.013c vanarājī yathā citrā vasante kusumācitā 13,019.014a ṛṣis tam āha deyā me sutā tubhyaṃ śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_13_u:3339: 13,019.014b*0190_01 ananyastrījanaḥ prājño hy apravāsī priyaṃvadaḥ 13,019.014b*0190_02 surūpaḥ saṃmato vīraḥ śīlavān bhogabhuk śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3341: 13,019.014b*0190_04 sabhṛtyaḥ svajanopeta iha pretya ca modate
GE07mbh_13_u:3342: 13,019.014c gaccha tāvad diśaṃ puṇyām uttarāṃ drakṣyase tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3343: 13,019.015 aṣṭāvakra uvāca 13,019.015a kiṃ draṣṭavyaṃ mayā tatra vaktum arhati me bhavān 13,019.015c tathedānīṃ mayā kāryaṃ yathā vakṣyati māṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:3344: 13,019.016 vadānya uvāca 13,019.016a dhanadaṃ samatikramya himavantaṃ tathaiva ca 13,019.016c rudrasyāyatanaṃ dṛṣṭvā siddhacāraṇasevitam
GE07mbh_13_u:3345: 13,019.017a prahṛṣṭaiḥ pārṣadair juṣṭaṃ nṛtyadbhir vividhānanaiḥ 13,019.017c divyāṅgarāgaiḥ paiśācair vanyair nānāvidhais tathā 13,019.018a pāṇitālasatālaiś ca śamyātālaiḥ samais tathā 13,019.018c saṃprahṛṣṭaiḥ pranṛtyadbhiḥ śarvas tatra niṣevyate 13,019.019a iṣṭaṃ kila girau sthānaṃ tad divyam anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_13_u:3346: 13,019.019c nityaṃ saṃnihito devas tathā pāriṣadāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3347: 13,019.020a tatra devyā tapas taptaṃ śaṃkarārthaṃ suduścaram
GE07mbh_13_u:3348: 13,019.020c atas tad iṣṭaṃ devasya tathomāyā iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3349: 13,019.021a tatra kūpo mahān pārśve devasyottaratas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:3350: 13,019.021c ṛtavaḥ kālarātriś ca ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ 13,019.022a sarve devam upāsante rūpiṇaḥ kila tatra ha
GE07mbh_13_u:3351: 13,019.022c tad atikramya bhavanaṃ tvayā yātavyam eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:3352: 13,019.023a tato nīlaṃ vanoddeśaṃ drakṣyase meghasaṃnibham 13,019.023c ramaṇīyaṃ manogrāhi tatra drakṣyasi vai striyam
GE07mbh_13_u:3353: 13,019.024a tapasvinīṃ mahābhāgāṃ vṛddhāṃ dīkṣām anuṣṭhitām 13,019.024c draṣṭavyā sā tvayā tatra saṃpūjyā caiva yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3354: 13,019.025a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vinivṛttas tvaṃ tataḥ pāṇiṃ grahīṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:3355: 13,019.025c yady eṣa samayaḥ satyaḥ sādhyatāṃ tatra gamyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:3356: 13,020.001 aṣṭāvakra uvāca 13,020.001a tathāstu sādhayiṣyāmi tatra yāsyāmy asaṃśayam 13,020.001c yatra tvaṃ vadase sādho bhavān bhavatu satyavāk
GE07mbh_13_u:3357: 13,020.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,020.002a tato 'gacchat sa bhagavān uttarām uttamāṃ diśam 13,020.002c himavantaṃ giriśreṣṭhaṃ siddhacāraṇasevitam
GE07mbh_13_u:3358: 13,020.003a sa gatvā dvijaśārdūlo himavantaṃ mahāgirim 13,020.003c abhyagacchan nadīṃ puṇyāṃ bāhudāṃ dharmadāyinīm 13,020.004a aśoke vimale tīrthe snātvā tarpya ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3359: 13,020.004c tatra vāsāya śayane kauśye sukham uvāsa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:3360: 13,020.005a tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ prātar utthāya sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3361: 13,020.005c snātvā prāduścakārāgniṃ hutvā caiva vidhānataḥ 13,020.006a rudrāṇīkūpam āsādya hrade tatra samāśvasat 13,020.006c viśrāntaś ca samutthāya kailāsam abhito yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:3363: 13,020.007c mandākinīṃ ca nalinīṃ dhanadasya mahātmanaḥ 13,020.008a atha te rākṣasāḥ sarve ye 'bhirakṣanti padminīm
GE07mbh_13_u:3365: 13,020.009a sa tān pratyarcayām āsa rākṣasān bhīmavikramān
GE07mbh_13_u:3366: 13,020.009c nivedayata māṃ kṣipraṃ dhanadāyeti cābravīt 13,020.010a te rākṣasās tadā rājan bhagavantam athābruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:3367: 13,020.010c asau vaiśravaṇo rājā svayam āyāti te 'ntikam
GE07mbh_13_u:3368: 13,020.011a vidito bhagavān asya kāryam āgamane ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:3369: 13,020.011c paśyainaṃ tvaṃ mahābhāgaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:3370: 13,020.012a tato vaiśravaṇo 'bhyetya aṣṭāvakram aninditam 13,020.012c vidhivat kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā tato brahmarṣim abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:3371: 13,020.013a sukhaṃ prāpto bhavān kaccit kiṃ vā mattaś cikīrṣasi 13,020.013c brūhi sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ vakṣyasi dvija 13,020.014a bhavanaṃ praviśa tvaṃ me yathākāmaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:3372: 13,020.014c satkṛtaḥ kṛtakāryaś ca bhavān yāsyaty avighnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3373: 13,020.015a prāviśad bhavanaṃ svaṃ vai gṛhītvā taṃ dvijottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:3374: 13,020.015c āsanaṃ svaṃ dadau caiva pādyam arghyaṃ tathaiva ca 13,020.016a athopaviṣṭayos tatra maṇibhadrapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3376: 13,020.017a tatas teṣāṃ niṣaṇṇānāṃ dhanado vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:3378: 13,020.018a ātithyaṃ paramaṃ kāryaṃ śuśrūṣā bhavatas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:3379: 13,020.018c saṃvartatām ity uvāca munir madhurayā girā
GE07mbh_13_u:3380: 13,020.019a athorvarā miśrakeśī rambhā caivorvaśī tathā 13,020.019c alambusā ghṛtācī ca citrā citrāṅgadā ruciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3381: 13,020.020a manoharā sukeśī ca sumukhī hāsinī prabhā
GE07mbh_13_u:3382: 13,020.020c vidyutā praśamā dāntā vidyotā ratir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:3383: 13,020.021a etāś cānyāś ca vai bahvyaḥ pranṛttāpsarasaḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3384: 13,020.021c avādayaṃś ca gandharvā vādyāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:3385: 13,020.022a atha pravṛtte gāndharve divye ṛṣir upāvasat
GE07mbh_13_u:3386: 13,020.022c divyaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ tatra raman vai sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3387: 13,020.023a tato vaiśravaṇo rājā bhagavantam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:3388: 13,020.023c sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro yātas tava vipreha paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3389: 13,020.024a hāryo 'yaṃ viṣayo brahman gāndharvo nāma nāmataḥ 13,020.024c chandato vartatāṃ vipra yathā vadati vā bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:3390: 13,020.025a atithiḥ pūjanīyas tvam idaṃ ca bhavato gṛham
GE07mbh_13_u:3391: 13,020.025c sarvam ājñāpyatām āśu paravanto vayaṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_13_u:3392: 13,020.026a atha vaiśravaṇaṃ prīto bhagavān pratyabhāṣata 13,020.026c arcito 'smi yathānyāyaṃ gamiṣyāmi dhaneśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:3393: 13,020.027a prīto 'smi sadṛśaṃ caiva tava sarvaṃ dhanādhipa 13,020.027c tava prasādād bhagavan maharṣeś ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3394: 13,020.027e niyogād adya yāsyāmi vṛddhimān ṛddhimān bhava
GE07mbh_13_u:3395: 13,020.028a atha niṣkramya bhagavān prayayāv uttarāmukhaḥ 13,020.028b*0191_01 kailāse śaṃkarāvāsam abhivīkṣya praṇamya ca 13,020.028b*0191_02 gaurīśaṃ śaṃkaraṃ dāntaṃ śaraṇāgatavatsalam
GE07mbh_13_u:3397: 13,020.028c kailāsaṃ mandaraṃ haimaṃ sarvān anucacāra ha
GE07mbh_13_u:3398: 13,020.029a tān atītya mahāśailān kairātaṃ sthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:3399: 13,020.029c pradakṣiṇaṃ tataś cakre prayataḥ śirasā naman
