GE07mbh_13_u:3537: 13,022.017c nakṣatratithisaṃyoge pātraṃ hi paramaṃ bhavān 13,022.018 bhīṣma uvāca 13,022.018a aṣṭāvakras tathety uktvā pratigṛhya ca tāṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:3538: 13,022.018c kanyāṃ paramadharmātmā prītimāṃś cābhavat tadā 13,022.019a kanyāṃ tāṃ pratigṛhyaiva bhāryāṃ paramaśobhanām 13,022.019c uvāsa muditas tatra āśrame sve gatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3540: 13,022.019d@007_0001 vaiśyayonyāṃ samutpannāḥ śūdrayonyāṃ tathaiva ca 13,022.019d@007_0002 brahmarṣaya iti proktāḥ purāṇā dvijasattamāḥ 13,022.019d@007_0003 katham etan mahārāja tattvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:3542: 13,022.019d@007_0004 viruddham iha paśyāmi viyonau brāhmaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:3543: 13,022.019d@007_0005 alaṃ kautūhalenātra nibodha tvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira 13,022.019d@007_0006 śubhetaraṃ śubhaṃ vāpi na cintayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:3544: 13,022.019d@007_0007 īśanty ātmana ity etad gatiś caiṣāṃ na sajjate 13,022.019d@007_0008 brahmabhūyāṃsa ity eva ṛṣayaḥ śruticoditāḥ 13,022.019d@007_0009 nindyā na caite rājendra pramāṇaṃ hi pramāṇinām
GE07mbh_13_u:3545: 13,022.019d@007_0010 loko 'numanyate caitān pramāṇaṃ hy atra vai tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3547: 13,022.019d@007_0012 pravartitāni kāryāṇi pramāṇāny eva sattama 13,022.019d@007_0013 bhāryāś catasro rājendra brāhmaṇasya svadharmataḥ 13,022.019d@007_0014 brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:3548: 13,022.019d@007_0015 rājñāṃ tu kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:3549: 13,022.019d@007_0016 vaiśyasya vaiśyā vihitā śūdrā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:3550: 13,022.019d@007_0017 śūdrasyaikā smṛtā bhāryā pratilome tu saṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3551: 13,022.019d@007_0018 śūdrāyās tu naraśreṣṭha catvāraḥ patayaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3552: 13,022.019d@007_0019 varṇottamāyās tu patiḥ savarṇas tv eka eva saḥ 13,022.019d@007_0020 dvau kṣatriyāyā vihitau brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:3553: 13,022.019d@007_0021 vaiśyāyās tu naraśreṣṭha vihitāḥ patayas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3554: 13,022.019d@007_0022 savarṇaḥ kṣatriyaś caiva brāhmaṇaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:3555: 13,022.019d@007_0023 evaṃ vidhim anusmṛtya tatas te ṛṣibhiḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:3556: 13,022.019d@007_0024 utpāditā mahātmānaḥ putrā brahmarṣayaḥ purā 13,022.019d@007_0025 purāṇābhyām ṛṣibhyāṃ tu mitreṇa varuṇena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:3558: 13,022.019d@007_0027 kakṣīvān ārṣṭiṣeṇaś ca puruṣaḥ kakṣa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:3559: 13,022.019d@007_0028 māmateyasya vai putrā gautamasyātmajāḥ smṛtāḥ 13,022.019d@007_0029 vatsapriyaś ca bhagavān sthūlaraśmis tathākṣaṇiḥ 13,022.019d@007_0030 gautamasyaiva tanayā ye dāsyāṃ janitā hy uta
GE07mbh_13_u:3561: 13,022.019d@007_0032 vainateyas tathā pakṣī turyāyāṃ ca vasiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3562: 13,022.019d@007_0033 prasādāc ca vasiṣṭhasya śulkābhyupagamena ca 13,022.019d@007_0034 adṛśyantyāḥ pitā vaiśyo nāmnā citramukhaḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:3563: 13,022.019d@007_0035 brāhmaṇatvam anuprāpto brahmarṣitvaṃ ca kaurava 13,022.019d@007_0036 vaiśyaś citramukhaḥ kanyāṃ vasiṣṭhatanayasya vai 13,022.019d@007_0037 śubhāṃ prādād yato jāto brahmarṣis tu parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3564: 13,022.019d@007_0038 tathaiva dāśakanyāyāṃ satyavatyāṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ 13,022.019d@007_0039 parāśarāt prasūtaś ca vyāso yogamayo muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3565: 13,022.019d@007_0040 vibhaṇḍakasya mṛgyāṃ ca tapoyogātmako muniḥ 13,022.019d@007_0041 ṛśyaśṛṅgaḥ samutpanno brahmacārī mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3566: 13,022.019d@007_0042 śāṅgaryāṃ ca mandapālasya catvāro brahmavādinaḥ 13,022.019d@007_0043 jātā brahmarṣayaḥ puṇyā yaiḥ stuto havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3567: 13,022.019d@007_0044 droṇaś ca stambamitraś ca śārisṛkvaś ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:3568: 13,022.019d@007_0045 jaritāriś ca vikhyātāś catvāraḥ sūryasaṃnibhāḥ 13,022.019d@007_0046 maharṣeḥ kālavṛkṣasya śakuntyām eva jajñivān 13,022.019d@007_0047 hiraṇyahasto bhagavān maharṣiḥ kāñcanaprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3569: 13,022.019d@007_0048 pāvakāt tāta saṃbhūtā manasā ca maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3571: 13,022.019d@007_0050 savarṇaś cāpi rājarṣiḥ savarṇāyām ajāyata 13,022.019d@007_0051 mṛṇmayyāṃ bharataśreṣṭha ādityena vivasvatā
GE07mbh_13_u:3572: 13,022.019d@007_0052 śāṇḍilyaś cāgnito jātaḥ kāśyapasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥ 13,022.019d@007_0053 śaradvataḥ śarastambāt kṛpaś ca kṛpayā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:3573: 13,022.019d@007_0054 padmāc ca jajñe rājendra somapasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3574: 13,022.019d@007_0055 reṇuś ca reṇukā caiva rāmamātā yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:3576: 13,022.019d@007_0057 arkadatto mahān ṛṣiḥ prathitaḥ pṛthivītale 13,022.019d@007_0058 agner āhavanīyāc ca drupadasyendravarcasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3577: 13,022.019d@007_0059 dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca saṃbhūto vedyāṃ kṛṣṇā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:3578: 13,022.019d@007_0060 vyāghrayonyāṃ tato jātā vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ 13,022.019d@007_0061 ekonaviṃśatiḥ putrāḥ khyātā vyāghrapadādayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3579: 13,022.019d@007_0062 mandhaś ca bādalomaś ca jābāliś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ 13,022.019d@007_0063 manyuś caivopamanyuś ca setukarṇas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:3580: 13,022.019d@007_0064 ete cānye ca vikhyātāḥ pṛthivyāṃ gotratāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3581: 13,022.019d@007_0065 viśvakāśasya rājarṣer aikṣvākos tu mahātmanaḥ 13,022.019d@007_0066 bālāśvo nāma putro 'bhūc chikhāṃ bhittvā viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3582: 13,022.019d@007_0067 māndhātā caiva rājarṣir yuvanāśvena dhīmatā 13,022.019d@007_0068 svayaṃ dhṛto 'tha garbheṇa divyāstrabalasaṃyutaḥ 13,022.019d@007_0069 gaurikaś cāpi rājarṣiś cakravartī mahāyaśāḥ 13,022.019d@007_0070 bāhudāyāṃ samutpanno nadyāṃ rājñā subāhunā 13,022.019d@007_0071 bhūmeś ca putro narakaḥ saṃvartaś caiva puṣkalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3583: 13,022.019d@007_0072 adbhiś caiva mahātejā ṛṣir gārgyo hy ajāyata
GE07mbh_13_u:3584: 13,022.019d@007_0073 ete cānye ca bahavo rājanyā brāhmaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:3586: 13,022.019d@007_0075 nāsādhyaṃ tapasā teṣāṃ vidyayātmaguṇaiḥ paraiḥ 13,022.019d@007_0076 asminn arthe ca manunā gītaḥ śloko narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:3587: 13,022.019d@007_0077 dharmaṃ praṇayatā rājaṃs taṃ nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:3588: 13,022.019d@007_0078 ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca sādhūnāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:3589: 13,022.019d@007_0079 prabhavo nādhigantavyaḥ strīṇāṃ duścaritasya ca 13,022.019d@007_0080 tan nātra cintā kartavyā maharṣīṇāṃ samudbhave
GE07mbh_13_u:3590: 13,022.019d@007_0081 yathā sarvagato hy agnis tathā tejo mahātmasu
GE07mbh_13_u:3592: 13,022.019d@007A_0001 putraiḥ kathaṃ mahārāja puruṣas tārito bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:3593: 13,022.019d@007A_0002 yāvan na labdhavān putram aphalaḥ puruṣo nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:3596: 13,022.019d@007A_0004 nāradena purā gītaṃ mārkaṇḍeyāya pṛcchate 13,022.019d@007A_0005 parvataṃ nāradaṃ caiva asitaṃ devalaṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_13_u:3597: 13,022.019d@007A_0006 āraṇeyaṃ ca raibhyaṃ ca etān atrāgatān purā
GE07mbh_13_u:3600: 13,022.019d@007A_0009 ṛṣayas tu muniṃ dṛṣṭvā samutthāyonmukhāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3601: 13,022.019d@007A_0010 arcayitvārhato vipraṃ kiṃ kurma iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:3603: 13,022.019d@007A_0011 ayaṃ samāgamaḥ sadbhir yatnenāsādito mayā 13,022.019d@007A_0012 atra prāpsyāmi dharmāṇām ācārasya ca niścayam
GE07mbh_13_u:3604: 13,022.019d@007A_0013 ṛjuḥ kṛtayuge dharmas tasmin kṣīṇe vimuhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:3605: 13,022.019d@007A_0014 yuge yuge maharṣibhyo dharmam icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:3606: 13,022.019d@007A_0015 ṛṣibhir nāradaḥ prokto brūhi yatrāsya saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3607: 13,022.019d@007A_0016 dharmādharmeṣu tattvajña tvaṃ hi cchettāsi saṃśayān
GE07mbh_13_u:3611: 13,022.019d@007A_0020 yatra te saṃśayo brahman samutpannaḥ sa ucyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:3612: 13,022.019d@007A_0021 dharmaṃ lokopakāraṃ vā yac cānyac chrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:3614: 13,022.019d@007A_0022 tad ahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi brūhi tvaṃ sumahātapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3616: 13,022.019d@007A_0024 kathaṃ dharmacchalenāhaṃ prāpnuyām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3617: 13,022.019d@007A_0025 āsīd dharmaḥ purā vipra catuṣpādaḥ kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_13_u:3618: 13,022.019d@007A_0026 tato hy adharmaḥ kālena prasūtaḥ kiṃ cid unnataḥ 13,022.019d@007A_0027 tatas tretāyugaṃ nāma pravṛttaṃ dharmadūṣaṇam 13,022.019d@007A_0028 tasmin vyatīte saṃprāptaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dvāparaṃ yugam
GE07mbh_13_u:3619: 13,022.019d@007A_0029 tadā dharmasya dvau pādāv adharmo nāśayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:3620: 13,022.019d@007A_0030 dvāpare tu parikṣīṇe nandike samupasthite 13,022.019d@007A_0031 lokavṛttaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca ucyamānaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:3621: 13,022.019d@007A_0032 caturthaṃ nandikaṃ nāma dharmapādāv aśeṣataḥ 13,022.019d@007A_0033 tataḥprabhṛti jāyante kṣīṇaprajñāyuṣo narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3624: 13,022.019d@007A_0035 evaṃ vilulite dharme loke cādharmasaṃyute 13,022.019d@007A_0036 nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3626: 13,022.019d@007A_0037 mantrapūtaṃ sadā havyaṃ kavyaṃ caiva na naśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:3627: 13,022.019d@007A_0038 pratigṛhṇanti tad devā dātur nyāyāt prayacchataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3628: 13,022.019d@007A_0039 sattvayuktaṃ ca dātā ca sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:3630: 13,022.019d@007A_0040 avāptakāmaḥ svarge ca mahīyeta yathepsitam 13,022.019d@007A_0041 catvāro hy atha ye varṇā havyakavyaṃ pradāsyate
GE07mbh_13_u:3632: 13,022.019d@007A_0042 mantrahīnam apanyāyaṃ teṣāṃ dattaṃ kva gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:3633: 13,022.019d@007A_0043 asurān gacchate dattaṃ viprai rakṣāṃsi kṣatriyaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3635: 13,022.019d@007A_0044 vaiśyaiḥ pretāni vai dattaṃ śūdrair bhūtāni gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:3638: 13,022.019d@007A_0046 dāsyanti havyakavyāni teṣāṃ dattaṃ kva gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:3640: 13,022.019d@007A_0048 naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratigṛhṇanti tat svayam
GE07mbh_13_u:3641: 13,022.019d@007A_0049 yātudhānāḥ piśācāś ca bhūtā ye cāpi nairṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3642: 13,022.019d@007A_0050 teṣāṃ sā vihitā vṛttiḥ pitṛdaivatanirgatā 13,022.019d@007A_0051 teṣāṃ sarvapradātṝṇāṃ havyakavyaṃ samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3644: 13,022.019d@007A_0052 yat prayacchanti vidhivat tad vai bhuñjanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3645: 13,022.019d@007A_0053 śrutaṃ varṇāvare dattaṃ havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca nārada
GE07mbh_13_u:3647: 13,022.019d@007A_0054 saṃprayoge ca putrāṇāṃ kanyānāṃ ca bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:3648: 13,022.019d@007A_0055 kanyāpradānaṃ putrāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ saṃyogam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:3649: 13,022.019d@007A_0056 ānupūrvyān mayā samyag ucyamānaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:3650: 13,022.019d@007A_0057 jātamātrā tu dātavyā kanyakā sadṛśe vare
GE07mbh_13_u:3651: 13,022.019d@007A_0058 kāladattāsu kanyāsu pitā dharmeṇa yujyate 13,022.019d@007A_0059 yas tu puṣpavatīṃ kanyāṃ bāndhavo na prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:3652: 13,022.019d@007A_0060 māsi māsi gate bandhus tasyā bhrauṇaghnyam āpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:3653: 13,022.019d@007A_0061 yas tu kanyāṃ gṛhe rundhyād grāmyair bhogair vivarjitām 13,022.019d@007A_0062 avadhyātaḥ sa kanyāyā bandhuḥ prāpnoti bhrūṇahām
GE07mbh_13_u:3654: 13,022.019d@007A_0063 dūṣitā pāṇimātreṇa mṛte bhartari dārikā 13,022.019d@007A_0064 saṃskāraṃ labhate nārī dvitīye sā punaḥ patau
GE07mbh_13_u:3655: 13,022.019d@007A_0065 punar bhūr nāma sā kanyā saputrā havyakavyadā
GE07mbh_13_u:3657: 13,022.019d@007A_0066 adūṣyā sā prasūtīṣu prajānāṃ dārakarmaṇi 13,022.019d@007A_0067 yā tu kanyā prasūyeta garbhiṇī yā tu vā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:3658: 13,022.019d@007A_0068 atha dārakriyāṃ bhūyaḥ sā bhajed ṛṣisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:3661: 13,022.019d@007A_0070 tasmāt kurvanti vai bhāvaṃ kumāryas tā na kanyakāḥ 13,022.019d@007A_0071 brahmahatyātribhāgena garbhādhānaviśodhitām 13,022.019d@007A_0072 mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3662: 13,022.019d@007A_0072 gṛhṇīyāt tāṃ caturbhāgaṃ viśuddhāṃ sarjanāt punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3663: 13,022.019d@007A_0073 kathaṃ kanyāsu ye jātā bandhūnāṃ dūṣitāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:3665: 13,022.019d@007A_0075 kanyāyās tu pituḥ putrāḥ kānīnā havyakavyadāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3667: 13,022.019d@007A_0076 antarvatnyās tu yaḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīyāt sa sahoḍhajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3668: 13,022.019d@007A_0077 atha yenāhito garbhaḥ kanyāyāṃ tatra nārada
GE07mbh_13_u:3670: 13,022.019d@007A_0078 kathaṃ putraphalaṃ tasya bhaved etat pracakṣva me
GE07mbh_13_u:3671: 13,022.019d@007A_0079 dharmācāreṣu te nityaṃ dūṣakāḥ kṛtaśodhanāḥ 13,022.019d@007A_0080 bījaṃ ca naśyate teṣāṃ moghaceṣṭā bhavanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:3673: 13,022.019d@007A_0081 atha kā cid bhavet kanyā krītā dattā hṛtāpi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:3675: 13,022.019d@007A_0082 kathaṃ putrakṛtaṃ tasyās tad bhaved ṛṣisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:3676: 13,022.019d@007A_0083 krītā dattā hṛtā caiva yā kanyā pāṇivarjitā
GE07mbh_13_u:3677: 13,022.019d@007A_0084 kaumārī nāma sā bhāryā prasaved aurasān sutān
GE07mbh_13_u:3679: 13,022.019d@007A_0085 na patyarthe śubhā proktā tatkarmaṇy aparājite
GE07mbh_13_u:3682: 13,022.019d@007A_0087 etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ tattveneha mahāmune 13,022.019d@007A_0088 nityaṃ nivasate lakṣmīḥ kanyakāsu pratiṣṭhitā 13,022.019d@007A_0089 śobhanā śubhayogyā ca pūjyā maṅgalakarmasu 13,022.019d@007A_0090 ākarasthaṃ yathā ratnaṃ sarvakāmaphalopagam
GE07mbh_13_u:3683: 13,022.019d@007A_0091 tathā kanyā mahālakṣmīḥ sarvalokasya maṅgalam 13,022.019d@007A_0092 evaṃ kanyā parā lakṣmī ratis toṣaś ca dehinām 13,022.019d@007A_0093 mahākulānāṃ cāritraṃ vṛttena nikaṣopalam
GE07mbh_13_u:3684: 13,022.019d@007A_0094 ānayitvā svakād varṇāt kanyakāṃ yo bhajen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3685: 13,022.019d@007A_0095 dātāraṃ havyakavyānāṃ putrakaṃ sā prasūyate 13,022.019d@007A_0096 sādhvī kulaṃ vardhayati sādhvī puṣṭir gṛhe parā
GE07mbh_13_u:3687: 13,022.019d@007A_0097 sādhvī lakṣmī ratiḥ sākṣāt pratiṣṭhā saṃtatis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:3688: 13,022.019d@007A_0098 śrutaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vṛttaṃ kanyakānāṃ mahāmate 13,022.019d@007A_0099 icchāmi yoṣitāṃ śrotuṃ dharmādharmaṃ parigrahe 13,022.019d@007A_0099 nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3689: 13,022.019d@007A_0100 aṣṭau bhāryāgamā dharmyā narāṇāṃ dārakarmaṇi 13,022.019d@007A_0101 pretyeha ca hitā yās tu saputrā havyakavyadāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3690: 13,022.019d@007A_0102 sādhvī pāṇigṛhītā yā kaumārī pāṇivarjitā 13,022.019d@007A_0103 bhrātṛbhāryā svabhāryeti prasūyet putram aurasam 13,022.019d@007A_0103 mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:3691: 13,022.019d@007A_0104 trayo bhāryāgamā jñātā yatra dharmo na naśyati

GE07mbh_13_u:4780: 13,034.021c brāhmaṇān sevamānasya rajaḥ sarvaṃ praṇaśyati 13,034.022a ato bhūtir ataḥ kīrtir ato buddhiḥ prajāyate

GE07mbh_13_u:4791: 13,035.002a sarvān naḥ suhṛdas tāta brāhmaṇāḥ sumanomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:4792: 13,035.002b*0280_01 sarvān ete haniṣyanti brāhmaṇā jātamanyavaḥ 13,035.002c gīrbhir maṅgalayuktābhir anudhyāyanti pūjitāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:4828: 13,036.002a śakro hy ajñātarūpeṇa jaṭī bhūtvā rajoruṇaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:4832: 13,036.005c abhyarcyān anupṛcchāmi pādau gṛhṇāmi dhīmatām 13,036.006a te viśrabdhāḥ prabhāṣante saṃyacchanti ca māṃ sadā

GE07mbh_13_u:4837: 13,036.008c samādhim ātmano nityam anulomam acintayan 13,036.009a so 'haṃ vāgagrasṛṣṭānāṃ rasānām avalehakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:4839: 13,036.010a etat pṛthivyām amṛtam etac cakṣur anuttamam

GE07mbh_13_u:4846: 13,036.013 soma uvāca 13,036.013a brāhmaṇās tapasā sarve sidhyante vāgbalāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:4847: 13,036.013c bhujavīryā hi rājāno vāgastrāś ca dvijātayaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:4860: 13,037.001c dūrād abhyāgataṃ vāpi kiṃ pātraṃ syāt pitāmaha

GE07mbh_13_u:4865: 13,037.006c sarve pūjyāś ca mānyāś ca śrutavṛttopasaṃhitāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:4885: 13,037.016c anurundhyād bahujñāṃś ca sārajñāṃś caiva paṇḍitān

GE07mbh_13_u:4893: 13,038.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,038.001a strīṇāṃ svabhāvam icchāmi śrotuṃ bharatasattama 13,038.001c striyo hi mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ laghucittāḥ pitāmaha

GE07mbh_13_u:4909: 13,038.011a kulīnā rūpavatyaś ca nāthavatyaś ca yoṣitaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:4934: 13,038.026c dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ hṛdyaṃ yoniḥ praklidyate striyaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:4937: 13,038.027a kāmānām api dātāraṃ kartāraṃ mānasāntvayoḥ 13,038.027c rakṣitāraṃ na mṛṣyanti bhartāraṃ paramaṃ striyaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:4944: 13,039.001c mohena param āviṣṭā daivādiṣṭena pārthiva 13,039.001e striyaś ca puruṣeṣv eva pratyakṣaṃ lokasākṣikam

GE07mbh_13_u:4951: 13,039.006a hasantaṃ prahasanty etā rudantaṃ prarudanti ca

GE07mbh_13_u:4954: 13,039.008b*0290_01 doṣāspade 'śucau deśe hy āsāṃ raktās tv aho narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:4955: 13,039.008c iti yās tāḥ kathaṃ vīra saṃrakṣyāḥ puruṣair iha 13,039.009a strīṇāṃ buddhyupaniṣkarṣād arthaśāstrāṇi śatruhan
GE07mbh_13_u:4956: 13,039.009c bṛhaspatiprabhṛtibhir manye sadbhiḥ kṛtāni vai 13,039.010a saṃpūjyamānāḥ puruṣair vikurvanti mano nṛṣu 13,039.010c apāstāś ca tathā rājan vikurvanti manaḥ striyaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:4959: 13,039.011c tan me brūhi mahābāho kurūṇāṃ vaṃśavardhana

GE07mbh_13_u:4962: 13,040.001c yathā bravīṣi kauravya nārīṃ prati janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:4963: 13,040.002a atra te vartayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam 13,040.002c yathā rakṣā kṛtā pūrvaṃ vipulena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:4964: 13,040.003a pramadāś ca yathā sṛṣṭā brahmaṇā bharatarṣabha

GE07mbh_13_u:4971: 13,040.007a teṣām antargataṃ jñātvā devānāṃ sa pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:4973: 13,040.008a pūrvasarge tu kaunteya sādhvyo nārya ihābhavan

GE07mbh_13_u:4976: 13,040.009c tāḥ kāmalubdhāḥ pramadāḥ prāmathnanta narāṃs tadā

GE07mbh_13_u:4981: 13,040.011a na ca strīṇāṃ kriyā kā cid iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:4983: 13,040.012c durvāgbhāvaṃ ratiṃ caiva dadau strībhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:4984: 13,040.013a na tāsāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ kartuṃ śakyaṃ puṃsā kathaṃ cana 13,040.013c api viśvakṛtā tāta kutas tu puruṣair iha
GE07mbh_13_u:4985: 13,040.014a vācā vā vadhabandhair vā kleśair vā vividhais tathā 13,040.014c na śakyā rakṣituṃ nāryas tā hi nityam asaṃyatāḥ 13,040.015a idaṃ tu puruṣavyāghra purastāc chrutavān aham
GE07mbh_13_u:4986: 13,040.015c yathā rakṣā kṛtā pūrvaṃ vipulena gurustriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:4987: 13,040.015d*0293_01 tan nibodha mahārāja kathayāmi samāsataḥ 13,040.016a ṛṣir āsīn mahābhāgo devaśarmeti viśrutaḥ 13,040.016c tasya bhāryā rucir nāma rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:4989: 13,040.017c viśeṣatas tu rājendra vṛtrahā pākaśāsanaḥ 13,040.018a nārīṇāṃ caritajñaś ca devaśarmā mahāmuniḥ 13,040.018c yathāśakti yathotsāhaṃ bhāryāṃ tām abhyarakṣata 13,040.019a puraṃdaraṃ ca jānīte parastrīkāmacāriṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:4990: 13,040.019c tasmād yatnena bhāryāyā rakṣaṇaṃ sa cakāra ha
GE07mbh_13_u:4991: 13,040.020a sa kadā cid ṛṣis tāta yajñaṃ kartumanās tadā 13,040.020c bhāryāsaṃrakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ syād ity acintayat
GE07mbh_13_u:4992: 13,040.021a rakṣāvidhānaṃ manasā sa vicintya mahātapāḥ 13,040.021c āhūya dayitaṃ śiṣyaṃ vipulaṃ prāha bhārgavam
GE07mbh_13_u:4993: 13,040.022a yajñakāro gamiṣyāmi ruciṃ cemāṃ sureśvaraḥ 13,040.022c putra prārthayate nityaṃ tāṃ rakṣasva yathābalam
GE07mbh_13_u:4994: 13,040.023a apramattena te bhāvyaṃ sadā prati puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_13_u:4995: 13,040.023c sa hi rūpāṇi kurute vividhāni bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:4996: 13,040.024a ity ukto vipulas tena tapasvī niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:4998: 13,040.025a dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca tatheti pratyabhāṣata 13,040.025c punaś cedaṃ mahārāja papraccha prathitaṃ gurum
GE07mbh_13_u:4999: 13,040.026a kāni rūpāṇi śakrasya bhavanty āgacchato mune
GE07mbh_13_u:5000: 13,040.026c vapus tejaś ca kīdṛg vai tan me vyākhyātum arhasi

GE07mbh_13_u:5002: 13,040.027c ācacakṣe yathātattvaṃ māyāṃ śakrasya bhārata 13,040.028a bahumāyaḥ sa viprarṣe balahā pākaśāsanaḥ 13,040.028c tāṃs tān vikurute bhāvān bahūn atha muhur muhuḥ 13,040.029a kirīṭī vajrabhṛd dhanvī mukuṭī baddhakuṇḍalaḥ 13,040.029c bhavaty atha muhūrtena caṇḍālasamadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5003: 13,040.030a śikhī jaṭī cīravāsāḥ punar bhavati putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:5004: 13,040.030c bṛhaccharīraś ca punaḥ pīvaro 'tha punaḥ kṛśaḥ 13,040.031a gauraṃ śyāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca varṇaṃ vikurute punaḥ 13,040.031c virūpo rūpavāṃś caiva yuvā vṛddhas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5005: 13,040.032a prājño jaḍaś ca mūkaś ca hrasvo dīrghas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5006: 13,040.032c brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaś caiva vaiśyaḥ śūdras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5007: 13,040.032e pratilomānulomaś ca bhavaty atha śatakratuḥ 13,040.033a śukavāyasarūpī ca haṃsakokilarūpavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5008: 13,040.033c siṃhavyāghragajānāṃ ca rūpaṃ dhārayate punaḥ 13,040.034a daivaṃ daityam atho rājñāṃ vapur dhārayate 'pi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5009: 13,040.034c sukṛśo vāyubhagnāṅgaḥ śakunir vikṛtas tathā 13,040.035a catuṣpād bahurūpaś ca punar bhavati bāliśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5011: 13,040.036a na śakyam asya grahaṇaṃ kartuṃ vipula kena cit 13,040.036c api viśvakṛtā tāta yena sṛṣṭam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:5012: 13,040.037a punar antarhitaḥ śakro dṛśyate jñānacakṣuṣā 13,040.037c vāyubhūtaś ca sa punar devarājo bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:5013: 13,040.038a evaṃ rūpāṇi satataṃ kurute pākaśāsanaḥ 13,040.038c tasmād vipula yatnena rakṣemāṃ tanumadhyamām 13,040.038d*0294_01 sā tvayā satataṃ rakṣyā ity uktvā prayayau muniḥ 13,040.039a yathā ruciṃ nāvalihed devendro bhṛgusattama 13,040.039c kratāv upahitaṃ nyastaṃ haviḥ śveva durātmavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5014: 13,040.040a evam ākhyāya sa munir yajñakāro 'gamat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5016: 13,040.041a vipulas tu vacaḥ śrutvā guroś cintāparo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:5017: 13,040.041c rakṣāṃ ca paramāṃ cakre devarājān mahābalāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5018: 13,040.042a kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gurudārābhirakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:5019: 13,040.042c māyāvī hi surendro 'sau durdharṣaś cāpi vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5021: 13,040.043c uṭajaṃ vā tathā hy asya nānāvidhasarūpatā
GE07mbh_13_u:5022: 13,040.044a vāyurūpeṇa vā śakro gurupatnīṃ pradharṣayet 13,040.044c tasmād imāṃ saṃpraviśya ruciṃ sthāsye 'ham adya vai 13,040.045a atha vā pauruṣeṇeyam aśakyā rakṣituṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:5023: 13,040.045c bahurūpo hi bhagavāñ chrūyate harivāhanaḥ 13,040.046a so 'haṃ yogabalād enāṃ rakṣiṣye pākaśāsanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5025: 13,040.047a yady ucchiṣṭām imāṃ patnīṃ ruciṃ paśyeta me guruḥ 13,040.047c śapsyaty asaṃśayaṃ kopād divyajñāno mahātapāḥ 13,040.048a na ceyaṃ rakṣituṃ śakyā yathānyā pramadā nṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5026: 13,040.048c māyāvī hi surendro 'sāv aho prāpto 'smi saṃśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:5027: 13,040.049a avaśyakaraṇīyaṃ hi guror iha hi śāsanam
GE07mbh_13_u:5028: 13,040.049c yadi tv etad ahaṃ kuryām āścaryaṃ syāt kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:5030: 13,040.050c nirmuktasya rajorūpān nāparādho bhaven mama 13,040.050d*0295_01 mana eva manuṣyāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bandhamokṣayoḥ 13,040.050d*0295_02 anyathāliṅgyate kāntā duhitāliṅgyate 'nyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5031: 13,040.050d*0295_03 garbhasaṃstho yathā putro jāyamāno na lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5032: 13,040.050d*0295_04 evaṃ jñānī na laukyaiś ca karmabhir naiva duṣyate 13,040.051a yathā hi śūnyāṃ pathikaḥ sabhām adhyāvaset pathi
GE07mbh_13_u:5034: 13,040.052a asaktaḥ padmapatrastho jalabindur yathā calaḥ 13,040.052c evam eva śarīre 'syā nivatsyāmi samāhitaḥ 13,040.053a ity evaṃ dharmam ālokya vedavedāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5035: 13,040.053c tapaś ca vipulaṃ dṛṣṭvā guror ātmana eva ca 13,040.054a iti niścitya manasā rakṣāṃ prati sa bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5036: 13,040.054c ātiṣṭhat paramaṃ yatnaṃ yathā tac chṛṇu pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:5037: 13,040.055a gurupatnīm upāsīno vipulaḥ sa mahātapāḥ 13,040.055c upāsīnām anindyāṅgīṃ kathābhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5038: 13,040.055d*0296_01 vipulo 'tha ruciṃ tasmin yogāt tāṃ praviveśa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5039: 13,040.055d*0296_02 rakṣituṃ gurupatnīṃ sa bahurūpāc chatakratoḥ 13,040.056a netrābhyāṃ netrayor asyā raśmīn saṃyojya raśmibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5040: 13,040.056c viveśa vipulaḥ kāyam ākāśaṃ pavano yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5041: 13,040.057a lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇenaiva vadanaṃ vadanena ca 13,040.057c aviceṣṭann atiṣṭhad vai chāyevāntargato muniḥ 13,040.058a tato viṣṭabhya vipulo gurupatnyāḥ kalevaram 13,040.058c uvāsa rakṣaṇe yukto na ca sā tam abudhyata 13,040.059a yaṃ kālaṃ nāgato rājan gurus tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5042: 13,040.059c kratuṃ samāpya svagṛhaṃ taṃ kālaṃ so 'bhyarakṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:5043: 13,041.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,041.001a tataḥ kadā cid devendro divyarūpavapurdharaḥ 13,041.001c idam antaram ity evaṃ tato 'bhyāgād athāśramam
GE07mbh_13_u:5044: 13,041.002a rūpam apratimaṃ kṛtvā lobhanīyaṃ janādhipa 13,041.002c darśanīyatamo bhūtvā praviveśa tam āśramam 13,041.003a sa dadarśa tam āsīnaṃ vipulasya kalevaram
GE07mbh_13_u:5047: 13,041.004c padmapatraviśālākṣīṃ saṃpūrṇendunibhānanām 13,041.005a sā tam ālokya sahasā pratyutthātum iyeṣa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5048: 13,041.005c rūpeṇa vismitā ko 'sīty atha vaktum ihecchatī
GE07mbh_13_u:5049: 13,041.006a utthātukāmāpi satī vyatiṣṭhad vipulena sā 13,041.006c nigṛhītā manuṣyendra na śaśāka viceṣṭitum 13,041.007a tām ābabhāṣe devendraḥ sāmnā paramavalgunā 13,041.007c tvadartham āgataṃ viddhi devendraṃ māṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_13_u:5051: 13,041.008c tat paryāpnuhi māṃ subhru purā kālo 'tivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:5052: 13,041.009a tam evaṃvādinaṃ śakraṃ śuśrāva vipulo muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5053: 13,041.009c gurupatnyāḥ śarīrastho dadarśa ca surādhipam 13,041.010a na śaśāka ca sā rājan pratyutthātum aninditā
GE07mbh_13_u:5054: 13,041.010c vaktuṃ ca nāśakad rājan viṣṭabdhā vipulena sā
GE07mbh_13_u:5055: 13,041.011a ākāraṃ gurupatnyās tu vijñāya sa bhṛgūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5056: 13,041.011c nijagrāha mahātejā yogena balavat prabho 13,041.011e babandha yogabandhaiś ca tasyāḥ sarvendriyāṇi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5057: 13,041.012a tāṃ nirvikārāṃ dṛṣṭvā tu punar eva śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5058: 13,041.012c uvāca vrīḍito rājaṃs tāṃ yogabalamohitām 13,041.013a ehy ehīti tataḥ sā taṃ prativaktum iyeṣa ca 13,041.013c sa tāṃ vācaṃ guroḥ patnyā vipulaḥ paryavartayat
GE07mbh_13_u:5059: 13,041.014a bhoḥ kim āgamane kṛtyam iti tasyāś ca niḥsṛtā 13,041.014c vaktrāc chaśāṅkapratimād vāṇī saṃskārabhūṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:5060: 13,041.015a vrīḍitā sā tu tad vākyam uktvā paravaśā tadā 13,041.015c puraṃdaraś ca saṃtrasto babhūva vimanās tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5061: 13,041.016a sa tad vaikṛtam ālakṣya devarājo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:5062: 13,041.016c avaikṣata sahasrākṣas tadā divyena cakṣuṣā 13,041.017a dadarśa ca muniṃ tasyāḥ śarīrāntaragocaram 13,041.017c pratibimbam ivādarśe gurupatnyāḥ śarīragam
GE07mbh_13_u:5063: 13,041.018a sa taṃ ghoreṇa tapasā yuktaṃ dṛṣṭvā puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5064: 13,041.018c prāvepata susaṃtrastaḥ śāpabhītas tadā vibho 13,041.019a vimucya gurupatnīṃ tu vipulaḥ sumahātapāḥ 13,041.019c svaṃ kalevaram āviśya śakraṃ bhītam athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5066: 13,041.020c na ciraṃ pūjayiṣyanti devās tvāṃ mānuṣās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5067: 13,041.021a kiṃ nu tad vismṛtaṃ śakra na tan manasi te sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:5069: 13,041.022a jāne tvāṃ bāliśamatim akṛtātmānam asthiram 13,041.022c mayeyaṃ rakṣyate mūḍha gaccha pāpa yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:5070: 13,041.023a nāhaṃ tvām adya mūḍhātman daheyaṃ hi svatejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:5071: 13,041.023c kṛpāyamāṇas tu na te dagdhum icchāmi vāsava
GE07mbh_13_u:5072: 13,041.024a sa ca ghoratapā dhīmān gurur me pāpacetasam
GE07mbh_13_u:5073: 13,041.024c dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ nirdahed adya krodhadīptena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:5074: 13,041.025a naivaṃ tu śakra kartavyaṃ punar mānyāś ca te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5076: 13,041.026a amaro 'smīti yad buddhim etām āsthāya vartase 13,041.026c māvamaṃsthā na tapasām asādhyaṃ nāma kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5077: 13,041.027a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ śakro vipulasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5079: 13,041.028a muhūrtayāte śakre tu devaśarmā mahātapāḥ 13,041.028c kṛtvā yajñaṃ yathākāmam ājagāma svam āśramam
GE07mbh_13_u:5081: 13,041.029c rakṣitāṃ gurave bhāryāṃ nyavedayad aninditām 13,041.030a abhivādya ca śāntātmā sa guruṃ guruvatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5083: 13,041.031a viśrāntāya tatas tasmai sahāsīnāya bhāryayā 13,041.031c nivedayām āsa tadā vipulaḥ śakrakarma tat
GE07mbh_13_u:5084: 13,041.032a tac chrutvā sa munis tuṣṭo vipulasya pratāpavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5085: 13,041.032c babhūva śīlavṛttābhyāṃ tapasā niyamena ca 13,041.033a vipulasya gurau vṛttiṃ bhaktim ātmani ca prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5086: 13,041.033c dharme ca sthiratāṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhv ity uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5087: 13,041.034a pratinandya ca dharmātmā śiṣyaṃ dharmaparāyaṇam 13,041.034c vareṇa cchandayām āsa sa tasmād guruvatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5088: 13,041.034c*0297_01 devaśarmā mahāmatiḥ 13,041.034c*0297_02 sthitiṃ ca dharme jagrāha
GE07mbh_13_u:5089: 13,041.034e anujñātaś ca guruṇā cacārānuttamaṃ tapaḥ 13,041.035a tathaiva devaśarmāpi sabhāryaḥ sa mahātapāḥ 13,041.035c nirbhayo balavṛtraghnāc cacāra vijane vane 13,042.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,042.001a vipulas tv akarot tīvraṃ tapaḥ kṛtvā guror vacaḥ 13,042.001c tapoyuktam athātmānam amanyata ca vīryavān 13,042.002a sa tena karmaṇā spardhan pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:5090: 13,042.002c cacāra gatabhīḥ prīto labdhakīrtir varo nṛṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:5091: 13,042.003a ubhau lokau jitau cāpi tathaivāmanyata prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5092: 13,042.003c karmaṇā tena kauravya tapasā vipulena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5093: 13,042.004a atha kāle vyatikrānte kasmiṃś cit kurunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:5094: 13,042.004c rucyā bhaginyā dānaṃ vai babhūva dhanadhānyavat
GE07mbh_13_u:5095: 13,042.005a etasminn eva kāle tu divyā kā cid varāṅganā 13,042.005c bibhratī paramaṃ rūpaṃ jagāmātha vihāyasā 13,042.006a tasyāḥ śarīrāt puṣpāṇi patitāni mahītale 13,042.006c tasyāśramasyāvidūre divyagandhāni bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5096: 13,042.007a tāny agṛhṇāt tato rājan rucir nalinalocanā
GE07mbh_13_u:5097: 13,042.007c tadā nimantrakas tasyā aṅgebhyaḥ kṣipram āgamat
GE07mbh_13_u:5098: 13,042.008a tasyā hi bhaginī tāta jyeṣṭhā nāmnā prabhāvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:5100: 13,042.009a pinahya tāni puṣpāṇi keśeṣu varavarṇinī 13,042.009c āmantritā tato 'gacchad rucir aṅgapater gṛhān
GE07mbh_13_u:5102: 13,042.010c bhaginīṃ codayām āsa puṣpārthe cārulocanā 13,042.011a sā bhartre sarvam ācaṣṭa ruciḥ surucirānanā
GE07mbh_13_u:5103: 13,042.011c bhaginyā bhāṣitaṃ sarvam ṛṣis tac cābhyanandata
GE07mbh_13_u:5104: 13,042.012a tato vipulam ānāyya devaśarmā mahātapāḥ 13,042.012c puṣpārthe codayām āsa gaccha gaccheti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5105: 13,042.012d*0298_01 gaccha gaccheti puṣpārtham āśramaṃ me 'tha bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5106: 13,042.013a vipulas tu guror vākyam avicārya mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5107: 13,042.013c sa tathety abravīd rājaṃs taṃ ca deśaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5108: 13,042.014a yasmin deśe tu tāny āsan patitāni nabhastalāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5109: 13,042.014c amlānāny api tatrāsan kusumāny aparāṇy api
GE07mbh_13_u:5110: 13,042.015a tataḥ sa tāni jagrāha divyāni rucirāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5111: 13,042.015c prāptāni svena tapasā divyagandhāni bhārata 13,042.016a saṃprāpya tāni prītātmā guror vacanakārakaḥ 13,042.016c tato jagāma tūrṇaṃ ca campāṃ campakamālinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:5112: 13,042.017a sa vane vijane tāta dadarśa mithunaṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:5113: 13,042.017c cakravat parivartantaṃ gṛhītvā pāṇinā karam 13,042.018a tatraikas tūrṇam agamat tatpade parivartayan 13,042.018c ekas tu na tathā rājaṃś cakratuḥ kalahaṃ tataḥ 13,042.019a tvaṃ śīghraṃ gacchasīty eko 'bravīn neti tathāparaḥ 13,042.019c neti neti ca tau tāta parasparam athocatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5114: 13,042.020a tayor vispardhator evaṃ śapatho 'yam abhūt tadā 13,042.020c manasoddiśya vipulaṃ tato vākyam athocatuḥ 13,042.021a āvayor anṛtaṃ prāha yas tasyātha dvijasya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:5115: 13,042.021c vipulasya pare loke yā gatiḥ sā bhaved iti 13,042.022a etac chrutvā tu vipulo viṣaṇṇavadano 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:5116: 13,042.022c evaṃ tīvratapāś cāhaṃ kaṣṭaś cāyaṃ parigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5117: 13,042.023a mithunasyāsya kiṃ me syāt kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yato gatiḥ 13,042.023c aniṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ kīrtitānena me 'dya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:5118: 13,042.024a evaṃ saṃcintayann eva vipulo rājasattama 13,042.024c avāṅmukho nyastaśirā dadhyau duṣkṛtam ātmanaḥ 13,042.025a tataḥ ṣaḍ anyān puruṣān akṣaiḥ kāñcanarājataiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5119: 13,042.025c apaśyad dīvyamānān vai lobhaharṣānvitāṃs tathā 13,042.026a kurvataḥ śapathaṃ taṃ vai yaḥ kṛto mithunena vai 13,042.026c vipulaṃ vai samuddiśya te 'pi vākyam athābruvan 13,042.027a yo lobham āsthāyāsmākaṃ viṣamaṃ kartum utsahet
GE07mbh_13_u:5120: 13,042.027c vipulasya pare loke yā gatis tām avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5121: 13,042.028a etac chrutvā tu vipulo nāpaśyad dharmasaṃkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:5123: 13,042.029a sa pradadhyau tadā rājann agnāv agnir ivāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5124: 13,042.029c dahyamānena manasā śāpaṃ śrutvā tathāvidham 13,042.030a tasya cintayatas tāta bahvyo dinaniśā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5125: 13,042.030c idam āsīn manasi ca rucyā rakṣaṇakāritam
GE07mbh_13_u:5126: 13,042.031a lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇenaiva vadanaṃ vadanena ca 13,042.031c vidhāya na mayā coktaṃ satyam etad guros tadā 13,042.032a etad ātmani kauravya duṣkṛtaṃ vipulas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5127: 13,042.032c amanyata mahābhāga tathā tac ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5128: 13,042.033a sa campāṃ nagarīm etya puṣpāṇi gurave dadau
GE07mbh_13_u:5129: 13,042.033c pūjayām āsa ca guruṃ vidhivat sa gurupriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5130: 13,043.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,043.001a tam āgatam abhiprekṣya śiṣyaṃ vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5131: 13,043.001c devaśarmā mahātejā yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:5133: 13,043.002a kiṃ te vipula dṛṣṭaṃ vai tasminn adya mahāvane 13,043.002c te tvā jānanti nipuṇa ātmā ca rucir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5134: 13,043.003 vipula uvāca 13,043.003a brahmarṣe mithunaṃ kiṃ tat ke ca te puruṣā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:5135: 13,043.003c ye māṃ jānanti tattvena tāṃś ca me vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:5137: 13,043.004a yad vai tan mithunaṃ brahmann ahorātraṃ hi viddhi tat
GE07mbh_13_u:5138: 13,043.004c cakravat parivarteta tat te jānāti duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:5139: 13,043.005a ye ca te puruṣā vipra akṣair dīvyanti hṛṣṭavat 13,043.005c ṛtūṃs tān abhijānīhi te te jānanti duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:5140: 13,043.006a na māṃ kaś cid vijānīta iti kṛtvā na viśvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:5141: 13,043.006c naro rahasi pāpātmā pāpakaṃ karma vai dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:5142: 13,043.007a kurvāṇaṃ hi naraṃ karma pāpaṃ rahasi sarvadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5143: 13,043.007c paśyanti ṛtavaś cāpi tathā dinaniśe 'py uta
GE07mbh_13_u:5144: 13,043.007d*0299_01 tathaiva hi bhaveyus te lokāḥ pāpakṛto yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5145: 13,043.007d*0299_02 kṛtvā nācakṣataḥ karma mama tac ca tvayā kṛtam 13,043.008a te tvāṃ harṣasmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā guroḥ karmānivedakam
GE07mbh_13_u:5146: 13,043.008c smārayantas tathā prāhus te yathā śrutavān bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5147: 13,043.009a ahorātraṃ vijānāti ṛtavaś cāpi nityaśaḥ 13,043.009c puruṣe pāpakaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā śubhakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5148: 13,043.010a tat tvayā mama yat karma vyabhicārād bhayātmakam
GE07mbh_13_u:5149: 13,043.010b*0300_01 tat tvayā vai tathā kāryam abhicārabhayātmakam
GE07mbh_13_u:5150: 13,043.010c nākhyātam iti jānantas te tvām āhus tathā dvija 13,043.011a te caiva hi bhaveyus te lokāḥ pāpakṛto yathā 13,043.011c kṛtvā nācakṣataḥ karma mama yac ca tvayā kṛtam 13,043.012a tathā śakyā ca durvṛttā rakṣituṃ pramadā dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:5151: 13,043.012c na ca tvaṃ kṛtavān kiṃ cid āgaḥ prīto 'smi tena te 13,043.012d*0301_01 manodoṣavihīnānāṃ na doṣaḥ syāt tathā tava
GE07mbh_13_u:5153: 13,043.012d*0301_03 yateś ca kāmukānāṃ ca yoṣidrūpe 'nyathā matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5154: 13,043.012d*0301_04 aśikṣayaiva manasaḥ prāyo lokas tu vañcyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5155: 13,043.012d*0301_05 lolety udvijate loko vaktrāsava iti spṛhā
GE07mbh_13_u:5157: 13,043.012d*0301_07 na rāgasnehalobhāndhaṃ karmiṇāṃ tan mahāphalam 13,043.012d*0301_08 niṣkaṣāyo viśuddhas tvaṃ rucyāveśān na dūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5158: 13,043.013a yadi tv ahaṃ tvā durvṛttam adrākṣaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:5159: 13,043.013c śapeyaṃ tvām ahaṃ krodhān na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:5160: 13,043.014a sajjanti puruṣe nāryaḥ puṃsāṃ so 'rthaś ca puṣkalaḥ 13,043.014c anyathā rakṣataḥ śāpo 'bhaviṣyat te gatiś ca sā
GE07mbh_13_u:5161: 13,043.015a rakṣitā sā tvayā putra mama cāpi niveditā
GE07mbh_13_u:5162: 13,043.015c ahaṃ te prītimāṃs tāta svasti svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:5163: 13,043.016 bhīṣma uvāca 13,043.016a ity uktvā vipulaṃ prīto devaśarmā mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5164: 13,043.016c mumoda svargam āsthāya sahabhāryaḥ saśiṣyakaḥ 13,043.017a idam ākhyātavāṃś cāpi mamākhyānaṃ mahāmuniḥ 13,043.017c mārkaṇḍeyaḥ purā rājan gaṅgākūle kathāntare 13,043.018a tasmād bravīmi pārtha tvā striyaḥ sarvāḥ sadaiva ca 13,043.018c ubhayaṃ dṛśyate tāsu satataṃ sādhv asādhu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5165: 13,043.019a striyaḥ sādhvyo mahābhāgāḥ saṃmatā lokamātaraḥ 13,043.019c dhārayanti mahīṃ rājann imāṃ savanakānanām 13,043.020a asādhvyaś cāpi durvṛttāḥ kulaghnyaḥ pāpaniścayāḥ 13,043.020c vijñeyā lakṣaṇair duṣṭaiḥ svagātrasahajair nṛpa 13,043.021a evam etāsu rakṣā vai śakyā kartuṃ mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5166: 13,043.021c anyathā rājaśārdūla na śakyā rakṣituṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5167: 13,043.022a etā hi manujavyāghra tīkṣṇās tīkṣṇaparākramāḥ 13,043.022c nāsām asti priyo nāma maithune saṃgame nṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5168: 13,043.023a etāḥ kṛtyāś ca kāryāś ca kṛtāś ca bharatarṣabha 13,043.023c na caikasmin ramanty etāḥ puruṣe pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:5169: 13,043.024a nāsu sneho nṛbhiḥ kāryas tathaiverṣyā janeśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:5170: 13,043.024c khedam āsthāya bhuñjīta dharmam āsthāya caiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:5174: 13,043.025c sarvathā rājaśārdūla yuktiḥ sarvatra pūjyate 13,043.026a tenaikena tu rakṣā vai vipulena kṛtā striyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5175: 13,043.026c nānyaḥ śakto nṛloke 'smin rakṣituṃ nṛpa yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5176: 13,044.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,044.001a yan mūlaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prajanasya gṛhasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5177: 13,044.001c pitṛdevātithīnāṃ ca tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:5178: 13,044.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,044.002a ayaṃ hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmaś cintyatamo mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5179: 13,044.002c kīdṛśāya pradeyā syāt kanyeti vasudhādhipa 13,044.003a śīlavṛtte samājñāya vidyāṃ yoniṃ ca karma ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5180: 13,044.003c adbhir eva pradātavyā kanyā guṇavate vare
GE07mbh_13_u:5181: 13,044.003e brāhmaṇānāṃ satām eṣa dharmo nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5182: 13,044.004a āvāhyam āvahed evaṃ yo dadyād anukūlataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5183: 13,044.004c śiṣṭānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5184: 13,044.005a ātmābhipretam utsṛjya kanyābhipreta eva yaḥ 13,044.005c abhipretā ca yā yasya tasmai deyā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5185: 13,044.005e gāndharvam iti taṃ dharmaṃ prāhur dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5186: 13,044.006a dhanena bahunā krītvā saṃpralobhya ca bāndhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5187: 13,044.006c asurāṇāṃ nṛpaitaṃ vai dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5188: 13,044.007a hatvā chittvā ca śīrṣāṇi rudatāṃ rudatīṃ gṛhāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5189: 13,044.007c prasahya haraṇaṃ tāta rākṣasaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam 13,044.007d*0304_01 suptāṃ mattāṃ pramattāṃ vā raho yatropagacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:5191: 13,044.008a pañcānāṃ tu trayo dharmyā dvāv adharmyau yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5192: 13,044.008c paiśāca āsuraś caiva na kartavyau kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5193: 13,044.009a brāhmaḥ kṣātro 'tha gāndharva ete dharmyā nararṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:5194: 13,044.009c pṛthag vā yadi vā miśrāḥ kartavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ 13,044.010a tisro bhāryā brāhmaṇasya dve bhārye kṣatriyasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:5195: 13,044.010c vaiśyaḥ svajātiṃ vindeta tāsv apatyaṃ samaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5196: 13,044.011a brāhmaṇī tu bhavej jyeṣṭhā kṣatriyā kṣatriyasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:5197: 13,044.011c ratyartham api śūdrā syān nety āhur apare janāḥ 13,044.012a apatyajanma śūdrāyāṃ na praśaṃsanti sādhavaḥ 13,044.012c śūdrāyāṃ janayan vipraḥ prāyaścittī vidhīyate 13,044.012d*0305_01 nātibālāṃ vahanty anye anityatvāt prajārthinaḥ 13,044.012d*0305_02 vahanti karmiṇas tasyām antaḥśuddhivyapekṣayā
GE07mbh_13_u:5198: 13,044.012d*0305_03 aparānvayasaṃbhūtāṃ saṃsvapnādivivarjitām 13,044.012d*0305_04 kāmo yasyāṃ niṣiddhaś ca ke cid icchanti cāpadi 13,044.013a triṃśadvarṣo daśavarṣāṃ bhāryāṃ vindeta nagnikām 13,044.013c ekaviṃśativarṣo vā saptavarṣām avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5199: 13,044.014a yasyās tu na bhaved bhrātā pitā vā bharatarṣabha 13,044.014c nopayaccheta tāṃ jātu putrikādharmiṇī hi sā
GE07mbh_13_u:5200: 13,044.015a trīṇi varṣāṇy udīkṣeta kanyā ṛtumatī satī
GE07mbh_13_u:5201: 13,044.015c caturthe tv atha saṃprāpte svayaṃ bhartāram arjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:5202: 13,044.016a prajano hīyate tasyā ratiś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:5204: 13,044.017a asapiṇḍā ca yā mātur asagotrā ca yā pituḥ 13,044.017c ity etām anugaccheta taṃ dharmaṃ manur abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5205: 13,044.017d*0306_01 sā praśastā dvijātīnāṃ dārakarmaṇi maithune 13,044.018 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,044.018a śulkam anyena dattaṃ syād dadānīty āha cāparaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5206: 13,044.018c balād anyaḥ prabhāṣeta dhanam anyaḥ pradarśayet
GE07mbh_13_u:5207: 13,044.019a pāṇigrahītā tv anyaḥ syāt kasya kanyā pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:5208: 13,044.019c tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ cakṣur bhavatu no bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5209: 13,044.020 bhīṣma uvāca 13,044.020a yat kiṃ cit karma mānuṣyaṃ saṃsthānāya prakṛṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5210: 13,044.020c mantravan mantritaṃ tasya mṛṣāvādas tu pātakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5212: 13,044.021c mṛṣokte daṇḍam arhanti nety āhur apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5213: 13,044.022a na hy akāmena saṃvādaṃ manur evaṃ praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_13_u:5214: 13,044.022c ayaśasyam adharmyaṃ ca yan mṛṣā dharmakopanam
GE07mbh_13_u:5215: 13,044.023a naikāntadoṣa ekasmiṃs tad dānaṃ nopalabhyate 13,044.023c dharmato yāṃ prayacchanti yāṃ ca krīṇanti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5217: 13,044.024c tathā sidhyanti te mantrā nādattāyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5218: 13,044.025a yas tv atra mantrasamayo bhāryāpatyor mithaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5219: 13,044.025c tam evāhur garīyāṃsaṃ yaś cāsau jñātibhiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5220: 13,044.026a devadattāṃ patir bhāryāṃ vetti dharmasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5221: 13,044.026c sā daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ vācam anṛtāṃ paryudasyati
GE07mbh_13_u:5222: 13,044.027 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,044.027a kanyāyāṃ prāptaśulkāyāṃ jyāyāṃś ced āvrajed varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5223: 13,044.027c dharmakāmārthasaṃpanno vācyam atrānṛtaṃ na vā 13,044.028a tasminn ubhayato doṣe kurvañ chreyaḥ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:5224: 13,044.028c ayaṃ naḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmaś cintyatamo mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5225: 13,044.029a tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ cakṣur bhavatu no bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5226: 13,044.029c tad etat sarvam ācakṣva na hi tṛpyāmi kathyatām 13,044.030 bhīṣma uvāca 13,044.030a na vai niṣṭhākaraṃ śulkaṃ jñātvāsīt tena nāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:5227: 13,044.030c na hi śulkaparāḥ santaḥ kanyāṃ dadati karhi cit 13,044.031a anyair guṇair upetaṃ tu śulkaṃ yācanti bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5228: 13,044.031c alaṃkṛtvā vahasveti yo dadyād anukūlataḥ 13,044.032a tac ca tāṃ ca dadāty eva na śulkaṃ vikrayo na saḥ 13,044.032c pratigṛhya bhaved deyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5229: 13,044.033a dāsyāmi bhavate kanyām iti pūrvaṃ nabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:5230: 13,044.033c ye caivāhur ye ca nāhur ye cāvaśyaṃ vadanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:5231: 13,044.034a tasmād ā grahaṇāt pāṇer yācayanti parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:5232: 13,044.034c kanyāvaraḥ purā datto marudbhir iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:5233: 13,044.035a nāniṣṭāya pradātavyā kanyā ity ṛṣicoditam 13,044.035c tan mūlaṃ kāmamūlasya prajanasyeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5234: 13,044.036a samīkṣya ca bahūn doṣān saṃvāsād vidviṣāṇayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5235: 13,044.036c yathā niṣṭhākaraṃ śulkaṃ na jātv āsīt tathā śṛṇu 13,044.037a ahaṃ vicitravīryāya dve kanye samudāvaham 13,044.037c jitvā ca māgadhān sarvān kāśīn atha ca kosalān 13,044.037e gṛhītapāṇir ekāsīt prāptaśulkāparābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:5236: 13,044.038a pāṇau gṛhītā tatraiva visṛjyā iti me pitā
GE07mbh_13_u:5237: 13,044.038c abravīd itarāṃ kanyām āvahat sa tu kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5238: 13,044.039a apy anyām anupapraccha śaṅkamānaḥ pitur vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5239: 13,044.039c atīva hy asya dharmepsā pitur me 'bhyadhikābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:5240: 13,044.040a tato 'ham abruvaṃ rājann ācārepsur idaṃ vacaḥ 13,044.040c ācāraṃ tattvato vettum icchāmīti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5241: 13,044.041a tato mayaivam ukte tu vākye dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5242: 13,044.041c pitā mama mahārāja bāhlīko vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5243: 13,044.042a yadi vaḥ śulkato niṣṭhā na pāṇigrahaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5244: 13,044.042c lājāntaram upāsīta prāptaśulkā patiṃ vṛtam 13,044.043a na hi dharmavidaḥ prāhuḥ pramāṇaṃ vākyataḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:5245: 13,044.043c yeṣāṃ vai śulkato niṣṭhā na pāṇigrahaṇāt tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5246: 13,044.044a prasiddhaṃ bhāṣitaṃ dāne teṣāṃ pratyasanaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5247: 13,044.044c ye manyante krayaṃ śulkaṃ na te dharmavido janāḥ 13,044.045a na caitebhyaḥ pradātavyā na voḍhavyā tathāvidhā
GE07mbh_13_u:5248: 13,044.045c na hy eva bhāryā kretavyā na vikreyā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5249: 13,044.046a ye ca krīṇanti dāsīvad ye ca vikrīṇate janāḥ 13,044.046c bhavet teṣāṃ tathā niṣṭhā lubdhānāṃ pāpacetasām
GE07mbh_13_u:5250: 13,044.047a asmin dharme satyavantaṃ paryapṛcchanta vai janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5251: 13,044.047c kanyāyāḥ prāptaśulkāyāḥ śulkadaḥ praśamaṃ gataḥ 13,044.048a pāṇigrahītā cānyaḥ syād atra no dharmasaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5252: 13,044.048c tan naś chindhi mahāprājña tvaṃ hi vai prājñasaṃmataḥ 13,044.048e tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ cakṣur bhavatu no bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5253: 13,044.049a tān evaṃ bruvataḥ sarvān satyavān vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5254: 13,044.049c yatreṣṭaṃ tatra deyā syān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:5255: 13,044.049e kurvate jīvato 'py evaṃ mṛte naivāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5256: 13,044.050a devaraṃ praviśet kanyā tapyed vāpi mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5257: 13,044.050c tam evānuvratā bhūtvā pāṇigrāhasya nāma sā
GE07mbh_13_u:5258: 13,044.051a likhanty eva tu keṣāṃ cid apareṣāṃ śanair api 13,044.051c iti ye saṃvadanty atra ta etaṃ niścayaṃ viduḥ 13,044.052a tat pāṇigrahaṇāt pūrvam uttaraṃ yatra vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:5259: 13,044.052c sarvamaṅgalamantraṃ vai mṛṣāvādas tu pātakaḥ 13,044.053a pāṇigrahaṇamantrāṇāṃ niṣṭhā syāt saptame pade 13,044.053c pāṇigrāhasya bhāryā syād yasya cādbhiḥ pradīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5260: 13,044.054a anukūlām anuvaṃśāṃ bhrātrā dattām upāgnikām 13,044.054c parikramya yathānyāyaṃ bhāryāṃ vinded dvijottamaḥ 13,045.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,045.001a kanyāyāḥ prāptaśulkāyāḥ patiś cen nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5261: 13,045.001c tatra kā pratipattiḥ syāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha 13,045.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,045.002a yāputrakasyāpy arikthasya pratipat sā tadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5262: 13,045.003a atha cet sāharec chulkaṃ krītā śulkapradasya sā
GE07mbh_13_u:5264: 13,045.004a na tasyā mantravat kāryaṃ kaś cit kurvīta kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5265: 13,045.005a svayaṃ vṛteti sāvitrī pitrā vai pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_13_u:5266: 13,045.005c tat tasyānye praśaṃsanti dharmajñā netare janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5267: 13,045.006a etat tu nāpare cakrur na pare jātu sādhavaḥ 13,045.006c sādhūnāṃ punar ācāro garīyo dharmalakṣaṇam 13,045.007a asminn eva prakaraṇe sukratur vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5269: 13,045.008a asadācarite mārge kathaṃ syād anukīrtanam 13,045.008c anupraśnaḥ saṃśayo vā satām etad upālabhet
GE07mbh_13_u:5270: 13,045.009a asad eva hi dharmasya pramādo dharma āsuraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5271: 13,045.009c nānuśuśruma jātv etām imāṃ pūrveṣu janmasu
GE07mbh_13_u:5272: 13,045.010a bhāryāpatyor hi saṃbandhaḥ strīpuṃsos tulya eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5273: 13,045.010c ratiḥ sādhāraṇo dharma iti cāha sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5274: 13,045.011 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,045.011a atha kena pramāṇena puṃsām ādīyate dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:5275: 13,045.011c putravad dhi pitus tasya kanyā bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:5276: 13,045.012 bhīṣma uvāca 13,045.012a yathaivātmā tathā putraḥ putreṇa duhitā samā
GE07mbh_13_u:5277: 13,045.012c tasyām ātmani tiṣṭhantyāṃ katham anyo dhanaṃ haret
GE07mbh_13_u:5278: 13,045.013a mātuś ca yautakaṃ yat syāt kumārībhāga eva saḥ 13,045.013c dauhitra eva vā riktham aputrasya pitur haret
GE07mbh_13_u:5279: 13,045.014a dadāti hi sa piṇḍaṃ vai pitur mātāmahasya ca 13,045.014c putradauhitrayor neha viśeṣo dharmataḥ smṛtaḥ 13,045.015a anyatra jātayā sā hi prajayā putra īhate
GE07mbh_13_u:5281: 13,045.016a dauhitrakeṇa dharmeṇa nātra paśyāmi kāraṇam 13,045.016c vikrītāsu ca ye putrā bhavanti pitur eva te 13,045.017a asūyavas tv adharmiṣṭhāḥ parasvādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥ 13,045.017c āsurād adhisaṃbhūtā dharmād viṣamavṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5282: 13,045.018a atra gāthā yamodgītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ 13,045.018c dharmajñā dharmaśāstreṣu nibaddhā dharmasetuṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:5283: 13,045.019a yo manuṣyaḥ svakaṃ putraṃ vikrīya dhanam icchati
GE07mbh_13_u:5284: 13,045.019c kanyāṃ vā jīvitārthāya yaḥ śulkena prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:5286: 13,045.020c svedaṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca tasmin preta upāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:5287: 13,045.021a ārṣe gomithunaṃ śulkaṃ ke cid āhur mṛṣaiva tat 13,045.021c alpaṃ vā bahu vā rājan vikrayas tāvad eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5288: 13,045.022a yady apy ācaritaḥ kaiś cin naiṣa dharmaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5289: 13,045.022c anyeṣām api dṛśyante lobhataḥ saṃpravṛttayaḥ 13,045.023a vaśyāṃ kumārīṃ vihitāṃ ye ca tām upabhuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:5290: 13,045.023c ete pāpasya kartāras tamasy andhe 'tha śerate
GE07mbh_13_u:5291: 13,045.024a anyo 'py atha na vikreyo manuṣyaḥ kiṃ punaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5292: 13,045.024c adharmamūlair hi dhanair na tair artho 'sti kaś cana 13,046.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,046.001a prācetasasya vacanaṃ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5293: 13,046.001c yasyāḥ kiṃ cin nādadate jñātayo na sa vikrayaḥ 13,046.002a arhaṇaṃ tat kumārīṇām ānṛśaṃsyatamaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:5294: 13,046.002c sarvaṃ ca pratideyaṃ syāt kanyāyai tad aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5295: 13,046.003a pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhiś caiva śvaśurair atha devaraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5296: 13,046.003c pūjyā lālayitavyāś ca bahukalyāṇam īpsubhiḥ 13,046.004a yadi vai strī na roceta pumāṃsaṃ na pramodayet 13,046.004c amodanāt punaḥ puṃsaḥ prajanaṃ na pravardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:5297: 13,046.005a pūjyā lālayitavyāś ca striyo nityaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:5298: 13,046.005b*0307_01 striyo yatra ca pūjyante ramante tatra devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5299: 13,046.005c apūjitāś ca yatraitāḥ sarvās tatrāphalāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5300: 13,046.005e tadaiva tat kulaṃ nāsti yadā śocanti jāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5302: 13,046.006c naiva bhānti na vardhante śriyā hīnāni pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:5303: 13,046.007a striyaḥ puṃsāṃ paridade manur jigamiṣur divam
GE07mbh_13_u:5306: 13,046.008c striyo mānanam arhanti tā mānayata mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5307: 13,046.009a strīpratyayo hi vo dharmo ratibhogāś ca kevalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5310: 13,046.010c prītyarthaṃ lokayātrā ca paśyata strīnibandhanam 13,046.011a saṃmānyamānāś caitābhiḥ sarvakāryāṇy avāpsyatha
GE07mbh_13_u:5312: 13,046.012a nāsti yajñaḥ striyaḥ kaś cin na śrāddhaṃ nopavāsakam 13,046.012c dharmas tu bhartṛśuśrūṣā tayā svargaṃ jayaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:5313: 13,046.013a pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane
GE07mbh_13_u:5314: 13,046.013c putrās tu sthavirībhāve na strī svātantryam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:5315: 13,046.014a śriya etāḥ striyo nāma satkāryā bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:5316: 13,046.014c lālitā nigṛhītā ca strī śrīr bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5317: 13,047.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,047.001a sarvaśāstravidhānajña rājadharmārthavittama 13,047.001c atīva saṃśayacchettā bhavān vai prathitaḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_13_u:5318: 13,047.002a kaś cit tu saṃśayo me 'sti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:5319: 13,047.002c asyām āpadi kaṣṭāyām anyaṃ pṛcchāma kaṃ vayam
GE07mbh_13_u:5320: 13,047.003a yathā nareṇa kartavyaṃ yaś ca dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5321: 13,047.003c etat sarvaṃ mahābāho bhavān vyākhyātum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:5322: 13,047.004a catasro vihitā bhāryā brāhmaṇasya pitāmaha 13,047.004c brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca ratim icchataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5323: 13,047.005a tatra jāteṣu putreṣu sarvāsāṃ kurusattama 13,047.005c ānupūrvyeṇa kas teṣāṃ pitryaṃ dāyādyam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:5324: 13,047.006a kena vā kiṃ tato hāryaṃ pitṛvittāt pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:5325: 13,047.006c etad icchāmi kathitaṃ vibhāgas teṣu yaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5326: 13,047.007 bhīṣma uvāca 13,047.007a brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyas trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5327: 13,047.007c eteṣu vihito dharmo brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhira 13,047.008a vaiṣamyād atha vā lobhāt kāmād vāpi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:5328: 13,047.008c brāhmaṇasya bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:5329: 13,047.009a śūdrāṃ śayanam āropya brāhmaṇaḥ pīḍito bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5331: 13,047.010a tatra jāteṣv apatyeṣu dviguṇaṃ syād yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5332: 13,047.010c atas te niyamaṃ vitte saṃpravakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5333: 13,047.011a lakṣaṇyo govṛṣo yānaṃ yat pradhānatamaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5334: 13,047.011c brāhmaṇyās tad dharet putra ekāṃśaṃ vai pitur dhanāt 13,047.012a śeṣaṃ tu daśadhā kāryaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5335: 13,047.012c tatra tenaiva hartavyāś catvāro 'ṃśāḥ pitur dhanāt 13,047.013a kṣatriyāyās tu yaḥ putro brāhmaṇaḥ so 'py asaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5336: 13,047.013c sa tu mātṛviśeṣeṇa trīn aṃśān hartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:5337: 13,047.014a varṇe tṛtīye jātas tu vaiśyāyāṃ brāhmaṇād api
GE07mbh_13_u:5338: 13,047.014c dviraṃśas tena hartavyo brāhmaṇasvād yudhiṣṭhira 13,047.015a śūdrāyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto nityādeyadhanaḥ smṛtaḥ 13,047.015c alpaṃ vāpi pradātavyaṃ śūdrāputrāya bhārata 13,047.016a daśadhā pravibhaktasya dhanasyaiṣa bhavet kramaḥ 13,047.016c savarṇāsu tu jātānāṃ samān bhāgān prakalpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:5339: 13,047.017a abrāhmaṇaṃ tu manyante śūdrāputram anaipuṇāt 13,047.017c triṣu varṇeṣu jāto hi brāhmaṇād brāhmaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5340: 13,047.018a smṛtā varṇāś ca catvāraḥ pañcamo nādhigamyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5341: 13,047.018c haret tu daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ śūdrāputraḥ pitur dhanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5342: 13,047.019a tat tu dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhati 13,047.019c avaśyaṃ hi dhanaṃ deyaṃ śūdrāputrāya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5343: 13,047.020a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharma iti tasmai pradīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5345: 13,047.021a yadi vāpy ekaputraḥ syād aputro yadi vā bhavet 13,047.021c nādhikaṃ daśamād dadyāc chūdrāputrāya bhārata 13,047.021d*0308_01 smṛta ekaś caturbhāgaḥ kanyābhāgas tu dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5346: 13,047.021d*0308_02 abhrātṛkā samagrārhā cārthasyety apare viduḥ 13,047.022a traivārṣikād yadā bhaktād adhikaṃ syād dvijasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:5347: 13,047.022c yajeta tena dravyeṇa na vṛthā sādhayed dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:5348: 13,047.023a trisāhasraparo dāyaḥ striyo deyo dhanasya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:5349: 13,047.023c tac ca bhartrā dhanaṃ dattaṃ nādattaṃ bhoktum arhati 13,047.024a strīṇāṃ tu patidāyādyam upabhogaphalaṃ smṛtam 13,047.024c nāpahāraṃ striyaḥ kuryuḥ pativittāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5350: 13,047.025a striyās tu yad bhaved vittaṃ pitrā dattaṃ yudhiṣṭhira 13,047.025c brāhmaṇyās tad dharet kanyā yathā putras tathā hi sā
GE07mbh_13_u:5351: 13,047.025e sā hi putrasamā rājan vihitā kurunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:5352: 13,047.026a evam etat samuddiṣṭaṃ dharmeṣu bharatarṣabha 13,047.026c etad dharmam anusmṛtya na vṛthā sādhayed dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:5353: 13,047.027 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,047.027a śūdrāyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto yady adeyadhanaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5354: 13,047.027c kena prativiśeṣeṇa daśamo 'py asya dīyate 13,047.028a brāhmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto brāhmaṇaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5355: 13,047.028c kṣatriyāyāṃ tathaiva syād vaiśyāyām api caiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:5356: 13,047.029a kasmāt te viṣamaṃ bhāgaṃ bhajeran nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:5357: 13,047.029c yadā sarve trayo varṇās tvayoktā brāhmaṇā iti
GE07mbh_13_u:5358: 13,047.030 bhīṣma uvāca 13,047.030a dārā ity ucyate loke nāmnaikena paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:5359: 13,047.030c proktena caikanāmnāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ sumahān bhavet 13,047.031a tisraḥ kṛtvā puro bhāryāḥ paścād vindeta brāhmaṇīm
GE07mbh_13_u:5360: 13,047.031c sā jyeṣṭhā sā ca pūjyā syāt sā ca tābhyo garīyasī
GE07mbh_13_u:5361: 13,047.032a snānaṃ prasādhanaṃ bhartur dantadhāvanam añjanam 13,047.032c havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca yac cānyad dharmayuktaṃ bhaved gṛhe 13,047.033a na tasyāṃ jātu tiṣṭhantyām anyā tat kartum arhati 13,047.033c brāhmaṇī tv eva tat kuryād brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5362: 13,047.034a annaṃ pānaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca 13,047.034c brāhmaṇyai tāni deyāni bhartuḥ sā hi garīyasī
GE07mbh_13_u:5363: 13,047.035a manunābhihitaṃ śāstraṃ yac cāpi kurunandana 13,047.035c tatrāpy eṣa mahārāja dṛṣṭo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5364: 13,047.036a atha ced anyathā kuryād yadi kāmād yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5365: 13,047.036c yathā brāhmaṇacaṇḍālaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭas tathaiva saḥ 13,047.037a brāhmaṇyāḥ sadṛśaḥ putraḥ kṣatriyāyāś ca yo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5366: 13,047.037c rājan viśeṣo nāsty atra varṇayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_13_u:5367: 13,047.038a na tu jātyā samā loke brāhmaṇyāḥ kṣatriyā bhavet 13,047.038c brāhmaṇyāḥ prathamaḥ putro bhūyān syād rājasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:5369: 13,047.039a yathā na sadṛśī jātu brāhmaṇyāḥ kṣatriyā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5370: 13,047.039c kṣatriyāyās tathā vaiśyā na jātu sadṛśī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5371: 13,047.040a śrīś ca rājyaṃ ca kośaś ca kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira 13,047.040c vihitaṃ dṛśyate rājan sāgarāntā ca medinī
GE07mbh_13_u:5372: 13,047.041a kṣatriyo hi svadharmeṇa śriyaṃ prāpnoti bhūyasīm
GE07mbh_13_u:5373: 13,047.041c rājā daṇḍadharo rājan rakṣā nānyatra kṣatriyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5374: 13,047.042a brāhmaṇā hi mahābhāgā devānām api devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5375: 13,047.042c teṣu rājā pravarteta pūjayā vidhipūrvakam 13,047.043a praṇītam ṛṣibhir jñātvā dharmaṃ śāśvatam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:5376: 13,047.043c lupyamānāḥ svadharmeṇa kṣatriyo rakṣati prajāḥ 13,047.044a dasyubhir hriyamāṇaṃ ca dhanaṃ dārāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5377: 13,047.044c sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ trātā bhavati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5378: 13,047.045a bhūyān syāt kṣatriyāputro vaiśyāputrān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5379: 13,047.045c bhūyas tenāpi hartavyaṃ pitṛvittād yudhiṣṭhira 13,047.045d*0309_01 vaiśyāputro 'pi bhūyāṃś ca śūdrāputrān na saṃśayaḥ 13,047.045d*0309_02 bhayaṃ saṃjanayaty eva tasmād deyadhanas tv asau
GE07mbh_13_u:5380: 13,047.046 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,047.046a uktaṃ te vidhivad rājan brāhmaṇasve pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:5381: 13,047.046c itareṣāṃ tu varṇānāṃ kathaṃ viniyamo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5382: 13,047.047 bhīṣma uvāca 13,047.047a kṣatriyasyāpi bhārye dve vihite kurunandana 13,047.047c tṛtīyā ca bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtā 13,047.048a eṣa eva kramo hi syāt kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5383: 13,047.048c aṣṭadhā tu bhavet kāryaṃ kṣatriyasvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5384: 13,047.049a kṣatriyāyā haret putraś caturo 'ṃśān pitur dhanāt 13,047.049c yuddhāvahārikaṃ yac ca pituḥ syāt sa harec ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:5385: 13,047.050a vaiśyāputras tu bhāgāṃs trīn śūdrāputras tathāṣṭamam
GE07mbh_13_u:5386: 13,047.050c so 'pi dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:5387: 13,047.051a ekaiva hi bhaved bhāryā vaiśyasya kurunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:5388: 13,047.051c dvitīyā vā bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtā 13,047.052a vaiśyasya vartamānasya vaiśyāyāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:5389: 13,047.052c śūdrāyāṃ caiva kaunteya tayor viniyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5390: 13,047.053a pañcadhā tu bhavet kāryaṃ vaiśyasvaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:5391: 13,047.053c tayor apatye vakṣyāmi vibhāgaṃ ca janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:5392: 13,047.054a vaiśyāputreṇa hartavyāś catvāro 'ṃśāḥ pitur dhanāt 13,047.054c pañcamas tu bhaved bhāgaḥ śūdrāputrāya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5393: 13,047.055a so 'pi dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:5394: 13,047.055c tribhir varṇais tathā jātaḥ śūdro deyadhano bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5395: 13,047.056a śūdrasya syāt savarṇaiva bhāryā nānyā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5396: 13,047.056c śūdrasya samabhāgaḥ syād yadi putraśataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5398: 13,047.057c sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ samabhāgo dhane smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5399: 13,047.058a jyeṣṭhasya bhāgo jyeṣṭhaḥ syād ekāṃśo yaḥ pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5400: 13,047.058c eṣa dāyavidhiḥ pārtha pūrvam uktaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:5401: 13,047.059a samavarṇāsu jātānāṃ viśeṣo 'sty aparo nṛpa 13,047.059c vivāhavaiśeṣyakṛtaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvo viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5402: 13,047.060a harej jyeṣṭhaḥ pradhānāṃśam ekaṃ tulyāsuteṣv api
GE07mbh_13_u:5403: 13,047.060c madhyamo madhyamaṃ caiva kanīyāṃs tu kanīyasam
GE07mbh_13_u:5404: 13,047.061a evaṃ jātiṣu sarvāsu savarṇāḥ śreṣṭhatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5405: 13,047.061c maharṣir api caitad vai mārīcaḥ kāśyapo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5406: 13,048.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,048.001a arthāśrayād vā kāmād vā varṇānāṃ vāpy aniścayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5407: 13,048.001c ajñānād vāpi varṇānāṃ jāyate varṇasaṃkaraḥ 13,048.002a teṣām etena vidhinā jātānāṃ varṇasaṃkare 13,048.002c ko dharmaḥ kāni karmāṇi tan me brūhi pitāmaha 13,048.003 bhīṣma uvāca 13,048.003a cāturvarṇyasya karmāṇi cāturvarṇyaṃ ca kevalam 13,048.003c asṛjat sa ha yajñārthe pūrvam eva prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5408: 13,048.004a bhāryāś catasro viprasya dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5409: 13,048.004c ānupūrvyād dvayor hīnau mātṛjātyau prasūyataḥ 13,048.005a paraṃ śavād brāhmaṇasyaiṣa putraḥ; śūdrāputraṃ pāraśavaṃ tam
GE07mbh_13_u:5411: 13,048.005c śuśrūṣakaḥ svasya kulasya sa syāt; svaṃ cāritraṃ nityam atho na jahyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5412: 13,048.006a sarvān upāyān api saṃpradhārya; samuddharet svasya kulasya
GE07mbh_13_u:5414: 13,048.006c jyeṣṭho yavīyān api yo dvijasya; śuśrūṣavān dānaparāyaṇaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5415: 13,048.007a tisraḥ kṣatriyasaṃbandhād dvayor ātmāsya jāyate 13,048.007c hīnavarṇas tṛtīyāyāṃ śūdra ugra iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5416: 13,048.008a dve cāpi bhārye vaiśyasya dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5417: 13,048.008c śūdrā śūdrasya cāpy ekā śūdram eva prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5418: 13,048.009a ato viśiṣṭas tv adhamo gurudārapradharṣakaḥ 13,048.009c bāhyaṃ varṇaṃ janayati
GE07mbh_13_u:5419: 13,048.010a ayājyaṃ kṣatriyo vrātyaṃ sūtaṃ stomakriyāparam 13,048.010c vaiśyo vaidehakaṃ cāpi maudgalyam apavarjitam 13,048.011a śūdraś caṇḍālam atyugraṃ vadhyaghnaṃ bāhyavāsinam 13,048.011c brāhmaṇyāṃ saṃprajāyanta ity ete kulapāṃsanāḥ 13,048.011e ete matimatāṃ śreṣṭha varṇasaṃkarajāḥ prabho 13,048.012a bandī tu jāyate vaiśyān māgadho vākyajīvanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5420: 13,048.012c śūdrān niṣādo matsyaghnaḥ kṣatriyāyāṃ vyatikramāt 13,048.013a śūdrād āyogavaś cāpi vaiśyāyāṃ grāmadharmiṇaḥ 13,048.013c brāhmaṇair apratigrāhyas takṣā sa vanajīvanaḥ 13,048.014a ete 'pi sadṛśaṃ varṇaṃ janayanti svayoniṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:5422: 13,048.015a yathā caturṣu varṇeṣu dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5423: 13,048.015c ānantaryāt tu jāyante tathā bāhyāḥ pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5424: 13,048.016a te cāpi sadṛśaṃ varṇaṃ janayanti svayoniṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:5426: 13,048.017a yathā ca śūdro brāhmaṇyāṃ jantuṃ bāhyaṃ prasūyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5427: 13,048.017c evaṃ bāhyatarād bāhyaś cāturvarṇyāt prasūyate 13,048.018a pratilomaṃ tu vartanto bāhyād bāhyataraṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5428: 13,048.018c hīnā hīnāt prasūyante varṇāḥ pañcadaśaiva te
GE07mbh_13_u:5430: 13,048.019c vrātyānām atra jāyante sairandhrā māgadheṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5434: 13,048.021a niṣādo mudgaraṃ sūte dāśaṃ nāvopajīvinam 13,048.021c mṛtapaṃ cāpi caṇḍālaḥ śvapākam atikutsitam 13,048.022a caturo māgadhī sūte krūrān māyopajīvinaḥ 13,048.022c māṃsasvādukaraṃ sūdaṃ saugandham iti saṃjñitam 13,048.023a vaidehakāc ca pāpiṣṭhaṃ krūraṃ bhāryopajīvinam 13,048.023c niṣādān madranābhaṃ ca kharayānaprayāyinam
GE07mbh_13_u:5436: 13,048.024c mṛtacelapraticchannaṃ bhinnabhājanabhojinam 13,048.025a āyogavīṣu jāyante hīnavarṇāsu te trayaḥ 13,048.025c kṣudro vaidehakād andhro bahir grāmapratiśrayaḥ 13,048.026a kārāvaro niṣādyāṃ tu carmakārāt prajāyate 13,048.026c caṇḍālāt pāṇḍusaupākas tvaksāravyavahāravān
GE07mbh_13_u:5439: 13,048.028a niṣādī cāpi caṇḍālāt putram antāvasāyinam 13,048.028c śmaśānagocaraṃ sūte bāhyair api bahiṣkṛtam 13,048.029a ity etāḥ saṃkare jātyaḥ pitṛmātṛvyatikramāt 13,048.029c pracchannā vā prakāśā vā veditavyāḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5440: 13,048.030a caturṇām eva varṇānāṃ dharmo nānyasya vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5441: 13,048.030c varṇānāṃ dharmahīneṣu saṃjñā nāstīha kasya cit
GE07mbh_13_u:5442: 13,048.031a yadṛcchayopasaṃpannair yajñasādhubahiṣkṛtaiḥ 13,048.031c bāhyā bāhyais tu jāyante yathāvṛtti yathāśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:5445: 13,048.032b*0311_01 kārṣṇāyasam alaṃkāraṃ parigṛhya ca nityaśaḥ 13,048.032b*0311_02 vaseyur ete pitryais tu vartayantaḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5446: 13,048.032c yuñjante cāpy alaṃkārāṃs tathopakaraṇāni ca 13,048.033a gobrāhmaṇārthe sāhāyyaṃ kurvāṇā vai na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5447: 13,048.033c ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ satyavākyam atha kṣamā 13,048.034a svaśarīraiḥ paritrāṇaṃ bāhyānāṃ siddhikārakam
GE07mbh_13_u:5448: 13,048.034c manujavyāghra bhavati tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5449: 13,048.035a yathopadeśaṃ parikīrtitāsu; naraḥ prajāyeta vicārya buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:5450: 13,048.035c vihīnayonir hi suto 'vasādayet; titīrṣamāṇaṃ salile yathopalam
GE07mbh_13_u:5451: 13,048.036a avidvāṃsam alaṃ loke vidvāṃsam api vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5452: 13,048.036c nayante hy utpathaṃ nāryaḥ kāmakrodhavaśānugam 13,048.037a svabhāvaś caiva nārīṇāṃ narāṇām iha dūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:5453: 13,048.037c ityarthaṃ na prasajjante pramadāsu vipaścitaḥ 13,048.038 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,048.038a varṇāpetam avijñātaṃ naraṃ kaluṣayonijam
GE07mbh_13_u:5454: 13,048.038c āryarūpam ivānāryaṃ kathaṃ vidyāmahe nṛpa 13,048.039 bhīṣma uvāca 13,048.039a yonisaṃkaluṣe jātaṃ nānācārasamāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:5458: 13,048.041a pitryaṃ vā bhajate śīlaṃ mātṛjaṃ vā tathobhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:5459: 13,048.041c na kathaṃ cana saṃkīrṇaḥ prakṛtiṃ svāṃ niyacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:5460: 13,048.042a yathaiva sadṛśo rūpe mātāpitror hi jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5461: 13,048.042c vyāghraś citrais tathā yoniṃ puruṣaḥ svāṃ niyacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:5462: 13,048.043a kulasrotasi saṃchanne yasya syād yonisaṃkaraḥ 13,048.043c saṃśrayaty eva tacchīlaṃ naro 'lpam api vā bahu
GE07mbh_13_u:5464: 13,048.044c svavarṇam anyavarṇaṃ vā svaśīlaṃ śāsti niścaye
GE07mbh_13_u:5466: 13,048.045c janmavṛttasamaṃ loke suśliṣṭaṃ na virajyate 13,048.046a śarīram iha sattvena narasya parikṛṣyate 13,048.046c jyeṣṭhamadhyāvaraṃ sattvaṃ tulyasattvaṃ pramodate
GE07mbh_13_u:5467: 13,048.047a jyāyāṃsam api śīlena vihīnaṃ naiva pūjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:5468: 13,048.047c api śūdraṃ tu sadvṛttaṃ dharmajñam abhipūjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:5469: 13,048.047d*0312_01 ātmānam ātmanākhyāti karmasvaiḥ karmabhir naraḥ 13,048.047d*0312_02 svaśīlacāritrakṛtaiḥ karmair vāpi (sic) śubhāśubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5470: 13,048.048a ātmānam ākhyāti hi karmabhir naraḥ; svaśīlacāritrakṛtaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ 13,048.048c pranaṣṭam apy ātmakulaṃ tathā naraḥ; punaḥ prakāśaṃ kurute
GE07mbh_13_u:5472: 13,048.049a yoniṣv etāsu sarvāsu saṃkīrṇāsv itarāsu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5473: 13,048.049c yatrātmānaṃ na janayed budhas tāḥ parivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:5474: 13,049.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,049.001a brūhi putrān kuruśreṣṭha varṇānāṃ tvaṃ pṛthak
GE07mbh_13_u:5475: 13,049.001c kīdṛśyāṃ kīdṛśāś cāpi putrāḥ kasya ca ke ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:5477: 13,049.002c atra no muhyatāṃ rājan saṃśayaṃ chettum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:5479: 13,049.002d*0313_01 ātmā putras tu vijñeyaḥ prathamo bahudhā pare
GE07mbh_13_u:5480: 13,049.002d*0313_02 sve kṣetre saṃskṛte yas tu putram utpādayet svayam 13,049.002d*0313_03 tam aurasaṃ vijānīyāt putraṃ prathamakalpitam 13,049.002d*0313_04 agniṃ prajāpatiṃ ceṣṭvā varāya pratipāditā 13,049.002d*0313_05 putrikā syād duhitari saṃkalpenāpi vā sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5481: 13,049.002d*0313_06 talpe jātaḥ pramītasya klībasya patitasya vā
GE07mbh_13_u:5482: 13,049.002d*0313_07 svadharmeṇa niyukto yaḥ sa putraḥ kṣetrajaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5483: 13,049.002d*0313_08 mātā pitā ca dadyātāṃ yam adbhiḥ putram āpadi 13,049.002d*0313_09 sadṛśaṃ prītisaṃyuktau vijñeyo dāttakaḥ sutaḥ 13,049.002d*0313_10 sadṛśaṃ tu prakuryād yaṃ guṇadoṣavicakṣaṇam 13,049.002d*0313_11 putraṃ putraguṇair yuktaṃ vijñeyas tu sa kṛtrimaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5484: 13,049.002d*0313_12 utpadyate yas tu gūḍhaṃ na ca jñāyeta kasya cit
GE07mbh_13_u:5485: 13,049.002d*0313_13 sa bhaved gūḍhajo nāma tasya syād yasya talpajaḥ 13,049.002d*0313_14 mātāpitṛbhyām utsṛṣṭaṃ tayor anyatareṇa vā 13,049.002d*0313_15 yaḥ putraṃ pratigṛhṇīyād apaviddhaḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5486: 13,049.002d*0313_16 pitṛveśmani kanyā tu yaṃ putraṃ janayed rahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5487: 13,049.002d*0313_17 kānīnaṃ taṃ vaden nāmnā voḍhuḥ kanyāsamudbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5488: 13,049.002d*0313_18 yā garbhiṇī saṃskriyate jñātājñātāpi vā satī
GE07mbh_13_u:5489: 13,049.002d*0313_19 voḍhuḥ sa garbho bhavati sahoḍha iti cocyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5490: 13,049.002d*0313_20 yā patyā vā parityaktā atha vā svecchayāpi vā 13,049.002d*0313_21 utpādayed akṣatāyāṃ sa paunarbhava ucyate 13,049.002d*0313_22 mātāpitṛvihīno vā sakto vā syād akāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5491: 13,049.002d*0313_23 ātmānaṃ sparśayed yas tu svayaṃdattaḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5492: 13,049.002d*0313_24 krīṇīyād yas tv apatyārthaṃ mātāpitror yam antikāt
GE07mbh_13_u:5493: 13,049.002d*0313_25 sa sutas tasya sadṛśaḥ krīto nāma budhaiḥ smṛtaḥ 13,049.002d*0313_26 dvādaśaite pare prāhur evaṃ dharmasya pāṭhakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5494: 13,049.002d*0314_01 sā ced akṣatayoniḥ syād gatapratyāgatāpi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:5495: 13,049.002d*0314_02 paunarbhavena bhartrā sā punaḥ saṃskāram arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:5496: 13,049.002d*0315_01 yaṃ brāhmaṇas tu śūdrāyāṃ kāmād utpādayet sutam
GE07mbh_13_u:5497: 13,049.002d*0315_02 sa pārayann eva śavas tasmāt pāraśavaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5498: 13,049.002d*0315_03 dāsyāṃ vā dāsadāsyāṃ vā yaḥ śūdrasya suto bhavet 13,049.002d*0315_04 so 'nujñāto hared aṃśam iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ 13,049.002d*0315_05 kṣetrajādīn sutān etān ekādaśa yathoditān 13,049.002d*0315_06 putrapratinidhīn āhuḥ kriyālopān manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5499: 13,049.002d*0315_07 bhrātṝṇām ekajātānām ekaś cet putravān bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5500: 13,049.002d*0315_08 sarvāṃs tāṃs tena putreṇa putriṇo manur abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5501: 13,049.002d*0315_09 sarvāsām ekapatnīnām ekā cet putriṇī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5502: 13,049.002d*0315_10 sarvās tās tena putreṇa prāha putravatīr manuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5503: 13,049.003 bhīṣma uvāca 13,049.003a ātmā putras tu vijñeyas tasyānantarajaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5504: 13,049.003c niyuktajaś ca vijñeyaḥ sutaḥ prasṛtajas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5505: 13,049.004a patitasya ca bhāryāyāṃ bhartrā susamavetayā 13,049.004c tathā dattakṛtau putrāv adhyūḍhaś ca tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5506: 13,049.005a ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajāś cāpi kānīnāpasadās tathā 13,049.005c ity ete te samākhyātās tān vijānīhi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5507: 13,049.006 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,049.006a ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajāḥ ke syuḥ ke vāpy apasadās tathā 13,049.006c etat sarvaṃ yathātattvaṃ vyākhyātuṃ me tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:5508: 13,049.007 bhīṣma uvāca 13,049.007a triṣu varṇeṣu ye putrā brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5509: 13,049.007c varṇayoś ca dvayoḥ syātāṃ yau rājanyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5511: 13,049.008c ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajās te hi tathaivāpasadāñ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:5512: 13,049.009a caṇḍālo vrātyavenau ca brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāsu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5514: 13,049.010a māgadho vāmakaś caiva dvau vaiśyasyopalakṣitau 13,049.010c brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāyāṃ ca kṣatriyasyaika eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:5515: 13,049.011a brāhmaṇyāṃ lakṣyate sūta ity ete 'pasadāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5516: 13,049.011c putrareto na śakyaṃ hi mithyā kartuṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:5517: 13,049.012 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,049.012a kṣetrajaṃ ke cid evāhuḥ sutaṃ ke cit tu śukrajam
GE07mbh_13_u:5518: 13,049.012c tulyāv etau sutau kasya tan me brūhi pitāmaha 13,049.013 bhīṣma uvāca 13,049.013a retajo vā bhavet putras tyakto vā kṣetrajo bhavet 13,049.013c adhyūḍhaḥ samayaṃ bhittvety etad eva nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:5519: 13,049.014 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,049.014a retojaṃ vidma vai putraṃ kṣetrajasyāgamaḥ katham
GE07mbh_13_u:5520: 13,049.014c adhyūḍhaṃ vidma vai putraṃ hitvā ca samayaṃ katham 13,049.015 bhīṣma uvāca 13,049.015a ātmajaṃ putram utpādya yas tyajet kāraṇāntare
GE07mbh_13_u:5521: 13,049.015c na tatra kāraṇaṃ retaḥ sa kṣetrasvāmino bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:5522: 13,049.016a putrakāmo hi putrārthe yāṃ vṛṇīte viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:5523: 13,049.016c tatra kṣetraṃ pramāṇaṃ syān na vai tatrātmajaḥ sutaḥ 13,049.017a anyatra kṣetrajaḥ putro lakṣyate bharatarṣabha 13,049.017c na hy ātmā śakyate hantuṃ dṛṣṭāntopagato hy asau 13,049.018a kaś cic ca kṛtakaḥ putraḥ saṃgrahād eva lakṣyate 13,049.018c na tatra retaḥ kṣetraṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syād yudhiṣṭhira 13,049.019 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,049.019a kīdṛśaḥ kṛtakaḥ putraḥ saṃgrahād eva lakṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5524: 13,049.019c śukraṃ kṣetraṃ pramāṇaṃ vā yatra lakṣyeta bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5525: 13,049.020 bhīṣma uvāca 13,049.020a mātāpitṛbhyāṃ saṃtyaktaṃ pathi yaṃ tu pralakṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:5526: 13,049.020c na cāsya mātāpitarau jñāyete sa hi kṛtrimaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5528: 13,049.021c savarṇas taṃ ca poṣeta savarṇas tasya jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5529: 13,049.022 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,049.022a katham asya prayoktavyaḥ saṃskāraḥ kasya vā katham
GE07mbh_13_u:5530: 13,049.022c deyā kanyā kathaṃ ceti tan me brūhi pitāmaha 13,049.023 bhīṣma uvāca 13,049.023a ātmavat tasya kurvīta saṃskāraṃ svāmivat tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5531: 13,049.024a tyakto mātāpitṛbhyāṃ yaḥ savarṇaṃ pratipadyate 13,049.024c tad gotravarṇatas tasya kuryāt saṃskāram acyuta
GE07mbh_13_u:5532: 13,049.024d*0316_01 saṃskṛtasya satas tasya varṇagotraṃ bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:5533: 13,049.025a atha deyā tu kanyā syāt tadvarṇena yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5536: 13,049.026c tāv api svāv iva sutau saṃskāryāv iti niścayaḥ 13,049.027a kṣetrajo vāpy apasado ye 'dhyūḍhās teṣu cāpy atha
GE07mbh_13_u:5537: 13,049.027c ātmavad vai prayuñjīran saṃskāraṃ brāhmaṇādayaḥ 13,049.028a dharmaśāstreṣu varṇānāṃ niścayo 'yaṃ pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:5538: 13,049.028c etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi 13,050.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,050.001a darśane kīdṛśaḥ snehaḥ saṃvāse ca pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:5539: 13,050.001c mahābhāgyaṃ gavāṃ caiva tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:5540: 13,050.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,050.002a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi purāvṛttaṃ mahādyute 13,050.002c nahuṣasya ca saṃvādaṃ maharṣeś cyavanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5541: 13,050.003a purā maharṣiś cyavano bhārgavo bharatarṣabha 13,050.003c udavāsakṛtārambho babhūva sumahāvrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5542: 13,050.004a nihatya mānaṃ krodhaṃ ca praharṣaṃ śokam eva ca 13,050.004c varṣāṇi dvādaśa munir jalavāse dhṛtavrataḥ 13,050.005a ādadhat sarvabhūteṣu visrambhaṃ paramaṃ śubham 13,050.005c jalecareṣu sattveṣu śītaraśmir iva prabhuḥ 13,050.006a sthāṇubhūtaḥ śucir bhūtvā daivatebhyaḥ praṇamya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5543: 13,050.006c gaṅgāyamunayor madhye jalaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha 13,050.007a gaṅgāyamunayor vegaṃ subhīmaṃ bhīmaniḥsvanam
GE07mbh_13_u:5545: 13,050.008a gaṅgā ca yamunā caiva saritaś cānugās tayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5546: 13,050.008c pradakṣiṇam ṛṣiṃ cakrur na cainaṃ paryapīḍayan
GE07mbh_13_u:5547: 13,050.009a antarjale sa suṣvāpa kāṣṭhabhūto mahāmuniḥ 13,050.009c tataś cordhvasthito dhīmān abhavad bharatarṣabha 13,050.010a jalaukasāṃ sa sattvānāṃ babhūva priyadarśanaḥ 13,050.010c upājighranta ca tadā matsyās taṃ hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5549: 13,050.011a tataḥ kadā cit samaye kasmiṃś cin matsyajīvinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5550: 13,050.011c taṃ deśaṃ samupājagmur jālahastā mahādyute 13,050.012a niṣādā bahavas tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:5551: 13,050.012c vyāyatā balinaḥ śūrāḥ salileṣv anivartinaḥ 13,050.012e abhyāyayuś ca taṃ deśaṃ niścitā jālakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:5552: 13,050.013a jālaṃ ca yojayām āsur viśeṣeṇa janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:5554: 13,050.014a tatas te bahubhir yogaiḥ kaivartā matsyakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5555: 13,050.014c gaṅgāyamunayor vāri jālair abhyakiraṃs tataḥ 13,050.015a jālaṃ suvitataṃ teṣāṃ navasūtrakṛtaṃ tathā 13,050.015c vistārāyāmasaṃpannaṃ yat tatra salile kṣamam 13,050.016a tatas te sumahac caiva balavac ca suvartitam
GE07mbh_13_u:5556: 13,050.016c prakīrya sarvataḥ sarve jālaṃ cakṛṣire tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5558: 13,050.017c babandhus tatra matsyāṃś ca tathānyāñ jalacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5559: 13,050.018a tathā matsyaiḥ parivṛtaṃ cyavanaṃ bhṛgunandanam 13,050.018c ākarṣanta mahārāja jālenātha yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_13_u:5560: 13,050.019a nadīśaivaladigdhāṅgaṃ hariśmaśrujaṭādharam 13,050.019c lagnaiḥ śaṅkhagaṇair gātraiḥ koṣṭhaiś citrair ivāvṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:5561: 13,050.020a taṃ jālenoddhṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā te tadā vedapāragam

GE07mbh_13_u:5564: 13,050.021c matsyā babhūvur vyāpannāḥ sthalasaṃkarṣaṇena ca 13,050.022a sa munis tat tadā dṛṣṭvā matsyānāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtam 13,050.022c babhūva kṛpayāviṣṭo niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5565: 13,050.023 niṣādā ūcuḥ 13,050.023a ajñānād yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ prasādaṃ tatra naḥ kuru 13,050.023c karavāma priyaṃ kiṃ te tan no brūhi mahāmune 13,050.024 bhīṣma uvāca 13,050.024a ity ukto matsyamadhyasthaś cyavano vākyam abravīt

GE07mbh_13_u:5567: 13,050.025c saṃvāsān notsahe tyaktuṃ salilādhyuṣitān imān 13,050.026a ity uktās te niṣādās tu subhṛśaṃ bhayakampitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5569: 13,051.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,051.001a nahuṣas tu tataḥ śrutvā cyavanaṃ taṃ tathāgatam

GE07mbh_13_u:5574: 13,051.005 cyavana uvāca 13,051.005a śrameṇa mahatā yuktāḥ kaivartā matsyajīvinaḥ 13,051.005c mama mūlyaṃ prayacchaibhyo matsyānāṃ vikrayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:5575: 13,051.006 nahuṣa uvāca 13,051.006a sahasraṃ dīyatāṃ mūlyaṃ niṣādebhyaḥ purohita 13,051.006c niṣkrayārthaṃ bhagavato yathāha bhṛgunandanaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:5577: 13,051.008 nahuṣa uvāca 13,051.008a sahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ kṣipraṃ niṣādebhyaḥ pradīyatām 13,051.008c syād etat tu bhaven mūlyaṃ kiṃ vānyan manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5578: 13,051.009 cyavana uvāca 13,051.009a nāhaṃ śatasahasreṇa nimeyaḥ pārthivarṣabha

GE07mbh_13_u:5580: 13,051.010 nahuṣa uvāca 13,051.010a koṭiḥ pradīyatāṃ mūlyaṃ niṣādebhyaḥ purohita 13,051.010c yad etad api naupamyam ato bhūyaḥ pradīyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:5581: 13,051.011 cyavana uvāca 13,051.011a rājan nārhāmy ahaṃ koṭiṃ bhūyo vāpi mahādyute
GE07mbh_13_u:5582: 13,051.011c sadṛśaṃ dīyatāṃ mūlyaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha cintaya

GE07mbh_13_u:5584: 13,051.012d*0317_02 avilambitam ity evam ṛṣiḥ kaṣṭāt pramucyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:5585: 13,051.013 cyavana uvāca 13,051.013a ardharājyaṃ samagraṃ vā nāham arhāmi pārthiva
