GE07mbh_13_u:5587: 13,051.014 bhīṣma uvāca 13,051.014a maharṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā nahuṣo duḥkhakarśitaḥ 13,051.014c sa cintayām āsa tadā sahāmātyapurohitaḥ 13,051.015a tatra tv anyo vanacaraḥ kaś cin mūlaphalāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5589: 13,051.016a sa samābhāṣya rājānam abravīd dvijasattamaḥ 13,051.016c toṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ vipraṃ yathā tuṣṭo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:5590: 13,051.017a nāhaṃ mithyāvaco brūyāṃ svaireṣv api kuto 'nyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5591: 13,051.017c bhavato yad ahaṃ brūyāṃ tat kāryam aviśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_13_u:5592: 13,051.018 nahuṣa uvāca 13,051.018a bravītu bhagavān mūlyaṃ maharṣeḥ sadṛśaṃ bhṛgoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5593: 13,051.018c paritrāyasva mām asmād viṣayaṃ ca kulaṃ ca me 13,051.019a hanyād dhi bhagavān kruddhas trailokyam api kevalam
GE07mbh_13_u:5594: 13,051.019c kiṃ punar māṃ tapohīnaṃ bāhuvīryaparāyaṇam 13,051.020a agādhe 'mbhasi magnasya sāmātyasya sahartvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5595: 13,051.020c plavo bhava maharṣe tvaṃ kuru mūlyaviniścayam
GE07mbh_13_u:5596: 13,051.021 bhīṣma uvāca 13,051.021a nahuṣasya vacaḥ śrutvā gavijātaḥ pratāpavān 13,051.021c uvāca harṣayan sarvān amātyān pārthivaṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_13_u:5598: 13,051.021d*0318_01 brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ caiva kulam ekaṃ dvidhā kṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:5599: 13,051.021d*0318_02 ekatra mantrās tiṣṭhanti havir anyatra tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:5601: 13,051.022c gāvaś ca pṛthivīpāla gaur mūlyaṃ parikalpyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:5602: 13,051.023a nahuṣas tu tataḥ śrutvā maharṣer vacanaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:5604: 13,051.024a abhigamya bhṛgoḥ putraṃ cyavanaṃ saṃśitavratam 13,051.024c idaṃ provāca nṛpate vācā saṃtarpayann iva
GE07mbh_13_u:5606: 13,051.025c etan mūlyam ahaṃ manye tava dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:5607: 13,051.026 cyavana uvāca 13,051.026a uttiṣṭhāmy eṣa rājendra samyak krīto 'smi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:5608: 13,051.026c gobhis tulyaṃ na paśyāmi dhanaṃ kiṃ cid ihācyuta 13,051.027a kīrtanaṃ śravaṇaṃ dānaṃ darśanaṃ cāpi pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:5609: 13,051.027c gavāṃ praśasyate vīra sarvapāpaharaṃ śivam 13,051.028a gāvo lakṣmyāḥ sadā mūlaṃ goṣu pāpmā na vidyate 13,051.028c annam eva sadā gāvo devānāṃ paramaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5611: 13,051.029c gāvo yajñapraṇetryo vai tathā yajñasya tā mukham
GE07mbh_13_u:5612: 13,051.030a amṛtaṃ hy akṣayaṃ divyaṃ kṣaranti ca vahanti ca 13,051.030c amṛtāyatanaṃ caitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5613: 13,051.031a tejasā vapuṣā caiva gāvo vahnisamā bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:5614: 13,051.031c gāvo hi sumahat tejaḥ prāṇināṃ ca sukhapradāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5615: 13,051.032a niviṣṭaṃ gokulaṃ yatra śvāsaṃ muñcati nirbhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:5616: 13,051.032c virājayati taṃ deśaṃ pāpmānaṃ cāpakarṣati 13,051.033a gāvaḥ svargasya sopānaṃ gāvaḥ svarge 'pi pūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5617: 13,051.033c gāvaḥ kāmadughā devyo nānyat kiṃ cit paraṃ smṛtam 13,051.034a ity etad goṣu me proktaṃ māhātmyaṃ pārthivarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:5618: 13,051.034c guṇaikadeśavacanaṃ śakyaṃ pārāyaṇaṃ na tu 13,051.035 niṣādā ūcuḥ 13,051.035a darśanaṃ kathanaṃ caiva sahāsmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ mune
GE07mbh_13_u:5619: 13,051.035c satāṃ saptapadaṃ mitraṃ prasādaṃ naḥ kuru prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:5620: 13,051.036a havīṃṣi sarvāṇi yathā hy upabhuṅkte hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5621: 13,051.036c evaṃ tvam api dharmātman puruṣāgniḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_13_u:5622: 13,051.037a prasādayāmahe vidvan bhavantaṃ praṇatā vayam 13,051.037c anugrahārtham asmākam iyaṃ gauḥ pratigṛhyatām 13,051.037d*0319_01 atyantāpadi śaktānāṃ paritrāṇaṃ hi kurvatām 13,051.037d*0319_02 yā gatir viditā tv adya narake śaraṇaṃ bhavān 13,051.038 cyavana uvāca 13,051.038a kṛpaṇasya ca yac cakṣur muner āśīviṣasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5623: 13,051.038c naraṃ samūlaṃ dahati kakṣam agnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_13_u:5624: 13,051.039a pratigṛhṇāmi vo dhenuṃ kaivartā muktakilbiṣāḥ 13,051.039c divaṃ gacchata vai kṣipraṃ matsyair jāloddhṛtaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:5625: 13,051.040 bhīṣma uvāca 13,051.040a tatas tasya prasādāt te maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5626: 13,051.040c niṣādās tena vākyena saha matsyair divaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5627: 13,051.041a tataḥ sa rājā nahuṣo vismitaḥ prekṣya dhīvarān
GE07mbh_13_u:5628: 13,051.041c ārohamāṇāṃs tridivaṃ matsyāṃś ca bharatarṣabha 13,051.041d*0320_01 ārohaṇaṃ niṣādānāṃ matsyānāṃ caiva bhārata 13,051.042a tatas tau gavijaś caiva cyavanaś ca bhṛgūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5629: 13,051.042c varābhyām anurūpābhyāṃ chandayām āsatur nṛpam 13,051.043a tato rājā mahāvīryo nahuṣaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ 13,051.043c param ity abravīt prītas tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:5630: 13,051.044a tato jagrāha dharme sa sthitim indranibho nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5631: 13,051.044c tatheti coditaḥ prītas tāv ṛṣī pratyapūjayat
GE07mbh_13_u:5632: 13,051.045a samāptadīkṣaś cyavanas tato 'gacchat svam āśramam 13,051.045c gavijaś ca mahātejāḥ svam āśramapadaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:5633: 13,051.046a niṣādāś ca divaṃ jagmus te ca matsyā janādhipa 13,051.046c nahuṣo 'pi varaṃ labdhvā praviveśa puraṃ svakam 13,051.047a etat te kathitaṃ tāta yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi 13,051.047c darśane yādṛśaḥ snehaḥ saṃvāse ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:5634: 13,051.048a mahābhāgyaṃ gavāṃ caiva tathā dharmaviniścayam 13,051.048c kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathyatāṃ vīra kiṃ te hṛdi vivakṣitam 13,051.048d*0321_01 tvayāpi gauḥ pradātavyā sālaṃkārā bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:5635: 13,052.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,052.001a saṃśayo me mahāprājña sumahān sāgaropamaḥ 13,052.001c tan me śṛṇu mahābāho śrutvā cākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:5636: 13,052.002a kautūhalaṃ me sumahaj jāmadagnyaṃ prati prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:5637: 13,052.002c rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:5638: 13,052.002d*0322_01 brāhme bale supūrṇānām eteṣāṃ cyavanādinām 13,052.003a katham eṣa samutpanno rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 13,052.003c kathaṃ brahmarṣivaṃśe ca kṣatradharmā vyajāyata 13,052.004a tad asya saṃbhavaṃ rājan nikhilenānukīrtaya 13,052.004c kauśikāc ca kathaṃ vaṃśāt kṣatrād vai brāhmaṇo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:5639: 13,052.005a aho prabhāvaḥ sumahān āsīd vai sumahātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5640: 13,052.005c rāmasya ca naravyāghra viśvāmitrasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5641: 13,052.006a kathaṃ putrān atikramya teṣāṃ naptṛṣv athābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:5642: 13,052.006c eṣa doṣaḥ sutān hitvā tan me vyākhyātum arhasi 13,052.007 bhīṣma uvāca 13,052.007a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:5643: 13,052.007c cyavanasya ca saṃvādaṃ kuśikasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5644: 13,052.008a etaṃ doṣaṃ purā dṛṣṭvā bhārgavaś cyavanas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5647: 13,052.009c dagdhukāmaḥ kulaṃ sarvaṃ kuśikānāṃ tapodhanaḥ 13,052.010a cyavanas tam anuprāpya kuśikaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5648: 13,052.010c vastum icchā samutpannā tvayā saha mamānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:5649: 13,052.011 kuśika uvāca 13,052.011a bhagavan sahadharmo 'yaṃ paṇḍitair iha dhāryate
GE07mbh_13_u:5650: 13,052.011c pradānakāle kanyānām ucyate ca sadā budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5651: 13,052.012a yat tu tāvad atikrāntaṃ dharmadvāraṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_13_u:5652: 13,052.012c tat kāryaṃ prakariṣyāmi tad anujñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:5653: 13,052.013 bhīṣma uvāca 13,052.013a athāsanam upādāya cyavanasya mahāmuneḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5654: 13,052.013c kuśiko bhāryayā sārdham ājagāma yato muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5655: 13,052.014a pragṛhya rājā bhṛṅgāraṃ pādyam asmai nyavedayat
GE07mbh_13_u:5656: 13,052.014c kārayām āsa sarvāś ca kriyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5657: 13,052.015a tataḥ sa rājā cyavanaṃ madhuparkaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:5659: 13,052.016a satkṛtya sa tathā vipram idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5660: 13,052.016c bhagavan paravantau svo brūhi kiṃ karavāvahe
GE07mbh_13_u:5661: 13,052.017a yadi rājyaṃ yadi dhanaṃ yadi gāḥ saṃśitavrata
GE07mbh_13_u:5662: 13,052.017c yajñadānāni ca tathā brūhi sarvaṃ dadāmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:5663: 13,052.018a idaṃ gṛham idaṃ rājyam idaṃ dharmāsanaṃ ca te 13,052.018c rājā tvam asi śādhy urvīṃ bhṛtyo 'haṃ paravāṃs tvayi 13,052.019a evam ukte tato vākye cyavano bhārgavas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5664: 13,052.019c kuśikaṃ pratyuvācedaṃ mudā paramayā yutaḥ 13,052.020a na rājyaṃ kāmaye rājan na dhanaṃ na ca yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5665: 13,052.020c na ca gā na ca te deśān na yajñāñ śrūyatām idam 13,052.021a niyamaṃ kaṃ cid ārapsye yuvayor yadi rocate
GE07mbh_13_u:5667: 13,052.022a evam ukte tadā tena daṃpatī tau jaharṣatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5668: 13,052.022c pratyabrūtāṃ ca tam ṛṣim evam astv iti bhārata 13,052.023a atha taṃ kuśiko hṛṣṭaḥ prāveśayad anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:5669: 13,052.023c gṛhoddeśaṃ tatas tatra darśanīyam adarśayat 13,052.024a iyaṃ śayyā bhagavato yathākāmam ihoṣyatām 13,052.024c prayatiṣyāvahe prītim āhartuṃ te tapodhana 13,052.025a atha sūryo 'ticakrāma teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5670: 13,052.025c atharṣiś codayām āsa pānam annaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5671: 13,052.026a tam apṛcchat tato rājā kuśikaḥ praṇatas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5672: 13,052.026c kim annajātam iṣṭaṃ te kim upasthāpayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:5673: 13,052.027a tataḥ sa parayā prītyā pratyuvāca janādhipam
GE07mbh_13_u:5675: 13,052.028a tad vacaḥ pūjayitvā tu tathety āha sa pārthivaḥ 13,052.028c yathopapannaṃ cāhāraṃ tasmai prādāj janādhipaḥ 13,052.029a tataḥ sa bhagavān bhuktvā daṃpatī prāha dharmavit
GE07mbh_13_u:5676: 13,052.029c svaptum icchāmy ahaṃ nidrā bādhate mām iti prabho 13,052.030a tataḥ śayyāgṛhaṃ prāpya bhagavān ṛṣisattamaḥ 13,052.030c saṃviveśa narendras tu sapatnīkaḥ sthito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:5677: 13,052.031a na prabodhyo 'smi saṃsupta ity uvācātha bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5678: 13,052.031c saṃvāhitavyau pādau me jāgartavyaṃ ca vāṃ niśi
GE07mbh_13_u:5679: 13,052.032a aviśaṅkaś ca kuśikas tathety āha sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_13_u:5680: 13,052.032c na prabodhayatāṃ taṃ ca tau tadā rajanīkṣaye
GE07mbh_13_u:5681: 13,052.033a yathādeśaṃ maharṣes tu śuśrūṣāparamau tadā 13,052.033c babhūvatur mahārāja prayatāv atha daṃpatī 13,052.034a tataḥ sa bhagavān vipraḥ samādiśya narādhipam
GE07mbh_13_u:5684: 13,052.035a sa tu rājā nirāhāraḥ sabhāryaḥ kurunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:5685: 13,052.035c paryupāsata taṃ hṛṣṭaś cyavanārādhane rataḥ 13,052.036a bhārgavas tu samuttasthau svayam eva tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5686: 13,052.036c akiṃcid uktvā tu gṛhān niścakrāma mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5687: 13,052.037a tam anvagacchatāṃ tau tu kṣudhitau śramakarśitau
GE07mbh_13_u:5688: 13,052.037c bhāryāpatī muniśreṣṭho na ca tāv avalokayat
GE07mbh_13_u:5689: 13,052.038a tayos tu prekṣator eva bhārgavāṇāṃ kulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5691: 13,052.039a sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya saha devyā mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5692: 13,052.039c punar anveṣaṇe yatnam akarot paramaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5693: 13,053.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,053.001a tasminn antarhite vipre rājā kim akarot tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5694: 13,053.001c bhāryā cāsya mahābhāgā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:5695: 13,053.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,053.002a adṛṣṭvā sa mahīpālas tam ṛṣiṃ saha bhāryayā
GE07mbh_13_u:5697: 13,053.003a sa praviśya purīṃ dīno nābhyabhāṣata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5698: 13,053.003c tad eva cintayām āsa cyavanasya viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_13_u:5699: 13,053.004a atha śūnyena manasā praviveśa gṛhaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5700: 13,053.004c dadarśa śayane tasmiñ śayānaṃ bhṛgunandanam 13,053.005a vismitau tau tu dṛṣṭvā taṃ tad āścaryaṃ vicintya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:5701: 13,053.005c darśanāt tasya ca muner viśrāntau saṃbabhūvatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5702: 13,053.006a yathāsthānaṃ tu tau sthitvā bhūyas taṃ saṃvavāhatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5703: 13,053.006c athāpareṇa pārśvena suṣvāpa sa mahāmuniḥ 13,053.007a tenaiva ca sa kālena pratyabudhyata
GE07mbh_13_u:5704: 13,053.007c na ca tau cakratuḥ kiṃ cid vikāraṃ bhayaśaṅkitau 13,053.008a pratibuddhas tu sa munis tau provāca viśāṃ pate 13,053.008c tailābhyaṅgo dīyatāṃ me snāsye 'ham iti bhārata 13,053.008d*0324_01 athāha bhagavāṃs tau tu pratibuddho viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:5705: 13,053.008d*0324_02 tailābhyaṅgaṃ prayacchetāṃ snātum icchāmi pārthiva 13,053.009a tatheti tau pratiśrutya kṣudhitau śramakarśitau 13,053.009c śatapākena tailena mahārheṇopatasthatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5706: 13,053.010a tataḥ sukhāsīnam ṛṣiṃ vāgyatau saṃvavāhatuḥ 13,053.010c na ca paryāptam ity āha bhārgavaḥ sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5707: 13,053.011a yadā tau nirvikārau tu lakṣayām āsa bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5708: 13,053.011c tata utthāya sahasā snānaśālāṃ viveśa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5709: 13,053.011e kḷptam eva tu tatrāsīt snānīyaṃ pārthivocitam
GE07mbh_13_u:5710: 13,053.012a asatkṛtya tu tat sarvaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata 13,053.012c sa muniḥ punar evātha nṛpateḥ paśyatas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5711: 13,053.012e nāsūyāṃ cakratus tau ca daṃpatī bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:5712: 13,053.013a atha snātaḥ sa bhagavān siṃhāsanagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5713: 13,053.013c darśayām āsa kuśikaṃ sabhāryaṃ bhṛgunandanaḥ 13,053.014a saṃhṛṣṭavadano rājā sabhāryaḥ kuśiko munim 13,053.014c siddham annam iti prahvo nirvikāro nyavedayat
GE07mbh_13_u:5714: 13,053.015a ānīyatām iti munis taṃ covāca narādhipam
GE07mbh_13_u:5715: 13,053.015c rājā ca samupājahre tadannaṃ saha bhāryayā
GE07mbh_13_u:5716: 13,053.016a māṃsaprakārān vividhāñ śākāni vividhāni ca 13,053.016c vesavāravikārāṃś ca pānakāni laghūni ca 13,053.017a rasālāpūpakāṃś citrān modakān atha ṣāḍavān 13,053.017c rasān nānāprakārāṃś ca vanyaṃ ca munibhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:5717: 13,053.018a phalāni ca vicitrāṇi tathā bhojyāni bhūriśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5718: 13,053.018c badareṅgudakāśmaryabhallātakavaṭāni ca 13,053.019a gṛhasthānāṃ ca yad bhojyaṃ yac cāpi vanavāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:5719: 13,053.019c sarvam āhārayām āsa rājā śāpabhayān muneḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5720: 13,053.020a atha sarvam upanyastam agrataś cyavanasya tat
GE07mbh_13_u:5721: 13,053.020c tataḥ sarvaṃ samānīya tac ca śayyāsanaṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5722: 13,053.021a vastraiḥ śubhair avacchādya bhojanopaskaraiḥ saha 13,053.021c sarvam ādīpayām āsa cyavano bhṛgunandanaḥ 13,053.022a na ca tau cakratuḥ kopaṃ daṃpatī sumahāvratau
GE07mbh_13_u:5724: 13,053.023a tatraiva ca sa rājarṣis tasthau tāṃ rajanīṃ tadā 13,053.023c sabhāryo vāgyataḥ śrīmān na ca taṃ kopa āviśat 13,053.024a nityaṃ saṃskṛtam annaṃ tu vividhaṃ rājaveśmani
GE07mbh_13_u:5725: 13,053.024c śayanāni ca mukhyāni pariṣekāś ca puṣkalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5726: 13,053.025a vastraṃ ca vividhākāram abhavat samupārjitam 13,053.025c na śaśāka tato draṣṭum antaraṃ cyavanas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5727: 13,053.026a punar eva ca viprarṣiḥ provāca kuśikaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_13_u:5728: 13,053.026c sabhāryo māṃ rathenāśu vaha yatra bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:5729: 13,053.027a tatheti ca prāha nṛpo nirviśaṅkas tapodhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:5731: 13,053.028a ity uktaḥ sa munis tena rājñā hṛṣṭena tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5733: 13,053.029a sajjīkuru rathaṃ kṣipraṃ yas te sāṃgrāmiko mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5734: 13,053.029c sāyudhaḥ sapatākaś ca saśaktiḥ kaṇayaṣṭimān 13,053.030a kiṅkiṇīśatanirghoṣo yuktas tomarakalpanaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5736: 13,053.031a tataḥ sa taṃ tathety uktvā kalpayitvā mahāratham
GE07mbh_13_u:5737: 13,053.031c bhāryāṃ vāme dhuri tadā cātmānaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5738: 13,053.032a tridaṃṣṭraṃ vajrasūcyagraṃ pratodaṃ tatra cādadhat 13,053.032c sarvam etat tato dattvā nṛpo vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5739: 13,053.033a bhagavan kva ratho yātu bravītu bhṛgunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5740: 13,053.033c yatra vakṣyasi viprarṣe tatra yāsyati te rathaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5741: 13,053.034a evam uktas tu bhagavān pratyuvācātha taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_13_u:5742: 13,053.034c itaḥprabhṛti yātavyaṃ padakaṃ padakaṃ śanaiḥ 13,053.035a śramo mama yathā na syāt tathā me chandacāriṇau 13,053.035c sukhaṃ caivāsmi voḍhavyo janaḥ sarvaś ca paśyatu
GE07mbh_13_u:5743: 13,053.036a notsāryaḥ pathikaḥ kaś cit tebhyo dāsyāmy ahaṃ vasu 13,053.036c brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ye kāmān arthayiṣyanti māṃ pathi
GE07mbh_13_u:5744: 13,053.037a sarvaṃ dāsyāmy aśeṣeṇa dhanaṃ ratnāni caiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:5745: 13,053.037c kriyatāṃ nikhilenaitan mā vicāraya pārthiva 13,053.038a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā bhṛtyān athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:5746: 13,053.038c yad yad brūyān munis tat tat sarvaṃ deyam aśaṅkitaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5747: 13,053.039a tato ratnāny anekāni striyo yugyam ajāvikam
GE07mbh_13_u:5748: 13,053.039c kṛtākṛtaṃ ca kanakaṃ gajendrāś cācalopamāḥ 13,053.040a anvagacchanta tam ṛṣiṃ rājāmātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5749: 13,053.040c hāhābhūtaṃ ca tat sarvam āsīn nagaram ārtimat
GE07mbh_13_u:5750: 13,053.041a tau tīkṣṇāgreṇa sahasā pratodena pracoditau 13,053.041c pṛṣṭhe viddhau kaṭe caiva nirvikārau tam ūhatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5752: 13,053.042c kathaṃ cid ūhatur vīrau daṃpatī taṃ rathottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:5753: 13,053.043a bahuśo bhṛśaviddhau tau kṣaramāṇau kṣatodbhavam 13,053.043c dadṛśāte mahārāja puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau 13,053.044a tau dṛṣṭvā pauravargas tu bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5754: 13,053.044c abhiśāpabhayāt trasto na ca kiṃ cid uvāca ha 13,053.045a dvandvaśaś cābruvan sarve paśyadhvaṃ tapaso balam
GE07mbh_13_u:5755: 13,053.045c kruddhā api muniśreṣṭhaṃ vīkṣituṃ naiva śaknumaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5756: 13,053.045d*0325_01 brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran nānyo varṇaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:5757: 13,053.045d*0325_02 īdṛśaṃ ratham āruhya ko 'nyo jīvitum utsahet 13,053.046a aho bhagavato vīryaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ 13,053.046c rājñaś cāpi sabhāryasya dhairyaṃ paśyata yādṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:5758: 13,053.047a śrāntāv api hi kṛcchreṇa ratham etaṃ samūhatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5759: 13,053.047c na caitayor vikāraṃ vai dadarśa bhṛgunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5760: 13,053.048 bhīṣma uvāca 13,053.048a tataḥ sa nirvikārau tau dṛṣṭvā bhṛgukulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5761: 13,053.048c vasu viśrāṇayām āsa yathā vaiśravaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:5762: 13,053.049a tatrāpi rājā prītātmā yathājñaptam athākarot 13,053.049c tato 'sya bhagavān prīto babhūva munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5763: 13,053.050a avatīrya rathaśreṣṭhād daṃpatī tau mumoca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5764: 13,053.050c vimocya caitau vidhivat tato vākyam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5766: 13,053.051c dadāni vāṃ varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tad brūtām iti bhārata 13,053.052a sukumārau ca tau vidvān karābhyāṃ munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5768: 13,053.053a athābravīn nṛpo vākyaṃ śramo nāsty āvayor iha
GE07mbh_13_u:5769: 13,053.053c viśrāntau svaḥ prabhāvāt te dhyānenaiveti bhārgava
GE07mbh_13_u:5770: 13,053.054a atha tau bhagavān prāha prahṛṣṭaś cyavanas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5771: 13,053.054c na vṛthā vyāhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yan mayā tad bhaviṣyati 13,053.055a ramaṇīyaḥ samuddeśo gaṅgātīram idaṃ śubham 13,053.055c kaṃ cit kālaṃ vrataparo nivatsyāmīha pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:5772: 13,053.056a gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ putra viśrāntaḥ punar eṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:5773: 13,053.056c ihasthaṃ māṃ sabhāryas tvaṃ draṣṭāsi śvo narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:5774: 13,053.057a na ca manyus tvayā kāryaḥ śreyas te samupasthitam 13,053.057c yat kāṅkṣitaṃ hṛdisthaṃ te tat sarvaṃ saṃbhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:5775: 13,053.058a ity evam uktaḥ kuśikaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā 13,053.058c provāca muniśārdūlam idaṃ vacanam arthavat 13,053.059a na me manyur mahābhāga pūto 'smi bhagavaṃs tvayā 13,053.059c saṃvṛttau yauvanasthau svo vapuṣmantau balānvitau 13,053.060a pratodena vraṇā ye me sabhāryasya kṛtās tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:5776: 13,053.060c tān na paśyāmi gātreṣu svastho 'smi saha bhāryayā 13,053.061a imāṃ ca devīṃ paśyāmi mune divyāpsaropamām
GE07mbh_13_u:5777: 13,053.061c śriyā paramayā yuktāṃ yathādṛṣṭāṃ mayā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:5778: 13,053.062a tava prasādāt saṃvṛttam idaṃ sarvaṃ mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:5779: 13,053.062c naitac citraṃ tu bhagavaṃs tvayi satyaparākrama
GE07mbh_13_u:5780: 13,053.063a ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ cyavanaḥ kuśikaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5781: 13,053.063c āgacchethāḥ sabhāryaś ca tvam iheti narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:5782: 13,053.064a ity uktaḥ samanujñāto rājarṣir abhivādya tam
GE07mbh_13_u:5783: 13,053.064c prayayau vapuṣā yukto nagaraṃ devarājavat 13,053.065a tata enam upājagmur amātyāḥ sapurohitāḥ 13,053.065c balasthā gaṇikāyuktāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tathā 13,053.066a tair vṛtaḥ kuśiko rājā śriyā paramayā jvalan
GE07mbh_13_u:5785: 13,053.067a tataḥ praviśya nagaraṃ kṛtvā sarvāhṇikakriyāḥ 13,053.067c bhuktvā sabhāryo rajanīm uvāsa sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5786: 13,053.068a tatas tu tau navam abhivīkṣya yauvanaṃ; parasparaṃ vigatajarāv ivāmarau
GE07mbh_13_u:5787: 13,053.068c nanandatuḥ śayanagatau vapurdharau; śriyā yutau dvijavaradattayā tayā 13,053.069a sa cāpy ṛṣir bhṛgukulakīrtivardhanas; tapodhano vanam abhirāmam ṛddhimat 13,053.069c manīṣayā bahuvidharatnabhūṣitaṃ; sasarja yan nāsti śatakrator api 13,054.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,054.001a tataḥ sa rājā rātryante pratibuddho mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5788: 13,054.001c kṛtapūrvāhṇikaḥ prāyāt sabhāryas tad vanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:5789: 13,054.002a tato dadarśa nṛpatiḥ prāsādaṃ sarvakāñcanam 13,054.002c maṇistambhasahasrāḍhyaṃ gandharvanagaropamam 13,054.002e tatra divyān abhiprāyān dadarśa kuśikas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:5790: 13,054.003a parvatān ramyasānūṃś ca nalinīś ca sapaṅkajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5791: 13,054.003c citraśālāś ca vividhās toraṇāni ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5793: 13,054.004a sahakārān praphullāṃś ca ketakoddālakān dhavān 13,054.004c aśokān mucukundāṃś ca phullāṃś caivātimuktakān 13,054.005a campakāṃs tilakān bhavyān panasān vañjulān api
GE07mbh_13_u:5794: 13,054.005c puṣpitān karṇikārāṃś ca tatra tatra dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5795: 13,054.006a śyāmāṃ vāraṇapuṣpīṃ ca tathāṣṭāpadikāṃ latām 13,054.006c tatra tatra parikḷptā dadarśa sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5798: 13,054.008a śītalāni ca toyāni kva cid uṣṇāni bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:5801: 13,054.009c bhakṣyabhojyam anantaṃ ca tatra tatropakalpitam 13,054.010a vāṇīvādāñ chukāṃś cāpi śārikābhṛṅgarājakān
GE07mbh_13_u:5803: 13,054.011a mayūrān kukkuṭāṃś cāpi putrakāñ jīvajīvakān 13,054.011c cakorān vānarān haṃsān sārasāṃś cakrasāhvayān 13,054.012a samantataḥ praṇaditān dadarśa sumanoharān
GE07mbh_13_u:5804: 13,054.012c kva cid apsarasāṃ saṃghān gandharvāṇāṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:5805: 13,054.013a kāntābhir aparāṃs tatra pariṣvaktān dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:5806: 13,054.013c na dadarśa ca tān bhūyo dadarśa ca punar nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5808: 13,054.014c haṃsān sumadhurāṃś cāpi tatra śuśrāva pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5809: 13,054.015a taṃ dṛṣṭvātyadbhutaṃ rājā manasācintayat tadā 13,054.015c svapno 'yaṃ cittavibhraṃśa utāho satyam eva tu 13,054.016a aho saha śarīreṇa prāpto 'smi paramāṃ gatim 13,054.016c uttarān vā kurūn puṇyān atha vāpy amarāvatīm
GE07mbh_13_u:5810: 13,054.017a kiṃ tv idaṃ mahad āścaryaṃ saṃpaśyāmīty acintayat
GE07mbh_13_u:5811: 13,054.017c evaṃ saṃcintayann eva dadarśa munipuṃgavam 13,054.018a tasmin vimāne sauvarṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:5812: 13,054.018c mahārhe śayane divye śayānaṃ bhṛgunandanam 13,054.019a tam abhyayāt praharṣeṇa narendraḥ saha bhāryayā
GE07mbh_13_u:5813: 13,054.019c antarhitas tato bhūyaś cyavanaḥ śayanaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:5814: 13,054.020a tato 'nyasmin vanoddeśe punar eva dadarśa tam 13,054.020c kauśyāṃ bṛsyāṃ samāsīnaṃ japamānaṃ mahāvratam 13,054.020e evaṃ yogabalād vipro mohayām āsa pārthivam
GE07mbh_13_u:5815: 13,054.021a kṣaṇena tad vanaṃ caiva te caivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:5816: 13,054.021c gandharvāḥ pādapāś caiva sarvam antaradhīyata 13,054.022a niḥśabdam abhavac cāpi gaṅgākūlaṃ punar nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:5817: 13,054.022c kuśavalmīkabhūyiṣṭhaṃ babhūva ca yathā purā 13,054.023a tataḥ sa rājā kuśikaḥ sabhāryas tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:5818: 13,054.023c vismayaṃ paramaṃ prāptas tad dṛṣṭvā mahad adbhutam

GE07mbh_13_u:6035: 13,058.034c āśīviṣān iva kruddhāṃs tān upācarata dvijān

GE07mbh_13_u:6037: 13,058.035c kṣatriyāṇāṃ pratapatāṃ tejasā ca balena ca

GE07mbh_13_u:6042: 13,058.038a bravīmi satyam etac ca yathāhaṃ pāṇḍunandana

GE07mbh_13_u:6049: 13,059.003c brāhmaṇo dhṛtimān vidvān devān prīṇāti tuṣṭimān

GE07mbh_13_u:6058: 13,059.008a tapasā dīpyamānās te daheyuḥ pṛthivīm api
GE07mbh_13_u:6059: 13,059.008b*0332_01 apūjyamānāḥ kauravya pūjārhās te tathāvidhāḥ 13,059.008c pūjyā hi jñānavijñānatapoyogasamanvitāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6074: 13,059.019c viśiṣṭaḥ sarvayajñebhyo nityaṃ tāta pravartatām 13,059.019d*0333_01 yat kiṃ cit pāṇḍaraṃ puṣpaṃ yat kiṃ cid anulepanam
GE07mbh_13_u:6076: 13,060.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,060.001a dānaṃ yajñakriyā ceha kiṃ svit pretya mahāphalam

GE07mbh_13_u:6079: 13,060.002a etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ yāthātathyena bhārata 13,060.002c vidvañ jijñāsamānāya dānadharmān pracakṣva me 13,060.003a antarvedyāṃ ca yad dattaṃ śraddhayā cānṛśaṃsyataḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6081: 13,060.004c tasya vaitānikaṃ karma dānaṃ caiveha pāvanam
GE07mbh_13_u:6082: 13,060.005a na tu pāpakṛtāṃ rājñāṃ pratigṛhṇanti sādhavaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6089: 13,060.009c pūjayethā yāyajūkāṃs tavāpy aṃśo bhaved yathā

GE07mbh_13_u:6093: 13,060.010a prajāvato bharethāś ca brāhmaṇān bahubhāriṇaḥ 13,060.010c prajāvāṃs tena bhavati yathā janayitā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:6094: 13,060.011a yāvato vai sādhudharmān santaḥ saṃvartayanty uta

GE07mbh_13_u:6249: 13,061.078c gośvavāhanasaṃpūrṇāṃ bāhuvīryasamārjitām 13,061.078d*0348_01 vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ svargaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6251: 13,061.079c akṣayāṃl labhate lokān bhūmisatraṃ hi tasya tat

GE07mbh_13_u:6260: 13,061.087a ājñā sadāpratihatā jayaśabdo bhavaty atha 13,061.087c bhūmidānasya puṣpāṇi phalaṃ svargaḥ puraṃdara 13,061.088a hiraṇyapuṣpāś cauṣadhyaḥ kuśakāñcanaśāḍvalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6261: 13,061.088c amṛtaprasavāṃ bhūmiṃ prāpnoti puruṣo dadat 13,061.089a nāsti bhūmisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6262: 13,061.089c nāsti satyasamo dharmo nāsti dānasamo nidhiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6267: 13,061.092a akṣayaṃ ca bhaved dattaṃ pitṛbhyas tan na saṃśayaḥ 13,061.092c tasmāc chrāddheṣv idaṃ vipro bhuñjataḥ śrāvayed dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:6268: 13,061.093a ity etat sarvadānānāṃ śreṣṭham uktaṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:6269: 13,061.093c mayā bharataśārdūla kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:6270: 13,062.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,062.001a kāni dānāni loke 'smin dātukāmo mahīpatiḥ 13,062.001c guṇādhikebhyo viprebhyo dadyād bharatasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:6271: 13,062.002a kena tuṣyanti te sadyas tuṣṭāḥ kiṃ pradiśanty uta 13,062.002c śaṃsa me tan mahābāho phalaṃ puṇyakṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:6272: 13,062.003a dattaṃ kiṃ phalavad rājann iha loke paratra ca 13,062.003c bhavataḥ śrotum icchāmi tan me vistarato vada
GE07mbh_13_u:6273: 13,062.004 bhīṣma uvāca 13,062.004a imam arthaṃ purā pṛṣṭo nārado devadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6274: 13,062.004c yad uktavān asau tan me gadataḥ śṛṇu bhārata 13,062.005 nārada uvāca 13,062.005a annam eva praśaṃsanti devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:6275: 13,062.005c lokatantraṃ hi yajñāś ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:6276: 13,062.006a annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:6277: 13,062.006c tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātum icchanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6278: 13,062.007a annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke prāṇāś cānne pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6279: 13,062.007c annena dhāryate sarvaṃ viśvaṃ jagad idaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:6280: 13,062.008a annād gṛhasthā loke 'smin bhikṣavas tata eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6281: 13,062.008c annāt prabhavati prāṇaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6283: 13,062.009c dātavyaṃ bhikṣave cānnam ātmano bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:6284: 13,062.010a brāhmaṇāyābhirūpāya yo dadyād annam arthine 13,062.010c nidadhāti nidhiṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pāralaukikam ātmanaḥ 13,062.011a śrāntam adhvani vartantaṃ vṛddham arham upasthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:6285: 13,062.011c arcayed bhūtim anvicchan gṛhastho gṛham āgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:6286: 13,062.012a krodham utpatitaṃ hitvā suśīlo vītamatsaraḥ 13,062.012c annadaḥ prāpnute rājan divi ceha ca yat sukham 13,062.013a nāvamanyed abhigataṃ na praṇudyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:6287: 13,062.013c api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṃ vipraṇaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:6288: 13,062.014a yo dadyād aparikliṣṭam annam adhvani vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:6289: 13,062.014c śrāntāyādṛṣṭapūrvāya sa mahad dharmam āpnuyāt 13,062.015a pitṝn devān ṛṣīn viprān atithīṃś ca janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:6290: 13,062.015c yo naraḥ prīṇayaty annais tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:6291: 13,062.016a kṛtvāpi pāpakaṃ karma yo dadyād annam arthine
GE07mbh_13_u:6292: 13,062.016c brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6293: 13,062.017a brāhmaṇeṣv akṣayaṃ dānam annaṃ śūdre mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:6294: 13,062.017c annadānaṃ ca śūdre ca brāhmaṇe ca viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6295: 13,062.018a na pṛcched gotracaraṇaṃ svādhyāyaṃ deśam eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:6296: 13,062.018c bhikṣito brāhmaṇeneha janma vānnaṃ prayācitaḥ 13,062.018d*0350_01 āśayābhyāgataṃ vipraṃ bhojanārtham upasthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:6298: 13,062.019c bhavantīhātha vāmutra nṛpate nātra saṃśayaḥ 13,062.020a āśaṃsante hi pitaraḥ suvṛṣṭim iva karṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6299: 13,062.020c asmākam api putro vā pautro vānnaṃ pradāsyati
GE07mbh_13_u:6300: 13,062.021a brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ svayaṃ dehīti yācate
GE07mbh_13_u:6301: 13,062.021c akāmo vā sakāmo vā dattvā puṇyam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:6303: 13,062.022c viprā yam abhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇā gṛhaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:6304: 13,062.023a satkṛtāś ca nivartante tad atīva pravardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:6305: 13,062.023c mahābhoge kule janma pretya prāpnoti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:6306: 13,062.024a dattvā tv annaṃ naro loke tathā sthānam anuttamam 13,062.024c mṛṣṭamṛṣṭānnadāyī tu svarge vasati satkṛtaḥ 13,062.025a annaṃ prāṇā narāṇāṃ hi sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:6307: 13,062.025c annadaḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavān api
GE07mbh_13_u:6308: 13,062.026a prāṇavāṃś cāpi bhavati rūpavāṃś ca tathā nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:6309: 13,062.026c annadaḥ prāṇado loke sarvadaḥ procyate tu saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6310: 13,062.027a annaṃ hi dattvātithaye brāhmaṇāya yathāvidhi 13,062.027c pradātā sukham āpnoti devaiś cāpy abhipūjyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6311: 13,062.028a brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ kṣetraṃ carati pādavat
GE07mbh_13_u:6312: 13,062.028c upyate tatra yad bījaṃ tad dhi puṇyaphalaṃ mahat 13,062.029a pratyakṣaṃ prītijananaṃ bhoktṛdātror bhavaty uta 13,062.029c sarvāṇy anyāni dānāni parokṣaphalavanty uta 13,062.030a annād dhi prasavaṃ viddhi ratim annād dhi bhārata 13,062.030c dharmārthāv annato viddhi roganāśaṃ tathānnataḥ 13,062.031a annaṃ hy amṛtam ity āha purākalpe prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6313: 13,062.031c annaṃ bhuvaṃ divaṃ khaṃ ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam 13,062.032a annapraṇāśe bhidyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ 13,062.032c balaṃ balavato 'pīha praṇaśyaty annahānitaḥ 13,062.033a āvāhāś ca vivāhāś ca yajñāś cānnam ṛte tathā 13,062.033c na vartante naraśreṣṭha brahma cātra pralīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6314: 13,062.034a annataḥ sarvam etad dhi yat kiṃ cit sthāṇu jaṅgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:6315: 13,062.034c triṣu lokeṣu dharmārtham annaṃ deyam ato budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6316: 13,062.035a annadasya manuṣyasya balam ojo yaśaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:6317: 13,062.035c kīrtiś ca vardhate śaśvat triṣu lokeṣu pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:6318: 13,062.036a megheṣv ambhaḥ saṃnidhatte prāṇānāṃ pavanaḥ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6319: 13,062.036c tac ca meghagataṃ vāri śakro varṣati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:6320: 13,062.037a ādatte ca rasaṃ bhaumam ādityaḥ svagabhastibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6321: 13,062.037c vāyur ādityatas tāṃś ca rasān devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6322: 13,062.038a tad yadā meghato vāri patitaṃ bhavati kṣitau
GE07mbh_13_u:6323: 13,062.038c tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:6324: 13,062.039a tataḥ sasyāni rohanti yena vartayate jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:6326: 13,062.040a saṃbhavanti tataḥ śukrāt prāṇinaḥ pṛthivīpate 13,062.040c agnīṣomau hi tac chukraṃ prajanaḥ puṣyataś ca ha 13,062.041a evam annaṃ ca sūryaś ca pavanaḥ śukram eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6327: 13,062.041c eka eva smṛto rāśir yato bhūtāni jajñire
GE07mbh_13_u:6328: 13,062.042a prāṇān dadāti bhūtānāṃ tejaś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:6329: 13,062.042c gṛham abhyāgatāyāśu yo dadyād annam arthine
GE07mbh_13_u:6330: 13,062.043 bhīṣma uvāca 13,062.043a nāradenaivam ukto 'ham adām annaṃ sadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:6331: 13,062.043c anasūyus tvam apy annaṃ tasmād dehi gatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6332: 13,062.044a dattvānnaṃ vidhivad rājan viprebhyas tvam api prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:6333: 13,062.044c yathāvad anurūpebhyas tataḥ svargam avāpsyasi 13,062.045a annadānāṃ hi ye lokās tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇu narādhipa 13,062.045c bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣāṃ mahātmanām 13,062.045e nānāsaṃsthānarūpāṇi nānāstambhānvitāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6339: 13,062.048c vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpā dīrghikāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6340: 13,062.049a ghoṣavanti ca yānāni yuktāny atha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6341: 13,062.049c bhakṣyabhojyamayāḥ śailā vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca 13,062.050a kṣīraṃ sravantyaḥ saritas tathā caivānnaparvatāḥ 13,062.050c prāsādāḥ pāṇḍurābhrābhāḥ śayyāś ca kanakojjvalāḥ 13,062.050e tān annadāḥ prapadyante tasmād annaprado bhava
GE07mbh_13_u:6342: 13,062.051a ete lokāḥ puṇyakṛtām annadānāṃ mahātmanām 13,062.051c tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātavyaṃ mānavair bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:6343: 13,063.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,063.001a śrutaṃ me bhavato vākyam annadānasya yo vidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6345: 13,063.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,063.002a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:6346: 13,063.002c devakyāś caiva saṃvādaṃ devarṣer nāradasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6348: 13,063.003c papracchainaṃ tataḥ praśnaṃ devakī dharmadarśinī 13,063.004a tasyāḥ saṃpṛcchamānāyā devarṣir nāradas tadā 13,063.004c ācaṣṭa vidhivat sarvaṃ yat tac chṛṇu viśāṃ pate 13,063.005 nārada uvāca 13,063.005a kṛttikāsu mahābhāge pāyasena sasarpiṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:6349: 13,063.005c saṃtarpya brāhmaṇān sādhūṃl lokān āpnoty anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:6350: 13,063.006a rohiṇyāṃ prathitair māṃsair māṣair annena sarpiṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:6352: 13,063.007a dogdhrīṃ dattvā savatsāṃ tu nakṣatre somadaivate
GE07mbh_13_u:6353: 13,063.007c gacchanti mānuṣāl lokāt svargalokam anuttamam 13,063.008a ārdrāyāṃ kṛsaraṃ dattvā tailamiśram upoṣitaḥ 13,063.008c naras tarati durgāṇi kṣuradhārāṃś ca parvatān
GE07mbh_13_u:6354: 13,063.009a apūpān punarvasau dattvā tathaivānnāni śobhane 13,063.009c yaśasvī rūpasaṃpanno bahvanne jāyate kule 13,063.010a puṣye tu kanakaṃ dattvā kṛtaṃ cākṛtam eva ca 13,063.010c anālokeṣu lokeṣu somavat sa virājate 13,063.011a āśleṣāyāṃ tu yo rūpyam ṛṣabhaṃ vā prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:6358: 13,063.012c pradāya putrapaśumān iha pretya ca modate
GE07mbh_13_u:6360: 13,063.013c bhakṣān phāṇitasaṃyuktān dattvā saubhāgyam ṛcchati 13,063.014a ghṛtakṣīrasamāyuktaṃ vidhivat ṣaṣṭikaudanam
GE07mbh_13_u:6362: 13,063.015a yad yat pradīyate dānam uttarāviṣaye naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6363: 13,063.015c mahāphalam anantaṃ ca bhavatīti viniścayaḥ 13,063.016a haste hastirathaṃ dattvā caturyuktam upoṣitaḥ 13,063.016c prāpnoti paramāṃl lokān puṇyakāmasamanvitān
GE07mbh_13_u:6364: 13,063.017a citrāyām ṛṣabhaṃ dattvā puṇyān gandhāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:6365: 13,063.017c caraty apsarasāṃ loke ramate nandane tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:6366: 13,063.018a svātāv atha dhanaṃ dattvā yad iṣṭatamam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6367: 13,063.018c prāpnoti lokān sa śubhān iha caiva mahad yaśaḥ 13,063.019a viśākhāyām anaḍvāhaṃ dhenuṃ dattvā ca dugdhadām
GE07mbh_13_u:6368: 13,063.019c saprāsaṅgaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ sadhānyaṃ vastrasaṃyutam 13,063.020a pitṝn devāṃś ca prīṇāti pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:6369: 13,063.020c na ca durgāṇy avāpnoti svargalokaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:6370: 13,063.021a dattvā yathoktaṃ viprebhyo vṛttim iṣṭāṃ sa vindati
GE07mbh_13_u:6371: 13,063.021c narakādīṃś ca saṃkleśān nāpnotīti viniścayaḥ 13,063.022a anurādhāsu prāvāraṃ vastrāntaram upoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6372: 13,063.022c dattvā yugaśataṃ cāpi naraḥ svarge mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6373: 13,063.023a kālaśākaṃ tu viprebhyo dattvā martyaḥ samūlakam
GE07mbh_13_u:6374: 13,063.023c jyeṣṭhāyām ṛddhim iṣṭāṃ vai gatim iṣṭāṃ ca vindati 13,063.024a mūle mūlaphalaṃ dattvā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ samāhitaḥ 13,063.024c pitṝn prīṇayate cāpi gatim iṣṭāṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:6375: 13,063.025a atha pūrvāsv aṣāḍhāsu dadhipātrāṇy upoṣitaḥ 13,063.025c kulavṛttopasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe vedapārage
GE07mbh_13_u:6376: 13,063.025e pradāya jāyate pretya kule subahugokule 13,063.026a udamanthaṃ sasarpiṣkaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:6378: 13,063.027a dugdhaṃ tv abhijite yoge dattvā madhughṛtāplutam
GE07mbh_13_u:6380: 13,063.028a śravaṇe kambalaṃ dattvā vastrāntaritam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6381: 13,063.028c śvetena yāti yānena sarvalokān asaṃvṛtān 13,063.029a goprayuktaṃ dhaniṣṭhāsu yānaṃ dattvā samāhitaḥ 13,063.029c vastraraśmidharaṃ sadyaḥ pretya rājyaṃ prapadyate 13,063.030a gandhāñ śatabhiṣagyoge dattvā sāgurucandanān
GE07mbh_13_u:6382: 13,063.030c prāpnoty apsarasāṃ lokān pretya gandhāṃś ca śāśvatān
GE07mbh_13_u:6384: 13,063.031c sarvabhakṣaphalopetaḥ sa vai pretya sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:6385: 13,063.032a aurabhram uttarāyoge yas tu māṃsaṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:6386: 13,063.032c sa pitṝn prīṇayati vai pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:6387: 13,063.033a kāṃsyopadohanāṃ dhenuṃ revatyāṃ yaḥ prayacchati 13,063.033c sā pretya kāmān ādāya dātāram upatiṣṭhati

GE07mbh_13_u:6420: 13,065.003a yānaṃ cāśvatarīyuktaṃ tasya śubhraṃ viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_13_u:6423: 13,065.004 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,065.004a yat phalaṃ tiladāne ca bhūmidāne ca kīrtitam

GE07mbh_13_u:6425: 13,065.005c niśamya ca yathānyāyaṃ prayaccha kurusattama 13,065.006a pitṝṇāṃ prathamaṃ bhojyaṃ tilāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:6426: 13,065.006c tiladānena vai tasmāt pitṛpakṣaḥ pramodate 13,065.007a māghamāse tilān yas tu brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:6427: 13,065.007c sarvasattvasamākīrṇaṃ narakaṃ sa na paśyati 13,065.008a sarvakāmaiḥ sa yajate yas tilair yajate pitṝn
GE07mbh_13_u:6428: 13,065.008c na cākāmena dātavyaṃ tilaśrāddhaṃ kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_13_u:6430: 13,065.010a pauṣṭikā rūpadāś caiva tathā pāpavināśanāḥ 13,065.010c tasmāt sarvapradānebhyas tiladānaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6431: 13,065.011a āpastambaś ca medhāvī śaṅkhaś ca likhitas tathā

GE07mbh_13_u:6440: 13,065.016a ata ūrdhvaṃ nibodhedaṃ devānāṃ yaṣṭum icchatām

GE07mbh_13_u:6448: 13,065.020c yasmin deśe kariṣyadhvaṃ yajñaṃ kāśyapanandanāḥ 13,065.021 devā ūcuḥ 13,065.021a bhagavan kṛtakāmāḥ smo yakṣyāmas tv āptadakṣiṇaiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6453: 13,065.025a prādeśamātraṃ bhūmes tu yo dadyād anupaskṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:6454: 13,065.025c na sīdati sa kṛcchreṣu na ca durgāṇy avāpnute 13,065.026a śītavātātapasahāṃ gṛhabhūmiṃ susaṃskṛtām

GE07mbh_13_u:6456: 13,065.027c pratiśrayapradātā ca so 'pi svarge mahīyate 13,065.028a adhyāpakakule jātaḥ śrotriyo niyatendriyaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6458: 13,065.029a tathā gavārthe śaraṇaṃ śītavarṣasahaṃ mahat 13,065.029c āsaptamaṃ tārayati kulaṃ bharatasattama

GE07mbh_13_u:6461: 13,065.032a pārakye bhūmideśe tu pitṝṇāṃ nirvapet tu yaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6477: 13,065.041c tataś carmaṇvatī rājan gocarmabhyaḥ pravartitā 13,065.042a paśutvāc ca vinirmuktāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6492: 13,065.050c akṣayaṃ narakaṃ yātīty evam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6499: 13,065.057c annāt prāṇaḥ prabhavati tejo vīryaṃ balaṃ tathā

GE07mbh_13_u:6505: 13,065.061a abhuktvātithaye cānnaṃ prayacched yaḥ samāhitaḥ 13,065.061c sa vai brahmavidāṃ lokān prāpnuyād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:6506: 13,065.062a sukṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaś cānnadaḥ puruṣas taret

GE07mbh_13_u:6510: 13,066.001c annaṃ tu te viśeṣeṇa praśastam iha bhārata

GE07mbh_13_u:6512: 13,066.003 bhīṣma uvāca 13,066.003a hanta te vartayiṣyāmi yathāvad bharatarṣabha 13,066.003c gadatas tan mamādyeha śṛṇu satyaparākrama 13,066.003e pānīyadānāt prabhṛti sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi te 'nagha

GE07mbh_13_u:6660: 13,069.028a tvayā tu tārito 'smy adya kim anyatra tapobalāt
GE07mbh_13_u:6661: 13,069.028c anujānīhi māṃ kṛṣṇa gaccheyaṃ divam adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:6662: 13,069.029a anujñātaḥ sa kṛṣṇena namaskṛtya janārdanam 13,069.029c vimānaṃ divyam āsthāya yayau divam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_13_u:6663: 13,069.030a tatas tasmin divaṃ prāpte nṛge bharatasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:6664: 13,069.030c vāsudeva imaṃ ślokaṃ jagāda kurunandana 13,069.031a brāhmaṇasvaṃ na hartavyaṃ puruṣeṇa vijānatā 13,069.031c brāhmaṇasvaṃ hṛtaṃ hanti nṛgaṃ brāhmaṇagaur iva
GE07mbh_13_u:6665: 13,069.032a satāṃ samāgamaḥ sadbhir nāphalaḥ pārtha vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6666: 13,069.032c vimuktaṃ narakāt paśya nṛgaṃ sādhusamāgamāt 13,069.033a pradānaṃ phalavat tatra drohas tatra tathāphalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6667: 13,069.033c apacāraṃ gavāṃ tasmād varjayeta yudhiṣṭhira 13,070.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,070.001a dattānāṃ phalasaṃprāptiṃ gavāṃ prabrūhi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:6668: 13,070.001c vistareṇa mahābāho na hi tṛpyāmi kathyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:6669: 13,070.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,070.002a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:6670: 13,070.002c ṛṣer uddālaker vākyaṃ nāciketasya cobhayoḥ 13,070.003a ṛṣir uddālakir dīkṣām upagamya tataḥ sutam
GE07mbh_13_u:6671: 13,070.003c tvaṃ mām upacarasveti nāciketam abhāṣata 13,070.003e samāpte niyame tasmin maharṣiḥ putram abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:6673: 13,070.004c idhmā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ kalaśaś cābhito jalam
GE07mbh_13_u:6674: 13,070.004e vismṛtaṃ me tad ādāya nadītīrād ihāvraja
GE07mbh_13_u:6676: 13,070.005c na paśyāmi tad ity evaṃ pitaraṃ so 'bravīn muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6678: 13,070.006c yamaṃ paśyeti taṃ putram aśapat sa mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6679: 13,070.007a tathā sa pitrābhihato vāgvajreṇa kṛtāñjaliḥ 13,070.007c prasīdeti bruvann eva gatasattvo 'patad bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:6680: 13,070.008a nāciketaṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ duḥkhamūrchitaḥ 13,070.008c kiṃ mayā kṛtam ity uktvā nipapāta mahītale
GE07mbh_13_u:6681: 13,070.009a tasya duḥkhaparītasya svaṃ putram upagūhataḥ 13,070.009c vyatītaṃ tad ahaḥśeṣaṃ sā cogrā tatra śarvarī
GE07mbh_13_u:6683: 13,070.010c prāspandacchayane kauśye vṛṣṭyā sasyam ivāplutam 13,070.011a sa paryapṛcchat taṃ putraṃ ślāghyaṃ pratyāgataṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6684: 13,070.011c divyair gandhaiḥ samādigdhaṃ kṣīṇasvapnam ivotthitam 13,070.012a api putra jitā lokāḥ śubhās te svena karmaṇā 13,070.012c diṣṭyā cāsi punaḥ prāpto na hi te mānuṣaṃ vapuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6685: 13,070.013a pratyakṣadarśī sarvasya pitrā pṛṣṭo mahātmanā 13,070.013c anvarthaṃ taṃ pitur madhye maharṣīṇāṃ nyavedayat
GE07mbh_13_u:6686: 13,070.014a kurvan bhavacchāsanam āśu yāto; hy ahaṃ viśālāṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:6688: 13,070.014c vaivasvatīṃ prāpya sabhām apaśyaṃ; sahasraśo yojanahaimabhaumām 13,070.015a dṛṣṭvaiva mām abhimukham āpatantaṃ; gṛhaṃ nivedyāsanam ādideśa
GE07mbh_13_u:6689: 13,070.015c vaivasvato 'rghyādibhir arhaṇaiś ca; bhavatkṛte pūjayām āsa
GE07mbh_13_u:6690: māṃ saḥ 13,070.016a tatas tv ahaṃ taṃ śanakair avocaṃ; vṛtaṃ sadasyair abhipūjyamānam
GE07mbh_13_u:6691: 13,070.016c prāpto 'smi te viṣayaṃ dharmarāja; lokān arhe yān sma tān me
GE07mbh_13_u:6693: 13,070.017a yamo 'bravīn māṃ na mṛto 'si saumya; yamaṃ paśyety āha tu tvāṃ tapasvī
GE07mbh_13_u:6694: 13,070.017c pitā pradīptāgnisamānatejā; na tac chakyam anṛtaṃ vipra kartum
GE07mbh_13_u:6695: 13,070.018a dṛṣṭas te 'haṃ pratigacchasva tāta; śocaty asau tava dehasya kartā 13,070.018c dadāmi kiṃ cāpi manaḥpraṇītaṃ; priyātithe tava kāmān vṛṇīṣva
GE07mbh_13_u:6696: 13,070.019a tenaivam uktas tam ahaṃ pratyavocaṃ; prāpto 'smi te viṣayaṃ durnivartyam
GE07mbh_13_u:6697: 13,070.019c icchāmy ahaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ samṛddhāṃl; lokān draṣṭuṃ yadi te 'haṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:6699: 13,070.020a yānaṃ samāropya tu māṃ sa devo; vāhair yuktaṃ suprabhaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:6701: 13,070.020c saṃdarśayām āsa tadā sma lokān; sarvāṃs tadā puṇyakṛtāṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:6703: 13,070.021a apaśyaṃ tatra veśmāni taijasāni kṛtātmanām 13,070.021c nānāsaṃsthānarūpāṇi sarvaratnamayāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6708: 13,070.024a bhakṣyabhojyamayāñ śailān vāsāṃsi śayanāni ca 13,070.024c sarvakāmaphalāṃś caiva vṛkṣān bhavanasaṃsthitān
GE07mbh_13_u:6709: 13,070.025a nadyo vīthyaḥ sabhā vāpī dīrghikāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6710: 13,070.025c ghoṣavanti ca yānāni yuktāny eva sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6711: 13,070.026a kṣīrasravā vai sarito girīṃś ca; sarpis tathā vimalaṃ cāpi toyam 13,070.026b*0363_01 kṣīrasravā vai sarito girīṃś ca sarpiṣāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:6712: 13,070.026b*0363_02 vimalaṃ caiva toyaṃ ca sarvaṃ svādu tathaiva ca 13,070.026c vaivasvatasyānumatāṃś ca deśān; adṛṣṭapūrvān subahūn apaśyam
GE07mbh_13_u:6713: 13,070.027a sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad ahaṃ dharmarājam; avocaṃ vai prabhaviṣṇuṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:6715: 13,070.027c kṣīrasyaitāḥ sarpiṣaś caiva nadyaḥ; śaśvat srotāḥ kasya
GE07mbh_13_u:6716: bhojyāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ 13,070.028a yamo 'bravīd viddhi bhojyās tvam etā; ye dātāraḥ sādhavo
GE07mbh_13_u:6718: 13,070.028c anye lokāḥ śāśvatā vītaśokāḥ; samākīrṇā gopradāne ratānām
GE07mbh_13_u:6719: 13,070.029a na tv evāsāṃ dānamātraṃ praśastaṃ; pātraṃ kālo goviśeṣo vidhiś ca 13,070.029c jñātvā deyā vipra gavāntaraṃ hi; duḥkhaṃ jñātuṃ pāvakādityabhūtam
GE07mbh_13_u:6720: 13,070.030a svādhyāyāḍhyo yo 'timātraṃ tapasvī; vaitānastho brāhmaṇaḥ pātram āsām 13,070.030c kṛcchrotsṛṣṭāḥ poṣaṇābhyāgatāś ca; dvārair etair goviśeṣāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6722: 13,070.031a tisro rātrīr adbhir upoṣya bhūmau; tṛptā gāvas tarpitebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6724: 13,070.031c vatsaiḥ prītāḥ suprajāḥ sopacārās; tryahaṃ dattvā gorasair
GE07mbh_13_u:6726: 13,070.032a dattvā dhenuṃ suvratāṃ kāṃsyadohāṃ; kalyāṇavatsām apalāyinīṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6727: 13,070.032c yāvanti lomāni bhavanti tasyās; tāvad varṣāṇy aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:6729: 13,070.033a tathānaḍvāhaṃ brāhmaṇāya pradāya; dāntaṃ dhuryaṃ balavantaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:6731: 13,070.033c kulānujīvaṃ vīryavantaṃ bṛhantaṃ; bhuṅkte lokān saṃmitān
GE07mbh_13_u:6733: 13,070.034a goṣu kṣāntaṃ gośaraṇyaṃ kṛtajñaṃ; vṛttiglānaṃ tādṛśaṃ pātram
GE07mbh_13_u:6735: 13,070.034c vṛttiglāne saṃbhrame vā mahārthe; kṛṣyarthe vā homahetoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6737: 13,070.035a gurvarthe vā bālapuṣṭyābhiṣaṅgād; gāvo dātuṃ deśakālo
GE07mbh_13_u:6741: 13,070.035d*0364_01 gā vai dadyān nyāyabhūtā dvijebhyo 13,070.035d*0364_02 yo yātum ākāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:6742: 13,070.036 nāciketa uvāca 13,070.036a śrutvā vaivasvatavacas tam ahaṃ punar abruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:6743: 13,070.036c agomī gopradātṝṇāṃ kathaṃ lokān nigacchati 13,070.037a tato yamo 'bravīd dhīmān gopradāne parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:6744: 13,070.037c gopradānānukalpaṃ tu gām ṛte santi gopradāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6745: 13,070.038a alābhe yo gavāṃ dadyād ghṛtadhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6746: 13,070.038c tasyaitā ghṛtavāhinyaḥ kṣarante vatsalā iva 13,070.039a ghṛtālābhe ca yo dadyāt tiladhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6747: 13,070.039c sa durgāt tārito dhenvā kṣīranadyāṃ pramodate
GE07mbh_13_u:6748: 13,070.040a tilālābhe ca yo dadyāj jaladhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6749: 13,070.040c sa kāmapravahāṃ śītāṃ nadīm etām upāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:6750: 13,070.041a evamādīni me tatra dharmarājo nyadarśayat 13,070.041c dṛṣṭvā ca paramaṃ harṣam avāpam aham acyuta
GE07mbh_13_u:6751: 13,070.042a nivedaye cāpi priyaṃ bhavatsu; kratur mahān alpadhanapracāraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6752: 13,070.042c prāpto mayā tāta sa matprasūtaḥ; prapatsyate vedavidhipravṛttaḥ 13,070.043a śāpo hy ayaṃ bhavato 'nugrahāya; prāpto mayā yatra dṛṣṭo yamo me
GE07mbh_13_u:6753: 13,070.043c dānavyuṣṭiṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā mahārthāṃ; niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ dānadharmāṃś cariṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:6754: 13,070.044a idaṃ ca mām abravīd dharmarājaḥ; punaḥ punaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭo
GE07mbh_13_u:6756: 13,070.044c dānena tāta prayato 'bhūḥ sadaiva; viśeṣato gopradānaṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6758: 13,070.045a śuddho hy artho nāvamanyaḥ svadharmāt; pātre deyaṃ deśakālopapanne
GE07mbh_13_u:6759: 13,070.045c tasmād gāvas te nityam eva pradeyā; mā bhūc ca te saṃśayaḥ kaś
GE07mbh_13_u:6760: cid atra 13,070.046a etāḥ purā adadan nityam eva; śāntātmāno dānapathe niviṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6761: 13,070.046c tapāṃsy ugrāṇy apratiśaṅkamānās; te vai dānaṃ pradaduś cāpi śaktyā
GE07mbh_13_u:6762: 13,070.047a kāle śaktyā matsaraṃ varjayitvā; śuddhātmānaḥ śraddhinaḥ puṇyaśīlāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6763: 13,070.047c dattvā taptvā lokam amuṃ prapannā; dedīpyante puṇyaśīlāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6765: 13,070.048a etad dānaṃ nyāyalabdhaṃ dvijebhyaḥ; pātre dattaṃ prāpaṇīyaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:6767: 13,070.048c kāmyāṣṭamyāṃ vartitavyaṃ daśāhaṃ; rasair gavāṃ śakṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:6768: prasnavair vā 13,070.049a vedavratī syād vṛṣabhapradātā; vedāvāptir goyugasya pradāne
GE07mbh_13_u:6770: 13,070.050a gām apy ekāṃ kapilāṃ saṃpradāya; nyāyopetāṃ kalmaṣād vipramucyet
GE07mbh_13_u:6771: 13,070.050c gavāṃ rasāt paramaṃ nāsti kiṃ cid; gavāṃ dānaṃ sumahat tad vadanti 13,070.051a gāvo lokān dhārayanti kṣarantyo; gāvaś cānnaṃ saṃjanayanti
GE07mbh_13_u:6773: 13,070.051c yas taj jānan na gavāṃ hārdam eti; sa vai gantā nirayaṃ pāpacetāḥ 13,070.052a yat te dātuṃ gosahasraṃ śataṃ vā; śatārdhaṃ vā daśa vā sādhuvatsāḥ 13,070.052c apy ekāṃ vā sādhave brāhmaṇāya; sāsyāmuṣmin puṇyatīrthā nadī
GE07mbh_13_u:6775: 13,070.053a prāptyā puṣṭyā lokasaṃrakṣaṇena; gāvas tulyāḥ sūryapādaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6777: 13,070.053c śabdaś caikaḥ saṃtatiś copabhogas; tasmād godaḥ sūrya
GE07mbh_13_u:6779: 13,070.054a guruṃ śiṣyo varayed gopradāne; sa vai vaktā niyataṃ svargadātā 13,070.054c vidhijñānāṃ sumahān eṣa dharmo; vidhiṃ hy ādyaṃ vidhayaḥ saṃśrayanti 13,070.055a etad dānaṃ nyāyalabdhaṃ dvijebhyaḥ; pātre dattvā prāpayethāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6781: 13,070.055c tvayy āśaṃsanty amarā mānavāś ca; vayaṃ cāpi prasṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:6783: 13,070.056a ity ukto 'haṃ dharmarājñā maharṣe; dharmātmānaṃ śirasābhipraṇamya 13,070.056c anujñātas tena vaivasvatena; pratyāgamaṃ bhagavatpādamūlam 13,071.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,071.001a uktaṃ vai gopradānaṃ te nāciketam ṛṣiṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:6784: 13,071.001c māhātmyam api caivoktam uddeśena gavāṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:6785: 13,071.002a nṛgeṇa ca yathā duḥkham anubhūtaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:6787: 13,071.003a dvāravatyāṃ yathā cāsau niviśantyāṃ samuddhṛtaḥ 13,071.003c mokṣahetur abhūt kṛṣṇas tad apy avadhṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:6788: 13,071.004a kiṃ tv asti mama saṃdeho gavāṃ lokaṃ prati prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:6789: 13,071.004c tattvataḥ śrotum icchāmi godā yatra viśanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:6790: 13,071.005 bhīṣma uvāca 13,071.005a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:6791: 13,071.005c yathāpṛcchat padmayonim etad eva śatakratuḥ 13,071.006 śakra uvāca 13,071.006a svarlokavāsināṃ lakṣmīm abhibhūya svayā tviṣā 13,071.006c golokavāsinaḥ paśye vrajataḥ saṃśayo 'tra me
GE07mbh_13_u:6792: 13,071.007a kīdṛśā bhagavaṃl lokā gavāṃ tad brūhi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:6793: 13,071.007c yān āvasanti dātāra etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:6794: 13,071.008a kīdṛśāḥ kiṃphalāḥ kaḥ svit paramas tatra vai guṇaḥ 13,071.008c kathaṃ ca puruṣās tatra gacchanti vigatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6795: 13,071.009a kiyat kālaṃ pradānasya dātā ca phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:6796: 13,071.009c kathaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dānaṃ syād alpam api vā katham 13,071.010a bahvīnāṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānam alpānāṃ vāpi kīdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:6797: 13,071.010c adattvā gopradāḥ santi kena vā tac ca śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_13_u:6798: 13,071.011a kathaṃ ca bahudātā syād alpadātrā samaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:6799: 13,071.011c alpapradātā bahudaḥ kathaṃ ca syād iheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:6800: 13,071.012a kīdṛśī dakṣiṇā caiva gopradāne viśiṣyate 13,071.012c etat tathyena bhagavan mama śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:6803: 13,072.001c nāsya praṣṭāsti loke 'smiṃs tvatto 'nyo hi śatakrato 13,072.002a santi nānāvidhā lokā yāṃs tvaṃ śakra na paśyasi 13,072.002c paśyāmi yān ahaṃ lokān ekapatnyaś ca yāḥ striyaḥ 13,072.003a karmabhiś cāpi suśubhaiḥ suvratā ṛṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:6804: 13,072.003c saśarīrā hi tān yānti brāhmaṇāḥ śubhavṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6806: 13,072.004c svapnabhūtāṃś ca tāṃl lokān paśyantīhāpi suvratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6807: 13,072.005a te tu lokāḥ sahasrākṣa śṛṇu yādṛgguṇānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6808: 13,072.005c na tatra kramate kālo na jarā na ca pāpakam
GE07mbh_13_u:6809: 13,072.005e tathānyan nāśubhaṃ kiṃ cin na vyādhis tatra na klamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6810: 13,072.006a yad yac ca gāvo manasā tasmin vāñchanti vāsava 13,072.006c tat sarvaṃ prāpayanti sma mama pratyakṣadarśanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:6811: 13,072.006e kāmagāḥ kāmacāriṇyaḥ kāmāt kāmāṃś ca bhuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:6812: 13,072.007a vāpyaḥ sarāṃsi sarito vividhāni vanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6813: 13,072.007c gṛhāṇi parvatāś caiva yāvad dravyaṃ ca kiṃ cana 13,072.008a manojñaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sarvaṃ tatra pradṛśyate 13,072.008c īdṛśān viddhi tāṃl lokān nāsti lokas tato 'dhikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6814: 13,072.009a tatra sarvasahāḥ kṣāntā vatsalā guruvartinaḥ 13,072.009c ahaṃkārair virahitā yānti śakra narottamāḥ 13,072.010a yaḥ sarvamāṃsāni na bhakṣayīta; pumān sadā yāvad antāya yuktaḥ 13,072.010c mātāpitror arcitā satyayuktaḥ; śuśrūṣitā brāhmaṇānām anindyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6815: 13,072.011a akrodhano goṣu tathā dvijeṣu; dharme rato guruśuśrūṣakaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6816: 13,072.011c yāvajjīvaṃ satyavṛtte rataś ca; dāne rato yaḥ kṣamī cāparādhe 13,072.012a mṛdur dānto devaparāyaṇaś ca; sarvātithiś cāpi tathā dayāvān
GE07mbh_13_u:6817: 13,072.012c īdṛgguṇo mānavaḥ saṃprayāti; lokaṃ gavāṃ śāśvataṃ cāvyayaṃ ca 13,072.013a na pāradārī paśyati lokam enaṃ; na vai gurughno na mṛṣāpralāpī 13,072.013c sadāpavādī brāhmaṇaḥ śāntavedo; doṣair anyair yaś ca yukto durātmā
GE07mbh_13_u:6819: dharmavidveṣakaś ca 13,072.014c na brahmahā manasāpi prapaśyed; gavāṃ lokaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:6820: 13,072.015a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ naipuṇena sureśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:6821: 13,072.015c gopradānaratānāṃ tu phalaṃ śṛṇu śatakrato 13,072.016a dāyādyalabdhair arthair yo gāḥ krītvā saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:6823: 13,072.017a yo vai dyūte dhanaṃ jitvā gāḥ krītvā saṃprayacchati 13,072.017c sa divyam ayutaṃ śakra varṣāṇāṃ phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:6824: 13,072.018a dāyādyā yasya vai gāvo nyāyapūrvair upārjitāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6828: 13,072.020c gurudvijasahaḥ kṣāntas tasya gobhiḥ samā gatiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6831: 13,072.022a satye dharme ca niratas tasya śakra phalaṃ śṛṇu 13,072.022c gosahasreṇa samitā tasya dhenur bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:6832: 13,072.023a kṣatriyasya guṇair ebhir anvitasya phalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:6833: 13,072.023c tasyāpi śatatulyā gaur bhavatīti viniścayaḥ 13,072.024a vaiśyasyaite yadi guṇās tasya pañcāśataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:6835: 13,072.025a etac caivaṃ yo 'nutiṣṭheta yuktaḥ; satyena yukto guruśuśrūṣayā
GE07mbh_13_u:6837: 13,072.025c dāntaḥ kṣānto devatārcī praśāntaḥ; śucir buddho dharmaśīlo
GE07mbh_13_u:6839: 13,072.026a mahat phalaṃ prāpnute sa dvijāya; dattvā dogdhrīṃ vidhinānena
GE07mbh_13_u:6841: 13,072.026c nityaṃ dadyād ekabhaktaḥ sadā ca; satye sthito guruśuśrūṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:6843: 13,072.027a vedādhyāyī goṣu yo bhaktimāṃś ca; nityaṃ dṛṣṭvā yo 'bhinandeta
GE07mbh_13_u:6844: gāś ca 13,072.027c ā jātito yaś ca gavāṃ nameta; idaṃ phalaṃ śakra nibodha tasya 13,072.028a yat syād iṣṭvā rājasūye phalaṃ tu; yat syād iṣṭvā bahunā kāñcanena 13,072.028c etat tulyaṃ phalam asyāhur agryaṃ; sarve santas tv ṛṣayo ye ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6846: 13,072.029a yo 'graṃ bhaktān kiṃ cid aprāśya dadyād; gobhyo nityaṃ govratī
GE07mbh_13_u:6848: 13,072.029c śānto buddho gosahasrasya puṇyaṃ; saṃvatsareṇāpnuyāt puṇyaśīlaḥ 13,072.030a ya ekaṃ bhaktam aśnīyād dadyād ekaṃ gavāṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:6849: 13,072.030c daśa varṣāṇy anantāni govratī gonukampakaḥ 13,072.031a ekenaiva ca bhaktena yaḥ krītvā gāṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:6850: 13,072.031c yāvanti tasya proktāni divasāni śatakrato 13,072.031e tāvac chatānāṃ sa gavāṃ phalam āpnoti śāśvatam

GE07mbh_13_u:6855: 13,072.033c yāvatīḥ sparśayed gā vai tāvat tu phalam aśnute 13,072.033e lomni lomni mahābhāga lokāś cāsyākṣayāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6856: 13,072.034a saṃgrāmeṣv arjayitvā tu yo vai gāḥ saṃprayacchati

GE07mbh_13_u:6860: 13,072.037a svādhyāyāḍhyaṃ śuddhayoniṃ praśāntaṃ; vaitānasthaṃ pāpabhīruṃ kṛtajñam

GE07mbh_13_u:6865: 13,072.038c gurvarthaṃ vā bālasaṃvṛddhaye vā; dhenuṃ dadyād deśakāle
GE07mbh_13_u:6869: 13,072.039c kṛcchrotsṛṣṭāḥ poṣaṇābhyāgatāś ca; dvārair etair goviśeṣāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6872: 13,072.040c yathā hi gaṅgā saritāṃ variṣṭhā; tathārjunīnāṃ kapilā variṣṭhā

GE07mbh_13_u:6895: 13,072.044e aśvamedhakratos tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati śāśvatam 13,072.045a mṛtyukāle sahasrākṣa yāṃ vṛttim anukāṅkṣate 13,072.045c lokān bahuvidhān divyān yad vāsya hṛdi vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:6896: 13,072.046a tat sarvaṃ samavāpnoti karmaṇā tena mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6897: 13,072.046c gobhiś ca samanujñātaḥ sarvatra sa mahīyate

GE07mbh_13_u:6900: 13,072.048a akāmaṃ tena vastavyaṃ muditena śatakrato 13,072.048c mama loke suraiḥ sārdhaṃ loke yatrāpi cecchati
GE07mbh_13_u:6901: 13,073.001 indra uvāca 13,073.001a jānan yo gām apahared vikrīyād vārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:6902: 13,073.001c etad vijñātum icchāmi kā nu tasya gatir bhavet 13,073.002 brahmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:6903: 13,073.002a bhakṣārthaṃ vikrayārthaṃ vā ye 'pahāraṃ hi kurvate 13,073.002c dānārthaṃ vā brāhmaṇāya tatredaṃ śrūyatāṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:6904: 13,073.003a vikrayārthaṃ hi yo hiṃsyād bhakṣayed vā niraṅkuśaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6911: 13,073.008a gopradānaṃ tārayate sapta pūrvāṃs tathā parān

GE07mbh_13_u:6918: 13,073.012c ṛṣibhyo lakṣmaṇenoktam araṇye vasatā vibho 13,073.013a pāraṃparyāgataṃ cedam ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6921: 13,073.014c yajñeṣu gopradāneṣu dvayor api samāgame 13,073.015a tasya lokāḥ kilākṣayyā daivataiḥ saha nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:6922: 13,073.015c iti brahmā sa bhagavān uvāca parameśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6923: 13,074.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,074.001a visrambhito 'haṃ bhavatā dharmān pravadatā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:6924: 13,074.001c pravakṣyāmi tu saṃdehaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:6925: 13,074.002a vratānāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ proktaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vā mahādyute
GE07mbh_13_u:6926: 13,074.002c niyamānāṃ phalaṃ kiṃ ca svadhītasya ca kiṃ phalam 13,074.003a damasyeha phalaṃ kiṃ ca vedānāṃ dhāraṇe ca kim 13,074.003c adhyāpane phalaṃ kiṃ ca sarvam icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:6927: 13,074.004a apratigrāhake kiṃ ca phalaṃ loke pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:6928: 13,074.004c tasya kiṃ ca phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ yaḥ saṃprayacchati 13,074.005a svakarmaniratānāṃ ca śūrāṇāṃ cāpi kiṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:6929: 13,074.005c satye ca kiṃ phalaṃ proktaṃ brahmacarye ca kiṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:6930: 13,074.006a pitṛśuśrūṣaṇe kiṃ ca mātṛśuśrūṣaṇe tathā 13,074.006c ācāryaguruśuśrūṣāsv anukrośānukampane 13,074.007a etat sarvam aśeṣeṇa pitāmaha yathātatham 13,074.007c vettum icchāmi dharmajña paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:6931: 13,074.008 bhīṣma uvāca 13,074.008a yo vrataṃ vai yathoddiṣṭaṃ tathā saṃpratipadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6932: 13,074.008c akhaṇḍaṃ samyag ārabdhaṃ tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6933: 13,074.009a niyamānāṃ phalaṃ rājan pratyakṣam iha dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6934: 13,074.009c niyamānāṃ kratūnāṃ ca tvayāvāptam idaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:6935: 13,074.010a svadhītasyāpi ca phalaṃ dṛśyate 'mutra ceha ca 13,074.010c ihaloke 'rthavān nityaṃ brahmaloke ca modate
GE07mbh_13_u:6936: 13,074.011a damasya tu phalaṃ rājañ śṛṇu tvaṃ vistareṇa me 13,074.011c dāntāḥ sarvatra sukhino dāntāḥ sarvatra nirvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6938: 13,074.012c prārthayanti ca yad dāntā labhante tan na saṃśayaḥ 13,074.013a yujyante sarvakāmair hi dāntāḥ sarvatra pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_13_u:6939: 13,074.013c svarge tathā pramodante tapasā vikrameṇa ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6940: 13,074.014a dānair yajñaiś ca vividhair yathā dāntāḥ kṣamānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6941: 13,074.014b*0368_01 dānād damo viśiṣṭo hi dānaṃ kiṃ cid dvijātaye 13,074.014c dātā kupyati no dāntas tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ 13,074.015a yas tu dadyād akupyan hi tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ 13,074.015c krodho hanti hi yad dānaṃ tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6942: 13,074.015d*0369_01 vidyādānāt paraṃ nāsti vedavidyā mahāphalā 13,074.016a adṛśyāni mahārāja sthānāny ayutaśo divi 13,074.016c ṛṣīṇāṃ sarvalokeṣu yānīto yānti devatāḥ 13,074.017a damena yāni nṛpate gacchanti paramarṣayaḥ 13,074.017c kāmayānā mahat sthānaṃ tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6944: 13,074.019c gurukarmapraśaṃsī ca so 'pi svarge mahīyate 13,074.020a kṣatriyo 'dhyayane yukto yajane dānakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:6945: 13,074.020c yuddhe yaś ca paritrātā so 'pi svarge mahīyate 13,074.021a vaiśyaḥ svakarmanirataḥ pradānāl labhate mahat 13,074.021c śūdraḥ svakarmanirataḥ svargaṃ śuśrūṣayārcchati
GE07mbh_13_u:6946: 13,074.022a śūrā bahuvidhāḥ proktās teṣām arthāṃś ca me śṛṇu 13,074.022c śūrānvayānāṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ śūrasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:6947: 13,074.022d*0370_01 śūrāṇāṃ cāpi nirdiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ ca niyataṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:6948: 13,074.023a yajñaśūrā dame śūrāḥ satyaśūrās tathāpare 13,074.023c yuddhaśūrās tathaivoktā dānaśūrāś ca mānavāḥ 13,074.024a buddhiśūrās tathaivānye kṣamāśūrās tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:6949: 13,074.024c ārjave ca tathā śūrāḥ śame vartanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6950: 13,074.025a tais tais tu niyamaiḥ śūrā bahavaḥ santi cāpare 13,074.025c vedādhyayanaśūrāś ca śūrāś cādhyāpane ratāḥ 13,074.026a guruśuśrūṣayā śūrāḥ pitṛśuśrūṣayāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:6952: 13,074.027a sāṃkhyaśūrāś ca bahavo yogaśūrās tathāpare 13,074.027c araṇye gṛhavāse ca śūrāś cātithipūjane 13,074.027e sarve yānti parāṃl lokān svakarmaphalanirjitān 13,074.028a dhāraṇaṃ sarvavedānāṃ sarvatīrthāvagāhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:6953: 13,074.028c satyaṃ ca bruvato nityaṃ samaṃ vā syān na vā samam
GE07mbh_13_u:6954: 13,074.029a aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:6955: 13,074.029c aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate 13,074.030a satyena sūryas tapati satyenāgniḥ pradīpyate 13,074.030c satyena māruto vāti sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:6956: 13,074.031a satyena devān prīṇāti pitṝn vai brāhmaṇāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:6957: 13,074.031c satyam āhuḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ tasmāt satyaṃ na laṅghayet 13,074.032a munayaḥ satyaniratā munayaḥ satyavikramāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:6959: 13,074.033a damaḥ satyaphalāvāptir uktā sarvātmanā mayā 13,074.033c asaṃśayaṃ vinītātmā sarvaḥ svarge mahīyate 13,074.034a brahmacaryasya tu guṇāñ śṛṇu me vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:6960: 13,074.034c ā janmamaraṇād yas tu brahmacārī bhaved iha
GE07mbh_13_u:6961: 13,074.034e na tasya kiṃ cid aprāpyam iti viddhi janādhipa 13,074.035a bahvyaḥ koṭyas tv ṛṣīṇāṃ tu brahmaloke vasanty uta 13,074.035c satye ratānāṃ satataṃ dāntānām ūrdhvaretasām 13,074.036a brahmacaryaṃ dahed rājan sarvapāpāny upāsitam 13,074.036c brāhmaṇena viśeṣeṇa brāhmaṇo hy agnir ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6962: 13,074.037a pratyakṣaṃ ca tavāpy etad brāhmaṇeṣu tapasviṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:6963: 13,074.037c bibheti hi yathā śakro brahmacāripradharṣitaḥ 13,074.037e tad brahmacaryasya phalam ṛṣīṇām iha dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:6964: 13,074.038a mātāpitroḥ pūjane yo dharmas tam api me śṛṇu 13,074.038c śuśrūṣate yaḥ pitaraṃ na cāsūyet kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:6965: 13,074.038e mātaraṃ vānahaṃvādī gurum ācāryam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6966: 13,074.039a tasya rājan phalaṃ viddhi svarloke sthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:6967: 13,074.039c na ca paśyeta narakaṃ guruśuśrūṣur ātmavān
GE07mbh_13_u:6968: 13,075.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,075.001a vidhiṃ gavāṃ param ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6969: 13,075.001c yena tāñ śāśvatāṃl lokān akhilān aśnuvīmahi
GE07mbh_13_u:6970: 13,075.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,075.002a na godānāt paraṃ kiṃ cid vidyate vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:6971: 13,075.002c gaur hi nyāyāgatā dattā sadyas tārayate kulam
GE07mbh_13_u:6972: 13,075.003a satām arthe samyag utpādito yaḥ; sa vai kḷptaḥ samyag iṣṭaḥ prajābhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6973: 13,075.003c tasmāt pūrvaṃ hy ādikāle pravṛttaṃ; gavāṃ dāne śṛṇu rājan vidhiṃ me
GE07mbh_13_u:6975: 13,075.004c māndhātrā prakṛtaṃ praśnaṃ bṛhaspatir abhāṣata 13,075.005a dvijātim abhisatkṛtya śvaḥ kālam abhivedya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6977: 13,075.006a āhvānaṃ ca prayuñjīta samaṅge bahuleti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:6978: 13,075.006c praviśya ca gavāṃ madhyam imāṃ śrutim udāharet
GE07mbh_13_u:6979: 13,075.007a gaur me mātā govṛṣabhaḥ pitā me; divaṃ śarma jagatī me pratiṣṭhā 13,075.007c prapadyaivaṃ śarvarīm uṣya goṣu; munir vāṇīm utsṛjed gopradāne
GE07mbh_13_u:6980: 13,075.008a sa tām ekāṃ niśāṃ gobhiḥ samasakhyaḥ samavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6984: 13,075.010a ūrjasvinya ūrjamedhāś ca yajño; garbho 'mṛtasya jagataś ca pratiṣṭhā
GE07mbh_13_u:6985: 13,075.010c kṣitau rādhaḥprabhavaḥ śaśvad eva; prājāpatyāḥ sarvam ity
GE07mbh_13_u:6987: 13,075.011a gāvo mamainaḥ praṇudantu sauryās; tathā saumyāḥ svargayānāya
GE07mbh_13_u:6989: 13,075.011c āmnātā me dadatīr āśrayaṃ tu; tathānuktāḥ santu sarvāśiṣo me
GE07mbh_13_u:6990: 13,075.012a śeṣotsarge karmabhir dehamokṣe; sarasvatyaḥ śreyasi saṃpravṛttāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:6991: 13,075.012c yūyaṃ nityaṃ puṇyakarmopavāhyā; diśadhvaṃ me gatim iṣṭāṃ prapannāḥ 13,075.013a yā vai yūyaṃ so 'ham adyaikabhāvo; yuṣmān dattvā cāham
GE07mbh_13_u:6993: 13,075.013c manaścyutā manaevopapannāḥ; saṃdhukṣadhvaṃ saumyarūpograrūpāḥ 13,075.014a evaṃ tasyāgre pūrvam ardhaṃ vadeta; gavāṃ dātā vidhivat
GE07mbh_13_u:6995: 13,075.014c pratibrūyāc cheṣam ardhaṃ dvijātiḥ; pratigṛhṇan vai gopradāne
GE07mbh_13_u:6998: 13,075.015c ūdhasyā bharitavyā ca vaiṣṇavīti ca codayet
GE07mbh_13_u:6999: 13,075.016a nāma saṃkīrtayet tasyā yathāsaṃkhyottaraṃ sa vai
GE07mbh_13_u:7000: 13,075.016c phalaṃ ṣaḍviṃśad aṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7001: 13,075.017a evam etān guṇān vṛddhān gavādīnāṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_13_u:7002: 13,075.017c gopradātā samāpnoti samastān aṣṭame krame 13,075.018a godaḥ śīlī nirbhayaś cārghadātā; na syād duḥkhī vasudātā ca kāmī
GE07mbh_13_u:7003: 13,075.018c ūdhasyoḍhā bhārata yaś ca vidvān; vyākhyātās te vaiṣṇavāś
GE07mbh_13_u:7005: 13,075.019a gā vai dattvā govratī syāt trirātraṃ; niśāṃ caikāṃ saṃvaseteha
GE07mbh_13_u:7007: 13,075.019c kāmyāṣṭamyāṃ vartitavyaṃ trirātraṃ; rasair vā goḥ śakṛtā prasnavair vā
GE07mbh_13_u:7008: 13,075.020a vedavratī syād vṛṣabhapradātā; vedāvāptir goyugasya pradāne
GE07mbh_13_u:7009: 13,075.020c tathā gavāṃ vidhim āsādya yajvā; lokān agryān vindate
GE07mbh_13_u:7011: 13,075.021a kāmān sarvān pārthivān ekasaṃsthān; yo vai dadyāt kāmadughāṃ ca dhenum
GE07mbh_13_u:7012: 13,075.021c samyak tāḥ syur havyakavyaughavatyas; tāsām ukṣṇāṃ jyāyasāṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:7015: 13,075.022c guhyo hy ayaṃ sarvalokasya dharmo; nemaṃ dharmaṃ yatra tatra prajalpet 13,075.023a santi loke śraddadhānā manuṣyāḥ; santi kṣudrā rākṣasā mānuṣeṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:7016: 13,075.023c yeṣāṃ dānaṃ dīyamānaṃ hy aniṣṭaṃ; nāstikyaṃ cāpy āśrayante hy apuṇyāḥ 13,075.024a bārhaspatyaṃ vākyam etan niśamya; ye rājāno gopradānāni kṛtvā
GE07mbh_13_u:7017: 13,075.024c lokān prāptāḥ puṇyaśīlāḥ suvṛttās; tān me rājan kīrtyamānān nibodha 13,075.025a uśīnaro viṣvagaśvo nṛgaś ca; bhagīratho viśruto yauvanāśvaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7018: 13,075.025c māndhātā vai mucukundaś ca rājā; bhūridyumno naiṣadhaḥ somakaś
GE07mbh_13_u:7020: 13,075.026a purūravā bharataś cakravartī; yasyānvaye bhāratāḥ sarva eva
GE07mbh_13_u:7021: 13,075.026c tathā vīro dāśarathiś ca rāmo; ye cāpy anye viśrutāḥ kīrtimantaḥ 13,075.027a tathā rājā pṛthukarmā dilīpo; divaṃ prāpto gopradāne vidhijñaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7022: 13,075.027c yajñair dānais tapasā rājadharmair; māndhātābhūd gopradānaiś ca yuktaḥ 13,075.028a tasmāt pārtha tvam apīmāṃ mayoktāṃ; bārhaspatīṃ bhāratīṃ dhārayasva
GE07mbh_13_u:7023: 13,075.028c dvijāgryebhyaḥ saṃprayaccha pratīto; gāḥ puṇyā vai prāpya rājyaṃ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:7024: 13,075.029 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 13,075.029a tathā sarvaṃ kṛtavān dharmarājo; bhīṣmeṇokto vidhivad gopradāne
GE07mbh_13_u:7025: 13,075.029c sa māndhātur devadevopadiṣṭaṃ; samyag dharmaṃ dhārayām āsa rājā 13,075.030a iti nṛpa satataṃ gavāṃ pradāne; yavaśakalān saha gomayaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7027: 13,075.030c kṣititalaśayanaḥ śikhī yatātmā; vṛṣa iva rājavṛṣas tadā babhūva 13,075.031a sa nṛpatir abhavat sadaiva tābhyaḥ; prayatamanā hy abhisaṃstuvaṃś ca gā vai
GE07mbh_13_u:7028: 13,075.031c nṛpadhuri ca na gām ayuṅkta bhūyas; turagavarair agamac ca

GE07mbh_13_u:7030: 13,076.001c godāne vistaraṃ dhīmān papraccha vinayānvitaḥ 13,076.002 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,076.002a gopradāne guṇān samyak punaḥ prabrūhi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:7031: 13,076.002c na hi tṛpyāmy ahaṃ vīra śṛṇvāno 'mṛtam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:7032: 13,076.003a ity ukto dharmarājena tadā śāṃtanavo nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:7033: 13,076.003c samyag āha guṇāṃs tasmai gopradānasya kevalān
GE07mbh_13_u:7034: 13,076.004 bhīṣma uvāca 13,076.004a vatsalāṃ guṇasaṃpannāṃ taruṇīṃ vastrasaṃvṛtām

GE07mbh_13_u:7036: 13,076.006a jarogrām upayuktārthāṃ jīrṇāṃ kūpam ivājalam 13,076.006c dattvā tamaḥ praviśati dvijaṃ kleśena yojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:7037: 13,076.007a duṣṭā ruṣṭā vyādhitā durbalā vā; na dātavyā yāś ca mūlyair adattaiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:7039: 13,076.008c yathā hi gaṅgā saritāṃ variṣṭhā; tathārjunīnāṃ kapilā variṣṭhā

GE07mbh_13_u:7042: 13,076.010c vakṣyāmi tad aśeṣeṇa rohiṇyo nirmitā yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:7043: 13,076.011a prajāḥ sṛjeti vyādiṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:7044: 13,076.011c asṛjad vṛttim evāgre prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā 13,076.012a yathā hy amṛtam āśritya vartayanti divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7045: 13,076.012c tathā vṛttiṃ samāśritya vartayanti prajā vibho

GE07mbh_13_u:7052: 13,076.015a etāny eva tu bhūtāni prākrośan vṛttikāṅkṣayā

GE07mbh_13_u:7060: 13,076.021a tat tejas tu tato raudraṃ kapilā gā viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_13_u:7069: 13,076.029a tato devair mahādevas tadā paśupatiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7070: 13,076.029c īśvaraḥ sa gavāṃ madhye vṛṣāṅka iti cocyate

GE07mbh_13_u:7076: 13,076.032c vimucyate kalikaluṣeṇa mānavaḥ; priyaṃ sutān paśudhanam

GE07mbh_13_u:7080: 13,076.034c sauvarṇakāṃsyopaduhās tato gāḥ; pārtho dadau brāhmaṇasattamebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7081: 13,076.035a tathaiva tebhyo 'bhidadau dvijebhyo; gavāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni
GE07mbh_13_u:7083: 13,076.035c yajñān samuddiśya ca dakṣiṇārthe; lokān vijetuṃ paramāṃ ca kīrtim 13,077.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,077.001a etasminn eva kāle tu vasiṣṭham ṛṣisattamam

GE07mbh_13_u:7093: 13,077.005c gāvaḥ pratiṣṭhā bhūtānāṃ gāvaḥ svastyayanaṃ mahat

GE07mbh_13_u:7099: 13,077.008a sāyaṃ prātaś ca satataṃ homakāle mahāmate
GE07mbh_13_u:7100: 13,077.008c gāvo dadati vai homyam ṛṣibhyaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:7101: 13,077.009a kāni cid yāni durgāṇi duṣkṛtāni kṛtāni ca
