GE07mbh_13_u:7851: 13,083.038c gadato mama viprarṣe sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ vara 13,083.039a mayā śrutam idaṃ pūrvaṃ purāṇe bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:7852: 13,083.039c prajāpateḥ kathayato manoḥ svāyaṃbhuvasya vai 13,083.040a śūlapāṇer bhagavato rudrasya ca mahātmanaḥ 13,083.040c girau himavati śreṣṭhe tadā bhṛgukulodvaha 13,083.041a devyā vivāhe nirvṛtte rudrāṇyā bhṛgunandana 13,083.041c samāgame bhagavato devyā saha mahātmanaḥ 13,083.041e tataḥ sarve samudvignā bhagavantam upāgaman 13,083.042a te mahādevam āsīnaṃ devīṃ ca varadām umām
GE07mbh_13_u:7853: 13,083.042c prasādya śirasā sarve rudram ūcur bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:7854: 13,083.043a ayaṃ samāgamo deva devyā saha tavānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:7856: 13,083.043e amoghatejās tvaṃ deva devī ceyam umā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:7857: 13,083.044a apatyaṃ yuvayor deva balavad bhavitā prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:7858: 13,083.044c tan nūnaṃ triṣu lokeṣu na kiṃ cic cheṣayiṣyati 13,083.045a tad ebhyaḥ praṇatebhyas tvaṃ devebhyaḥ pṛthulocana
GE07mbh_13_u:7860: 13,083.045e apatyārthaṃ nigṛhṇīṣva tejo jvalitam uttamam 13,083.045e*0390_01 tejaḥ paramakaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:7861: 13,083.045e*0390_02 trailokyasārau hi yuvāṃ lokaṃ saṃtāpayiṣyatha 13,083.045e*0390_03 tad apatyaṃ hi yuvayor devān abhibhaved dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:7862: 13,083.045e*0390_04 na hi te pṛthivī devī na ca dyaur na divaṃ prabho 13,083.045e*0390_05 vīryaṃ dhārayituṃ śaktāḥ samastā iti no matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7863: 13,083.045e*0390_06 tejaḥprabhāvān nirdagdhaṃ na syāt sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:7864: 13,083.045e*0390_07 tasmāt prasādaṃ bhagavan kartum arhasi naḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:7865: 13,083.045e*0390_08 na devyāḥ saṃbhavet putro bhavataḥ surasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:7867: 13,083.046a iti teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ bhagavān govṛṣadhvajaḥ 13,083.046c evam astv iti devāṃs tān viprarṣe pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:7868: 13,083.047a ity uktvā cordhvam anayat tad reto vṛṣavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7869: 13,083.047c ūrdhvaretāḥ samabhavat tataḥprabhṛti cāpi saḥ 13,083.048a rudrāṇī tu tataḥ kruddhā prajocchede tathā kṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:7870: 13,083.048c devān athābravīt tatra strībhāvāt paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7871: 13,083.049a yasmād apatyakāmo vai bhartā me vinivartitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7872: 13,083.049c tasmāt sarve surā yūyam anapatyā bhaviṣyatha
GE07mbh_13_u:7873: 13,083.050a prajocchedo mama kṛto yasmād yuṣmābhir adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:7874: 13,083.050c tasmāt prajā vaḥ khagamāḥ sarveṣāṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:7875: 13,083.051a pāvakas tu na tatrāsīc chāpakāle bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:7876: 13,083.051c devā devyās tathā śāpād anapatyās tadābhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:7877: 13,083.052a rudras tu tejo 'pratimaṃ dhārayām āsa tat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:7878: 13,083.052c praskannaṃ tu tatas tasmāt kiṃ cit tatrāpatad bhuvi 13,083.053a tat papāta tadā cāgnau vavṛdhe cādbhutopamam
GE07mbh_13_u:7879: 13,083.053c tejas tejasi saṃpṛktam ekayonitvam āgatam 13,083.054a etasminn eva kāle tu devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7880: 13,083.054c asuras tārako nāma tena saṃtāpitā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:7882: 13,083.055c sādhyāś ca sarve saṃtrastā daiteyasya parākramāt
GE07mbh_13_u:7883: 13,083.056a sthānāni devatānāṃ hi vimānāni purāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:7884: 13,083.056c ṛṣīṇām āśramāś caiva babhūvur asurair hṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7885: 13,083.057a te dīnamanasaḥ sarve devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca ha 13,083.057c prajagmuḥ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ brahmāṇam ajaraṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_13_u:7886: 13,083.057d*0391_01 vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ stotum ārebhire prabhum
GE07mbh_13_u:7887: 13,084.001 devā ūcuḥ 13,084.001a asuras tārako nāma tvayā dattavaraḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:7888: 13,084.001c surān ṛṣīṃś ca kliśnāti vadhas tasya vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:7889: 13,084.002a tasmād bhayaṃ samutpannam asmākaṃ vai pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:7890: 13,084.002c paritrāyasva no deva na hy anyā gatir asti naḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7894: 13,084.004a vedā dharmāś ca notsādaṃ gaccheyuḥ surasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7895: 13,084.004c vihitaṃ pūrvam evātra mayā vai vyetu vo jvaraḥ 13,084.005 devā ūcuḥ 13,084.005a varadānād bhagavato daiteyo balagarvitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7896: 13,084.005c devair na śakyate hantuṃ sa kathaṃ praśamaṃ vrajet 13,084.006a sa hi naiva sma devānāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ na rakṣasām 13,084.006c vadhyaḥ syām iti jagrāha varaṃ tvattaḥ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:7897: 13,084.007a devāś ca śaptā rudrāṇyā prajocchede purā kṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:7898: 13,084.007c na bhaviṣyati vo 'patyam iti sarvajagatpate 13,084.008 brahmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:7899: 13,084.008a hutāśano na tatrāsīc chāpakāle surottamāḥ 13,084.008c sa utpādayitāpatyaṃ vadhārthaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:7900: 13,084.009a tad vai sarvān atikramya devadānavarākṣasān 13,084.009c mānuṣān atha gandharvān nāgān atha ca pakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7902: 13,084.010c yato vo bhayam utpannaṃ ye cānye suraśatravaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7903: 13,084.011a sanātano hi saṃkalpaḥ kāma ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:7904: 13,084.011c rudrasya tejaḥ praskannam agnau nipatitaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:7905: 13,084.012a tat tejo 'gnir mahad bhūtaṃ dvitīyam iva pāvakam 13,084.012c vadhārthaṃ devaśatrūṇāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ janayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:7906: 13,084.013a sa tu nāvāpa taṃ śāpaṃ naṣṭaḥ sa hutabhuk tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:7907: 13,084.013c tasmād vo bhayahṛd devāḥ samutpatsyati pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7908: 13,084.014a anviṣyatāṃ vai jvalanas tathā cādya niyujyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:7909: 13,084.014c tārakasya vadhopāyaḥ kathito vai mayānaghāḥ 13,084.015a na hi tejasvināṃ śāpās tejaḥsu prabhavanti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:7910: 13,084.015c balāny atibalaṃ prāpya nabalāni bhavanti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:7911: 13,084.016a hanyād avadhyān varadān api caiva tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7914: 13,084.017c hṛcchayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jyeṣṭho rudrād api prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7915: 13,084.018a anviṣyatāṃ sa tu kṣipraṃ tejorāśir hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7916: 13,084.018c sa vo manogataṃ kāmaṃ devaḥ saṃpādayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:7917: 13,084.019a etad vākyam upaśrutya tato devā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7919: 13,084.020a tatas trailokyam ṛṣayo vyacinvanta suraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:7920: 13,084.020c kāṅkṣanto darśanaṃ vahneḥ sarve tadgatamānasāḥ 13,084.021a pareṇa tapasā yuktāḥ śrīmanto lokaviśrutāḥ 13,084.021c lokān anvacaran siddhāḥ sarva eva bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:7921: 13,084.021e naṣṭam ātmani saṃlīnaṃ nādhijagmur hutāśanam 13,084.022a tataḥ saṃjātasaṃtrāsān agner darśanalālasān
GE07mbh_13_u:7924: 13,084.023a rasātalatale devā vasaty agnir iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:7925: 13,084.023c saṃtāpād iha saṃprāptaḥ pāvakaprabhavād aham 13,084.024a sa saṃsupto jale devā bhagavān havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7926: 13,084.024c apaḥ saṃsṛjya tejobhis tena saṃtāpitā vayam
GE07mbh_13_u:7927: 13,084.025a tasya darśanam iṣṭaṃ vo yadi devā vibhāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7928: 13,084.025c tatrainam abhigacchadhvaṃ kāryaṃ vo yadi vahninā
GE07mbh_13_u:7929: 13,084.026a gamyatāṃ sādhayiṣyāmo vayaṃ hy agnibhayāt surāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7930: 13,084.026c etāvad uktvā maṇḍūkas tvarito jalam āviśat
GE07mbh_13_u:7931: 13,084.027a hutāśanas tu bubudhe maṇḍūkasyātha paiśunam 13,084.027c śaśāpa sa tam āsādya na rasān vetsyasīti vai 13,084.028a taṃ sa saṃyujya śāpena maṇḍūkaṃ pāvako yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:7932: 13,084.028c anyatra vāsāya vibhur na ca devān adarśayat
GE07mbh_13_u:7933: 13,084.029a devās tv anugrahaṃ cakrur maṇḍūkānāṃ bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:7934: 13,084.029c yat tac chṛṇu mahābāho gadato mama sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7938: 13,084.031c gatāsūn api vaḥ śuṣkān bhūmiḥ saṃdhārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:7939: 13,084.031e tamogatāyām api ca niśāyāṃ vicariṣyatha 13,084.032a ity uktvā tāṃs tato devāḥ punar eva mahīm imām
GE07mbh_13_u:7940: 13,084.032c parīyur jvalanasyārthe na cāvindan hutāśanam 13,084.033a atha tān dviradaḥ kaś cit surendradviradopamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7941: 13,084.033c aśvatthastho 'gnir ity evaṃ prāha devān bhṛgūdvaha 13,084.034a śaśāpa jvalanaḥ sarvān dviradān krodhamūrchitaḥ 13,084.034c pratīpā bhavatāṃ jihvā bhavitrīti bhṛgūdvaha 13,084.035a ity uktvā niḥsṛto 'śvatthād agnir vāraṇasūcitaḥ 13,084.035c praviveśa śamīgarbham atha vahniḥ suṣupsayā 13,084.035d*0392_01 viveśa kīcakānantaḥ praviśann eva sūcitaḥ 13,084.035d*0392_02 ūṣmāyāṃ cittalair vaṃśais tāṃs tyaktvā prāviśac chamīm
GE07mbh_13_u:7942: 13,084.036a anugrahaṃ tu nāgānāṃ yaṃ cakruḥ śṛṇu taṃ prabho 13,084.036c devā bhṛgukulaśreṣṭha prītāḥ satyaparākramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7943: 13,084.037 devā ūcuḥ 13,084.037a pratīpayā jihvayāpi sarvāhārān kariṣyatha
GE07mbh_13_u:7945: 13,084.037e ity uktvā punar evāgnim anusasrur divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7946: 13,084.038a aśvatthān niḥsṛtaś cāgniḥ śamīgarbhagatas tadā 13,084.038c śukena khyāpito vipra taṃ devāḥ samupādravan
GE07mbh_13_u:7947: 13,084.039a śaśāpa śukam agnis tu vāgvihīno bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:7948: 13,084.039c jihvāṃ cāvartayām āsa tasyāpi hutabhuk tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:7949: 13,084.040a dṛṣṭvā tu jvalanaṃ devāḥ śukam ūcur dayānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7950: 13,084.040c bhavitā na tvam atyantaṃ śakune naṣṭavāg iti
GE07mbh_13_u:7951: 13,084.041a āvṛttajihvasya sato vākyaṃ kāntaṃ bhaviṣyati 13,084.041b*0393_01 kriyamāṇā ca te vāṇī bhaviṣyati narair bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:7952: 13,084.041c bālasyeva pravṛddhasya kalam avyaktam adbhutam 13,084.042a ity uktvā taṃ śamīgarbhe vahnim ālakṣya devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7953: 13,084.042c tad evāyatanaṃ cakruḥ puṇyaṃ sarvakriyāsv api
GE07mbh_13_u:7954: 13,084.043a tataḥprabhṛti cāpy agniḥ śamīgarbheṣu dṛśyate 13,084.043c utpādane tathopāyam anujagmuś ca mānavāḥ 13,084.044a āpo rasātale yās tu saṃsṛṣṭāś citrabhānunā
GE07mbh_13_u:7955: 13,084.044c tāḥ parvataprasravaṇair ūṣmāṃ muñcanti bhārgava 13,084.044e pāvakenādhiśayatā saṃtaptās tasya tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:7956: 13,084.045a tato 'gnir devatā dṛṣṭvā babhūva vyathitas tadā 13,084.045c kim āgamanam ity evaṃ tān apṛcchata pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7957: 13,084.046a tam ūcur vibudhāḥ sarve te caiva paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7958: 13,084.046c tvāṃ niyokṣyāmahe kārye tad bhavān kartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:7959: 13,084.046e kṛte ca tasmin bhavitā tavāpi sumahān guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7960: 13,084.047 agnir uvāca 13,084.047a brūta yad bhavatāṃ kāryaṃ sarvaṃ kartāsmi tat surāḥ 13,084.047c bhavatāṃ hi niyojyo 'haṃ mā vo 'trāstu vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:7961: 13,084.048 devā ūcuḥ 13,084.048a asuras tārako nāma brahmaṇo varadarpitaḥ 13,084.048c asmān prabādhate vīryād vadhas tasya vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:7962: 13,084.049a imān devagaṇāṃs tāta prajāpatigaṇāṃs tathā 13,084.049c ṛṣīṃś cāpi mahābhāgān paritrāyasva pāvaka 13,084.050a apatyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ pravīraṃ janaya prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:7963: 13,084.050c yad bhayaṃ no 'surāt tasmān nāśayed dhavyavāhana
GE07mbh_13_u:7964: 13,084.051a śaptānāṃ no mahādevyā nānyad asti parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:7965: 13,084.051c anyatra bhavato vīryaṃ tasmāt trāyasva nas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7966: 13,084.052a ity uktaḥ sa tathety uktvā bhagavān havyakavyabhuk
GE07mbh_13_u:7967: 13,084.052c jagāmātha durādharṣo gaṅgāṃ bhāgīrathīṃ prati 13,084.053a tayā cāpy abhavan miśro garbhaś cāsyābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:7968: 13,084.053c vavṛdhe sa tadā garbhaḥ kakṣe kṛṣṇagatir yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:7969: 13,084.054a tejasā tasya garbhasya gaṅgā vihvalacetanā 13,084.054c saṃtāpam agamat tīvraṃ sā soḍhuṃ na śaśāka ha 13,084.055a āhite jvalanenātha garbhe tejaḥsamanvite
GE07mbh_13_u:7970: 13,084.055c gaṅgāyām asuraḥ kaś cid bhairavaṃ nādam utsṛjat
GE07mbh_13_u:7973: 13,084.056e visaṃjñā nāśakad garbhaṃ saṃdhārayitum ātmanā 13,084.057a sā tu tejaḥparītāṅgī kampamānā ca jāhnavī
GE07mbh_13_u:7974: 13,084.057c uvāca vacanaṃ vipra tadā garbhabaloddhatā 13,084.057e na te śaktāsmi bhagavaṃs tejaso 'sya vidhāraṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:7975: 13,084.058a vimūḍhāsmi kṛtānena tathāsvāsthyaṃ kṛtaṃ param 13,084.058c vihvalā cāsmi bhagavaṃs tejo naṣṭaṃ ca me 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:7976: 13,084.059a dhāraṇe nāsya śaktāhaṃ garbhasya tapatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:7977: 13,084.059c utsrakṣye 'ham imaṃ duḥkhān na tu kāmāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:7978: 13,084.060a na cetaso 'sti saṃsparśo mama deva vibhāvaso
GE07mbh_13_u:7980: 13,084.061a yad atra guṇasaṃpannam itaraṃ vā hutāśana
GE07mbh_13_u:7981: 13,084.061c tvayy eva tad ahaṃ manye dharmādharmau ca kevalau 13,084.062a tām uvāca tato vahnir dhāryatāṃ dhāryatām ayam
GE07mbh_13_u:7983: 13,084.063a śaktā hy asi mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ voḍhuṃ dhārayituṃ tathā 13,084.063c na hi te kiṃ cid aprāpyaṃ madretodhāraṇād ṛte 13,084.064a sā vahninā vāryamāṇā devaiś cāpi saridvarā
GE07mbh_13_u:7984: 13,084.064c samutsasarja taṃ garbhaṃ merau girivare tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:7986: 13,084.065c nāśakat taṃ tadā garbhaṃ saṃdhārayitum ojasā
GE07mbh_13_u:7987: 13,084.066a sā samutsṛjya taṃ duḥkhād dīptavaiśvānaraprabham 13,084.066c darśayām āsa cāgnis tāṃ tadā gaṅgāṃ bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:7988: 13,084.066e papraccha saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ kaccid garbhaḥ sukhodayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7989: 13,084.067a kīdṛgvarṇo 'pi vā devi kīdṛgrūpaś ca dṛśyate 13,084.067c tejasā kena vā yuktaḥ sarvam etad bravīhi me 13,084.068 gaṅgovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:7990: 13,084.068a jātarūpaḥ sa garbho vai tejasā tvam ivānala
GE07mbh_13_u:7991: 13,084.068c suvarṇo vimalo dīptaḥ parvataṃ cāvabhāsayat 13,084.069a padmotpalavimiśrāṇāṃ hradānām iva śītalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:7992: 13,084.069c gandho 'sya sa kadambānāṃ tulyo vai tapatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:7993: 13,084.070a tejasā tasya garbhasya bhāskarasyeva raśmibhiḥ 13,084.070c yad dravyaṃ parisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:7994: 13,084.070e tat sarvaṃ kāñcanībhūtaṃ samantāt pratyadṛśyata 13,084.071a paryadhāvata śailāṃś ca nadīḥ prasravaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:7995: 13,084.071c vyadīpayat tejasā ca trailokyaṃ sacarācaram 13,084.072a evaṃrūpaḥ sa bhagavān putras te havyavāhana
GE07mbh_13_u:7997: 13,084.072e evam uktvā tu sā devī tatraivāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_13_u:7998: 13,084.073a pāvakaś cāpi tejasvī kṛtvā kāryaṃ divaukasām
GE07mbh_13_u:7999: 13,084.073c jagāmeṣṭaṃ tato deśaṃ tadā bhārgavanandana 13,084.074a etaiḥ karmaguṇair loke nāmāgneḥ parigīyate 13,084.074c hiraṇyaretā iti vai ṛṣibhir vibudhais tathā

GE07mbh_13_u:9018: 13,098.022d@010_0252 kṛtaṃ kṛtavatāṃ gacchet kiṃ punar yo niṣevate

GE07mbh_13_u:9293: 13,100.017c arcāpūrvaṃ mahārāja tataḥ prīṇāti mānuṣān 13,100.018a anityaṃ hi sthito yasmāt tasmād atithir ucyate

GE07mbh_13_u:9303: 13,100.024c tathā cakāra satataṃ tvam apy evaṃ samācara
GE07mbh_13_u:9304: 13,100.025a evaṃ gṛhasthadharmaṃ tvaṃ cetayāno narādhipa 13,100.025c ihaloke yaśaḥ prāpya pretya svargam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:9305: 13,101.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,101.001a ālokadānaṃ nāmaitat kīdṛśaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:9306: 13,101.001c katham etat samutpannaṃ phalaṃ cātra bravīhi me

GE07mbh_13_u:9311: 13,101.004a kulaśīlaguṇopetaḥ svādhyāye ca paraṃ gataḥ 13,101.004c bahūn svavaṃśaprabhavān samatītaḥ svakair guṇaiḥ 13,101.005a sa kadā cin manuṃ vipro dadarśopasasarpa ca

GE07mbh_13_u:9331: 13,101.015c etasminn antare caiva vīrudoṣadhya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:9332: 13,101.016a somasyātmā ca bahudhā saṃbhūtaḥ pṛthivītale 13,101.016c amṛtaṃ ca viṣaṃ caiva yāś cānyās tulyajātayaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:9337: 13,101.019a mano hlādayate yasmāc chriyaṃ cāpi dadhāti ha

GE07mbh_13_u:9339: 13,101.019c tasmāt sumanasaḥ proktā naraiḥ sukṛtakarmabhiḥ 13,101.020a devatābhyaḥ sumanaso yo dadāti naraḥ śuciḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:9342: 13,101.021a yaṃ yam uddiśya dīyeran devaṃ sumanasaḥ prabho

GE07mbh_13_u:9409: 13,102.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,102.001a śrutaṃ me bharataśreṣṭha puṣpadhūpapradāyinām

GE07mbh_13_u:9425: 13,102.013c paryāyaś cāpy agastyasya samapadyata bhārata 13,102.014a athāgamya mahātejā bhṛgur brahmavidāṃ varaḥ 13,102.014c agastyam āśramasthaṃ vai samupetyedam abravīt 13,102.015a evaṃ vayam asatkāraṃ devendrasyāsya durmateḥ 13,102.015c nahuṣasya kimarthaṃ vai marṣayāma mahāmune 13,102.016 agastya uvāca 13,102.016a katham eṣa mayā śakyaḥ śaptuṃ yasya mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:9426: 13,102.016c varadena varo datto bhavato viditaś ca saḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:9682: 13,106.010c adāṃ ca tatrāśvatarīsahasraṃ; nārīpuraṃ na ca tenāham āgām 13,106.011a daśāyutāni cāśvānām ayutāni ca viṃśatim 13,106.011c puṣkareṣu dvijātibhyaḥ prādāṃ gāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:9684: 13,106.012c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāṇi vibhūṣitānāṃ; jāmbūnadair ābharaṇair na tena

GE07mbh_13_u:9698: 13,106.021c vājapeyeṣu daśasu prādāṃ tenāpi nāpy aham

GE07mbh_13_u:9705: 13,106.026e na tenāpy aham āgacchaṃ phaleneha pitāmaha

GE07mbh_13_u:9707: 13,106.028c ekaikaṃ vai kāñcanaṃ śṛṅgam ebhyaḥ; patnīś caiṣām adadaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:9711: 13,106.030a śataṃ śatānāṃ gṛṣṭīnām adadaṃ cāpy atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:9712: 13,106.030c iṣṭvānekair mahāyajñair brāhmaṇebhyo na tena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:9713: 13,106.031a ekādaśāhair ayajaṃ sadakṣiṇair; dvirdvādaśāhair aśvamedhaiś ca

GE07mbh_13_u:10605: 13,110.137d@011_0382 vijānīyāt tu māsena dehanyāsam upasthitam 13,110.137d@011_0383 visragandham upāghrāti surabhiṃ prāpya bhāsvaram 13,110.137d@011_0384 devatāyatanastho 'pi saptarātreṇa mṛtyubhāk 13,110.137d@011_0385 sarvāṅgadhāraṇāvasthāṃ dhārayeta samāhitaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:10629: 13,110.137d@011_0418 saraṇe prajanādāne guṇānāṃ prakṛtiḥ sadā 13,110.137d@011_0419 parā pramattā satatam etāvat kāryakāraṇam 13,110.137d@011_0420 asac caiva ca sac caiva kurute sa punaḥ punaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:11818: 13,125.038d@014_0346 śrūyatāṃ cāparaṃ guhyaṃ rahasyaṃ dharmasaṃhitam 13,125.038d@014_0347 śraddadhānena kartavyaṃ gurūṇāṃ vacanaṃ sadā 13,125.038d@014_0348 dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca māsi māsi ghṛtākṣatam

GE07mbh_13_u:12075: 13,125.038d@014B_0043 maudgalyāya gataḥ svargaṃ śatadyumno mahīpatiḥ 13,125.038d@014B_0044 bhakṣyabhojyasya ca kṛtān rāśayaḥ parvatopamān 13,125.038d@014B_0045 śāṇḍilyāya purā dattvā samanyur divam āsthitaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:12116: 13,126.011c devalaḥ kāśyapaś caiva hastikāśyapa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12118: 13,126.012c śiṣyair anugatāḥ sarve devakalpais tapodhanaiḥ 13,126.013a teṣām atithisatkāram arcanīyaṃ kulocitam
GE07mbh_13_u:12120: 13,126.014a hariteṣu suvarṇeṣu barhiṣkeṣu naveṣu ca 13,126.014c upopaviviśuḥ prītā viṣṭareṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:12121: 13,126.015a kathāś cakrus tatas te tu madhurā dharmasaṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12122: 13,126.015c rājarṣīṇāṃ surāṇāṃ ca ye vasanti tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12124: 13,126.016c vaktrān niḥsṛtya kṛṣṇasya vahnir adbhutakarmaṇaḥ 13,126.017a so 'gnir dadāha taṃ śailaṃ sadrumaṃ salatākṣupam 13,126.017c sapakṣimṛgasaṃghātaṃ saśvāpadasarīsṛpam 13,126.018a mṛgaiś ca vividhākārair hāhābhūtam acetanam 13,126.018c śikharaṃ tasya śailasya mathitaṃ dīptadarśanam 13,126.019a sa tu vahnir mahājvālo dagdhvā sarvam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12125: 13,126.019c viṣṇoḥ samīpam āgamya pādau śiṣyavad aspṛśat
GE07mbh_13_u:12126: 13,126.020a tato viṣṇur vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirdagdham arikarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12127: 13,126.020c saumyair dṛṣṭinipātais tat punaḥ prakṛtim ānayat
GE07mbh_13_u:12128: 13,126.021a tathaiva sa girir bhūyaḥ prapuṣpitalatādrumaḥ 13,126.021c sapakṣigaṇasaṃghuṣṭaḥ saśvāpadasarīsṛpaḥ 13,126.022a tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā munigaṇas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12130: 13,126.023a tato nārāyaṇo dṛṣṭvā tān ṛṣīn vismayānvitān
GE07mbh_13_u:12131: 13,126.023c praśritaṃ madhuraṃ snigdhaṃ papraccha vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12132: 13,126.024a kim asya ṛṣipūgasya tyaktasaṅgasya nityaśaḥ 13,126.024c nirmamasyāgamavato vismayaḥ samupāgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12133: 13,126.025a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ yāthātathyam aninditāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:12135: 13,126.026c bhavāñ śītaṃ bhavān uṣṇaṃ bhavān eva pravarṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:12136: 13,126.027a pṛthivyāṃ yāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12137: 13,126.027c teṣāṃ pitā tvaṃ mātā ca prabhuḥ prabhava eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12138: 13,126.028a etan no vismayakaraṃ praśaṃsa madhusūdana 13,126.028c tvam evārhasi kalyāṇa vaktuṃ vahner vinirgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:12139: 13,126.029a tato vigatasaṃtrāsā vayam apy arikarśana 13,126.029c yac chrutaṃ yac ca dṛṣṭaṃ nas tat pravakṣyāmahe hare
GE07mbh_13_u:12140: 13,126.030 vāsudeva uvāca 13,126.030a etat tad vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo mama vaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:12141: 13,126.030c kṛṣṇavartmā yugāntābho yenāyaṃ mathito giriḥ 13,126.031a ṛṣayaś cārtim āpannā jitakrodhā jitendriyāḥ 13,126.031c bhavanto vyathitāś cāsan devakalpās tapodhanāḥ 13,126.032a vratacaryāparītasya tapasvivratasevayā 13,126.032c mama vahniḥ samudbhūto na vai vyathitum arhatha
GE07mbh_13_u:12142: 13,126.033a vrataṃ cartum ihāyātas tv ahaṃ girim imaṃ śubham 13,126.033c putraṃ cātmasamaṃ vīrye tapasā sraṣṭum āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12143: 13,126.034a tato mamātmā yo dehe so 'gnir bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ 13,126.034c gataś ca varadaṃ draṣṭuṃ sarvalokapitāmaham 13,126.035a tena cātmānuśiṣṭo me putratve munisattamāḥ 13,126.035c tejaso 'rdhena putras te bhaviteti vṛṣadhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12145: 13,126.036c śiṣyavat paricaryātha śāntaḥ prakṛtim āgataḥ 13,126.037a etad asya rahasyaṃ vaḥ padmanābhasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12146: 13,126.037c mayā premṇā samākhyātaṃ na bhīḥ kāryā tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12147: 13,126.038a sarvatra gatir avyagrā bhavatāṃ dīrghadarśanāḥ 13,126.038c tapasvivratasaṃdīptā jñānavijñānaśobhitāḥ 13,126.039a yac chrutaṃ yac ca vo dṛṣṭaṃ divi vā yadi vā bhuvi 13,126.039c āścaryaṃ paramaṃ kiṃ cit tad bhavanto bruvantu me 13,126.040a tasyāmṛtanikāśasya vāṅmadhor asti me spṛhā 13,126.040c bhavadbhiḥ kathitasyeha tapovananivāsibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12148: 13,126.041a yady apy aham adṛṣṭaṃ vā divyam adbhutadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12149: 13,126.041c divi vā bhuvi vā kiṃ cit paśyāmy amaladarśanāḥ 13,126.042a prakṛtiḥ sā mama parā na kva cit pratihanyate 13,126.042c na cātmagatam aiśvaryam āścaryaṃ pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_13_u:12150: 13,126.043a śraddheyaḥ kathito hy arthaḥ sajjanaśravaṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12151: 13,126.043c ciraṃ tiṣṭhati medinyāṃ śaile lekhyam ivārpitam
GE07mbh_13_u:12152: 13,126.044a tad ahaṃ sajjanamukhān niḥsṛtaṃ tatsamāgame 13,126.044c kathayiṣyāmy aharahar buddhidīpakaraṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:12153: 13,126.045a tato munigaṇāḥ sarve praśritāḥ kṛṣṇasaṃnidhau 13,126.045c netraiḥ padmadalaprakhyair apaśyanta janārdanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12156: 13,126.047a tato munigaṇāḥ sarve nāradaṃ devadarśanam 13,126.047c tadā niyojayām āsur vacane vākyakovidam 13,126.048a yad āścaryam acintyaṃ ca girau himavati prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:12158: 13,126.049a tad bhavān ṛṣisaṃghasya hitārthaṃ sarvacoditaḥ 13,126.049c yathādṛṣṭaṃ hṛṣīkeśe sarvam ākhyātum arhati 13,126.050a evam uktaḥ sa munibhir nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12159: 13,126.050c kathayām āsa devarṣiḥ pūrvavṛttāṃ kathāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_13_u:12160: 13,127.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,127.001a tato nārāyaṇasuhṛn nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ 13,127.001c śaṃkarasyomayā sārdhaṃ saṃvādaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:12161: 13,127.002a tapaś cacāra dharmātmā vṛṣabhāṅkaḥ sureśvaraḥ 13,127.002c puṇye girau himavati
GE07mbh_13_u:12163: 13,127.003c apsarogaṇasaṃkīrṇe bhūtasaṃghaniṣevite 13,127.004a tatra devo mudā yukto bhūtasaṃghaśatair
GE07mbh_13_u:12164: 13,127.004c nānārūpair virūpaiś ca divyair adbhutadarśanaiḥ 13,127.005a siṃhavyāghragajaprakhyaiḥ sarvajātisamanvitaiḥ 13,127.005c kroṣṭukadvīpivadanair ṛkṣarṣabhamukhais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12166: 13,127.006c nānāvarṇamṛgaprakhyaiḥ sarvajātisamanvayaiḥ 13,127.006e kiṃnarair devagandharvair yakṣabhūtagaṇais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12169: 13,127.008a mṛdaṅgapaṇavodghuṣṭaṃ śaṅkhabherīnināditam 13,127.008c nṛtyadbhir bhūtasaṃghaiś ca barhiṇaiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12172: 13,127.010a sa giris tapasā tasya bhūteśasya vyarocata
GE07mbh_13_u:12174: 13,127.011c ṣaṭpadair upagītaiś ca mādhavāpratimo giriḥ 13,127.012a taṃ mahotsavasaṃkāśaṃ bhīmarūpadharaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12175: 13,127.012c dṛṣṭvā munigaṇasyāsīt parā prītir janārdana 13,127.013a munayaś ca mahābhāgāḥ siddhāś caivordhvaretasaḥ 13,127.013c maruto vasavaḥ sādhyā viśvedevāḥ sanātanāḥ 13,127.014a yakṣā nāgāḥ piśācāś ca lokapālā hutāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12176: 13,127.014c bhāvāś ca sarve nyagbhūtās tatraivāsan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12177: 13,127.015a ṛtavaḥ sarvapuṣpaiś ca vyakiranta mahādbhutaiḥ 13,127.015c oṣadhyo jvalamānāś ca dyotayanti sma tad vanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12178: 13,127.016a vihagāś ca mudā yuktāḥ prānṛtyan vyanadaṃś ca ha 13,127.016c giripṛṣṭheṣu ramyeṣu vyāharanto janapriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12180: 13,127.017c paryaṅka iva vibhrājann upaviṣṭo mahāmanāḥ 13,127.018a vyāghracarmāmbaradharaḥ siṃhacarmottaracchadaḥ 13,127.018c vyālayajñopavītī ca lohitāṅgadabhūṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12181: 13,127.019a hariśmaśrur jaṭī bhīmo bhayakartā suradviṣām 13,127.019c abhayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhaktānāṃ vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12182: 13,127.020a dṛṣṭvā tam ṛṣayaḥ sarve śirobhir avanīṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12184: 13,127.021a tasya bhūtapateḥ sthānaṃ bhīmarūpadharaṃ babhau 13,127.021c apradhṛṣyataraṃ caiva mahoragasamākulam
GE07mbh_13_u:12186: 13,127.022c tat sado vṛṣabhāṅkasya bhīmarūpadharaṃ babhau 13,127.023a tam abhyayāc chailasutā
GE07mbh_13_u:12192: 13,127.026a tataḥ smayantī pāṇibhyāṃ narmārthaṃ cārudarśanā 13,127.026c haranetre śubhe devī sahasā sā samāvṛṇot
GE07mbh_13_u:12193: 13,127.027a saṃvṛtābhyāṃ tu netrābhyāṃ tamobhūtam acetanam 13,127.027c nirhomaṃ nirvaṣaṭkāraṃ tat sadaḥ sahasābhavat 13,127.028a janaś ca vimanāḥ sarvo bhayatrāsasamanvitaḥ 13,127.028c nimīlite bhūtapatau naṣṭasūrya ivābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:12194: 13,127.029a tato vitimiro lokaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata 13,127.029c jvālā ca mahatī dīptā lalāṭāt tasya niḥsṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:12195: 13,127.030a tṛtīyaṃ cāsya saṃbhūtaṃ netram ādityasaṃnibham 13,127.030c yugāntasadṛśaṃ dīptaṃ yenāsau mathito giriḥ 13,127.031a tato girisutā dṛṣṭvā dīptāgnisadṛśekṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:12199: 13,127.033a mṛgayūthair drutair bhītair harapārśvam upāgataiḥ 13,127.033c śaraṇaṃ cāpy avindadbhis tat sadaḥ saṃkulaṃ babhau
GE07mbh_13_u:12202: 13,127.035a kṣaṇena tena dagdhaḥ sa himavān abhavan nagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12203: 13,127.035c sadhātuśikharābhogo dīnadagdhavanauṣadhiḥ 13,127.036a taṃ dṛṣṭvā mathitaṃ śailaṃ śailarājasutā tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12204: 13,127.036c bhagavantaṃ prapannā sā sāñjalipragrahā sthitā 13,127.037a umāṃ śarvas tadā dṛṣṭvā strībhāvāgatamārdavām 13,127.037c pitur dainyam anicchantīṃ prītyāpaśyat tato girim
GE07mbh_13_u:12207: 13,127.039a prakṛtisthaṃ giriṃ dṛṣṭvā prītā devī maheśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:12208: 13,127.039c uvāca sarvabhūtānāṃ patiṃ patim aninditā 13,127.040a bhagavan sarvabhūteśa śūlapāṇe mahāvrata
GE07mbh_13_u:12209: 13,127.040c saṃśayo me mahāñ jātas taṃ me vyākhyātum arhasi 13,127.041a kimarthaṃ te lalāṭe vai tṛtīyaṃ netram utthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:12210: 13,127.041c kimarthaṃ ca girir dagdhaḥ sapakṣigaṇakānanaḥ 13,127.042a kimarthaṃ ca punar deva prakṛtisthaḥ kṣaṇāt kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12211: 13,127.042c tathaiva drumasaṃchannaḥ kṛto 'yaṃ te maheśvara 13,127.043 maheśvara uvāca 13,127.043a netre me saṃvṛte devi tvayā bālyād anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:12212: 13,127.043c naṣṭālokas tato lokaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata 13,127.044a naṣṭāditye tathā loke tamobhūte nagātmaje 13,127.044c tṛtīyaṃ locanaṃ dīptaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ te rakṣatā prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12213: 13,127.045a tasya cākṣṇo mahat tejo yenāyaṃ mathito giriḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12214: 13,127.045c tvatpriyārthaṃ ca me devi prakṛtisthaḥ kṣaṇāt kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12216: 13,127.046a bhagavan kena te vaktraṃ candravat priyadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12217: 13,127.046c pūrvaṃ tathaiva śrīkāntam uttaraṃ paścimaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12218: 13,127.047a dakṣiṇaṃ ca mukhaṃ raudraṃ kenordhvaṃ kapilā jaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12219: 13,127.047c kena kaṇṭhaś ca te nīlo barhibarhanibhaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12220: 13,127.048a haste caitat pinākaṃ te satataṃ kena tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:12221: 13,127.048c jaṭilo brahmacārī ca kimartham asi nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12222: 13,127.049a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ vada bhūtapate 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:12223: 13,127.049c sadharmacāriṇī cāhaṃ bhaktā ceti vṛṣadhvaja 13,127.050a evam uktaḥ sa bhagavāñ śailaputryā pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_13_u:12224: 13,127.050c tasyā vṛttyā ca buddhyā ca prītimān abhavat prabhuḥ 13,127.051a tatas tām abravīd devaḥ subhage śrūyatām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:12225: 13,127.051c hetubhir yair mamaitāni rūpāṇi rucirānane 13,128.001 maheśvara uvāca 13,128.001a tilottamā nāma purā brahmaṇā yoṣid uttamā
GE07mbh_13_u:12226: 13,128.001c tilaṃ tilaṃ samuddhṛtya ratnānāṃ nirmitā śubhā
GE07mbh_13_u:12227: 13,128.002a sābhyagacchata māṃ devi rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi 13,128.002c pradakṣiṇaṃ lobhayantī māṃ śubhe rucirānanā 13,128.003a yato yataḥ sā sudatī mām upādhāvad antike
GE07mbh_13_u:12228: 13,128.003c tatas tato mukhaṃ cāru mama devi vinirgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:12229: 13,128.004a tāṃ didṛkṣur ahaṃ yogāc caturmūrtitvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12230: 13,128.004c caturmukhaś ca saṃvṛtto darśayan yogam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12231: 13,128.005a pūrveṇa vadanenāham indratvam anuśāsmi ha 13,128.005c uttareṇa tvayā sārdhaṃ ramāmy aham anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:12232: 13,128.006a paścimaṃ me mukhaṃ saumyaṃ sarvaprāṇisukhāvaham 13,128.006c dakṣiṇaṃ bhīmasaṃkāśaṃ raudraṃ saṃharati prajāḥ 13,128.007a jaṭilo brahmacārī ca lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā 13,128.007c devakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ pinākaṃ me kare sthitam 13,128.008a indreṇa ca purā vajraṃ kṣiptaṃ śrīkāṅkṣiṇā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:12233: 13,128.008c dagdhvā kaṇṭhaṃ tu tad yātaṃ tena śrīkaṇṭhatā mama 13,128.009 umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:12234: 13,128.009a vāhaneṣu prabhūteṣu śrīmatsv anyeṣu satsu te
GE07mbh_13_u:12235: 13,128.009c kathaṃ govṛṣabho deva vāhanatvam upāgataḥ 13,128.010 maheśvara uvāca 13,128.010a surabhīṃ sasṛje brahmāmṛtadhenuṃ payomucam
GE07mbh_13_u:12236: 13,128.010c sā sṛṣṭā bahudhā jātā kṣaramāṇā payo 'mṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:12237: 13,128.011a tasyā vatsamukhotsṛṣṭaḥ pheno madgātram āgataḥ 13,128.011c tato dagdhā mayā gāvo nānāvarṇatvam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12239: 13,128.012c vṛṣaṃ cemaṃ dhvajārthaṃ me dadau vāhanam eva ca 13,128.013 umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:12241: 13,128.013c tāṃś ca saṃtyajya bhagavañ śmaśāne ramase katham
GE07mbh_13_u:12244: 13,128.015c vinikīrṇāmiṣacaye śivānādavinādite 13,128.016 maheśvara uvāca 13,128.016a medhyānveṣī mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ vicarāmi niśāsv aham
GE07mbh_13_u:12245: 13,128.016c na ca medhyataraṃ kiṃ cic chmaśānād iha vidyate 13,128.017a tena me sarvavāsānāṃ śmaśāne ramate manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12246: 13,128.017c nyagrodhaśākhāsaṃchanne nirbhuktasragvibhūṣite 13,128.018a tatra caiva ramante me bhūtasaṃghāḥ śubhānane
GE07mbh_13_u:12247: 13,128.018c na ca bhūtagaṇair devi vināhaṃ vastum utsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:12248: 13,128.019a eṣa vāso hi me medhyaḥ svargīyaś ca mato hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:12249: 13,128.019c puṇyaḥ paramakaś caiva medhyakāmair upāsyate 13,128.020 umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:12251: 13,128.020c pinākapāṇe varada saṃśayo me mahān ayam
GE07mbh_13_u:12252: 13,128.021a ayaṃ munigaṇaḥ sarvas tapas tapa iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:12254: 13,128.022a asya caivarṣisaṃghasya mama ca priyakāmyayā 13,128.022c etaṃ mameha saṃdehaṃ vaktum arhasy ariṃdama
GE07mbh_13_u:12255: 13,128.023a dharmaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ proktaḥ kathaṃ vācarituṃ naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12256: 13,128.023c śakyo dharmam avindadbhir dharmajña vada me prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:12257: 13,128.024 nārada uvāca 13,128.024a tato munigaṇaḥ sarvas tāṃ devīṃ pratyapūjayat
GE07mbh_13_u:12258: 13,128.024c vāgbhir ṛgbhūṣitārthābhiḥ stavaiś cārthavidāṃ vara 13,128.025 maheśvara uvāca 13,128.025a ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūtānukampanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12259: 13,128.025c śamo dānaṃ yathāśakti gārhasthyo dharma uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12262: 13,128.027a eṣa pañcavidho dharmo bahuśākhaḥ sukhodayaḥ 13,128.027c dehibhir dharmaparamaiḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃcayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12264: 13,128.028a bhagavan saṃśayaṃ pṛṣṭas taṃ me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:12265: 13,128.028c cāturvarṇyasya yo dharmaḥ sve sve varṇe guṇāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12266: 13,128.029a brāhmaṇe kīdṛśo dharmaḥ kṣatriye kīdṛśo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:12267: 13,128.029c vaiśye kiṃlakṣaṇo dharmaḥ śūdre kiṃlakṣaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:12268: 13,128.030 maheśvara uvāca 13,128.030a nyāyatas te mahābhāge saṃśayaḥ samudīritaḥ 13,128.030c bhūmidevā mahābhāgāḥ sadā loke dvijātayaḥ 13,128.031a upavāsaḥ sadā dharmo brāhmaṇasya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12269: 13,128.031c sa hi dharmārtham utpanno brahmabhūyāya kalpate
GE07mbh_13_u:12270: 13,128.032a tasya dharmakriyā devi vratacaryā ca nyāyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12272: 13,128.033a gurudaivatapūjārthaṃ svādhyāyābhyasanātmakaḥ 13,128.033c dehibhir dharmaparamaiś cartavyo dharmasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12274: 13,128.034a bhagavan saṃśayo me 'tra taṃ me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:12275: 13,128.034c cāturvarṇyasya dharmaṃ hi naipuṇyena prakīrtaya 13,128.035 maheśvara uvāca 13,128.035a rahasyaśravaṇaṃ dharmo vedavrataniṣevaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:12279: 13,128.037a guruṇā tv abhyanujñātaḥ samāvarteta vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12282: 13,128.038c dharmo nityopavāsitvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ tathaiva ca 13,128.039a āhitāgnir adhīyāno juhvānaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12283: 13,128.039c vighasāśī yatāhāro gṛhasthaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ 13,128.040a atithivratatā dharmo dharmas tretāgnidhāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:12284: 13,128.040c iṣṭīś ca paśubandhāṃś ca vidhipūrvaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:12285: 13,128.041a yajñaś ca paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā ca dehiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:12286: 13,128.041c apūrvabhojanaṃ dharmo vighasāśitvam eva ca 13,128.042a bhukte parijane paścād bhojanaṃ dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12288: 13,128.043a daṃpatyoḥ samaśīlatvaṃ dharmaś ca gṛhamedhinām 13,128.043c gṛhyāṇāṃ caiva devānāṃ nityaṃ puṣpabalikriyā 13,128.044a nityopalepanaṃ dharmas tathā nityopavāsitā
GE07mbh_13_u:12290: 13,128.045a eṣa dvijajane dharmo gārhasthyo lokadhāraṇaḥ 13,128.045c dvijātīnāṃ satāṃ nityaṃ sadaivaiṣa pravartate 13,128.046a yas tu kṣatragato devi tvayā dharma udīritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12291: 13,128.046c tam ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi taṃ me śṛṇu samāhitā 13,128.047a kṣatriyasya smṛto dharmaḥ prajāpālanam āditaḥ 13,128.047c nirdiṣṭaphalabhoktā hi rājā dharmeṇa yujyate 13,128.048a prajāḥ pālayate yo hi dharmeṇa manujādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12293: 13,128.049a tatra rājñaḥ paro dharmo damaḥ svādhyāya eva ca 13,128.049c agnihotraparispando dānādhyayanam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12295: 13,128.050c bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇaṃ dharmaḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā
GE07mbh_13_u:12296: 13,128.051a samyag daṇḍe sthitir dharmo dharmo vedakratukriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12298: 13,128.052a ārtahastaprado rājā pretya ceha mahīyate 13,128.052c gobrāhmaṇārthe vikrāntaḥ saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ gataḥ 13,128.052e aśvamedhajitāṃl lokān prāpnoti tridivālaye
GE07mbh_13_u:12299: 13,128.053a vaiśyasya satataṃ dharmaḥ pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12301: 13,128.054a vāṇijyaṃ satpathasthānam ātithyaṃ praśamo damaḥ 13,128.054c viprāṇāṃ svāgataṃ tyāgo vaiśyadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 13,128.055a tilān gandhān rasāṃś caiva na vikrīṇīta vai kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:12302: 13,128.055c vaṇikpatham upāsīno vaiśyaḥ satpatham āśritaḥ 13,128.056a sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti yathārhataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12303: 13,128.056c śūdradharmaḥ paro nityaṃ śuśrūṣā ca dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:12304: 13,128.057a sa śūdraḥ saṃśitatapāḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ 13,128.057c śuśrūṣann atithiṃ prāptaṃ tapaḥ saṃcinute mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:12306: 13,128.058c śūdro dharmaphalair iṣṭaiḥ saṃprayujyeta buddhimān 13,128.059a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ cāturvarṇyasya śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:12307: 13,128.059c ekaikasyeha subhage kim anyac chrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:12309: 13,129.001a uktās tvayā pṛthagdharmāś cāturvarṇyahitāḥ śubhāḥ 13,129.001c sarvavyāpī tu yo dharmo bhagavaṃs taṃ bravīhi me 13,129.002 maheśvara uvāca 13,129.002a brāhmaṇā lokasāreṇa sṛṣṭā dhātrā guṇārthinā 13,129.002c lokāṃs tārayituṃ kṛtsnān martyeṣu kṣitidevatāḥ 13,129.003a teṣām imaṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmakarmaphalodayam
GE07mbh_13_u:12310: 13,129.003c brāhmaṇeṣu hi yo dharmaḥ sa dharmaḥ paramo mataḥ 13,129.004a ime tu lokadharmārthaṃ trayaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:12311: 13,129.004c pṛthivyāḥ sarjane nityaṃ sṛṣṭās tān api me śṛṇu 13,129.005a vedoktaḥ paramo dharmaḥ smṛtiśāstragato 'paraḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:12313: 13,129.006a traividyo brāhmaṇo vidvān na cādhyayanajīvanaḥ 13,129.006c trikarmā triparikrānto maitra eṣa smṛto dvijaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:12317: 13,129.009a nityasvādhyāyatā dharmo dharmo yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ 13,129.009c dānaṃ praśasyate cāsya yathāśakti yathāvidhi 13,129.010a ayaṃ tu paramo dharmaḥ pravṛttaḥ satsu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12318: 13,129.010c gṛhasthatā viśuddhānāṃ dharmasya nicayo mahān 13,129.011a pañcayajñaviśuddhātmā satyavāg anasūyakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12320: 13,129.012a amānī ca sadājihmaḥ snigdhavāṇīpradas tathā 13,129.012c atithyabhyāgataratiḥ śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ 13,129.013a pādyam arghyaṃ yathānyāyam āsanaṃ śayanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12321: 13,129.013c dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ cāpi yo dadāti sa dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12322: 13,129.014a prātar utthāya cācamya bhojanenopamantrya ca 13,129.014c satkṛtyānuvrajed yaś ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12326: 13,129.016c tam ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi sarvabhūtahitaṃ śubham 13,129.017a dātavyam asakṛc chaktyā yaṣṭavyam asakṛt tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12327: 13,129.017c puṣṭikarmavidhānaṃ ca kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā 13,129.018a dharmeṇārthaḥ samāhāryo dharmalabdhaṃ tridhā dhanam 13,129.018c kartavyaṃ dharmaparamaṃ mānavena prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12328: 13,129.019a ekenāṃśena dharmārthaś cartavyo bhūtim icchatā 13,129.019c ekenāṃśena kāmārtha ekam aṃśaṃ vivardhayet 13,129.020a nivṛttilakṣaṇas tv anyo dharmo mokṣa iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12329: 13,129.020c tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu me devi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12332: 13,129.022a na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅgo na vāsasi na cāsane 13,129.022c na tridaṇḍe na śayane nāgnau na śaraṇālaye
GE07mbh_13_u:12334: 13,129.023c yukto yogaṃ prati sadā pratisaṃkhyānam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12336: 13,129.024c nadīpulinaśāyī ca nadītīraratiś ca yaḥ 13,129.025a vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgeṣu snehabandheṣu ca dvijaḥ 13,129.025c ātmany evātmano bhāvaṃ samāsajyāṭati dvijaḥ 13,129.026a sthāṇubhūto nirāhāro mokṣadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:12337: 13,129.026c parivrajati yo yuktas tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12338: 13,129.027a na caikatra cirāsakto na caikagrāmagocaraḥ 13,129.027c yukto hy aṭati nirmukto na caikapulineśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12339: 13,129.028a eṣa mokṣavidāṃ dharmo vedoktaḥ satpathaḥ satām
GE07mbh_13_u:12340: 13,129.028c yo mārgam anuyātīmaṃ padaṃ tasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12342: 13,129.029c haṃsaḥ paramahaṃsaś ca yo yaḥ paścāt sa uttamaḥ 13,129.030a ataḥ parataraṃ nāsti nādharaṃ na tiro 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12343: 13,129.030c aduḥkham asukhaṃ saumyam ajarāmaram avyayam 13,129.031 umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:12344: 13,129.031a gārhasthyo mokṣadharmaś ca sajjanācaritas tvayā 13,129.031c bhāṣito martyalokasya mārgaḥ śreyaskaro mahān 13,129.032a ṛṣidharmaṃ tu dharmajña śrotum icchāmy anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:12345: 13,129.032c spṛhā bhavati me nityaṃ tapovananivāsiṣu 13,129.033a ājyadhūmodbhavo gandho ruṇaddhīva tapovanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12346: 13,129.033c taṃ dṛṣṭvā me manaḥ prītaṃ maheśvara sadā bhavet 13,129.034a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva munidharmakṛtaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:12348: 13,129.034e nikhilena mayā pṛṣṭaṃ mahādeva yathātatham 13,129.035 maheśvara uvāca 13,129.035a hanta te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi munidharmam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:12349: 13,129.035c yaṃ kṛtvā munayo yānti siddhiṃ svatapasā śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:12350: 13,129.036a phenapānām ṛṣīṇāṃ yo dharmo dharmavidāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12351: 13,129.036c taṃ me śṛṇu mahābhāge dharmajñe dharmam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12352: 13,129.037a uñchanti satataṃ tasmin brāhmaṃ phenotkaraṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:12353: 13,129.037c amṛtaṃ brahmaṇā pītaṃ madhuraṃ prasṛtaṃ divi
GE07mbh_13_u:12354: 13,129.038a eṣa teṣāṃ viśuddhānāṃ phenapānāṃ tapodhane 13,129.038c dharmacaryākṛto mārgo vālakhilyagaṇe śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:12356: 13,129.039c uñcham uñchanti dharmajñāḥ śākunīṃ vṛttim āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12357: 13,129.040a mṛganirmokavasanāś cīravalkalavāsasaḥ 13,129.040c nirdvaṃdvāḥ satpathaṃ prāptā vālakhilyās tapodhanāḥ 13,129.041a aṅguṣṭhaparvamātrās te sveṣv aṅgeṣu vyavasthitāḥ 13,129.041c tapaścaraṇam īhante teṣāṃ dharmaphalaṃ mahat 13,129.042a te suraiḥ samatāṃ yānti surakāryārthasiddhaye 13,129.042c dyotayanto diśaḥ sarvās tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāḥ 13,129.043a ye tv anye śuddhamanaso dayādharmaparāyaṇāḥ 13,129.043c santaś cakracarāḥ puṇyāḥ somalokacarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:12360: 13,129.045a somapānāṃ ca devānām ūṣmapāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12363: 13,129.046c yajñānāṃ cāpi pañcānāṃ yajanaṃ dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12364: 13,129.047a eṣa cakracarair devi devalokacarair dvijaiḥ 13,129.047c ṛṣidharmaḥ sadā cīrṇo yo 'nyas tam api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:12365: 13,129.048a sarveṣv evarṣidharmeṣu jeya ātmā jitendriyaḥ 13,129.048c kāmakrodhau tataḥ paścāj jetavyāv iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12367: 13,129.050a nityaṃ yajñakriyā dharmaḥ pitṛdevārcane ratiḥ 13,129.050c sarvātithyaṃ ca kartavyam annenoñchārjitena vai 13,129.051a nivṛttir upabhogasya gorasānāṃ ca vai ratiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12370: 13,129.052c ṛṣīṇāṃ niyamā hy ete yair jayanty ajitāṃ gatim 13,129.053a vidhūme nyastamusale vyaṅgāre bhuktavaj jane 13,129.053c atītapātrasaṃcāre kāle vigatabhaikṣake
GE07mbh_13_u:12373: 13,129.055a na stambhī na ca mānī yo na pramatto na vismitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12374: 13,129.055c mitrāmitrasamo maitro yaḥ sa dharmavid uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12376: 13,130.001a deśeṣu ramaṇīyeṣu girīṇāṃ nirjhareṣu ca 13,130.001c sravantīnāṃ ca kuñjeṣu parvatopavaneṣu ca 13,130.002a deśeṣu ca vicitreṣu phalavatsu samāhitāḥ 13,130.002c mūlavatsu ca deśeṣu vasanti niyatavratāḥ 13,130.003a teṣām api vidhiṃ puṇyaṃ śrotum icchāmi śaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:12378: 13,130.003d*0627_01 vānaprasthoñchavṛttīnāṃ tapovistṛtacetasām 13,130.004 maheśvara uvāca 13,130.004a vānaprastheṣu yo dharmas taṃ me śṛṇu samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:12379: 13,130.004c śrutvā caikamanā devi dharmabuddhiparā bhava 13,130.005a saṃsiddhair niyataiḥ sadbhir vanavāsam upāgataiḥ 13,130.005c vānaprasthair idaṃ karma kartavyaṃ śṛṇu yādṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:12383: 13,130.007c iṅgudair aṇḍatailānāṃ snehārthaṃ ca niṣevaṇam 13,130.008a yogacaryākṛtaiḥ siddhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12385: 13,130.009a yuktair yogavahaiḥ sadbhir grīṣme pañcatapais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12386: 13,130.009c maṇḍūkayoganiyatair yathānyāyaniṣevibhiḥ 13,130.010a vīrāsanagatair nityaṃ sthaṇḍile śayanais tathā 13,130.010c śītayogo 'gniyogaś ca cartavyo dharmabuddhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12388: 13,130.011c aśmakuṭṭais tathā dāntaiḥ saṃprakṣālais tathāparaiḥ 13,130.012a cīravalkalasaṃvītair mṛgacarmanivāsibhiḥ 13,130.012c kāryā yātrā yathākālaṃ yathādharmaṃ yathāvidhi 13,130.013a vananityair vanacarair vanapair vanagocaraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12389: 13,130.013c vanaṃ gurum ivāsādya vastavyaṃ vanajīvibhiḥ 13,130.014a teṣāṃ homakriyā dharmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12390: 13,130.014c nāgapañcamayajñasya vedoktasyānupālanam 13,130.015a aṣṭamīyajñaparatā cāturmāsyaniṣevaṇam 13,130.015c paurṇamāsyāṃ tu yo yajño nityayajñas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12392: 13,130.016c vimuktāḥ sarvapāpaiś ca caranti munayo vane
GE07mbh_13_u:12394: 13,130.017c santaḥ satpathanityā ye te yānti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:12395: 13,130.018a brahmalokaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ somalokaṃ ca śāśvatam 13,130.018c gacchanti munayaḥ siddhā ṛṣidharmavyapāśrayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:12396: 13,130.019a eṣa dharmo mayā devi vānaprasthāśritaḥ śubhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12400: 13,130.020c yo dharmo munisaṃghasya siddhivādeṣu taṃ vada
GE07mbh_13_u:12402: 13,130.021c svairiṇo dārasaṃyuktās teṣāṃ dharmaḥ kathaṃ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12403: 13,130.022 maheśvara uvāca 13,130.022a svairiṇas tāpasā devi sarve dāravihāriṇaḥ 13,130.022c teṣāṃ mauṇḍyaṃ kaṣāyaś ca vāsarātriś ca kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:12404: 13,130.023a trikālam abhiṣekaś ca hotraṃ tv ṛṣikṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:12406: 13,130.024a ye ca te pūrvakathitā dharmā vananivāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:12407: 13,130.024c yadi sevanti dharmāṃs tān āpnuvanti tapaḥphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:12410: 13,130.026a teṣām ṛṣikṛto dharmo dharmiṇām upapadyate 13,130.026c na kāmakārāt kāmo 'nyaḥ saṃsevyo dharmadarśibhiḥ 13,130.027a sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ samyag dadāty abhayadakṣiṇām 13,130.027c hiṃsāroṣavimuktātmā sa vai dharmeṇa yujyate 13,130.028a sarvabhūtānukampī yaḥ sarvabhūtārjavavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12411: 13,130.028c sarvabhūtātmabhūtaś ca sa vai dharmeṇa yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12412: 13,130.029a sarvavedeṣu vā snānaṃ sarvabhūteṣu cārjavam 13,130.029c ubhe ete same syātām ārjavaṃ vā viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12413: 13,130.030a ārjavaṃ dharma ity āhur adharmo jihma ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12414: 13,130.030c ārjaveneha saṃyukto naro dharmeṇa yujyate 13,130.031a ārjavo bhuvane nityaṃ vasaty amarasaṃnidhau 13,130.031c tasmād ārjavanityaḥ syād ya icched dharmam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12416: 13,130.032c dharme ratamanā nityaṃ naro dharmeṇa yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12417: 13,130.033a vyapetatandro dharmātmā śakyā satpatham āśritaḥ 13,130.033c cāritraparamo buddho brahmabhūyāya kalpate
GE07mbh_13_u:12419: 13,130.034a āśramābhiratā deva tāpasā ye tapodhanāḥ 13,130.034c dīptimantaḥ kayā caiva caryayātha bhavanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:12420: 13,130.035a rājāno rājaputrāś ca nirdhanā vā mahādhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12421: 13,130.035c karmaṇā kena bhagavan prāpnuvanti mahāphalam 13,130.036a nityaṃ sthānam upāgamya
GE07mbh_13_u:12422: 13,130.036c kena vā karmaṇā deva bhavanti vanagocarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12423: 13,130.037a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva tapaścaryāgataṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:12424: 13,130.037c śaṃsa sarvam aśeṣeṇa tryakṣa tripuranāśana 13,130.038 maheśvara uvāca 13,130.038a upavāsavratair dāntā ahiṃsrāḥ satyavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12425: 13,130.038c saṃsiddhāḥ pretya gandharvaiḥ saha modanty anāmayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12427: 13,130.039c dīkṣāṃ carati dharmātmā sa nāgaiḥ saha modate
GE07mbh_13_u:12428: 13,130.040a śaṣpaṃ mṛgamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ yo mṛgaiḥ saha sevate
GE07mbh_13_u:12429: 13,130.040c dīkṣito vai mudā yuktaḥ sa gacchaty amarāvatīm
GE07mbh_13_u:12430: 13,130.041a śaivālaṃ śīrṇaparṇaṃ vā tad vrato yo niṣevate
GE07mbh_13_u:12431: 13,130.041c śītayogavaho nityaṃ sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:12435: 13,130.043c cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi rājā bhavati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12437: 13,130.044c maruṃ saṃsādhya yatnena rājā bhavati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12438: 13,130.045a sthaṇḍile śuddham ākāśaṃ parigṛhya samantataḥ 13,130.045c praviśya ca mudā yukto dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm
GE07mbh_13_u:12439: 13,130.046a sthaṇḍilasya phalāny āhur yānāni śayanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12440: 13,130.046c gṛhāṇi ca mahārhāṇi candraśubhrāṇi bhāmini 13,130.047a ātmānam upajīvan yo niyato niyatāśanaḥ 13,130.047c dehaṃ vānaśane tyaktvā sa svargaṃ samupāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:12441: 13,130.048a ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm 13,130.048c tyaktvā mahārṇave dehaṃ vāruṇaṃ lokam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:12442: 13,130.049a ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm 13,130.049c aśmanā caraṇau bhittvā guhyakeṣu sa modate
GE07mbh_13_u:12444: 13,130.050c cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekāṃ manogatām
GE07mbh_13_u:12445: 13,130.050e svargalokam avāpnoti devaiś ca saha modate
GE07mbh_13_u:12446: 13,130.051a ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm 13,130.051c hutvāgnau deham utsṛjya vahniloke mahīyate 13,130.052a yas tu devi yathānyāyaṃ dīkṣito niyato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12447: 13,130.052c ātmany ātmānam ādhāya nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ 13,130.053a cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekāṃ manogatām
GE07mbh_13_u:12448: 13,130.053c araṇīsahitaṃ skandhe baddhvā gacchaty anāvṛtaḥ 13,130.054a vīrādhvānamanā nityaṃ vīrāsanaratas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12449: 13,130.054c vīrasthāyī ca satataṃ sa vīragatim āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:12451: 13,130.055c divyapuṣpasamākīrṇo divyacandanabhūṣitaḥ 13,130.055e sukhaṃ vasati dharmātmā divi devagaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:12453: 13,130.056c sattvasthaḥ sarvam utsṛjya dīkṣito niyataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12454: 13,130.056e vīrādhvānaṃ prapadyed yas tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12455: 13,130.057a kāmagena vimānena sa vai carati cchandataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12456: 13,130.057c śakralokagataḥ śrīmān modate ca nirāmayaḥ 13,131.001 umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:12458: 13,131.001c dakṣakratuhara tryakṣa saṃśayo me mahān ayam
GE07mbh_13_u:12459: 13,131.002a cāturvarṇyaṃ bhagavatā pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā 13,131.002c kena karmavipākena vaiśyo gacchati śūdratām 13,131.003a vaiśyo vā kṣatriyaḥ kena dvijo vā kṣatriyo bhavet 13,131.003c pratilomaḥ kathaṃ deva śakyo dharmo niṣevitum
GE07mbh_13_u:12460: 13,131.004a kena vā karmaṇā vipraḥ śūdrayonau prajāyate

GE07mbh_13_u:12462: 13,131.005a etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:12463: 13,131.005c trayo varṇāḥ prakṛtyeha kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12464: 13,131.006 maheśvara uvāca 13,131.006a brāhmaṇyaṃ devi duṣprāpaṃ nisargād brāhmaṇaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:12465: 13,131.006c kṣatriyo vaiśyaśūdrau vā nisargād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12466: 13,131.007a karmaṇā duṣkṛteneha sthānād bhraśyati vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12467: 13,131.007c jyeṣṭhaṃ varṇam anuprāpya tasmād rakṣeta vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12469: 13,131.008c kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā brahmabhūyāya gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:12470: 13,131.009a yas tu vipratvam utsṛjya kṣātraṃ dharmaṃ niṣevate
GE07mbh_13_u:12471: 13,131.009c brāhmaṇyāt sa paribhraṣṭaḥ kṣatrayonau prajāyate 13,131.010a vaiśyakarma ca yo vipro lobhamohavyapāśrayaḥ 13,131.010c brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya karoty alpamatiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12472: 13,131.011a sa dvijo vaiśyatām eti vaiśyo vā śūdratām iyāt 13,131.011c svadharmāt pracyuto vipras tataḥ śūdratvam āpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:12473: 13,131.012a tatrāsau nirayaṃ prāpto varṇabhraṣṭo bahiṣkṛtaḥ 13,131.012c brahmalokaparibhraṣṭaḥ śūdraḥ samupajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12474: 13,131.013a kṣatriyo vā mahābhāge vaiśyo vā dharmacāriṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:12475: 13,131.013c svāni karmāṇy apāhāya śūdrakarmāṇi sevate 13,131.014a svasthānāt sa paribhraṣṭo varṇasaṃkaratāṃ gataḥ 13,131.014c brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdratvaṃ yāti tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12476: 13,131.015a yas tu śuddhaḥ svadharmeṇa jñānavijñānavāñ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12477: 13,131.015c dharmajño dharmanirataḥ sa dharmaphalam aśnute 13,131.016a idaṃ caivāparaṃ devi brahmaṇā samudīritam 13,131.016c adhyātmaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ sadbhir dharmakāmair niṣevyate 13,131.017a ugrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi gaṇānnaṃ śrāddhasūtakam 13,131.017c ghuṣṭānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ śūdrānnaṃ naiva karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:12478: 13,131.018a śūdrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi devadevair mahātmabhiḥ 13,131.018c pitāmahamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇam iti me matiḥ 13,131.019a śūdrānnenāvaśeṣeṇa jaṭhare yo mriyeta vai 13,131.019c āhitāgnis tathā yajvā sa śūdragatibhāg bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:12480: 13,131.020c brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām eti nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:12481: 13,131.021a yasyānnenāvaśeṣeṇa jaṭhare yo mriyeta vai 13,131.021c tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ vrajed vipro yasyānnam upajīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:12483: 13,131.022c abhojyānnāni cāśnāti sa dvijatvāt pateta vai
GE07mbh_13_u:12485: 13,131.023c svādhyāyavarjitaḥ pāpo lubdho naikṛtikaḥ śaṭhaḥ 13,131.024a avratī vṛṣalībhartā kuṇḍāśī somavikrayī
GE07mbh_13_u:12486: 13,131.024c nihīnasevī vipro hi patati brahmayonitaḥ 13,131.025a gurutalpī gurudveṣī gurukutsāratiś ca yaḥ 13,131.025c brahmadviṭ cāpi patati brāhmaṇo brahmayonitaḥ 13,131.026a ebhis tu karmabhir devi śubhair ācaritais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12487: 13,131.026c śūdro brāhmaṇatāṃ gacched vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:12489: 13,131.027c śuśrūṣāṃ paricaryāṃ ca jyeṣṭhe varṇe prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12490: 13,131.027e kuryād avimanāḥ śūdraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12493: 13,131.029c vṛthāmāṃsāny abhuñjānaḥ śūdro vaiśyatvam ṛcchati 13,131.030a ṛtavāg anahaṃvādī nirdvaṃdvaḥ śamakovidaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12494: 13,131.030c yajate nityayajñaiś ca svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥ 13,131.031a dānto brāhmaṇasatkartā
GE07mbh_13_u:12497: 13,131.032c agnihotram upāsaṃś ca juhvānaś ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:12499: 13,131.033c tretāgnimantravihito vaiśyo bhavati vai yadi 13,131.033e sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyakule śucau mahati jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12500: 13,131.034a sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo jāto janmaprabhṛti saṃskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12501: 13,131.034c upanīto vrataparo dvijo bhavati satkṛtaḥ 13,131.035a dadāti yajate yajñaiḥ saṃskṛtair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ 13,131.035c adhīte svargam anvicchaṃs tretāgniśaraṇaḥ sadā 13,131.036a ārtahastaprado nityaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan 13,131.036c satyaḥ satyāni kurute nityaṃ yaḥ sukhadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12505: 13,131.038c ṛtukāle tu dharmātmā patnīṃ seveta nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12508: 13,131.040a sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya kurvāṇaḥ sumanāḥ sadā 13,131.040c śūdrāṇāṃ cānnakāmānāṃ nityaṃ siddham iti bruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:12509: 13,131.041a svārthād vā yadi vā kāmān na kiṃ cid upalakṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:12510: 13,131.041c pitṛdevātithikṛte sādhanaṃ kurute ca yaḥ 13,131.042a svaveśmani yathānyāyam upāste bhaikṣam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12511: 13,131.042c trikālam agnihotraṃ ca juhvāno vai yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:12513: 13,131.043c tretāgnimantrapūtaṃ vā samāviśya dvijo bhavet 13,131.044a jñānavijñānasaṃpannaḥ saṃskṛto vedapāragaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12514: 13,131.044c vipro bhavati dharmātmā kṣatriyaḥ svena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:12518: 13,131.046c brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyam utsṛjya śūdro bhavati tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12519: 13,131.047a karmabhiḥ śucibhir devi śuddhātmā vijitendriyaḥ 13,131.047c śūdro 'pi dvijavat sevya iti brahmābravīt svayam 13,131.048a svabhāvakarma ca śubhaṃ yatra śūdre 'pi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:12520: 13,131.048c viśuddhaḥ sa dvijātir vai vijñeya iti me matiḥ 13,131.049a na yonir nāpi saṃskāro na śrutaṃ na ca saṃnatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12521: 13,131.049c kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:12522: 13,131.050a sarvo 'yaṃ brāhmaṇo loke vṛttena tu vidhīyate 13,131.050c vṛtte sthitaś ca suśroṇi brāhmaṇatvaṃ nigacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:12523: 13,131.051a brāhmaḥ svabhāvaḥ kalyāṇi samaḥ sarvatra me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12524: 13,131.051c nirguṇaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma yatra tiṣṭhati sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12526: 13,131.052c svayaṃ ca varadenoktā brahmaṇā sṛjatā prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12527: 13,131.053a brāhmaṇo hi mahat kṣetraṃ loke carati pādavat
GE07mbh_13_u:12528: 13,131.053c yat tatra bījaṃ vapati sā kṛṣiḥ pāralaukikī
GE07mbh_13_u:12529: 13,131.054a mitāśinā sadā bhāvyaṃ satpathālambinā sadā 13,131.054c brāhmamārgam atikramya vartitavyaṃ bubhūṣatā
GE07mbh_13_u:12530: 13,131.055a saṃhitādhyāyinā bhāvyaṃ gṛhe vai gṛhamedhinā 13,131.055c nityaṃ svādhyāyayuktena
GE07mbh_13_u:12531: 13,131.056a evaṃbhūto hi yo vipraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12533: 13,131.057a brāhmaṇyam eva saṃprāpya rakṣitavyaṃ yatātmabhiḥ 13,131.057c yonipratigrahādānaiḥ karmabhiś ca śucismite
GE07mbh_13_u:12534: 13,131.058a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathā śūdro bhaved dvijaḥ 13,131.058c brāhmaṇo vā cyuto dharmād yathā śūdratvam āpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:12537: 13,132.001c dharmādharme nṛṇāṃ deva brūhi me saṃśayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:12538: 13,132.002a karmaṇā manasā vācā trividhaṃ hi naraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12539: 13,132.002c badhyate bandhanaiḥ pāśair mucyate 'py atha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12540: 13,132.003a kena śīlena vā deva karmaṇā kīdṛśena vā
GE07mbh_13_u:12541: 13,132.003c samācārair guṇair vākyaiḥ svargaṃ yāntīha mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12542: 13,132.004 maheśvara uvāca 13,132.004a devi dharmārthatattvajñe satyanitye dame rate 13,132.004c sarvaprāṇihitaḥ praśnaḥ śrūyatāṃ buddhivardhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12544: 13,132.005c nādharmeṇa na dharmeṇa badhyante chinnasaṃśayāḥ 13,132.006a pralayotpattitattvajñāḥ sarvajñāḥ samadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12546: 13,132.007a karmaṇā manasā vācā ye na hiṃsanti kiṃ cana 13,132.007c ye na sajjanti kasmiṃś cid badhyante te na karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12553: 13,132.011a mātṛvat svasṛvac caiva nityaṃ duhitṛvac ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:12554: 13,132.011c paradāreṣu vartante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,132.012a stainyān nivṛttāḥ satataṃ saṃtuṣṭāḥ svadhanena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12555: 13,132.012c svabhāgyāny upajīvanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,132.013a svadāraniratā ye ca ṛtukālābhigāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12556: 13,132.013c agrāmyasukhabhogāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,132.014a paradāreṣu ye nityaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:12557: 13,132.014c yatendriyāḥ śīlaparās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,132.015a eṣa devakṛto mārgaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12558: 13,132.015c akaṣāyakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12559: 13,132.016a dānadharmatapoyuktaḥ śīlaśaucadayātmakaḥ 13,132.016c vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12560: 13,132.016e svargavāsam abhīpsadbhir na sevyas tv ata uttaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12562: 13,132.017a vācātha badhyate yena mucyate 'py atha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12563: 13,132.017c tāni karmāṇi me deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:12564: 13,132.018 maheśvara uvāca 13,132.018a ātmahetoḥ parārthe vā narmahāsyāśrayāt tathā 13,132.018c ye mṛṣā na vadantīha te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12565: 13,132.019a vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā kāmakārāt tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12566: 13,132.019c anṛtaṃ ye na bhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12567: 13,132.020a ślakṣṇāṃ vāṇīṃ nirābādhāṃ madhurāṃ pāpavarjitām 13,132.020c svāgatenābhibhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12568: 13,132.021a kaṭukāṃ ye na bhāṣante paruṣāṃ niṣṭhurāṃ giram
GE07mbh_13_u:12569: 13,132.021c apaiśunyaratāḥ santas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,132.022a piśunāṃ ye na bhāṣante mitrabhedakarīṃ giram
GE07mbh_13_u:12570: 13,132.022c ṛtāṃ maitrīṃ prabhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12571: 13,132.023a varjayanti sadā sūcyaṃ paradrohaṃ ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12572: 13,132.023c sarvabhūtasamā dāntās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,132.024a śaṭhapralāpād viratā
GE07mbh_13_u:12573: 13,132.024c saumyapralāpino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,132.025a na kopād vyāharante ye vācaṃ hṛdayadāraṇīm
GE07mbh_13_u:12574: 13,132.025c sāntvaṃ vadanti kruddhāpi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12575: 13,132.026a eṣa vāṇīkṛto devi dharmaḥ sevyaḥ sadā naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12576: 13,132.026c śubhaḥ satyaguṇo nityaṃ varjanīyā mṛṣā budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12578: 13,132.027a manasā badhyate yena karmaṇā puruṣaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12579: 13,132.027c tan me brūhi mahābhāga devadeva pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_13_u:12580: 13,132.028 maheśvara uvāca 13,132.028a mānaseneha dharmeṇa saṃyuktāḥ puruṣāḥ sadā 13,132.028c svargaṃ gacchanti kalyāṇi tan me kīrtayataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:12582: 13,132.029c badhyate mānavo yena śṛṇu cānyac chubhānane
GE07mbh_13_u:12583: 13,132.030a araṇye vijane nyastaṃ parasvaṃ vīkṣya ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12584: 13,132.030c manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12585: 13,132.031a grāme gṛhe vā yad dravyaṃ pārakyaṃ vijane sthitam 13,132.031c nābhinandanti vai nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12586: 13,132.032a tathaiva paradārān ye kāmavṛttān rahogatān 13,132.032c manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12587: 13,132.033a śatruṃ mitraṃ ca ye nityaṃ tulyena manasā narāḥ 13,132.033c bhajanti maitrāḥ saṃgamya te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12589: 13,132.034c svair arthaiḥ parisaṃtuṣṭās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12590: 13,132.035a avairā ye tv anāyāsā maitracittaparāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12593: 13,132.036c dharmādharmavido nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,132.037a śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃcaye 13,132.037c vipākajñāś ca ye devi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12595: 13,132.038c samatāṃ samanuprāptās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,132.039a śubhaiḥ karmaphalair devi mayaite parikīrtitāḥ 13,132.039c svargamārgopagā bhūyaḥ kim anyac chrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:12597: 13,132.040a mahān me saṃśayaḥ kaś cin martyān prati maheśvara 13,132.040c tasmāt taṃ naipuṇenādya mamākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:12598: 13,132.041a kenāyur labhate dīrghaṃ karmaṇā puruṣaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:12599: 13,132.041c tapasā vāpi deveśa kenāyur labhate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:12600: 13,132.042a kṣīṇāyuḥ kena bhavati karmaṇā bhuvi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12601: 13,132.042c vipākaṃ karmaṇāṃ deva vaktum arhasy anindita
GE07mbh_13_u:12602: 13,132.043a apare ca mahābhogā mandabhogās tathāpare 13,132.043c akulīnās tathā cānye kulīnāś ca tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:12603: 13,132.044a durdarśāḥ ke cid ābhānti narāḥ kāṣṭhamayā iva
GE07mbh_13_u:12604: 13,132.044c priyadarśās tathā cānye darśanād eva mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12605: 13,132.045a duṣprajñāḥ ke cid ābhānti ke cid ābhānti paṇḍitāḥ 13,132.045c mahāprajñās tathaivānye
GE07mbh_13_u:12606: 13,132.046a alpābādhās tathā ke cin mahābādhās tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:12607: 13,132.046c dṛśyante puruṣā deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:12608: 13,132.047 maheśvara uvāca 13,132.047a hanta te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi devi karmaphalodayam
GE07mbh_13_u:12609: 13,132.047c martyaloke narāḥ sarve yena svaṃ bhuñjate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:12610: 13,132.048a prāṇātipātī yo raudro daṇḍahastodyatas tathā 13,132.048c nityam udyatadaṇḍaś ca hanti bhūtagaṇān naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12613: 13,132.050a evaṃbhūto naro devi nirayaṃ pratipadyate 13,132.050c viparītas tu dharmātmā rūpavān abhijāyate 13,132.051a nirayaṃ yāti hiṃsātmā yāti svargam ahiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12614: 13,132.051c yātanāṃ niraye raudrāṃ sa kṛcchrāṃ labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12615: 13,132.052a atha cen nirayāt tasmāt samuttarati karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:12616: 13,132.052c mānuṣyaṃ labhate cāpi hīnāyus tatra jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12617: 13,132.053a pāpena karmaṇā devi baddho hiṃsāratir naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12620: 13,132.054c nikṣiptadaṇḍo nirdaṇḍo na hinasti kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:12621: 13,132.055a na ghātayati no hanti ghnantaṃ naivānumodate
GE07mbh_13_u:12623: 13,132.056a īdṛśaḥ puruṣotkarṣo devi devatvam aśnute 13,132.056c upapannān sukhān bhogān upāśnāti mudā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12624: 13,132.057a atha cen mānuṣe loke kadā cid upapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12625: 13,132.057c tatra dīrghāyur utpannaḥ sa naraḥ sukham edhate
GE07mbh_13_u:12626: 13,132.058a evaṃ dīrghāyuṣāṃ mārgaḥ suvṛttānāṃ sukarmaṇām 13,132.058c prāṇihiṃsāvimokṣeṇa brahmaṇā samudīritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12628: 13,133.001a kiṃśīlāḥ kiṃsamācārāḥ puruṣāḥ kaiś ca karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12629: 13,133.001c svargaṃ samabhipadyante saṃpradānena kena vā 13,133.002 maheśvara uvāca 13,133.002a dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā dīnāndhakṛpaṇādiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:12631: 13,133.003a pratiśrayān sabhāḥ kūpān prapāḥ puṣkariṇīs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12632: 13,133.003c naityakāni ca sarvāṇi kim icchakam atīva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12633: 13,133.004a āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ dhanaṃ ratnaṃ gṛhāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12634: 13,133.004c sasyajātāni sarvāṇi gāḥ kṣetrāṇy atha yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12635: 13,133.005a supratītamanā nityaṃ yaḥ prayacchati mānavaḥ 13,133.005c evaṃbhūto mṛto devi devaloke 'bhijāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12636: 13,133.006a tatroṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:12638: 13,133.007a tasmāt svargāc cyuto lokān mānuṣeṣūpajāyate 13,133.007c mahābhoge kule devi
GE07mbh_13_u:12639: 13,133.008a tatra kāmaguṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samupeto mudā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12640: 13,133.008c mahābhogo mahākośo dhanī bhavati mānavaḥ 13,133.009a ete devi mahābhogāḥ prāṇino dānaśīlinaḥ 13,133.009c brahmaṇā vai purā proktāḥ sarvasya priyadarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12641: 13,133.010a apare mānavā devi pradānakṛpaṇā dvijaiḥ 13,133.010c yācitā na prayacchanti vidyamāne 'py abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12642: 13,133.011a dīnāndhakṛpaṇān dṛṣṭvā bhikṣukān atithīn api 13,133.011c yācyamānā nivartante
GE07mbh_13_u:12643: 13,133.012a na dhanāni na vāsāṃsi na bhogān na ca kāñcanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12644: 13,133.012c na gāvo nānnavikṛtiṃ prayacchanti kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:12645: 13,133.013a apravṛttās tu ye lubdhā nāstikā dānavarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12646: 13,133.013c evaṃbhūtā narā devi nirayaṃ yānty abuddhayaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:12821: 13,134.057d@015_0019 tasmād dharmārthasaṃyuktam āyatyāṃ ca hitodayam 13,134.057d@015_0020 āścaryaṃ paramaṃ vākyaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:12823: 13,134.057d@015_0022 bhavantaṃ bahumānāc ca praṇayāc copasevate 13,134.057d@015_0023 asyaiva tu samakṣaṃ naḥ pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12824: 13,134.057d@015_0024 itivṛttaṃ purāṇaṃ ca śrotṝṇāṃ paramaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:12827: 13,134.057d@015_0026 matpriyārthaṃ tu kauravya snehād bhāṣitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:12828: 13,134.057d@015_0027 tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād āgataviklavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12829: 13,134.057d@015_0028 prapibann iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:12830: 13,134.057d@015_0029 śṛṇu rājan purā vṛttam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12831: 13,134.057d@015_0030 etāvad uktvā gāṅgeyaḥ praṇamya śirasā harim
GE07mbh_13_u:12832: 13,134.057d@015_0031 dharmarājaṃ samīkṣyedaṃ punar vaktuṃ samārabhat 13,134.057d@015_0032 ayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān putrārthaṃ vratakāṅkṣayā 13,134.057d@015_0033 dīkṣito 'bhūn mahābāhuḥ purā dvādaśavārṣikam
GE07mbh_13_u:12833: 13,134.057d@015_0034 dīkṣitaṃ keśavaṃ draṣṭum abhijagmur maharṣayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0035 sevituṃ ca mahātmānaḥ prīyamāṇā janārdanam 13,134.057d@015_0036 nāradaḥ parvataś caiva kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tathā 13,134.057d@015_0037 devalaḥ kāśyapaś caiva hastikāśyapa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12834: 13,134.057d@015_0038 jamadagniś ca rājendra dhaumyo vālmīkir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12835: 13,134.057d@015_0039 apare 'pi tapaḥsiddhāḥ satyavrataparāyaṇāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0040 śiṣyair anugatāḥ sarve brahmavidbhir akalmaṣaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_0041 keśavas tān abhigatān prītyā saṃpratigṛhya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12839: 13,134.057d@015_0045 viśvasteṣu hi tuṣṭeṣu keśavārcanayā punaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0046 parasparaṃ kathā divyāḥ prāvartanta manoramāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0047 viṣṇor nārāyaṇasyaiva prasādāt kathayāmi tāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0048 tasyaiva vratacaryāyāṃ munibhir vismitaḥ purā 13,134.057d@015_0049 yaś ca govṛṣabhāṅkasya prabhāvo 'bhūn mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12840: 13,134.057d@015_0050 yatra devī mahādevam apṛcchat saṃśayān purā
GE07mbh_13_u:12841: 13,134.057d@015_0051 kathayām āsa śarvas tān devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_13_u:12842: 13,134.057d@015_0052 umāpatyoś ca saṃvādaṃ śṛṇu tāta manoramam
GE07mbh_13_u:12843: 13,134.057d@015_0053 varṇāśramāṇāṃ dharmaś ca tatra tāta samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12844: 13,134.057d@015_0054 ṛṣidharmaś ca nikhilo rājadharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12845: 13,134.057d@015_0055 gṛhasthadharmaś ca śubhaḥ karmapākaphalāni ca 13,134.057d@015_0056 devaguhyaṃ ca vividhaṃ dānadharmavidhis tadā 13,134.057d@015_0057 vidhānam atra saṃproktaṃ yamasya niyamasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:12847: 13,134.057d@015_0059 prāṇamokṣavidhiś caiva tīrthacaryā ca puṣkalā 13,134.057d@015_0060 mokṣadharmavidhānaṃ ca sāṃkhyayogasamanvitam
GE07mbh_13_u:12848: 13,134.057d@015_0061 strīdharmaś ca svayaṃ devyā devadevāya bhāṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12849: 13,134.057d@015_0062 evamādi śubhaṃ sarvaṃ tatra tāta samāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:12850: 13,134.057d@015_0063 rudrāṇyāḥ saṃśayapraśno yatra tāta pravartate 13,134.057d@015_0064 dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ dharmyaṃ ca paramaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:12851: 13,134.057d@015_0065 puṣṭiyogam idaṃ divyaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:12852: 13,134.057d@015_0066 itihāsam imaṃ divyaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:12853: 13,134.057d@015_0067 sāyaṃ prātaḥ sadā samyak śrotavyaṃ ca bubhūṣatā
GE07mbh_13_u:12854: 13,134.057d@015_0068 tato nārāyaṇo devaḥ saṃkliṣṭo vratacaryayā 13,134.057d@015_0069 vahnir viniḥsṛto vaktrāt kṛṣṇasyādbhutadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12855: 13,134.057d@015_0070 agninā tena mahatā niḥsṛtena mukhād vibhoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12856: 13,134.057d@015_0071 paśyatām eva sarveṣāṃ dagdha eva nagottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12859: 13,134.057d@015_0074 punaḥ sa dṛṣṭamātreṇa hariṇā saumyacetasā 13,134.057d@015_0075 sa babhūva giriḥ kṣipraṃ praphulladrumakānanaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0076 siddhacāraṇasaṃghaiś ca prasannair upaśobhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12861: 13,134.057d@015_0078 tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca sarveṣām abhavad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:12862: 13,134.057d@015_0079 taṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaromāṇaḥ sarve munigaṇās tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12864: 13,134.057d@015_0081 na kiṃ cid abruvaṃs tatra śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
GE07mbh_13_u:12865: 13,134.057d@015_0082 tato nārāyaṇo devo munisaṃghe suvismite 13,134.057d@015_0083 tān samīkṣyaiva madhuraṃ babhāṣe puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0084 kimarthaṃ munisaṃghasya vismayo 'yam anuttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12866: 13,134.057d@015_0085 etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarve yāthātathyam aninditāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12868: 13,134.057d@015_0087 keśavasya vacaḥ śrutvā tuṣṭuvur munipuṃgavāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0088 bhavān sṛjati vai lokān bhavān saṃharati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12869: 13,134.057d@015_0089 bhavāñ śītaṃ bhavān uṣṇaṃ bhavān satyaṃ bhavān kratuḥ 13,134.057d@015_0090 bhavān ādir bhavān anto bhavato 'nyan na vidyate 13,134.057d@015_0091 sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ sarvaṃ tvam eva puruṣottama
GE07mbh_13_u:12870: 13,134.057d@015_0092 tvattaḥ sarvam idaṃ tāta lokacakraṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:12871: 13,134.057d@015_0093 tvam evārhasi tad vaktuṃ mukhād agnivinirgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:12872: 13,134.057d@015_0094 etan no vismayakaraṃ babhūva madhusūdana 13,134.057d@015_0095 tato 'dhigatasaṃtrāsā bhavāma puruṣottama 13,134.057d@015_0096 bhagavān
GE07mbh_13_u:12873: 13,134.057d@015_0096 yad icchet tatra vaktavyaṃ kuto 'smākaṃ niyogataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12874: 13,134.057d@015_0097 nityaṃ hitārthaṃ lokānāṃ bhavadbhiḥ kriyate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12875: 13,134.057d@015_0098 tasmāl lokahitaṃ guhyaṃ śrūyatāṃ kathayāmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12876: 13,134.057d@015_0099 asuraḥ sāṃprataṃ kaś cid ahito lokanāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12878: 13,134.057d@015_0101 babhūva sa mayā vadhyo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:12879: 13,134.057d@015_0102 putreṇa me vadho dṛṣṭas tasya vai munipuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12880: 13,134.057d@015_0103 tadarthaṃ putram evāhaṃ sisṛkṣur vanam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12881: 13,134.057d@015_0104 ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ putram ahaṃ janayituṃ vrataiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12883: 13,134.057d@015_0106 athātmā mama dehasthaḥ so 'gnir bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0107 viniḥsṛtya gato draṣṭuṃ kṣaṇena ca pitāmaham
GE07mbh_13_u:12885: 13,134.057d@015_0109 anujñātaś ca tenaiva punar āyān mamāntikam
GE07mbh_13_u:12886: 13,134.057d@015_0110 etan me vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo mama vaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:12887: 13,134.057d@015_0111 tattejasā nirmathitaḥ purato 'yaṃ giriḥ sthitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0112 dṛṣṭvā nāśaṃ gires tasya saumyabhāvatayā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:12888: 13,134.057d@015_0113 punaḥ sa dṛṣṭamātreṇa girir āsīd yathāpuram
GE07mbh_13_u:12889: 13,134.057d@015_0114 etad guhyaṃ mayā tathyaṃ kathitaṃ vaḥ samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12890: 13,134.057d@015_0115 bhavanto vyathitā yena vismitāś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12892: 13,134.057d@015_0116 ṛṣīṇām evam uktvā tu tān punaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:12893: 13,134.057d@015_0117 bhavatāṃ darśanād eva prītir abhyadhikā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:12894: 13,134.057d@015_0118 bhavantas tu tapaḥsiddhā bhavanto devadarśanāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0119 sarvatra gatimantaś ca jñānavijñānabhāvitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12896: 13,134.057d@015_0121 tasmād bhavadbhir yat kiṃ cid dṛṣṭaṃ vāpy atha vā
GE07mbh_13_u:12898: 13,134.057d@015_0122 āścaryabhūtaṃ lokeṣu tad bhavanto bruvantu me
GE07mbh_13_u:12899: 13,134.057d@015_0123 yuṣmābhiḥ kathitaṃ yat syāt tapasā bhāvitātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12900: 13,134.057d@015_0124 tat syād amṛtasaṃkāśaṃ vāṅmadhuśravaṇe spṛhā 13,134.057d@015_0125 rāgadveṣaviyuktānāṃ satataṃ satyavādinām
GE07mbh_13_u:12901: 13,134.057d@015_0126 śraddheyaṃ śravaṇīyaṃ ca vacanaṃ hi satāṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:12902: 13,134.057d@015_0127 tatsaṃyogaṃ hi tan me 'stu na vṛthā kartum arhatha
GE07mbh_13_u:12903: 13,134.057d@015_0128 bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ tasmāt saphalaṃ tu bhaven mama
GE07mbh_13_u:12904: 13,134.057d@015_0129 tad ahaṃ sajjanamukhān niḥsṛtaṃ janasaṃsadi 13,134.057d@015_0130 kathayiṣyāmy aharaho buddhidīpakaraṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:12905: 13,134.057d@015_0131 tad anye vardhayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vāpare 13,134.057d@015_0132 vākśalyavigatāś cānye praśaṃsanti purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12907: 13,134.057d@015_0133 evaṃ bruvati govinde śravaṇārthaṃ maharṣayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0134 vāgbhiḥ sāñjalimālābhir idam ūcur janārdanam 13,134.057d@015_0135 ayuktam asmān evaṃ tvaṃ vācā varada bhāṣitum
GE07mbh_13_u:12909: 13,134.057d@015_0137 evaṃ pūjayituṃ cāsmān na caivārhasi keśava
GE07mbh_13_u:12910: 13,134.057d@015_0138 tad vastv anyan na paśyāmo yal loke te na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:12911: 13,134.057d@015_0139 divi vā bhuvi vā kiṃ cit tat sarvaṃ hi tvayā tatam 13,134.057d@015_0140 na vidmahe vayaṃ deva kathyamānaṃ tavāntike
GE07mbh_13_u:12912: 13,134.057d@015_0141 evam ukto hṛṣīkeśaḥ sasmitaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:12914: 13,134.057d@015_0143 tasmān mānuṣavad vīryaṃ mama jānīta suvratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12916: 13,134.057d@015_0144 bhavadbhiḥ kathyamānaṃ ca apūrvam iva tad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:12917: 13,134.057d@015_0145 evaṃ saṃcoditāḥ sarve keśavena mahātmanā 13,134.057d@015_0146 ṛṣayaś cānuvartante vāsudevasya śāsanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12918: 13,134.057d@015_0147 tatas tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ sarve nāradaṃ devadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:12919: 13,134.057d@015_0148 amanyanta budhā buddhyā samarthaṃ tannibodhane 13,134.057d@015_0149 ṛṣir ugratapāś cāyaṃ keśavasya priyo 'dhikam
GE07mbh_13_u:12920: 13,134.057d@015_0150 purāṇajñaś ca vāgmī ca kāraṇais taṃ ca menire 13,134.057d@015_0151 sarve tadarhaṇaṃ kṛtvā nāradaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:12922: 13,134.057d@015_0153 dṛṣṭaṃ vai yat tad āścaryaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ paramaṃ priyam 13,134.057d@015_0154 tattvaṃ tvam aviśeṣeṇa hitārthaṃ sarvam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12924: 13,134.057d@015_0155 priyārthaṃ keśavasyāsya sa bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:12925: 13,134.057d@015_0156 tadā saṃcoditaḥ sarvair ṛṣibhir nāradas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12926: 13,134.057d@015_0157 praṇamya śirasā viṣṇuṃ sarvalokahite ratam 13,134.057d@015_0158 samudvīkṣya hṛṣīkeśaṃ vaktum evopacakrame
GE07mbh_13_u:12927: 13,134.057d@015_0159 tato nārāyaṇasuhṛn nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0160 nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12929: 13,134.057d@015_0161 bhagavaṃs tīrthayātrārthaṃ tathaiva caratā mayā 13,134.057d@015_0162 divyam adbhutasaṃkāśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ haimavataṃ vanam 13,134.057d@015_0163 nānāvṛkṣalatāyuktaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇair yutam
GE07mbh_13_u:12933: 13,134.057d@015_0168 variṣṭhāpsarasākīrṇaṃ nānāgandharvasaṃkulam 13,134.057d@015_0169 mṛdaṅgamurajodghuṣṭaṃ śaṅkhavīṇābhināditam 13,134.057d@015_0170 nṛtyadbhir bhūtasaṃghaiś ca sarvatas tv abhiśobhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:12934: 13,134.057d@015_0171 nānārūpair virūpaiś ca bhīmarūpair bhayānakaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_0172 vyāghrasiṃhoragamukhair biḍālavadanais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:12940: 13,134.057d@015_0178 samājaṃ tadvane dṛṣṭaṃ mayā bhūtapateḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:12942: 13,134.057d@015_0180 ṣaṭpadair upagītaṃ ca prathame māsi mādhave
GE07mbh_13_u:12946: 13,134.057d@015_0184 draṣṭuṃ bhavati sarvasya dharmabhāgijanasya ca 13,134.057d@015_0185 ye cordhvaretasaḥ siddhās tatra tatra samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12948: 13,134.057d@015_0187 tathā nāgās tathādityā lokapālā hutāśanāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0188 vātāś ca sarve vāyanti divyapuṣpasamākulāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0189 kirantaḥ sarvapuṣpāṇi kiranto 'dbhutadarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12949: 13,134.057d@015_0190 oṣadhyaḥ prajvalantyaś ca dyotayantyo diśo daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:12950: 13,134.057d@015_0191 vihagāś ca mudā yuktā nṛtyanti ca nadanti ca 13,134.057d@015_0192 giraḥ sumadhurās tatra divyā divyajanapriyāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0193 tatra devo giritaṭe hemadhātuvibhūṣite
GE07mbh_13_u:12951: 13,134.057d@015_0194 paryaṅka iva babhrāja upaviṣṭo mahādyutiḥ 13,134.057d@015_0195 vyāghracarmaparīdhāno gajacarmottaracchadaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0196 vyālayajñopavītaś ca lohitāntravibhūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12955: 13,134.057d@015_0200 ṛṣibhiś cāpsarobhiś ca sarvataś cāpi śobhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12960: 13,134.057d@015_0205 tatra bhūtapatiṃ devam āsīnaṃ śikharottame 13,134.057d@015_0206 ṛṣayo bhūtasaṃghāś ca praṇamya śirasā haram
GE07mbh_13_u:12961: 13,134.057d@015_0207 gīrbhiḥ paramaśuddhābhis tuṣṭuvuś ca maheśvaram 13,134.057d@015_0208 vimuktāś caiva pāpebhyo babhūvur vigatajvarāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0209 ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca tathā viprarṣayaś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:12962: 13,134.057d@015_0210 ayonijā yonijāś ca tapaḥsiddhā maharṣayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0211 tatrasthaṃ devadeveśaṃ bhagavantam upāsate
GE07mbh_13_u:12963: 13,134.057d@015_0212 tatas tasmin kṣaṇe devī bhūtastrīgaṇasevitā 13,134.057d@015_0213 haratulyāmbaradharā samānavratacāriṇī 13,134.057d@015_0214 kāñcanaṃ kalaśaṃ gṛhya sarvatīrthāmbupūritam
GE07mbh_13_u:12964: 13,134.057d@015_0215 puṣpavṛṣṭyābhivarṣantī divyagandhasamāyutā 13,134.057d@015_0216 saridvarābhiḥ sarvābhiḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nugatā varā
GE07mbh_13_u:12966: 13,134.057d@015_0218 āgamya tu gireḥ putrī devadevasya cāntikam
GE07mbh_13_u:12968: 13,134.057d@015_0220 manoharābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ haranetre pidhāya tu 13,134.057d@015_0221 avekṣya hṛṣṭā svagaṇān smayantī pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitā
GE07mbh_13_u:12969: 13,134.057d@015_0222 devyā cāndhīkṛte deve kaśmalaṃ samapadyata 13,134.057d@015_0223 nimīlite bhūtapatau naṣṭacandrārkatārakam
GE07mbh_13_u:12971: 13,134.057d@015_0225 viṣaṇṇaṃ bhayasaṃtrastaṃ jagad āsīd bhayākulam 13,134.057d@015_0226 hāhākāras tv ṛṣīṇāṃ ca lokānām abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:12973: 13,134.057d@015_0228 tṛtīyaṃ cāsya saṃbhūtaṃ lalāṭe netram āyatam
GE07mbh_13_u:12975: 13,134.057d@015_0230 tatra netrāgninā tena yugāntāgninibhena vai 13,134.057d@015_0231 adahyata giriḥ sarvo himavān agrataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:12977: 13,134.057d@015_0233 savidyādharagandharve divyauṣadhasamāyute 13,134.057d@015_0234 tato girisutā cāpi vismayotphullalocanā
GE07mbh_13_u:12978: 13,134.057d@015_0235 babhūva ca jagat sarvaṃ tathā vismayasaṃyutam
GE07mbh_13_u:12980: 13,134.057d@015_0237 netrajenāgninā tena dagdha eva nagottamaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0238 taṃ dṛṣṭvā mathitaṃ śailaṃ śailaputrī saviklavā
