GE07mbh_13_u:13133: 13,134.057d@015_0441 evaṃ dharmaparatvaṃ ca devadevasya cārhati 13,134.057d@015_0442 evaṃ bruvatsu muniṣu vaco devy abravīd dharam
GE07mbh_13_u:13134: 13,134.057d@015_0443 prītyarthaṃ ca munīnāṃ sā kṣaṇajñā paramaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:13136: 13,134.057d@015_0445 asya vai ṛṣisaṃghasya mama ca priyakāmyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:13137: 13,134.057d@015_0446 varṇāśramagataṃ dharmaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ 13,134.057d@015_0447 na tṛptir asti deveśa śravaṇīyaṃ hi te vacaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0448 sadharmacāriṇī ceyaṃ bhaktā ceyam iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:13138: 13,134.057d@015_0449 vaktum arhasi deveśa lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā 13,134.057d@015_0450 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13139: 13,134.057d@015_0450 yāthātathyena tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi śaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:13140: 13,134.057d@015_0451 hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yat te devi manaḥpriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:13141: 13,134.057d@015_0452 śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilaṃ dharmaṃ varṇāśramāśritam
GE07mbh_13_u:13142: 13,134.057d@015_0453 brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ceti caturvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13143: 13,134.057d@015_0454 brahmaṇā vihitāḥ pūrvaṃ lokatantram abhīpsatā 13,134.057d@015_0455 karmāṇi ca tadarhāṇi śāstreṣu vihitāni vai
GE07mbh_13_u:13144: 13,134.057d@015_0456 yadi cedekavarṇaṃ syāj jagat sarvaṃ vinaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:13145: 13,134.057d@015_0457 sahaiva devair varṇāni catvāri vihitāny uta
GE07mbh_13_u:13146: 13,134.057d@015_0458 mukhato brāhmaṇāḥ sṛṣṭās tasmāt te vāgviśāradāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13147: 13,134.057d@015_0459 bāhubhyāṃ kṣatriyāḥ sṛṣṭās tasmād bāhubalānvitāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0460 udarād udgatā vaiśyās tasmād vārtopajīvinaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0461 śūdrāś ca pādataḥ sṛṣṭās tasmāt te paricārakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13148: 13,134.057d@015_0462 teṣāṃ dharmāṃś ca karmāṇi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:13149: 13,134.057d@015_0463 viprāḥ kṛtā bhūmidevā lokānāṃ dhāraṇe kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13150: 13,134.057d@015_0464 te kaiś cin nāvamantavyā brāhmaṇā hitam icchubhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13151: 13,134.057d@015_0465 yadi te brāhmaṇā na syur dānayogavahāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:13152: 13,134.057d@015_0466 ubhayor lokayor devi sthitir na syāt samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13153: 13,134.057d@015_0467 lokeṣu durlabhaṃ kiṃ tu brāhmaṇatvam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:13154: 13,134.057d@015_0468 abudho vā daridro vā pūjanīyaḥ sadaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13155: 13,134.057d@015_0469 brāhmaṇaṃ yo 'vamanyeta nindayet krośayec ca vā
GE07mbh_13_u:13156: 13,134.057d@015_0470 prahareta hared vāpi dhanaṃ teṣāṃ narādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13158: 13,134.057d@015_0472 sa ca mām avamanyeta māṃ krośati ca nindati 13,134.057d@015_0473 mām eva praharen mūḍho maddhanasyāpahārakaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0474 mamaiva prekṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā nandate mūḍhacetanaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0475 svādhyāyo yajanaṃ dānaṃ tasya dharma iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13159: 13,134.057d@015_0476 karmāṇy adhyāpanaṃ caiva yājanaṃ ca pratigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13160: 13,134.057d@015_0477 satyaṃ śāntis tapaḥ śaucaṃ tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13162: 13,134.057d@015_0479 anāpadi ca śūdrānnaṃ vṛṣalīsaṃgrahas tathā 13,134.057d@015_0480 tapa eva sadā dharmo brāhmaṇasya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13163: 13,134.057d@015_0481 sa tu dharmārtham utpannaḥ pūrvaṃ dhātrā tapobalāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13166: 13,134.057d@015_0484 agnikāryaṃ paro dharmo nityaṃ yajñopavītitā 13,134.057d@015_0485 śūdrānnavarjanaṃ dharmo dharmaḥ satpathasevanam
GE07mbh_13_u:13167: 13,134.057d@015_0486 dharmo nityopavāsitvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tathā 13,134.057d@015_0487 amṛtāśyaṃ paraṃ dharmo gṛhapuṣpabalis tathā 13,134.057d@015_0488 gṛhasaṃmārjanaṃ dharma ālepanavidhis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13169: 13,134.057d@015_0490 iṣṭayaḥ paśubandhāś ca vidhipūrvaṃ paraṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13170: 13,134.057d@015_0491 daṃpatyoḥ samaśīlatvaṃ dharmo vai gṛhamedhinām 13,134.057d@015_0492 eṣa dvijanmano dharmo gārhasthye dharmadhāraṇam 13,134.057d@015_0493 yas tu kṣatragato dharmas tvayā devi pracoditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13171: 13,134.057d@015_0494 tam ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:13172: 13,134.057d@015_0495 kṣatriyās tu tathā devi prajānāṃ pālane smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13173: 13,134.057d@015_0496 yadi na kṣatriyo loke jagat syād adharottaram
GE07mbh_13_u:13174: 13,134.057d@015_0497 rakṣaṇāt kṣatriyair eva jagad bhavati śāśvatam
GE07mbh_13_u:13175: 13,134.057d@015_0498 tasyāpy adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ yajanaṃ dharmataḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:13176: 13,134.057d@015_0499 bhītānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ caiva pāpānām anuśāsanam 13,134.057d@015_0500 satāṃ saṃpoṣaṇaṃ caiva karaṣaḍbhāgajīvanam
GE07mbh_13_u:13177: 13,134.057d@015_0501 utsāhaḥ śastrajīvitvaṃ tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0502 bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇaṃ dharmaḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā
GE07mbh_13_u:13178: 13,134.057d@015_0503 samyag raṇadhṛto dharmo dharmaḥ paurahitakriyā 13,134.057d@015_0504 vyavahārasthitir nityaṃ guṇam etan mahīpateḥ 13,134.057d@015_0505 ārtahastaprado rājā dharmaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam 13,134.057d@015_0506 evaṃ te vihitāḥ pūrvair dharmāḥ karmavidhānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13179: 13,134.057d@015_0507 tathaiva devi vaiśyāś ca lokayātrāhitāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13180: 13,134.057d@015_0508 anye tān upajīvanti pratyakṣaphaladā hi te
GE07mbh_13_u:13181: 13,134.057d@015_0509 yadi na syus tathā vaiśyā na bhaveyus tathā pare
GE07mbh_13_u:13182: 13,134.057d@015_0510 teṣām adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ yajanaṃ dharma iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13183: 13,134.057d@015_0511 vaiśyasya satataṃ dharmaḥ pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13185: 13,134.057d@015_0513 vāṇijyaṃ satpathe sthānam ātitheyaṃ sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13186: 13,134.057d@015_0514 viprāṇāṃ svāgataṃ nyāyo vaiśyadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0515 tilagandharasāś caiva na vikreyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:13187: 13,134.057d@015_0516 vaṇikpatham upāsadbhir vaiśyair vaiśyapathi sthitaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_0517 sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti divāniśam
GE07mbh_13_u:13188: 13,134.057d@015_0518 evaṃ te vihitā devi lokayātrā svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:13190: 13,134.057d@015_0520 śūdrāś ca yadi te na syuḥ karmakartā na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13191: 13,134.057d@015_0521 trayaḥ pūrve śūdramūlās tasmāt karmakarāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13192: 13,134.057d@015_0522 brāhmaṇādiṣu śuśrūṣā dāsadharma iti smṛtaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0523 vārtā ca kārukarmāṇi śilpaṃ nāṭyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13195: 13,134.057d@015_0526 evamādi tathānyac ca śūdrakarma iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:13196: 13,134.057d@015_0527 te 'py evaṃ vihitā loke karmayogāḥ śubhānane 13,134.057d@015_0528 evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ puṇyalokāḥ paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13197: 13,134.057d@015_0529 vihitāś ca tathā dṛṣṭā yathāvad dharmacāriṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:13198: 13,134.057d@015_0530 eṣa varṇāśrayo dharmaḥ karma caiva tadarpaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:13200: 13,134.057d@015_0531 kathitaṃ śrotukāmāyāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:13201: 13,134.057d@015_0532 bhagavan devadeveśa namas te vṛṣabhadhvaja 13,134.057d@015_0533 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13202: 13,134.057d@015_0533 śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva dharmam āśramiṇāṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:13203: 13,134.057d@015_0534 athāśramagataṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇu devi samāhitā 13,134.057d@015_0535 āśramāṇāṃ tu yo dharmaḥ kriyate brahmavādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13204: 13,134.057d@015_0536 gṛhasthaḥ pravaras teṣāṃ gārhasthyavratam āśritaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0537 pañcayajñakriyā śaucaṃ dāratuṣṭir atandritā
GE07mbh_13_u:13209: 13,134.057d@015_0542 evamādi śubhaṃ cānyat kuryāt tadvṛttavān gṛhī
GE07mbh_13_u:13210: 13,134.057d@015_0543 evaṃ saṃcaratas tasya puṇyalokā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13211: 13,134.057d@015_0544 tathaiva vānaprasthasya dharmāḥ proktāḥ sanātanāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0545 gṛhavāsaṃ samutsṛjya niścityaikamanāḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13212: 13,134.057d@015_0546 vanyair eva sadāhārair vartayed iti ca sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13214: 13,134.057d@015_0548 devatātithisatkāro mahākṛcchrābhipūjanam 13,134.057d@015_0549 agnihotraṃ triṣavaṇaṃ nityaṃ tasya vidhīyate 13,134.057d@015_0550 brahmacaryaṃ kṣamā śaucaṃ tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13215: 13,134.057d@015_0551 evaṃ sa vigate prāṇe devaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13216: 13,134.057d@015_0552 yatidharmās tathā devi saṅgāṃs tyaktvā yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13217: 13,134.057d@015_0553 ākiṃcanyam anārambhaḥ sarvataḥ śaucam ārjavam 13,134.057d@015_0554 sarvatra bhaikṣacaryā ca sarvatraiva vivāsanam 13,134.057d@015_0555 sadā dhyānaparatvaṃ ca doṣaśuddhiḥ kṣamā dayā
GE07mbh_13_u:13219: 13,134.057d@015_0557 brahmacārī ca yo devi janmaprabhṛti dīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13220: 13,134.057d@015_0558 brahmacaryaparo bhūtvā saṃśrayed gurum ātmanaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0559 sarvakāleṣu sarvatra gurupūjāṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:13222: 13,134.057d@015_0561 svādhyāyaḥ satataṃ devi tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13223: 13,134.057d@015_0562 tasya ceṣṭā tu gurvartham āprāṇāntam iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13224: 13,134.057d@015_0563 guror abhāve tatputre guruvad vṛttim ācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:13225: 13,134.057d@015_0564 evaṃ so 'py amalāṃl lokān brāhmaṇaḥ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13226: 13,134.057d@015_0565 eṣa te kathito devi dharmaś cāśramavāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:13227: 13,134.057d@015_0566 cāturvarṇyāśrame yukto loka ity eva vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13229: 13,134.057d@015_0567 kathitaṃ te samāsena kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:13231: 13,134.057d@015_0569 ayaṃ tv ṛṣigaṇo deva tapas tepa iti prabho 13,134.057d@015_0570 tapasā karśitā nityaṃ taporjanaparāyaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13232: 13,134.057d@015_0571 asya kiṃlakṣaṇo dharmaḥ kīdṛśaś cāgamas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13233: 13,134.057d@015_0572 etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me vada varaprada 13,134.057d@015_0572
GE07mbh_13_u:13234: 13,134.057d@015_0573 evaṃ vadantyāṃ rudrāṇyām ṛṣayaḥ sādhu sādhv iti
GE07mbh_13_u:13236: 13,134.057d@015_0575 śṛṇvantīm ṛṣidharmāṃs tu ṛṣayaś cābhyapūjayan 13,134.057d@015_0576 tvatprasādād vayaṃ devi śroṣyāmaḥ paramaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:13237: 13,134.057d@015_0577 dhanyāḥ khalu vayaṃ sarve pādamūlaṃ tavāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13239: 13,134.057d@015_0578 iti sarve tadā devīṃ vācā samabhipūjayan
GE07mbh_13_u:13240: 13,134.057d@015_0579 nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmā manasvini 13,134.057d@015_0580 hanta te kathayiṣyāmi munidharmaṃ śucismite 13,134.057d@015_0581 vānaprasthaṃ samāśritya kriyate bahudhā naraiḥ 13,134.057d@015_0582 bahuśākho bahuvidha ṛṣidharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13241: 13,134.057d@015_0583 prāyaśaḥ svargabhogārtham ṛṣibhiḥ kriyate tapaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0584 tathā saṃcaratāṃ teṣāṃ devi dharmavidhiṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:13242: 13,134.057d@015_0585 bhūtvā pūrvaṃ gṛhasthas tu putrānṛṇyam avāpya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13243: 13,134.057d@015_0586 kalatrakāryaṃ saṃsthāpya kāraṇāt saṃtyajed gṛham 13,134.057d@015_0587 avasthāpya mano dhṛtyā vyavasāyapuraḥsaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13244: 13,134.057d@015_0588 nirdvaṃdvo vā sadāro vā vanavāsāya saṃvrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:13247: 13,134.057d@015_0591 tatra gatvā vidhiṃ jñātvā dīkṣāṃ kuryād yathākramam
GE07mbh_13_u:13249: 13,134.057d@015_0593 kālyotthānaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca sarvadevapraṇāmanam 13,134.057d@015_0594 śakṛdālepanaṃ kāye tyaktadoṣāpramāditā
GE07mbh_13_u:13250: 13,134.057d@015_0595 sāyaṃ prātaś cābhiṣekam agnihotraṃ yathāvidhi 13,134.057d@015_0596 kāyaśaucaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca jaṭāvalkaladhāraṇam 13,134.057d@015_0597 satataṃ vanacaryā ca samitkusumakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13252: 13,134.057d@015_0599 sadāyatanaśaucaṃ ca tasya dharmāya ceṣyate 13,134.057d@015_0600 atithīnām ābhimukhyaṃ tatparatvaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0601 pādyāsanābhyāṃ saṃpūjā tathāhāranimantraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:13254: 13,134.057d@015_0603 paścād atithisatkāras tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0604 śiṣṭair dharmāsane caiva dharmārthasahitāḥ kathāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0605 pratiśrayavibhāgaś ca bhūmiśayyā śilāsu vā 13,134.057d@015_0606 vratopavāsayogaś ca kṣamā cendriyanigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13255: 13,134.057d@015_0607 divā rātrau yathāyogaṃ śaucaṃ dharmārthacintanā 13,134.057d@015_0608 evaṃ dharmāḥ purā dṛṣṭāḥ sāmānyā vanavāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:13256: 13,134.057d@015_0609 evaṃ vai yatamānasya kāladharmo yadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13257: 13,134.057d@015_0610 tadaiva so 'bhijāyeta svargalokaṃ śucismite 13,134.057d@015_0611 tatra saṃvihitā bhogāḥ svargastrībhir anindite 13,134.057d@015_0612 paribhraṣṭo yadā svargād viśiṣṭas tu bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:13258: 13,134.057d@015_0613 evaṃ dharmaḥ sadā devi sarveṣāṃ vanavāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:13260: 13,134.057d@015_0614 etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi 13,134.057d@015_0615 bhagavan devadeveśa ṛṣīṇāṃ caritaṃ śubham 13,134.057d@015_0616 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13261: 13,134.057d@015_0616 viśeṣadharmān icchāmi śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:13262: 13,134.057d@015_0617 tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:13264: 13,134.057d@015_0619 vanaṃ gurum ivālambya vastavyam iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13266: 13,134.057d@015_0621 vratopavāsair bahubhir grīṣme pañcatapais tathā 13,134.057d@015_0622 pañcayajñaparair nityaṃ paurṇamāsyaparāyaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13270: 13,134.057d@015_0626 evaṃvidhair vanagatais tapyate sumahat tapaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0627 evaṃ kṛtvā śubhaṃ karma paścād yāti triviṣṭapam
GE07mbh_13_u:13271: 13,134.057d@015_0628 tatrāpi sumahat kālaṃ sa vihṛtya yathāsukham
GE07mbh_13_u:13275: 13,134.057d@015_0631 bhagavan sarvabhūteśa teṣu ye dārasaṃyutāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0632 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13276: 13,134.057d@015_0632 kīdṛśaṃ caritaṃ teṣāṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:13277: 13,134.057d@015_0633 ya ekapatnīdharmāṇaś caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0634 vindhyapādeṣu ye ke cid ye ca naimiṣavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13278: 13,134.057d@015_0635 puṣkareṣu ca ye cānye nadīvanasamāśritāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0636 sarve te vidhidṛṣṭena caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13282: 13,134.057d@015_0640 svadārasahitā devi caranti vratam uttamam 13,134.057d@015_0641 vasanti sukham avyagrāḥ putradārasamanvitāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:13438: 13,134.057d@015_0858 vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyaḥ snehabandhena vai dvijaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0859 ātmany evātmano bhāvaṃ samāyojyeha te vane

GE07mbh_13_u:13442: 13,134.057d@015_0864 eṣa mokṣavidāṃ dharmo vedoktaḥ satpathe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13443: 13,134.057d@015_0865 devadeva namas tubhyaṃ triyakṣa vṛṣabhadhvaja 13,134.057d@015_0866 śrutaṃ me bhagavan sarvaṃ tvatprasādān maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:13444: 13,134.057d@015_0867 saṃgṛhītaṃ mayā tac ca tava vākyam anuttamam

GE07mbh_13_u:13448: 13,134.057d@015_0871 sa cāpi daṇḍayan martyān bhartsayan vidhamann api
GE07mbh_13_u:13450: 13,134.057d@015_0873 rājavṛttam ahaṃ tasmāc chrotum icchāmi mānada

GE07mbh_13_u:13455: 13,134.057d@015_0879 nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāmini 13,134.057d@015_0880 tasmāt tasyaiva caritaṃ jagatpathyaṃ śṛṇu priye
GE07mbh_13_u:13456: 13,134.057d@015_0881 arājake purā tv āsīt prajānāṃ saṃkulaṃ mahat

GE07mbh_13_u:13459: 13,134.057d@015_0885 yathā pretya labhet svargaṃ yathā vīryaṃ yaśas tathā 13,134.057d@015_0886 pitryaṃ vā bhūtapūrvaṃ vā svayam utpādya vā punaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0887 rājadharmam anuṣṭhāya vidhivad bhoktum arhati 13,134.057d@015_0888 ātmānam eva prathamaṃ vinayair upapādayet 13,134.057d@015_0889 anu bhṛtyān prajāḥ paścād ity eṣa vinayakramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13460: 13,134.057d@015_0890 svāminaṃ copamāṃ kṛtvā prajās tadvṛttakāṅkṣayā 13,134.057d@015_0891 svayaṃ vinayasaṃpannā bhavantīha śubhekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:13461: 13,134.057d@015_0892 tasmāt pūrvataraṃ rājā ātmānaṃ vinaye nayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13462: 13,134.057d@015_0893 yo vinītaḥ svayaṃ rājā vinayaty eva vai prajāḥ 13,134.057d@015_0894 apahāsyo bhavet tādṛk svadoṣasyānavekṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13463: 13,134.057d@015_0895 vidyābhyāsair vṛddhayogair ātmānaṃ vinayaṃ nayet 13,134.057d@015_0896 vidyā dharmārthaphalinī tadvido vṛddhasaṃjñitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13464: 13,134.057d@015_0897 indriyāṇāṃ jayo devi ata ūrdhvam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:13465: 13,134.057d@015_0898 ajaye sumahān doṣo rājānaṃ vinipātayet 13,134.057d@015_0899 pañcaiva svavaśān kṛtvā tadarthān pañca śoṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13466: 13,134.057d@015_0900 ṣaḍ utsṛjya yathāyogaṃ jñānena vinayena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13467: 13,134.057d@015_0901 śāstracakṣur nayaparo bhūtvā bhṛtyān samāharet 13,134.057d@015_0902 vṛttaśrutakulopetān upadhābhiḥ parīkṣitān
GE07mbh_13_u:13469: 13,134.057d@015_0904 yojayeta yathāyogaṃ yathārhaṃ sveṣu karmasu 13,134.057d@015_0905 amātyā buddhisaṃpannā rāṣṭraṃ bahujanapriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:13470: 13,134.057d@015_0906 durādharṣaṃ puraśreṣṭhaṃ kośaḥ kṛcchrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0907 anuraktaṃ balaṃ sāram advaidhaṃ mitram eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13471: 13,134.057d@015_0908 etāḥ prakṛtayaḥ ṣaṭ ca svāmī ca nayatattvavit
GE07mbh_13_u:13472: 13,134.057d@015_0909 prajānāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya sarvam etad vinirmitam 13,134.057d@015_0910 ābhiḥ karaṇabhūtābhiḥ kuryāl lokahitaṃ nṛpaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0911 ātmarakṣā nṛpendrasya prajārakṣārtham iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13473: 13,134.057d@015_0912 tasmāt satatam ātmānaṃ saṃrakṣed apramādavān 13,134.057d@015_0913 bhojanācchādanāt snānād bahir niṣkramaṇād api 13,134.057d@015_0914 nityaṃ strīgaṇasaṃyogād rakṣed ātmānam ātmavān 13,134.057d@015_0915 svebhyaś caiva parebhyaś ca śastrād api viṣād api 13,134.057d@015_0916 satataṃ putradārebhyo rakṣed ātmānam ātmavān 13,134.057d@015_0917 sarvebhya eva sthānebhyo rakṣed ātmānam ātmavān
GE07mbh_13_u:13475: 13,134.057d@015_0919 prajākāryaṃ tu tatkāryaṃ prajāsaukhyaṃ tu tatsukham
GE07mbh_13_u:13476: 13,134.057d@015_0920 prajāpriyaṃ priyaṃ tasya svahitaṃ hi prajāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:13477: 13,134.057d@015_0921 prajārthaṃ tasya sarvasvam ātmārthaṃ na vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13478: 13,134.057d@015_0922 prakṛtīnāṃ vivādārthaṃ rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca 13,134.057d@015_0923 ubhayoḥ pakṣayor vādaṃ śrutvā caiva yathātatham
GE07mbh_13_u:13479: 13,134.057d@015_0924 tam arthaṃ vimṛśed buddhyā svayam ā tattvadarśanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13480: 13,134.057d@015_0925 tadvidbhir bahubhir vṛddhaiḥ sahāsīno narottamaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_0926 kartāram aparādhaṃ ca deśakālau nayānayau 13,134.057d@015_0927 jñātvā samyag yathāśāstraṃ tato daṇḍaṃ nayen nṛṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:13481: 13,134.057d@015_0928 evaṃ kurvaṃl labhed dharmaṃ pakṣapātavivarjanāt 13,134.057d@015_0929 pratyakṣāptopadeśābhyām anumānena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13482: 13,134.057d@015_0930 boddhavyaṃ satataṃ rājñā deśavṛttaṃ śubhāśubham 13,134.057d@015_0931 cāraiḥ karmapravṛttyā ca tad vijñāya vicārayan
GE07mbh_13_u:13483: 13,134.057d@015_0932 aśubhaṃ nirharet sadyo joṣayec chubham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13484: 13,134.057d@015_0933 garhyān vigarhayed eva pūjyān saṃpūjayet tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13485: 13,134.057d@015_0934 daṇḍyāṃś ca daṇḍayed devi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:13486: 13,134.057d@015_0935 pañcāpekṣaṃ sadā mantraṃ kuryād buddhiyutair naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13488: 13,134.057d@015_0937 kāmarāgeṇa vai mūrkhair naiva mantramanā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13490: 13,134.057d@015_0939 sarvodyogaṃ svayaṃ kuryād durgādiṣu sadā nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13492: 13,134.057d@015_0941 deśakṣayakarān sarvān saṃpriyān api varjayet 13,134.057d@015_0942 ahany ahani saṃpaśyed anujīvigaṇaṃ svayam 13,134.057d@015_0943 sumukhaḥ supriyo bhūtvā samyag vṛttaṃ samādiśet
GE07mbh_13_u:13493: 13,134.057d@015_0944 adharmyaṃ paruṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vākyaṃ vaktuṃ na cārhati
GE07mbh_13_u:13494: 13,134.057d@015_0945 nare nare guṇān doṣān samyag veditum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:13495: 13,134.057d@015_0946 sveṅgitaṃ vṛṇuyād dhairyān na kuryāt kṣudrasaṃvidam
GE07mbh_13_u:13496: 13,134.057d@015_0947 pareṅgitajño lokajño bhūtvā saṃsargam ācaret 13,134.057d@015_0948 svataś ca parataś caiva parasparabhayād api
GE07mbh_13_u:13497: 13,134.057d@015_0949 amānuṣabhayebhyaś ca svāḥ prajāḥ pālayen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13498: 13,134.057d@015_0950 lubdhāḥ kaṭhorāś cādhyakṣā mānavā dasyuvṛttayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0951 nigrāhyā eva te rājñā saṃgṛhītā yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13499: 13,134.057d@015_0952 kumārān vinayair eva janmaprabhṛti yojayet 13,134.057d@015_0953 teṣām ātmaguṇopetaṃ yauvarājye niyojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13500: 13,134.057d@015_0954 prakṛtīnāṃ yathā na syād rājyabhraṃśodbhavaṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:13501: 13,134.057d@015_0955 etat saṃcintayan nityaṃ tadvidhānaṃ tathārhati 13,134.057d@015_0956 arājakaṃ kṣaṇam api rāṣṭraṃ na syād dhi śobhane 13,134.057d@015_0957 ātmano 'nuvidhānāya yauvarājyaṃ sadeṣyate 13,134.057d@015_0958 kulajānāṃ ca vaidyānāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ tapasvinām 13,134.057d@015_0959 anyeṣāṃ vṛttayuktānāṃ viśeṣaṃ kartum arhati 13,134.057d@015_0960 ātmārthaṃ rājyatantrārthaṃ kośasaṃcayam ārabhet
GE07mbh_13_u:13502: 13,134.057d@015_0961 durgād rāṣṭrāt samudrāc ca vaṇigbhyaḥ puruṣātyayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13505: 13,134.057d@015_0964 sādaraḥ satataṃ bhūtvā apekṣāvratam ācaret 13,134.057d@015_0965 caturdhā vibhajet kośaṃ dharmabhṛtyātmakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13506: 13,134.057d@015_0966 āpadarthaṃ ca nītijño deśakālavaśena tu 13,134.057d@015_0967 anāthān vyādhitān vṛddhān svadeśe poṣayen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13507: 13,134.057d@015_0968 saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva tadviśeṣāṃs tathāparān
GE07mbh_13_u:13509: 13,134.057d@015_0970 sarveṣāṃ sa priyo bhūtvā maṇḍalaṃ satataṃ caret
GE07mbh_13_u:13510: 13,134.057d@015_0971 śubheṣv api ca kāryeṣu na caiko 'ntaḥ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:13511: 13,134.057d@015_0972 svataś ca parataś caiva vyasanāni vimṛśya tu

GE07mbh_13_u:13513: 13,134.057d@015_0975 kunṛpaiḥ pīḍitās tasmāt prajāḥ sarvatra pālayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13514: 13,134.057d@015_0976 yātrākālam avekṣyaiva paścāt kopaḥ phalodayam 13,134.057d@015_0977 tadyuktāś cāpadaś caiva prāg yānād iti cintayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13515: 13,134.057d@015_0978 vyasanebhyo balaṃ rakṣen nayato vyayato 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:13517: 13,134.057d@015_0980 kāraṇād eva yoddhavyaṃ nātmanaḥ paradoṣataḥ 13,134.057d@015_0981 suyuddhe prāṇamokṣaś ca tasya dharmāya iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13518: 13,134.057d@015_0982 abhiyukto balavatā kuryād āpadvidhiṃ nṛpaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0983 anunīya tathā sarvān prajānāṃ hitakāraṇāt 13,134.057d@015_0984 anyaprakṛtiyuktānāṃ rājñāṃ vṛttavicāriṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:13519: 13,134.057d@015_0985 anyāṃś cāpatprapannānāṃ na tān saṃyoktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:13520: 13,134.057d@015_0986 śubhāśubhaṃ yadā devi vṛttaṃ tūbhayataḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:13521: 13,134.057d@015_0987 ātmaiva tac chubhaṃ kuryād aśubhaṃ yojayet parān
GE07mbh_13_u:13522: 13,134.057d@015_0988 evam uddeśataḥ proktam alepatvaṃ yathā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13523: 13,134.057d@015_0989 etad evaṃ samāsena rājadharmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_0990 evaṃ saṃvartamānas tu daṇḍayan bhartsayan prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13524: 13,134.057d@015_0991 na kilbiṣam avāpnoti padmapatram ivāmbhasā 13,134.057d@015_0992 evaṃ saṃvartamānasya kāladharmo yadā bhavet 13,134.057d@015_0993 svargaloke tadā rājā tridaśaiḥ saha toṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13526: 13,134.057d@015_0995 evaṃ nyāyānugaṃ vṛttaṃ kathitaṃ te śubhekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:13527: 13,134.057d@015_0996 rājyaṃ nyāyānugaṃ nāma buddhiśāstrānugaṃ bhavet 13,134.057d@015_0997 dharmyaṃ pathyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca svargyaṃ caiva tathā bhavet 13,134.057d@015_0998 daivapakṣye sati nṛpe rājyaṃ nyāyānugaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13528: 13,134.057d@015_0999 kriyante yatra karmāṇi śāstrayuktiṃ vimṛśya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:13529: 13,134.057d@015_1000 kartā dveṣaviyuktaś ca tatra nyāyānugaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13530: 13,134.057d@015_1001 rājyaṃ bhogānugaṃ nāma ayathāvat pradṛśyate 13,134.057d@015_1002 tat tu śāstravinirmuktaṃ satāṃ kopakaraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13531: 13,134.057d@015_1003 adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca durantaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:13532: 13,134.057d@015_1004 yatra svacchandataḥ sarvaṃ kriyate karma rājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13533: 13,134.057d@015_1005 yatra bhāgyavaśād bhṛtyā labhante na viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13534: 13,134.057d@015_1006 yatra daṇḍyā na daṇḍyante pūjyante vā narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13535: 13,134.057d@015_1007 yatra santo vihanyante tatra bhāgyānugaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13536: 13,134.057d@015_1008 śubhāśubhaṃ yadā yatra viparītaṃ pradṛśyate 13,134.057d@015_1009 rājñi vāsurapakṣe tu tatra bhāgyānugaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13537: 13,134.057d@015_1010 bhāgyānuge tu rājāno vartamānā yathātathā 13,134.057d@015_1011 prāpyākīrtim anarthaṃ ca ihaloke śubhekṣaṇe 13,134.057d@015_1012 paratra sumahāghoraṃ tamaḥ prāpya duratyayam 13,134.057d@015_1013 tiṣṭhanti narake devi pralayāntād iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13538: 13,134.057d@015_1014 mokṣaṇaṃ duṣkṛtīnāṃ tu vidyate kālaparyayāt 13,134.057d@015_1015 nāsty eva mokṣaṇaṃ devi rājñāṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:13539: 13,134.057d@015_1016 etat sarvaṃ samāsena rājavṛttaṃ śubhāśubham 13,134.057d@015_1017 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:13540: 13,134.057d@015_1017 kathitaṃ te mahābhāge bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:13543: 13,134.057d@015_1019 yāni dharmarahasyāni śrotum icchāmi tāny aham
GE07mbh_13_u:13544: 13,134.057d@015_1020 rahasyaṃ śrūyatāṃ devi mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvaham 13,134.057d@015_1021 napuṃsakeṣu vandhyāsu viyonau pṛthivītale
GE07mbh_13_u:13545: 13,134.057d@015_1022 utsargo retasas teṣu na kāryo dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13546: 13,134.057d@015_1023 eteṣu bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na virohati vai priye
GE07mbh_13_u:13547: 13,134.057d@015_1024 yatra vā tatra vā bījaṃ dharmārthī notsṛjet punaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1025 naro bījavināśena lipyate bhrūṇahatyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:13548: 13,134.057d@015_1026 ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:13549: 13,134.057d@015_1027 ahiṃsā dharmaśāstreṣu sarveṣu paramaṃ padam 13,134.057d@015_1028 devatātithiśuśrūṣā satataṃ dharmaśīlatā
GE07mbh_13_u:13550: 13,134.057d@015_1029 vedādhyayanayajñāś ca tapo dānaṃ damas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13552: 13,134.057d@015_1031 ahiṃsāyā varārohe kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm 13,134.057d@015_1032 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:13553: 13,134.057d@015_1032 etat te paramaṃ guhyam ākhyātaṃ paramārcitam
GE07mbh_13_u:13554: 13,134.057d@015_1033 yadi dharmas tv ahiṃsāyāṃ kimartham amarottama
GE07mbh_13_u:13555: 13,134.057d@015_1034 yajñeṣu paśubandheṣu hanyante paśavo dvijaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_1035 kathaṃ ca bhagavan bhūyo hiṃsamānā narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13556: 13,134.057d@015_1036 svargaṃ sudurgamaṃ yānti sadā sma ripusūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:13557: 13,134.057d@015_1037 yasyaiva gosahasrāṇi viṃśatiḥ sādhikāni tu 13,134.057d@015_1038 ahany ahani hanyante dvijānāṃ māṃsakāraṇāt 13,134.057d@015_1039 samāṃsaṃ tu sa dattvānnaṃ rantidevo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13558: 13,134.057d@015_1040 kathaṃ svargam anuprāptaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:13559: 13,134.057d@015_1041 kiṃ nu dharmaṃ na śṛṇvanti na śraddadhati vā śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:13560: 13,134.057d@015_1042 mṛgayāyai vinirgatya mṛgān ghnanti narādhipāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1043 etat sarvaṃ viśeṣeṇa vistareṇa vṛṣadhvaja 13,134.057d@015_1044 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13561: 13,134.057d@015_1044 śrotum icchāmi bhagavaṃs tattvam etan mamocyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:13562: 13,134.057d@015_1045 bahumānyam idaṃ devi nāsti kaś cid ahiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13563: 13,134.057d@015_1046 śrūyatāṃ kāraṇaṃ cātra yathānekavidhaṃ bhavet 13,134.057d@015_1047 dṛśyate cāpi loke 'smin na kaś cid avihiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13564: 13,134.057d@015_1048 dharaṇīsaṃśritāñ jīvān susūkṣmāṃś caiva madhyamān 13,134.057d@015_1049 saṃcaraṃś caraṇābhyāṃ ca hanti jīvān anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13565: 13,134.057d@015_1050 ajñānāj jñānato vāpi ye jīvāḥ śayanāsane
GE07mbh_13_u:13566: 13,134.057d@015_1051 upāviśañ śayānaś ca hanti jīvān anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13567: 13,134.057d@015_1052 śirovastreṣu ye jīvā narāṇāṃ svedasaṃbhavāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1053 tāṃś ca hiṃsanti satataṃ daṃśāṃś ca maśakān api 13,134.057d@015_1054 jale jīvās tathākāśe pṛthivī jīvamālinī 13,134.057d@015_1055 evaṃ jīvākule loke ko 'sau syād yas tv ahiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13569: 13,134.057d@015_1057 dṛśyarūpair adṛśyaiś ca nānārūpaiś ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:13570: 13,134.057d@015_1058 jīvais tatam idaṃ sarvam ākāśaṃ pṛthivī tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13571: 13,134.057d@015_1059 anyonyaṃ te ca hiṃsanti durbalān balavattarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13572: 13,134.057d@015_1060 matsyā matsyān grasantīha khagāṃś caiva khagās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13573: 13,134.057d@015_1061 sarīsṛpaiś ca jīvanti kapotādyā vihaṃgamāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1062 bhūcarāḥ khecarāś cānye kravyādā māṃsagṛddhinaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1063 samṛddhāḥ paramāṃsais tu bhakṣeran ye 'pi cāparaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13575: 13,134.057d@015_1065 apīḍayitvā naivānyaṃ jīvā jīvanti sundari 13,134.057d@015_1066 sthūlakāyasya sattvasya kharasya mahiṣasya vā 13,134.057d@015_1067 jīvasyaikasya māṃsena payasā rudhireṇa vā 13,134.057d@015_1068 tṛpyante bahavo jīvāḥ kravyādā māṃsabhojinaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1069 eko jīvasahasrāṇi sadā khādati mānavaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1070 annādyalpopabhogena dhānyasaṃjñāni yāni tu
GE07mbh_13_u:13576: 13,134.057d@015_1071 māṃsadhānyaiḥ sabījaiś ca bhojanaṃ parivarjayet 13,134.057d@015_1072 trirātraṃ pañcarātraṃ vā saptarātram athāpi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:13577: 13,134.057d@015_1073 dhānyāni yo na hiṃsetāhiṃsakaḥ parikīrtitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1074 nāśnāti yāvato jīvāṃs tāvat puṇyena yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13579: 13,134.057d@015_1076 tapyamāne śarīre tu śarīraṃ cendriyāṇy api
GE07mbh_13_u:13580: 13,134.057d@015_1077 vaśe tiṣṭhanti suśroṇi nṛpāṇām iva kiṃkarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13581: 13,134.057d@015_1078 niruṇaddhīndriyāṇy eva sa sukhī sa vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13582: 13,134.057d@015_1079 indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena dānena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13583: 13,134.057d@015_1080 naraḥ sarvam avāpnoti manasā yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_13_u:13584: 13,134.057d@015_1081 etan mūlam ahiṃsāyā upavāsaḥ prakīrtitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1082 āhāraṃ kurute yas tu bhūmim ākramate ca yaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1083 sarve te hiṃsakā devi yathā dharmeṣu dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13585: 13,134.057d@015_1084 yathehāhiṃsako devi tattvajño jñāyate naraḥ 13,134.057d@015_1085 tathā te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ dharmacāriṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:13586: 13,134.057d@015_1086 phalāni jīrṇaparṇāni bhasma vā yo 'pi bhakṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13587: 13,134.057d@015_1087 ālekhyam iva niśceṣṭaṃ taṃ manye 'ham ahiṃsakam
GE07mbh_13_u:13588: 13,134.057d@015_1088 ārambhā hiṃsayā yuktā dhūmenāgnir ivāvṛtāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1089 tasmād yas tu nirāhāras taṃ manye 'ham ahiṃsakam
GE07mbh_13_u:13589: 13,134.057d@015_1090 yas tu sarvaṃ samutsṛjya dīkṣito niyataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13590: 13,134.057d@015_1091 kṛtvā maṇḍalamaryādāṃ saṃkalpaṃ kurute naraḥ 13,134.057d@015_1092 yāvajjīvam anāśitvā kālākāṅkṣī dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13591: 13,134.057d@015_1093 dhyānena tapasā yuktas taṃ manye 'ham ahiṃsakam
GE07mbh_13_u:13592: 13,134.057d@015_1094 anyathā hi na paśyāmi naro yaḥ syād ahiṃsakaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1095 bahu cintyam idaṃ devi nāsti kaś cid ahiṃsakaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1096 yato yato mahābhāge hiṃsā syān mahatī tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13593: 13,134.057d@015_1097 nivṛttau madhumāṃsābhyāṃ hiṃsā tv alpatarā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13594: 13,134.057d@015_1098 nivṛttiḥ paramo dharmo nivṛttiḥ paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:13595: 13,134.057d@015_1099 manasā vinivṛttānāṃ dharmasya nicayo mahān 13,134.057d@015_1100 manaḥpūrvaṃgamā dharmā adharmāś ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13596: 13,134.057d@015_1101 manasā badhyate cāpi mucyate cāpi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13597: 13,134.057d@015_1102 nigṛhīte bhavet svargo visṛṣṭe narako dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13598: 13,134.057d@015_1103 ghātakaḥ śastram udyamya manasā cintayed yadi
GE07mbh_13_u:13599: 13,134.057d@015_1104 āyuḥkṣayaṃ gate 'dyaiṣāṃ mṛte tu praharāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:13600: 13,134.057d@015_1105 iti yo ghātako hanyān na sa pāpena lipyate 13,134.057d@015_1106 vidhinā nihataḥ pūrvaṃ nimittaṃ sa tu ghātakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13601: 13,134.057d@015_1107 vidhir hi balavān devi dustyajaṃ vai purākṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:13604: 13,134.057d@015_1110 nānāvidhavicitrāṅgā nānāvīryaparākramāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1111 nānābhūmipradeśeṣu nānāhārāś ca jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13605: 13,134.057d@015_1112 jāyamānasya jīvasya mṛtyuḥ pūrvaṃ prajāyate 13,134.057d@015_1113 sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13606: 13,134.057d@015_1114 prāpnuvanti narā mṛtyuṃ yadā yatra ca yena ca 13,134.057d@015_1115 nātikrāntuṃ hi śakyaṃ syān nideśaḥ pūrvakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13607: 13,134.057d@015_1116 apramattaḥ pramatteṣu vidhir jāgarti jantuṣu 13,134.057d@015_1117 na hi tasya priyaḥ kaś cin na dveṣyo na ca madhyamaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1118 samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu kālaḥ kālaṃ nirīkṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:13608: 13,134.057d@015_1119 gatāyuṣo hy ākṣipati jīvaṃ sarvasya dehinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13609: 13,134.057d@015_1120 yathā yena ca martavyaṃ tathā yujyeta mṛtyunā
GE07mbh_13_u:13610: 13,134.057d@015_1121 avaśo nīyate tatra martavyaṃ yatra yena tu
GE07mbh_13_u:13611: 13,134.057d@015_1122 araṇye svagṛhe vāpi rātrau vāhani vā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13612: 13,134.057d@015_1123 yathā yena hi martavyaṃ nānyathā mriyate hi saḥ 13,134.057d@015_1124 dṛśyate na ca loke 'smin bhūto bhavyo 'pi vā punaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1125 vijñānair vikramair vāpi nānāmantrauṣadhair api 13,134.057d@015_1126 yo hi vañcayituṃ śakto vidhes tu niyatāṃ gatim 13,134.057d@015_1127 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13613: 13,134.057d@015_1127 eṣa te 'bhihito devi jīvahiṃsāvidhikramaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1128 śrūyatāṃ kāraṇaṃ devi yathā hi duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13614: 13,134.057d@015_1129 vidhiḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu martavye samupasthite 13,134.057d@015_1130 āyuḥkṣayeṇopahatāḥ samāgamya varānane
GE07mbh_13_u:13615: 13,134.057d@015_1131 kīṭāḥ pataṃgā bahavaḥ sthūlāḥ sūkṣmāś ca madhyamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13616: 13,134.057d@015_1132 prajvalatsu pradīpeṣu svayam eva patanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:13618: 13,134.057d@015_1134 yas tu kālahatas teṣāṃ sa vai kālena vadhyate 13,134.057d@015_1135 sūnārthaṃ devi baddhānāṃ kṣīṇāyur yo nibadhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13619: 13,134.057d@015_1136 avaśo ghātakasyātha hastaṃ tad ahar eti saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13621: 13,134.057d@015_1138 kṣīṇāyuṣo nibadhyante śaktā api palāyitum 13,134.057d@015_1139 yathā vāricarā mīnā bahavo bahujātayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1140 jālaṃ samadhirohanti svayam eva vidher vaśāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13622: 13,134.057d@015_1141 śalyakasya ca jihvāgraṃ svayam āruhya śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:13624: 13,134.057d@015_1143 kṛṣatāṃ karṣakāṇāṃ ca nāsti buddhir vihiṃsane
GE07mbh_13_u:13626: 13,134.057d@015_1145 pādāgreṇaiva caikena yāṃ hiṃsāṃ kurute naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13627: 13,134.057d@015_1146 mātaṃgo 'pi na tāṃ kuryāt krūro janmaśatair api
GE07mbh_13_u:13628: 13,134.057d@015_1147 mriyante yair hi martavyaṃ na tān hanti kṛṣīvalaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1148 kṛṣāmīti matis tasya nāsti cintā vihiṃsane
GE07mbh_13_u:13629: 13,134.057d@015_1149 tasmāj jīvasahasrāṇi hatvāpi na sa lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13630: 13,134.057d@015_1150 vidhinā vihitaḥ pūrvaṃ paścāt prāṇī vipadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13631: 13,134.057d@015_1151 evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu vidhir hi duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13632: 13,134.057d@015_1152 gatāyuṣā na śakyaṃ hi muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE07mbh_13_u:13633: 13,134.057d@015_1153 jīvitavye na martavyaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:13634: 13,134.057d@015_1154 śubhāśubhaṃ karmaphalaṃ na śakyam ativartitum 13,134.057d@015_1155 tathā tābhiś ca martavyaṃ bhoktavyāś caiva tās tathā 13,134.057d@015_1156 rantidevasya gāvo vai vidher hi vaśam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13635: 13,134.057d@015_1157 svayam āyānti gāvo vai hanyante yatra sundari
GE07mbh_13_u:13636: 13,134.057d@015_1158 gavāṃ vai hanyamānānāṃ rudhiraprabhavā nadī 13,134.057d@015_1159 carmaṇvatīti vikhyātā khuraśṛṅgāsthidurgamā
GE07mbh_13_u:13637: 13,134.057d@015_1160 rudhiraṃ tāṃ nadīṃ prāpya toyaṃ bhavati śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:13638: 13,134.057d@015_1161 medhyaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca gandhavarṇarasair yutam
GE07mbh_13_u:13640: 13,134.057d@015_1163 dvijā devagaṇāś cāpi lokapālā maheśvarāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1164 tasya rājñaḥ sadā satre svayam āgamya sundari
GE07mbh_13_u:13643: 13,134.057d@015_1167 samāṃsaṃ ca sadā hy annaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13644: 13,134.057d@015_1168 bhuñjānānāṃ dvijātīnām astam eti divākaraḥ 13,134.057d@015_1169 gāvo yās tatra hanyante rājñas tasya kratūttame
GE07mbh_13_u:13646: 13,134.057d@015_1171 tāś ca svargaṃ gatā gāvo rantidevaś ca pārthivaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1172 sadā satravidhānena siddhiṃ prāpto nareśvaraḥ 13,134.057d@015_1173 atha yas tu sahāyārtham uktaḥ syāt pārthivair naraḥ 13,134.057d@015_1174 bhogānāṃ saṃvibhāgena vastrābharaṇabhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13648: 13,134.057d@015_1176 sahāyakāle saṃprāpte saṃgrāme śastram uddharet 13,134.057d@015_1177 vyūḍhānīke yathā śastraṃ senayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_13_u:13652: 13,134.057d@015_1183 nānāpraharaṇair yodhaiḥ senayor ubhayor api 13,134.057d@015_1184 yuddhaśauṇḍaiḥ pragarjadbhir vṛṣeṣu vṛṣabhair iva 13,134.057d@015_1185 śaṅkhaduṃdubhinādena nānātūryaraveṇa ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13654: 13,134.057d@015_1187 yodhānāṃ siṃhanādaiś ca ghaṇṭānāṃ śiñjitasvanaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_1188 diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva samantād badhirīkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13658: 13,134.057d@015_1192 pravṛtte śastrasaṃpāte yodhānāṃ tatra senayoḥ 13,134.057d@015_1193 teṣāṃ prahārakṣatajaṃ raktacandanasaprabham
GE07mbh_13_u:13659: 13,134.057d@015_1194 te sravantaḥ svagātrebhyas tarante raṇamūrdhani 13,134.057d@015_1195 palāśāśokapuṣpāṇāṃ jaṃgamā iva rāśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13661: 13,134.057d@015_1197 śobhamānā raṇe śūrā āhvayantaḥ parasparam 13,134.057d@015_1198 hanyamāneṣv abhighnatsu śūreṣu raṇasaṃkaṭe
GE07mbh_13_u:13662: 13,134.057d@015_1199 pṛṣṭhaṃ dattvātha ye tatra nāyakasya narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13663: 13,134.057d@015_1200 anāhatā nivartante nāyake vāpy abhīpsati 13,134.057d@015_1201 te duṣkṛtaṃ prapadyante nāyakasyākhilaṃ narāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1202 yac cāsti sukṛtaṃ teṣāṃ yujyate tena nāyakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13664: 13,134.057d@015_1203 ahiṃsā paramo dharma iti ye 'pi narā viduḥ 13,134.057d@015_1204 saṃgrāmeṣu na yudhyante bhṛtāś caivānurūpataḥ 13,134.057d@015_1205 narakaṃ yānti te ghoraṃ bhartṛpiṇḍāpahāriṇaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1206 yas tu prāṇān parityajya praviśed udyatāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13665: 13,134.057d@015_1207 saṃgrāmam agnipratimaṃ pataṃgā iva nirbhayam 13,134.057d@015_1208 sattvam āviśate tatra jñātvā yodhasya niścayam
GE07mbh_13_u:13666: 13,134.057d@015_1209 āviṣṭaś caiva sattvena nirghṛṇo jāyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13667: 13,134.057d@015_1210 prahārair nandayed devi sattvenādhiṣṭhito hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13668: 13,134.057d@015_1211 prahāravyathitaś caiva na vaiklavyam upaiti saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13669: 13,134.057d@015_1212 yas tu svaṃ nāyakaṃ rakṣann atighore raṇāṅgaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:13670: 13,134.057d@015_1213 tāpayann arisainyāni siṃho mṛgagaṇān iva 13,134.057d@015_1214 āditya iva madhyāhne durnirīkṣyo raṇājire 13,134.057d@015_1215 nirdayo yas tu saṃgrāme praharaty udyatāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13671: 13,134.057d@015_1216 yajate sa tu pūtātmā saṃgrāmeṇa mahākratum
GE07mbh_13_u:13672: 13,134.057d@015_1217 varma kṛṣṇājinaṃ tasya daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ dhanuḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:13673: 13,134.057d@015_1218 ratho vedī dhvajo yūpaḥ kuśāś ca ratharaśmayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13674: 13,134.057d@015_1219 māno darpas tv ahaṃkāras trayas tretāgnayaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13675: 13,134.057d@015_1220 pratodaś ca sruvas tasya upādhyāyo 'sya sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13676: 13,134.057d@015_1221 srug bhāṇḍaṃ cāpi yat kiṃ cid yajñopakaraṇāni ca 13,134.057d@015_1222 āyudhāny asya tat sarvaṃ samidhaḥ sāyakāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13677: 13,134.057d@015_1223 svedasrāvaś ca gātrebhyaḥ kṣaudraṃ tasya yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13678: 13,134.057d@015_1224 puroḍāśā nṛśīrṣāṇi rudhiraṃ cāhutiḥ smṛtam 13,134.057d@015_1225 tūṇaś caiva carur jñeyo vasor dhārā vasā smṛtā 13,134.057d@015_1226 kravyādā bhūtasaṃghāś ca tasmin yajñe dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13680: 13,134.057d@015_1228 bhuñjate te yathākāmaṃ yathā yajñe kim icchake
GE07mbh_13_u:13682: 13,134.057d@015_1230 hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca yad vai yajñasya dakṣiṇā 13,134.057d@015_1231 yas tatra hanyate devi gajaskandhagato naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13683: 13,134.057d@015_1232 brahmalokam avāpnoti raṇeṣv abhimukho hataḥ 13,134.057d@015_1233 rathamadhyagato vāpi hayapṛṣṭhagato 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:13684: 13,134.057d@015_1234 hanyate yas tu saṃgrāme śakraloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13685: 13,134.057d@015_1235 svarge hantā pūjyate tair hatas tatraiva pūjyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13686: 13,134.057d@015_1236 dvāv etau sukham edhete hantā yaś caiva hanyate 13,134.057d@015_1237 tasmāt saṃgrāmam āsādya prahartavyam abhītavat 13,134.057d@015_1238 nirbhayo yas tu saṃgrāme prahared udyatāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13687: 13,134.057d@015_1239 rājño vallabhatām eti kulaṃ bhāvayate svakam
GE07mbh_13_u:13689: 13,134.057d@015_1241 tathā sarve na saṃdeho dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vare

GE07mbh_13_u:13692: 13,134.057d@015_1244 tathaiva mānavā dharmā dharmāś cānye tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:13693: 13,134.057d@015_1245 deśajātikulānāṃ ca grāmadharmās tathaiva ca 13,134.057d@015_1246 ye dharmāḥ pārvatīyeṣu ye dharmāḥ pattanādiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:13695: 13,134.057d@015_1248 dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13696: 13,134.057d@015_1249 tasmād dharmo na hantavyaḥ pārthivena viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13697: 13,134.057d@015_1250 prajāḥ pālayate yatra dharmeṇa vasudhādhipaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1251 ṣaṭkarmaniratā viprāḥ pūjyante pitṛdevatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13698: 13,134.057d@015_1252 naiva tasminn anāvṛṣṭir na rogā nāpy upadravāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13699: 13,134.057d@015_1253 dharmaśīlāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ svadharmanirate nṛpe 13,134.057d@015_1254 eṣṭavyaḥ satataṃ devi yuktācāro narādhipaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1255 chidrajñaś caiva śatrūṇām apramattaḥ pratāpavān 13,134.057d@015_1256 śūdrāḥ pṛthivyāṃ bahavo rājñāṃ bahuvināśakāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1257 tasmāt pramādaṃ suśroṇi na kuryāt paṇḍito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13700: 13,134.057d@015_1258 teṣu mitreṣu tyakteṣu tathā martyeṣu hastiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:13702: 13,134.057d@015_1260 rājño vallabhatām eti kulaṃ bhāvayate svakam
GE07mbh_13_u:13703: 13,134.057d@015_1261 yas tu rāṣṭrahitārthāya gobrāhmaṇakṛte tathā 13,134.057d@015_1262 bandigrāhāya mitrārthe prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān 13,134.057d@015_1263 sarvakāmadughāṃ dhenuṃ dharaṇīṃ lokadhāriṇīm
GE07mbh_13_u:13705: 13,134.057d@015_1265 dadyād devi dvijātibhyo vasupūrṇāṃ vasuṃdharām 13,134.057d@015_1266 na tatsamaṃ varārohe prāṇatyāgī viśiṣyate 13,134.057d@015_1267 sahasram api yajñānāṃ yajate yadi carddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:13706: 13,134.057d@015_1268 yajñais tasya kim āścaryaṃ prāṇatyāgaḥ suduṣkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13708: 13,134.057d@015_1270 evaṃ saṃgrāmayajñās te yathātattvam udāhṛtāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1271 mṛgayātrāṃ tu vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tāṃ dharmacāriṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:13709: 13,134.057d@015_1272 mṛgān hatvā mahīpālo yathā pāpair na lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13710: 13,134.057d@015_1273 nirmānuṣām imāṃ sarve mṛgā icchanti medinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:13711: 13,134.057d@015_1274 bhakṣayanti ca sasyāni śāsitavyā nṛpeṇa te
GE07mbh_13_u:13712: 13,134.057d@015_1275 duṣṭānāṃ śāsanaṃ dharmaḥ śiṣṭānāṃ paripālanam 13,134.057d@015_1276 kartavyaṃ bhūmipālena nityaṃ kāryeṣu cārjavam 13,134.057d@015_1277 svargaṃ mṛgāś ca gacchanti svayaṃ nṛpatinā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13713: 13,134.057d@015_1278 yathā gāvo hy agopālās tathā rāṣṭram anāyakam
GE07mbh_13_u:13714: 13,134.057d@015_1279 tasmād aṃśās tu devānāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām 13,134.057d@015_1280 rājye niyuktā rāṣṭreṣu prajāpālanakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13716: 13,134.057d@015_1282 teṣāṃ caryāṃ pravakṣyāmi śrūyatām anupūrvaśaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1283 yathā pracaratāṃ teṣāṃ pārthivānāṃ yaśasvini 13,134.057d@015_1284 rāṣṭraṃ dharmo dhanaṃ caiva yaśaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhate 13,134.057d@015_1285 nṛpāṇāṃ pūrvam evāyaṃ dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vare
GE07mbh_13_u:13720: 13,134.057d@015_1289 kulam utsādayeyus te krodhāviṣṭā dvijātayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1290 dhmāyamāno yathā hy agnir nirdahet sarvam indhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:13721: 13,134.057d@015_1291 tathā krodhāgninā viprā daheyuḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_13_u:13722: 13,134.057d@015_1292 na hi vipreṣu kruddheṣu rājyaṃ bhuñjanti bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13724: 13,134.057d@015_1294 sabandhumitrā naṣṭās te dagdhā brāhmaṇamanyubhiḥ 13,134.057d@015_1295 śarīraṃ cāpi śakrasya kṛtaṃ bhaganirantaram 13,134.057d@015_1296 tato devagaṇāḥ sarve indrasyārthe mahāmatim 13,134.057d@015_1297 prasādaṃ kārayām āsuḥ praṇāmastutivandanaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13725: 13,134.057d@015_1298 tena prītena suśroṇi gautamena mahātmanā 13,134.057d@015_1299 tac charīraṃ tu śakrasya sahasrabhagacihnitam 13,134.057d@015_1300 kṛtaṃ netrasahasreṇa kṣaṇenaiva nirantaram
GE07mbh_13_u:13727: 13,134.057d@015_1302 indrasya vṛṣaṇau bhūtvā kṣipraṃ vai śleṣam āgatau
GE07mbh_13_u:13728: 13,134.057d@015_1303 evaṃ vipreṣu kruddheṣu devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ 13,134.057d@015_1304 aśaktaḥ śāsituṃ rājyaṃ kiṃ punar mānuṣo bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:13729: 13,134.057d@015_1305 krodhāviṣṭo dahed vipraḥ śuṣkendhanam ivānalaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1306 bhasmīkṛtya jagat sarvaṃ sṛjed anyaj jagat punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13730: 13,134.057d@015_1307 adevān api devān sa kuryād devān adevatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13731: 13,134.057d@015_1308 tasmān notpādayen manyuṃ manyupraharaṇā dvijāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1309 mahatsv apy aparādheṣu śāsanaṃ nārhati dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13732: 13,134.057d@015_1310 na ca śastranipātāni na ca prāṇair viyojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:13733: 13,134.057d@015_1311 dṛśyate triṣu lokeṣu brāhmaṇānām anindite 13,134.057d@015_1312 krodhāś ca vipulā ghorāḥ prasādāś cāpy anuttamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13734: 13,134.057d@015_1313 tasmān notpādayet krodhaṃ nityaṃ pūjyā dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13735: 13,134.057d@015_1314 dṛśyate na sa loke 'smin bhūto vātha bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:13736: 13,134.057d@015_1315 kruddheṣu yo vai vipreṣu rājyaṃ bhuṅkte narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13737: 13,134.057d@015_1316 na caivopahased viprān na caivopālabhec ca tān
GE07mbh_13_u:13738: 13,134.057d@015_1317 kālam āsādya kupyec ca kāle kuryād anugraham
GE07mbh_13_u:13739: 13,134.057d@015_1318 saṃprahāsaś ca bhṛtyeṣu na kartavyo narādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13740: 13,134.057d@015_1319 laghutvaṃ caiva prāpnoti ājñā cāsya nivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:13742: 13,134.057d@015_1321 ayācyāni ca yācanti avaktavyaṃ bruvanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13743: 13,134.057d@015_1322 pūrvam apy ucitair lābhaiḥ paritoṣaṃ na yānti te 13,134.057d@015_1323 tasmād bhṛtyeṣu nṛpatiḥ saṃprahāsaṃ vivarjayet 13,134.057d@015_1324 na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste ca na viśvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:13744: 13,134.057d@015_1325 sagotreṣu viśeṣeṇa sarvopāyair na viśvaset 13,134.057d@015_1326 viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ hanyād vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13745: 13,134.057d@015_1327 pramādād dhanyate rājā lobhena ca vaśīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13746: 13,134.057d@015_1328 tasmāt pramādaṃ lobhaṃ ca na kuryān na ca viśvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:13748: 13,134.057d@015_1330 tasmāt kṛtyaviśeṣajño nityaṃ rāṣṭrahite rataḥ 13,134.057d@015_1331 satyasaṃdhaḥ sthito rājye prajāpālanatatparaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13749: 13,134.057d@015_1332 alubdho nyāyavādī ca ṣaḍbhāgaṃ copajīvati 13,134.057d@015_1333 kāryākāryaviśeṣajñaḥ sarvaṃ dharmeṇa paśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:13750: 13,134.057d@015_1334 svarāṣṭreṣu dayāṃ kuryād akāryaṃ na pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:13751: 13,134.057d@015_1335 ye caivainaṃ praśaṃsanti ye ca nindanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13752: 13,134.057d@015_1336 śatruṃ ca mitravat paśyed aparādhavivarjitam 13,134.057d@015_1337 aparādhānurūpeṇa duṣṭaṃ daṇḍena śāsayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13753: 13,134.057d@015_1338 dharmaḥ pravartate tatra yatra daṇḍarucir nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13754: 13,134.057d@015_1339 nādharmo vidyate tatra yatra rājā kṣamānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13756: 13,134.057d@015_1341 vadhyāṃś ca ghātayed yas tu avadhyān parirakṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:13757: 13,134.057d@015_1342 avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvo dūtaś caiva pitā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:13758: 13,134.057d@015_1343 vidyāṃ grāhayate yaś ca ye ca pūrvopakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13759: 13,134.057d@015_1344 striyaś caiva na hantavyā yaś ca sarvātithir naraḥ 13,134.057d@015_1345 dharaṇīṃ gāṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca siddhānnaṃ ca tilān ghṛtam 13,134.057d@015_1346 dadan nityaṃ dvijātibhyo mucyate rājakilbiṣāt 13,134.057d@015_1347 evaṃ carati yo nityaṃ rājā rāṣṭrahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13760: 13,134.057d@015_1348 tasya rāṣṭraṃ dhanaṃ dharmo yaśaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhate 13,134.057d@015_1349 na ca pāpair na cānarthair yujyate sa narādhipaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1350 ṣaḍbhāgam upayuñjan yaḥ prajā rājā na rakṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:13761: 13,134.057d@015_1351 svacakraparacakrābhyāṃ dhanair vā vikrameṇa vā 13,134.057d@015_1352 nirudyogo nṛpo yaś ca pararāṣṭranighātane 13,134.057d@015_1353 svarāṣṭraṃ niṣpratāpasya paracakreṇa hanyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13763: 13,134.057d@015_1355 tat pāpaṃ sakalaṃ rājā hatarāṣṭraḥ prapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13764: 13,134.057d@015_1356 mātulaṃ bhāgineyaṃ vā mātaraṃ śvaśuraṃ gurum
GE07mbh_13_u:13765: 13,134.057d@015_1357 pitaraṃ varjayitvaikaṃ hanyād ghātakam āgatam 13,134.057d@015_1358 svasya rāṣṭrasya rakṣārthaṃ yudhyamānas tu yo hataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13766: 13,134.057d@015_1359 saṃgrāme paracakreṇa śrūyatāṃ tasya yā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13768: 13,134.057d@015_1361 śakralokam ito yāti saṃgrāme nihato nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13769: 13,134.057d@015_1362 yāvanto lomakūpāḥ syus tasya gātreṣu sundari
GE07mbh_13_u:13771: 13,134.057d@015_1364 yadi vai mānuṣe loke kadā cid upapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13772: 13,134.057d@015_1365 rājā vā rājamātro vā bhūyo bhavati vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:13774: 13,134.057d@015_1367 vyavahāraś ca cāraś ca satataṃ satyasaṃdhatā
GE07mbh_13_u:13776: 13,134.057d@015_1369 bharaṇaṃ caiva bhṛtyānāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca poṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:13777: 13,134.057d@015_1370 yodhānāṃ caiva satkāraḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā
GE07mbh_13_u:13779: 13,134.057d@015_1371 śreya eva narendrāṇām iha caiva paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13781: 13,134.057d@015_1373 yūpe nibaddhā mantraiś ca yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:13782: 13,134.057d@015_1374 mantrāhutivipūtās te svargaṃ yānti yaśasvini 13,134.057d@015_1375 tarpitā yajñabhāgeṣu teṣāṃ māṃsair varānane 13,134.057d@015_1376 agnayas tridaśāś caiva lokapālāḥ saheśvarāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1377 teṣu tuṣṭeṣu jāyeta tasya yajñasya yat phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:13783: 13,134.057d@015_1378 tena saṃyujyate devi yajamāno na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13784: 13,134.057d@015_1379 sapatnīkaḥ saputraḥ sa sa pitṛbhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:13785: 13,134.057d@015_1380 ye tatra dīkṣitā devi sarve svargaṃ prayānti te 13,134.057d@015_1381
GE07mbh_13_u:13786: 13,134.057d@015_1381 etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi 13,134.057d@015_1382 bhagavan sarvabhūteśa śūlapāṇe mahādyute
GE07mbh_13_u:13787: 13,134.057d@015_1383 śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ sarveṣāṃ gṛhamedhinām
GE07mbh_13_u:13788: 13,134.057d@015_1384 kīdṛśaṃ caritaṃ teṣāṃ trivargasahitaṃ prabho 13,134.057d@015_1385 pratyāyatiḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ jīvanārtham udāhṛtam 13,134.057d@015_1386 vartamānāḥ kathaṃ sarve prāpnuvanty uttamāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:13790: 13,134.057d@015_1387 etat sarvaṃ samāsena vaktum arhasi mānada
GE07mbh_13_u:13791: 13,134.057d@015_1388 nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāmini 13,134.057d@015_1389 prāyaśo lokasadvṛttam iṣyate gṛhavāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:13792: 13,134.057d@015_1390 teṣāṃ saṃrakṣaṇārthāya rājānaḥ saṃsmṛtā bhuvi 13,134.057d@015_1391 sarveṣām atha martyānāṃ vṛttiṃ sāmānyataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:13793: 13,134.057d@015_1392 vidyā vārttā ca sevā ca kārutvaṃ nāṭyatā tathā 13,134.057d@015_1393 ity ete jīvanārthāya martyānāṃ vihitāḥ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:13794: 13,134.057d@015_1394 api janmaphalaṃ tāvan mānuṣāṇāṃ viśeṣataḥ 13,134.057d@015_1395 vihitaṃ tat svavṛttena tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:13795: 13,134.057d@015_1396 karmakṣetraṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ bhogaduḥkhayutāḥ pare 13,134.057d@015_1397 sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ tasmān mānuṣye vṛttam iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13796: 13,134.057d@015_1398 vidyāyogas tu sarveṣāṃ pūrvam eva vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13797: 13,134.057d@015_1399 kāryākāryaṃ vijānāti vidyayā devi nānyathā 13,134.057d@015_1400 vidyayā sphīyate jñānaṃ jñānāt tattvavidarśanam 13,134.057d@015_1401 dṛṣṭatattvo vinītātmā sarvārthasya ca bhājanam 13,134.057d@015_1402 śakyaṃ vidyāvinītena loke saṃjīvanaṃ sukham 13,134.057d@015_1403 ātmānaṃ vidyayā tasmāt pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tu bhājanam
GE07mbh_13_u:13798: 13,134.057d@015_1404 vaśyendriyo jitakrodho bhūtvātmānaṃ tu bhāvayet 13,134.057d@015_1405 bhāvayitvā tathātmānaṃ pūjanīyaḥ satām api 13,134.057d@015_1406 kulānuvṛttaṃ vṛttaṃ vā pūrvam eva samāśrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13800: 13,134.057d@015_1408 yadi ced vidyayā caiva vṛttiṃ kāṅkṣed athātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13801: 13,134.057d@015_1409 rājavidyāṃ tu vāde 'pi lokavidyām athāpi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:13802: 13,134.057d@015_1410 tīrthataś cāpi gṛhṇīyāc chuśrūṣādiguṇair yutaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1411 granthataś cārthataś caiva dṛḍhīkuryāt prayatnataḥ 13,134.057d@015_1412 evaṃ vidyāphalaṃ devi prāpnuyān nānyathā naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13803: 13,134.057d@015_1413 nyāyād vidyāphalaṃ cecched adharmaṃ tatra varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13804: 13,134.057d@015_1414 yadi ced vārttayā vṛttiṃ kāṅkṣeta vidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:13805: 13,134.057d@015_1415 kṣetre jalopapanne ca tad yogyāṃ kṛṣim ācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:13806: 13,134.057d@015_1416 vāṇijyaṃ vā yathākālaṃ kuryāt taddeśayogataḥ 13,134.057d@015_1417 mūlyam arthaṃ prayāsaṃ ca vicāryaiva phalodayau
GE07mbh_13_u:13807: 13,134.057d@015_1418 paśusaṃjīvakaś caiva deśe gāḥ poṣayed dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:13808: 13,134.057d@015_1419 bahuprakārā bahavaḥ paśavas tasya sādhakāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1420 yaḥ kaś cit sevayā vṛttiṃ kāṅkṣeta matimān naraḥ 13,134.057d@015_1421 yatātmā śravaṇīyānāṃ bhaved vai saṃprayojakaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1422 buddhyā vā karmayogād vā yodhanād vā samāśrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13809: 13,134.057d@015_1423 mārgatas tu samāśritya tadā tatsaṃpriyo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:13810: 13,134.057d@015_1424 yathā yathā sa tuṣyeta tathā saṃtoṣayeta tam
GE07mbh_13_u:13812: 13,134.057d@015_1426 vipriyaṃ nācaret tasya eṣā sevā samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13813: 13,134.057d@015_1427 viprayogāt purā tena gatim anyāṃ na lakṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13814: 13,134.057d@015_1428 kārukarma ca nāṭyaṃ ca prāyaśo nīcayoniṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:13815: 13,134.057d@015_1429 tayor api yathāyogaṃ nyāyataḥ karmavetanam 13,134.057d@015_1430 ājīvebhyo 'pi sarvebhyaś cārjavād vetanaṃ haret
GE07mbh_13_u:13816: 13,134.057d@015_1431 anārjavād āharatas tat tu pāpāya kalpate
GE07mbh_13_u:13817: 13,134.057d@015_1432 sarveṣāṃ pūrvam ārambhāṃś cintayen nayapūrvakam 13,134.057d@015_1433 ātmaśaktim upāyāṃś ca deśakālau ca śaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13818: 13,134.057d@015_1434 kāraṇāni pravāsaṃ ca prakṣepaṃ ca phalodayam

GE07mbh_13_u:13822: 13,134.057d@015_1438 daivamānuṣavighnebhyo na punar bhraśyate yathā 13,134.057d@015_1439 pālayan vardhayan bhuñjaṃs tāṃ prāpya na vināśayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13823: 13,134.057d@015_1440 kṣīyate girisaṃkāśam aśnato hy anapekṣayā 13,134.057d@015_1441 ājīvebhyo dhanaṃ prāpya caturdhā vibhajed budhaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:13828: 13,134.057d@015_1446 kulārthaṃ saṃnivāsārthaṃ kriyānityaiś ca dhārmikaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_1447 evamādiṣu cānyeṣu dharmārthaṃ saṃtyajed dhanam 13,134.057d@015_1448 dharmakārye dhanaṃ dadyād anavekṣya phalodayam 13,134.057d@015_1449 aiśvaryasthānalābhārthaṃ rājavāllabhyakāraṇāt 13,134.057d@015_1450 vārttāyāṃ ca samārambhe bhṛtyamitraparigrahe
GE07mbh_13_u:13829: 13,134.057d@015_1451 āvāhe ca vivāhe ca putrāṇāṃ vṛttikāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13831: 13,134.057d@015_1453 evamādiṣu cānyeṣu arthārthaṃ vibhajed dhanam 13,134.057d@015_1454 anubandhaṃ phalaṃ hetuṃ dṛṣṭvā vittaṃ parityajet
GE07mbh_13_u:13832: 13,134.057d@015_1455 anarthaṃ bādhate hy artho arthaṃ caiva phalāny uta 13,134.057d@015_1456 nādhanāḥ prāpnuvanty arthān narā yatnaśatair api
GE07mbh_13_u:13833: 13,134.057d@015_1457 tasmād dhanaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ dātavyaṃ ca vidhānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13835: 13,134.057d@015_1459 naṭagāndharvasaṃyoge kāmayātrāvihārayoḥ 13,134.057d@015_1460 manaḥpriyāṇāṃ saṃyoge prītidāne tathaiva ca 13,134.057d@015_1461 evamādiṣu cānyeṣu kāmārthaṃ visṛjed dhanam 13,134.057d@015_1462 vicārya guṇadoṣau tu mātrayā tatra saṃtyajet
GE07mbh_13_u:13836: 13,134.057d@015_1463 caturthaṃ saṃnidadhyāc ca āpadarthaṃ śucismite 13,134.057d@015_1464 rājyabhraṃśavināśārthaṃ durbhikṣārthaṃ ca śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:13838: 13,134.057d@015_1466 śatrūṇāṃ pratikārāya sāhasaiś cāpy amarṣaṇāt 13,134.057d@015_1467 prasthāne cānyadeśārtham āpadāṃ vipramokṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:13839: 13,134.057d@015_1468 evamādi samuddiśya saṃnidadhyāt svakaṃ dhanam 13,134.057d@015_1469 sukham arthavatāṃ loke kṛcchrāṇāṃ vipramokṣaṇam 13,134.057d@015_1470 yasya nāsti dhanaṃ kiṃ cit tasya lokadvayaṃ na ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13840: 13,134.057d@015_1471 aśanād indriyāṇīva sarvam arthāt pravartate 13,134.057d@015_1472 nidhānaṃ mātrayā kuryād anyathā vilayaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:13841: 13,134.057d@015_1473 evaṃ devi manuṣyāṇāṃ loke tv ājīvanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:13842: 13,134.057d@015_1474 evaṃ yuktasya lokasya laukyaṃ vṛttaṃ punaḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:13843: 13,134.057d@015_1475 dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargīyaṃ paramaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13844: 13,134.057d@015_1476 trivarge ca yathā yuktaṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃvidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13845: 13,134.057d@015_1477 tathā saṃvartamānās tu lokayor hitam āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13846: 13,134.057d@015_1478 kālyotthānaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca devabrāhmaṇabhaktatā 13,134.057d@015_1479 gurūṇām eva śuśrūṣā brāhmaṇeṣv abhivādanam 13,134.057d@015_1480 pratyutthānaṃ ca vṛddhānāṃ devasthānapraṇāmanam
GE07mbh_13_u:13847: 13,134.057d@015_1481 ābhimukhyaṃ puraskṛtya atithīnāṃ ca bhojanam 13,134.057d@015_1482 vṛddhopadeśakaraṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ hitapathyayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13850: 13,134.057d@015_1485 samyag vṛttaṃ svadāreṣu doṣāṇāṃ pratiṣedhanam 13,134.057d@015_1486 putrāṇāṃ vinayaṃ kuryāt tattatkārye niyojayet 13,134.057d@015_1487 varjanaṃ cāśubhārthānāṃ śubhānāṃ joṣaṇaṃ tathā 13,134.057d@015_1488 kulocitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathāvat paripālanam
GE07mbh_13_u:13851: 13,134.057d@015_1489 varjanaṃ kalahādīnāṃ bhaktyā saṃśamanaṃ tathā 13,134.057d@015_1490 satāṃ vyasanasaṃyoge svaśaktyābhyavapattitā
GE07mbh_13_u:13855: 13,134.057d@015_1494 evamādi śubhaṃ sarvaṃ tasya vṛttam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:13856: 13,134.057d@015_1495 vṛddhasevī bhaven nityaṃ hitārthaṃ jñānakāṅkṣayā 13,134.057d@015_1496 parārthaṃ nāhared dravyam anāmantrya tu sarvadā
GE07mbh_13_u:13857: 13,134.057d@015_1497 na yāceta parān dhīraḥ svabāhubalam āśrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13858: 13,134.057d@015_1498 svaśarīraṃ sadā rakṣed āhārācārayor api 13,134.057d@015_1499 hitaṃ pathyaṃ sadāhāraṃ jīrṇaṃ bhuñjīta mātrayā
GE07mbh_13_u:13860: 13,134.057d@015_1501 śeṣaṃ bhuñjec chucir bhūtvā na ca bhāṣeta vipriyam 13,134.057d@015_1502 pratiśrayaṃ ca pānīyaṃ baliṃ bhikṣāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13861: 13,134.057d@015_1503 gṛhasthaḥ pravahed dadyād gāś ca vatsāṃś ca poṣayet 13,134.057d@015_1504 bahir niṣkramaṇaṃ caiva kuryāt kāraṇato divā
GE07mbh_13_u:13862: 13,134.057d@015_1505 madhyāhne vārdharātre vā gamanaṃ naiva rocayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13863: 13,134.057d@015_1506 viṣamān nāvagāheta svaśaktyā samam ācaret 13,134.057d@015_1507 yathāyavyayatā loke gṛhasthānāṃ prapūjitā
GE07mbh_13_u:13864: 13,134.057d@015_1508 ayaśaskaram arthaghnaṃ karma yat parapīḍanam 13,134.057d@015_1509 bhayād vā yadi vā lobhān na kurvīta kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:13866: 13,134.057d@015_1511 ārabheta tadā karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
GE07mbh_13_u:13867: 13,134.057d@015_1512 ātmā sākṣī bhaven nityam ātmanas tu śubhāśubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:13869: 13,134.057d@015_1513 manasā karmaṇā vācā na ca kāṅkṣeta pātakam
GE07mbh_13_u:13871: 13,134.057d@015_1515 ime tu varṇāś catvāro vihitāḥ svit svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13872: 13,134.057d@015_1516 utāho kriyayā varṇāḥ saṃbhavanti maheśvara 13,134.057d@015_1517 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13873: 13,134.057d@015_1517 eṣa me saṃśayapraśnas taṃ me chettuṃ tvam arhasi 13,134.057d@015_1518 svabhāvād eva vidyante catvāro brāhmaṇādayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1519 ekajātyāḥ suduṣprāpam anyavarṇatvam āgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:13874: 13,134.057d@015_1520 tac ca karma viśeṣeṇa punarjanmani jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13875: 13,134.057d@015_1521 tasmāt te saṃpravakṣyāmi tat sarvaṃ karma pākataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13876: 13,134.057d@015_1522 brāhmaṇas tu naro bhūtvā svajātim anupālayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13879: 13,134.057d@015_1525 tasyāṃ jātyāṃ samudito jātidharmān na hāpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13880: 13,134.057d@015_1526 evaṃ saṃvartamānas tu kāladharmaṃ gataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13882: 13,134.057d@015_1528 tatkṣaye brāhmaṇo bhūtvā tathaiva nṛṣu jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13883: 13,134.057d@015_1529 evaṃ svakarmaṇā martyaḥ svajātiṃ labhate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13884: 13,134.057d@015_1530 aparas tu tathā kaś cid brahmayonisamudbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13886: 13,134.057d@015_1532 anyathā vartamānas tu jātikarmāṇi varjayet 13,134.057d@015_1533 śūdravad vicarel loke śūdrakarmābhilāṣayā
GE07mbh_13_u:13887: 13,134.057d@015_1534 śūdraiḥ saha caran nityaṃ śaucamaṅgalavarjitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1535 sa cāpi kāladharmastho yamalokeṣu daṇḍitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1536 yadi jāyeta martyeṣu śūdra evābhijāyate 13,134.057d@015_1537 śūdra eva bhaved devi brāhmaṇo 'pi svakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:13888: 13,134.057d@015_1538 tathaiva śūdras tv aparaḥ śūdrakarmāṇi varjayan
GE07mbh_13_u:13891: 13,134.057d@015_1541 evaṃyuktasamācāraḥ śūdro 'pi maraṇaṃ gataḥ 13,134.057d@015_1542 svargaloke 'bhijāyeta tatkṣaye nṛṣu jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13893: 13,134.057d@015_1544 evam eva sadā loke śūdro brāhmaṇyam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:13894: 13,134.057d@015_1545 evaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyāś ca jātidharmeṇa saṃyutāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1546 svakarmaṇaiva jāyante viśiṣṭeṣv adhameṣu ca 13,134.057d@015_1547 evaṃ jātiviparyāsaḥ pretyabhāve bhaven nṛṇām 13,134.057d@015_1548 anyathā tu na śakyante lokasaṃsthitikāraṇāt 13,134.057d@015_1549 tasmāj jātiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ tu kathaṃ cit prāpya paṇḍitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1550 sarvathā tāṃ tato rakṣen na punar bhraśyate yathā 13,134.057d@015_1551 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:13895: 13,134.057d@015_1551 iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi 13,134.057d@015_1552 janmaprabhṛti kaiḥ śuddho labhej janmaphalaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13898: 13,134.057d@015_1554 karma kurvan na lipyeta ārjavena samācaran
GE07mbh_13_u:13899: 13,134.057d@015_1555 ātmaiva tac chubhaṃ kuryād aśubhe naiva yojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:13900: 13,134.057d@015_1556 śaṭheṣu śaṭhavat kuryād āryeṣv ṛjuvad ācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:13901: 13,134.057d@015_1557 āpatsu nāvasīdec ca ghorān saṃkrāmayet parān
GE07mbh_13_u:13902: 13,134.057d@015_1558 sāmnaiva sarvakāryāṇi kartuṃ pūrvaṃ samārabhet 13,134.057d@015_1559 anarthādharmaśokāṃs tu yathā na prāpnuyāt svayam
GE07mbh_13_u:13903: 13,134.057d@015_1560 prayateta tathā kartum etad vṛttaṃ samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13904: 13,134.057d@015_1561 etad vṛttaṃ samāsādya gṛham āśritya mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13905: 13,134.057d@015_1562 nirābādhā nirudvegāḥ prāpnuvanty uttamāṃ gatim 13,134.057d@015_1563 etaj janmaphalaṃ nityaṃ sarveṣāṃ gṛhavāsinām 13,134.057d@015_1564 evaṃ gṛhagatair nityaṃ vartitavyam iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13906: 13,134.057d@015_1565 etat sarvaṃ mayā proktaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi 13,134.057d@015_1565
GE07mbh_13_u:13908: 13,134.057d@015_1567 mānuṣeṣv eva ye ke cid āḍhyāḥ kleśavivarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13909: 13,134.057d@015_1568 bhuñjānā vividhān bhogān dṛśyante nirupadravāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1569 apare kleśasaṃyuktā daridrā bhogavarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13910: 13,134.057d@015_1570 kimarthaṃ mānuṣe loke na samatvena kalpitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13912: 13,134.057d@015_1571 etac chrotuṃ mahādeva kautūhalam atīva me
GE07mbh_13_u:13913: 13,134.057d@015_1572 nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāmini 13,134.057d@015_1573 śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13914: 13,134.057d@015_1574 ādisarge purā brahmā samatvenāsṛjat prajāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1575 nityaṃ na bhavato hy asya rāgadveṣau prajāpateḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13915: 13,134.057d@015_1576 tadā tasmāt samāḥ sarve babhūvuḥ sarvato narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13916: 13,134.057d@015_1577 evaṃ saṃvartamāne tu yuge kālaviparyayāt 13,134.057d@015_1578 ke cit prapedire tatra viṣamaṃ buddhimohitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13917: 13,134.057d@015_1579 teṣāṃ hāniṃ tato dṛṣṭvā tulyānām eva bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:13919: 13,134.057d@015_1581 kartuṃ nārhasi deveśa pakṣapātaṃ tvam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:13920: 13,134.057d@015_1582 putrabhāve same deva kimarthaṃ no bhavet kaliḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13921: 13,134.057d@015_1583 ity evaṃ tair upālabdho brahmā vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:13922: 13,134.057d@015_1584 yūyaṃ mā kārṣṭa me roṣaṃ svakṛtaṃ smarata prajāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1585 yuṣmābhir eva yuṣmākaṃ grathitaṃ hi śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:13923: 13,134.057d@015_1586 yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:13924: 13,134.057d@015_1587 svakṛtasya phalaṃ bhuṅkte nānyas tad bhoktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:13925: 13,134.057d@015_1588 evaṃ saṃbodhitās tena lokakartrā svayaṃbhuvā 13,134.057d@015_1589 punar nivṛtya karmāṇi śubhāny eva prapedire
GE07mbh_13_u:13927: 13,134.057d@015_1591 śubhāni vidhivat kṛtvā kāladharmagatāḥ punaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1592 tāni dānaphalāny eva bhuñjate sukhabhoginaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1593 svakṛtaṃ tu naras tasmāt svayam eva prapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:13928: 13,134.057d@015_1594 apare dharmakāryebhyo nivṛttās tu śubhekṣaṇe 13,134.057d@015_1595 kadaryā niranukrośāḥ prāyeṇātmaparāyaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13929: 13,134.057d@015_1596 tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhane 13,134.057d@015_1597 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:13930: 13,134.057d@015_1597 daridrāḥ kleśasaṃyuktā bhavanty eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13931: 13,134.057d@015_1598 mānuṣeṣv eva ye ke cid dhanadhānyasamanvitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13933: 13,134.057d@015_1600 na bhuñjate kimarthaṃ te tan me śaṃsitum arhasi 13,134.057d@015_1601 paraiḥ saṃcoditā dharmaṃ kurvate na svakāmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13934: 13,134.057d@015_1602 svayaṃ śraddhāṃ bahiṣkṛtya kurvanti ca rudanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13935: 13,134.057d@015_1603 tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhane 13,134.057d@015_1604 phalāni tāni saṃprāpya bhuñjate na kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:13937: 13,134.057d@015_1605 rakṣanto vardhayantaś ca āsate nidhipālavat 13,134.057d@015_1606 ke cid dhanaviyuktāś ca bhogayuktā maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:13939: 13,134.057d@015_1607 mānuṣāḥ saṃpradṛśyante tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:13940: 13,134.057d@015_1608 ānṛśaṃsyaparā ye tu dharmakāmāś ca durgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13942: 13,134.057d@015_1610 pratidadyuḥ paradhanaṃ naṣṭaṃ vānyair hṛtaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:13943: 13,134.057d@015_1611 nityaṃ ye dātumanaso narā vitteṣv asatsv api
GE07mbh_13_u:13944: 13,134.057d@015_1612 kāladharmavaśaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani te narāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1613 ete dhanaviyuktāś ca bhogayuktā bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:13945: 13,134.057d@015_1614 dharmadānopadeśaṃ vā kartavyam iti niścayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1615 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:13946: 13,134.057d@015_1615 iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi 13,134.057d@015_1616 bhagavan devadeveśa triyakṣa vṛṣabhadhvaja
GE07mbh_13_u:13947: 13,134.057d@015_1617 mānuṣās trividhā deva dṛśyante satataṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:13949: 13,134.057d@015_1619 apare yatnapūrvaṃ tu labhante bhogasaṃgraham 13,134.057d@015_1620 apare yatamānās tu labhante na tu kiṃ cana 13,134.057d@015_1621 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13950: 13,134.057d@015_1621 kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:13951: 13,134.057d@015_1622 nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāmini 13,134.057d@015_1623 ye loke mānuṣā devi dānadharmaparāyaṇāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1624 pātrāṇi vidhivaj jñātvā dūrato hy anumānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13952: 13,134.057d@015_1625 abhigamya svayaṃ tatra grāhayanti prasādya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:13953: 13,134.057d@015_1626 dānāni ceṅgitair eva tair avijñātam eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:13954: 13,134.057d@015_1627 punarjanmani deveśi tādṛśāḥ śobhanā narāḥ 13,134.057d@015_1628 ayatnatas tu tāny eva phalāni prāpnuvanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:13955: 13,134.057d@015_1629 āsīnā eva bhuñjante bhogān sukṛtabhoginaḥ 13,134.057d@015_1630 apare ye ca dānāni dadaty eva prayācitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13956: 13,134.057d@015_1631 yathā yathā te dīnatvāt punar dāsyanti yācitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:13957: 13,134.057d@015_1632 tāvat kālaṃ tathā devi punarjanmani te narāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:14616: 13,134.057d@015_2431 uparīva ca martyānāṃ devavat saṃprakāśate 13,134.057d@015_2432 kāmaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ darpam ajñānaṃ caiva buddhijam
GE07mbh_13_u:14617: 13,134.057d@015_2433 tac chrutaṃ nudati kṣipraṃ yathā vāyur balāhakān
GE07mbh_13_u:14618: 13,134.057d@015_2434 alpamātraṃ kṛto dharmo bhavej jñānavatāṃ mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:14619: 13,134.057d@015_2435 mahān api kṛto dharmo hy ajñānān niṣphalo bhavet 13,134.057d@015_2436 parāvarajño bhūtānāṃ jñānavāṃs tattvavid bhavet 13,134.057d@015_2437 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:14620: 13,134.057d@015_2437 evaṃ śrutaphalaṃ sarvaṃ kathitaṃ te śubhekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:14621: 13,134.057d@015_2438 bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cij jātismaraṇasaṃyutāḥ 13,134.057d@015_2439 kimarthaṃ te 'bhijāyante jānantaḥ paurvadehikam 13,134.057d@015_2440 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14622: 13,134.057d@015_2440 etan me tattvato deva mānuṣeṣu vadasva bhoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14623: 13,134.057d@015_2441 tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:14624: 13,134.057d@015_2442 ye mṛtāḥ sahasā martyā jāyante sahasā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14625: 13,134.057d@015_2443 teṣāṃ paurāṇiko 'bhyāsaḥ kaṃ cit kālaṃ sa tiṣṭhati 13,134.057d@015_2444 tasmāj jātismarā loke jāyante bodhasaṃyutāḥ 13,134.057d@015_2445 teṣāṃ vivardhatāṃ saṃjñā svapnavat sā praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:14627: 13,134.057d@015_2446 paralokasya cāstitve mūḍhānāṃ kāraṇaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:14628: 13,134.057d@015_2447 bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cin mṛtā bhūtvā hi saṃprati 13,134.057d@015_2448 nivartamānā dṛśyante deheṣv eva punar narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14630: 13,134.057d@015_2449 tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:14631: 13,134.057d@015_2450 prāṇair viyojyamānānāṃ bahutvāt prāṇināṃ kṣaye 13,134.057d@015_2451 tathaiva nāmasāmānyād yamadūtā nṛṇāṃ bhuvi 13,134.057d@015_2452 vahanti te kva cin mohād anyāṃs ta iti yāmikāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14632: 13,134.057d@015_2453 nirvikāraṃ hi tat sarvaṃ yamo veda kṛtākṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:14633: 13,134.057d@015_2454 tasmāt saṃyaminīṃ prāpya yamenaite vimokṣitāḥ 13,134.057d@015_2455 punar eva nivartante śeṣaṃ bhoktuṃ svakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14635: 13,134.057d@015_2456 svakarmaṇy asamāpte tu na mriyante hi mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14638: 13,134.057d@015_2458 kiṃ tat svabhāvam anyad vā tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:14639: 13,134.057d@015_2459 suptānāṃ tu punaś ceṣṭā svapna ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:14640: 13,134.057d@015_2460 anāgatam atikrāntaṃ paśyate saṃcaran manaḥ 13,134.057d@015_2461 nimittaṃ ca bhavet tasmāt prāṇināṃ svapnadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:14642: 13,134.057d@015_2462 evaṃ te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi 13,134.057d@015_2463 bhagavan sarvabhūteśa loke karmakriyāpathe
GE07mbh_13_u:14643: 13,134.057d@015_2464 daivāt pravartate sarvam iti ke cid vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14644: 13,134.057d@015_2465 apare ceṣṭayā ceti dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣataḥ kriyām
GE07mbh_13_u:14645: 13,134.057d@015_2466 pakṣabhede dvidhā cāsmin saṃśayasthaṃ mano mama
GE07mbh_13_u:14646: 13,134.057d@015_2467 tattvaṃ vada mahādeva śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:14648: 13,134.057d@015_2468 tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitā 13,134.057d@015_2469 na daivaṃ kurute karma loke devi śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:14649: 13,134.057d@015_2470 lakṣyate dvividhaṃ karma mānuṣāṇāṃ śubhānane 13,134.057d@015_2471 purākṛtaṃ tayor ekam aihikaṃ ca paraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:14650: 13,134.057d@015_2472 adṛṣṭaṃ paurvikaṃ karma tad daivam iti lakṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:14651: 13,134.057d@015_2473 aihikaṃ dṛṣṭakaraṇaṃ tan mānuṣam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:14652: 13,134.057d@015_2474 mānuṣaṃ ca kriyāmātraṃ daivāt saṃbhavate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:14653: 13,134.057d@015_2475 evaṃ tad ubhayaṃ sarvaṃ mānuṣaṃ vidyate nṛṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:14655: 13,134.057d@015_2477 kṛṣau tu dṛśyate karma karṣaṇaṃ vapanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:14656: 13,134.057d@015_2478 ropaṇaṃ caiva lavanaṃ yac cānyat pauruṣaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:14657: 13,134.057d@015_2479 kāle vṛṣṭiḥ suvāpaś ca prarohaḥ paktir eva ca 13,134.057d@015_2480 evamādi tu yac cānyat tad daivatam iti smṛtam 13,134.057d@015_2481 pravāpaḥ pauruṣaṃ karma siddhir daivam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:14658: 13,134.057d@015_2482 daivād asiddhiś ca bhaved duṣkṛtaṃ cāsti pauruṣe
GE07mbh_13_u:14659: 13,134.057d@015_2483 suyatnāl labhate kīrtiṃ duryatnād ayaśas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:14661: 13,134.057d@015_2484 evaṃ lokagatir devi ādiprabhṛti vartate 13,134.057d@015_2485 bhagavan sarvabhūteśa surāsuranamaskṛta
GE07mbh_13_u:14662: 13,134.057d@015_2486 katham ātmā sadā garbhaṃ saṃviśet karmakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:14664: 13,134.057d@015_2487 tan me vada mahādeva tad dhi guhyaṃ paraṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:14665: 13,134.057d@015_2488 śṛṇu bhāmini tad guhyaṃ guhyānāṃ paramaṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:14666: 13,134.057d@015_2489 devaguhyād api param ātmaguhyam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:14667: 13,134.057d@015_2490 devāsurās tan na vidur ātmano hi gatāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:14668: 13,134.057d@015_2491 adṛśyo hi sa devānāṃ śaighryāt saukṣmyān nirāśrayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:14671: 13,134.057d@015_2494 maithunaṃ śoṇitaṃ bījaṃ daivaṃ cāpy atra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:14673: 13,134.057d@015_2496 tadātmā viśate garbham evam aṇḍajarāyuje 13,134.057d@015_2497 śītoṣṇayos tu saṃyoge kledajeṣv avatiṣṭhati 13,134.057d@015_2498 bījabhūmijalānāṃ tu yogād udbhedajeṣu ca 13,134.057d@015_2499 evaṃ saṃyogakāle tu ātmā garbhatvam eyivān
GE07mbh_13_u:14674: 13,134.057d@015_2500 kalalāj jāyate piṇḍaṃ piṇḍāt peśyarbudaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:14675: 13,134.057d@015_2501 vyaktibhāvaṃ gate caiva karma tv āśrayate kramāt
GE07mbh_13_u:14676: 13,134.057d@015_2502 evaṃ strīpuruṣasaṃyogaṃ pauruṣaṃ viddhi bhāmini 13,134.057d@015_2503 apatyalābho yac cānyat tad daivam iti saṃsmṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:14677: 13,134.057d@015_2504 evaṃ vivardhamānena karmātmā saha vartate 13,134.057d@015_2505 evam ātmagatiṃ viddhi yan māṃ pṛcchasi suvrate
GE07mbh_13_u:14678: 13,134.057d@015_2506 pañcabhūtasthitiś caiva jyotiṣām ayanaṃ tathā 13,134.057d@015_2507 abuddhigamyaṃ yan martyair hetubhir vā na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:14679: 13,134.057d@015_2508 tādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ daivaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
GE07mbh_13_u:14680: 13,134.057d@015_2509 yādṛśaṃ cātmanā śakyaṃ tat pauruṣam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:14681: 13,134.057d@015_2510 kevalaṃ phalaniṣpattir ekena na tu śakyate
GE07mbh_13_u:14682: 13,134.057d@015_2511 pauruṣeṇa ca daivena yugapad grathitaṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:14683: 13,134.057d@015_2512 tayoḥ samāhitaṃ karma śītoṣṇaṃ yugapat tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:14684: 13,134.057d@015_2513 pauruṣaṃ tu tayoḥ pūrvam ārabdhavyaṃ vijānatā
GE07mbh_13_u:14685: 13,134.057d@015_2514 ātmanā naiva śakyaṃ hi na tathā kīrtim āpnuyāt 13,134.057d@015_2515 khananān mathanāl loke jalāgniprāpaṇaṃ yathā 13,134.057d@015_2516 tathā puruṣakāre tu daivasaṃpat samāhitā 13,134.057d@015_2517 narasyākurvataḥ karma daivasaṃpan na labhyate 13,134.057d@015_2518 tasmāt sarvasamārambho daivamānuṣanirmitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14686: 13,134.057d@015_2519 asurā rākṣasāś caiva manyante lokanāyakāḥ 13,134.057d@015_2520 na paśyante ca te pāpāḥ kevalaṃ māṃsabhakṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14687: 13,134.057d@015_2521 pracchāditaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ guhyakāmā hi devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14688: 13,134.057d@015_2522 tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi devaguhyaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:14689: 13,134.057d@015_2523 ādikāle prajāḥ sarvāḥ kṛtvā karma śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:14690: 13,134.057d@015_2524 bhuñjate paśyamānās te vṛttāntaṃ lokayor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14693: 13,134.057d@015_2527 evaṃ vyavasthite loke sarve dharmaparābhavan 13,134.057d@015_2528 acireṇaiva kālena svargaḥ saṃpūritas tadā 13,134.057d@015_2529 devānām api saṃbādhaṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmāpy acintayat
GE07mbh_13_u:14694: 13,134.057d@015_2530 saṃcarante kathaṃ devā mānuṣāḥ praviśanti hi
GE07mbh_13_u:14695: 13,134.057d@015_2531 ity evam anucintyaiṣa mānuṣān samamohayat 13,134.057d@015_2532 tadāprabhṛti te martyā na vidus te purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:14696: 13,134.057d@015_2533 kāmakrodhau ca tatkāle mānuṣeṣu nyapātayat 13,134.057d@015_2534 tābhyām abhihatā martyāḥ svargalokaṃ na lebhire
GE07mbh_13_u:14697: 13,134.057d@015_2535 purākṛtasyāvijñānāt kāmakrodhābhipīḍanāt 13,134.057d@015_2536 naitad astīti manvānā vikārāṃś cakrire punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14700: 13,134.057d@015_2539 evaṃ vyavasthite loke kaśmalaṃ samapadyata 13,134.057d@015_2540 lokānāṃ caiva vedānāṃ kṣayāyaiva tadā priye
GE07mbh_13_u:14701: 13,134.057d@015_2541 narakāḥ pūritāś cāsan prāṇibhiḥ pāpakāribhiḥ 13,134.057d@015_2542 punar eva tu tad dṛṣṭvā lokakartā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14702: 13,134.057d@015_2543 acintayat tam evārthaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāraṇāt 13,134.057d@015_2544 samatvena kathaṃ loko varteteti muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14703: 13,134.057d@015_2545 cintayitvā tadā brahmā jñānena tapasā priye
GE07mbh_13_u:14705: 13,134.057d@015_2546 akaroj jñānadṛśyaṃ tu paralokaṃ na cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:14706: 13,134.057d@015_2547 bhagavan mṛtamātras tu yo 'yaṃ jāta iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14707: 13,134.057d@015_2548 tathaiva dṛśyate jātas tatrātmā tu kathaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:14708: 13,134.057d@015_2549 garbhādāv eva saṃviṣṭa ātmeti bhagavanmatam 13,134.057d@015_2550 eṣa me saṃśayo deva tan me chettuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:14710: 13,134.057d@015_2551 tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitā 13,134.057d@015_2552 anyo garbhagato bhūtvā tatraiva nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14711: 13,134.057d@015_2553 punar anyac charīraṃ tadāviśya bhuvi jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:14712: 13,134.057d@015_2554 tat kva cin naiva sarvatra daivayogaṃ tu tad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:14713: 13,134.057d@015_2555 sūtikāyā hitārthaṃ ca mohanārthaṃ ca dehinām
GE07mbh_13_u:14714: 13,134.057d@015_2556 yamakarmavidhānaṃ tad ity evaṃ viddhi śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:14715: 13,134.057d@015_2557 kaukṣamātraṃ tu narakaṃ bhuktvā ke cit prayānti hi 13,134.057d@015_2558 māyā sā yāmikā nāma yaj janmamaraṇāntare
GE07mbh_13_u:14716: 13,134.057d@015_2559 iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi 13,134.057d@015_2559
GE07mbh_13_u:14718: 13,134.057d@015_2561 nāsty ātmā karmabhokteti mṛto jantur na jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:14719: 13,134.057d@015_2562 svabhāvāj jāyate sarvaṃ yathā vṛkṣaphalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:14721: 13,134.057d@015_2564 tapodānādi yat karma tatrātmā dṛśyate vṛthā
GE07mbh_13_u:14722: 13,134.057d@015_2565 nāsti paunarbhavaṃ janma iti ke cid vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14723: 13,134.057d@015_2566 parokṣavacanaṃ śrutvā na pratyakṣasya darśanāt 13,134.057d@015_2567 tat sarvaṃ nāsti vāstīti saṃśayasthās tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:14724: 13,134.057d@015_2568 pakṣabhedāntare cāsmiṃs tattvaṃ me vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:14726: 13,134.057d@015_2569 uktaṃ bhagavatā yat tu tat tu lokasya saṃsthitiḥ 13,134.057d@015_2570 praśnam etaṃ tu pṛcchantyāṃ rudrāṇyāṃ pariṣat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:14729: 13,134.057d@015_2572 naitad asti mahābhāge yad vadantīha nāstikāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14731: 13,134.057d@015_2574 sarvam arthaṃ śrutaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yat prāg uktaṃ mayā tava
GE07mbh_13_u:14732: 13,134.057d@015_2575 tadāprabhṛti martyānāṃ śrutam āśritya paṇḍitāḥ 13,134.057d@015_2576 kāmān saṃchindya parighān dhṛtyā vai paramāsinā
GE07mbh_13_u:14733: 13,134.057d@015_2577 abhiyānty eva te svargaṃ paśyantaḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:14734: 13,134.057d@015_2578 evaṃ śraddhāphalaṃ loke parataḥ sumahat phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:14735: 13,134.057d@015_2579 buddhiḥ śraddhā ca śuśrūṣā kāraṇāni hitaiṣiṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:14736: 13,134.057d@015_2580 tasmāt svargābhigantāraḥ kati cit tv abhavan narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14737: 13,134.057d@015_2581 anye karaṇahīnatvān nāstikyaṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ 13,134.057d@015_2582 śrutavidveṣiṇo mūrkhā nāstikā dṛḍhaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14738: 13,134.057d@015_2583 niṣkriyāś ca nirannādyāḥ patanty evādhamāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:14739: 13,134.057d@015_2584 nāstīti vai punarjanma kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ 13,134.057d@015_2585 nādhigacchanti tan nityaṃ hetuvādaśatair api 13,134.057d@015_2586 eṣā brahmakṛtā māyā durvijñeyā surāsuraiḥ 13,134.057d@015_2587 kiṃ punar mānuṣair loke jñātukāmaiḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14741: 13,134.057d@015_2589 tad astīty eva mantavyaṃ tathā hi tam avāpnuyāt 13,134.057d@015_2590 vedaguhyeṣu cānyeṣu hetur devi nirarthakaḥ 13,134.057d@015_2591 badhirāndhavad evātra vartitavyaṃ hitaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:14742: 13,134.057d@015_2592 etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ devaguhyaṃ prajāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:14743: 13,134.057d@015_2593 tvatprītyartham idaṃ guhyam avācyam api bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:14746: 13,134.057d@015_2595 kīdṛśā yamadaṇḍās te kīdṛśāḥ paricārakāḥ 13,134.057d@015_2596 kathaṃ mṛtās te gacchanti prāṇino yamasādanam
GE07mbh_13_u:14747: 13,134.057d@015_2597 kīdṛśaṃ bhavanaṃ tasya kathaṃ daṇḍayati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14749: 13,134.057d@015_2598 etat sarvaṃ mahādeva śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:14750: 13,134.057d@015_2599 śṛṇu kalyāṇi tat sarvaṃ yat tad devi manaḥpriyam 13,134.057d@015_2600 dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhe yamasya sadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:14752: 13,134.057d@015_2602 pitṛbhiḥ pretasaṃghaiś ca yamadūtaiś ca saṃtatam
GE07mbh_13_u:14753: 13,134.057d@015_2603 prāṇisaṃghaiḥ subahubhiḥ karmavaśyais tu pūritam 13,134.057d@015_2604 tatrāste daṇḍayan nityaṃ yamo lokahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14754: 13,134.057d@015_2605 māyayā satataṃ vetti prāṇināṃ yac chubhāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:14755: 13,134.057d@015_2606 māyayā saṃharaṃs tatra prāṇisaṃghān yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14756: 13,134.057d@015_2607 tasya māyāmayāḥ pāśā na vedyante surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14757: 13,134.057d@015_2608 ko hi mānuṣamātras tu vettā tac caritaṃ mahat 13,134.057d@015_2609 evaṃ hi śāsatas tasya yamasya paricārakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:14758: 13,134.057d@015_2610 gṛhītvā saṃnayanty eva prāṇinaḥ kṣīṇakarmiṇaḥ 13,134.057d@015_2611 yena kenāpadeśena apadeśas tadudbhavaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:15041: 13,134.057d@015_3005 yan māṃsarasam āsvādya punar māṃsāni varjayet
