GE07mbh_13_u:15043: 13,134.057d@015_3007 ity evaṃ munayaḥ prāhur māṃsasyābhakṣaṇe guṇān
GE07mbh_13_u:15044: 13,134.057d@015_3008 evaṃ bahuguṇaṃ devi nṛṇāṃ māṃsavivarjanam 13,134.057d@015_3009 na śaknuyād yadā jīvaṃs tyaktuṃ māṃsaṃ kathaṃ cana 13,134.057d@015_3010 tripuṇyamāsamātraṃ vā varjanīyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15045: 13,134.057d@015_3011 na śaknuyād api tathā kaumudīmāsam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15047: 13,134.057d@015_3013 varjanīyaṃ tathā māṃsaṃ paratra hitam icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:15048: 13,134.057d@015_3014 aśaktaḥ kāraṇān martyo bhoktum icched vidhiṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:15049: 13,134.057d@015_3015 anena vidhinā khādan kalmaṣeṇa na lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15050: 13,134.057d@015_3016 sūnāyāṃ ca gataprāṇaṃ krītvā nyāyena bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:15052: 13,134.057d@015_3018 bhaiṣajyakāraṇād vyādhau khādan pāpair na lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15055: 13,134.057d@015_3020 gurupūjā kathaṃ deva kriyate dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥ 13,134.057d@015_3021 gurupūjāṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat tava śobhane 13,134.057d@015_3022 kṛtajñānāṃ paro dharma iti vedānuśāsanam 13,134.057d@015_3023 tasmāt svaguravaḥ pūjyās te hi pūrvopakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15056: 13,134.057d@015_3024 gurūṇāṃ ca garīyāṃsas trayo lokeṣu pūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15057: 13,134.057d@015_3025 upādhyāyaḥ pitā mātā saṃpūjyās te viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15058: 13,134.057d@015_3026 ye pitṛbhrātaro jyeṣṭhā ye ca tasyānujās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15059: 13,134.057d@015_3027 pituḥ pitā ca sarve te pūjanīyā yathā pitā 13,134.057d@015_3028 mātur yā bhaginī jyeṣṭhā mātur yā ca yavīyasī 13,134.057d@015_3029 mātāmahī ca dhātrī ca sarvās tā mātaraḥ smṛtāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3030 upādhyāyasya yaḥ putro yaś ca tasya bhaved guruḥ 13,134.057d@015_3031 ṛtvig guruḥ pitā ceti guravaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15060: 13,134.057d@015_3032 jyeṣṭho bhrātā narendraś ca mātulaḥ śvaśuras tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15061: 13,134.057d@015_3033 bhayatrātā ca bhartā ca guravas te prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15062: 13,134.057d@015_3034 ity eṣa kathitaḥ svargyo gurūṇāṃ sarvasaṃgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15063: 13,134.057d@015_3035 anuvṛttiṃ ca pūjāṃ ca teṣām api nibodha me 13,134.057d@015_3036 avadhyau mātṛpitarau upādhyāyas tathaiva ca 13,134.057d@015_3037 kathaṃ cin nāvamantavyā nareṇa hitam icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:15064: 13,134.057d@015_3038 yena prīṇāti ca pitā tena prītaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15065: 13,134.057d@015_3039 yena prīṇāti cen mātā prītāḥ syur devamātaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15066: 13,134.057d@015_3040 yena prīṇāty upādhyāyo brahmā tenābhipūjitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3041 aprīteṣu punas teṣu naro narakam eti hi
GE07mbh_13_u:15067: 13,134.057d@015_3042 gurūṇāṃ vairanirbandho na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:15068: 13,134.057d@015_3043 narakaṃ sa guruprītyā manasāpi na gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:15069: 13,134.057d@015_3044 na brūyād vipriyaṃ teṣām aniṣṭe na pravartayet
GE07mbh_13_u:15070: 13,134.057d@015_3045 vigṛhya na vadet teṣāṃ samīpe spardhayā kva cit 13,134.057d@015_3046 yad yad icchanti te kartum asvatantras tad ācaret 13,134.057d@015_3047 vedānuśāsanasamaṃ guruśāsanam iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15071: 13,134.057d@015_3048 kalahāṃś ca vivādāṃś ca gurubhiḥ saha varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:15072: 13,134.057d@015_3049 kaitavaṃ parihāsāṃś ca manyukāmāśrayāḥ kathāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3050 gurūṇāṃ yo 'nahaṃvādī karoty ājñām atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15073: 13,134.057d@015_3051 na tasmāt sarvamartyeṣu vidyate puṇyakṛttamaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3052 asūyām apavādāṃś ca gurūṇāṃ parivarjayet 13,134.057d@015_3053 teṣāṃ priyahitānveṣī bhūtvā paricaret sadā 13,134.057d@015_3054 na tad yajñaphalaṃ kuryāt tapo vācaritaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:15074: 13,134.057d@015_3055 yat kuryāt puruṣasyeha gurupūjā sadā kṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:15075: 13,134.057d@015_3056 anuvṛtter vinā dharmo nāsti sarvāśrameṣv api
GE07mbh_13_u:15076: 13,134.057d@015_3057 tasmāt samādṛtaḥ kāle guruvṛttiṃ samācaret 13,134.057d@015_3058 svam arthaṃ svaśarīraṃ ca gurvarthaṃ saṃtyajed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15077: 13,134.057d@015_3059 vivādaṃ dhanahetor vā mohād vā tair na rocayet 13,134.057d@015_3060 brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca dānāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15078: 13,134.057d@015_3061 gurubhiḥ pratiṣiddhasya sarvam etad apārthakam 13,134.057d@015_3062 upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15081: 13,134.057d@015_3065 tebhyo nānyaḥ pāpakṛd asti loke 13,134.057d@015_3065 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:15083: 13,134.057d@015_3066 upavāsavidhiṃ tatra tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:15085: 13,134.057d@015_3068 ekabhuktopavāsais tu dhārayante vrataṃ narāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3069 labhante vipulaṃ dharmaṃ tathāhāraparikṣayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15086: 13,134.057d@015_3070 bahūnām uparodhaṃ tu na kuryād ātmakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15087: 13,134.057d@015_3071 jīvopaghātaṃ ca tathā dhānyaṃ saṃjīvyam iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15088: 13,134.057d@015_3072 tasmāt puṇyaṃ labhen martyaḥ svayam āhārakarśanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15089: 13,134.057d@015_3073 tad gṛhasthair yathāśakti kartavyam iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15090: 13,134.057d@015_3074 upavāsārdite kāya āpadarthaṃ payo jalam 13,134.057d@015_3075 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:15091: 13,134.057d@015_3075 bhuñjan na vrataghātī syād brāhmaṇān anumānya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15093: 13,134.057d@015_3077 tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:15094: 13,134.057d@015_3078 brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ śaucaṃ brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15095: 13,134.057d@015_3079 kevalaṃ brahmacaryeṇa prāpyate paramaṃ padam 13,134.057d@015_3080 saṃkalpād darśanāc caiva tad yuktavacanād api
GE07mbh_13_u:15096: 13,134.057d@015_3081 saṃsparśād atha saṃyogāt pañcadhā rakṣitaṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:15097: 13,134.057d@015_3082 vratavad dhāritaṃ caiva brahmacaryam akalmaṣam 13,134.057d@015_3083 nityasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ tasya naiṣṭhikānāṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15098: 13,134.057d@015_3084 tad iṣyate gṛhasthānāṃ kālam uddiśya kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:15104: 13,134.057d@015_3090 kāni tīrthāni lokeśa tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:15105: 13,134.057d@015_3091 hanta te kathayiṣyāmi tīrthasnānavidhiṃ priye 13,134.057d@015_3092 pāvanārthaṃ ca śaucārthaṃ brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:15106: 13,134.057d@015_3093 yās tu loke mahānadyas tāḥ sarvās tīrthasaṃjñitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15107: 13,134.057d@015_3094 tāsāṃ prāk srotasaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ saṃgamaś ca parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:15108: 13,134.057d@015_3095 tāsāṃ sāgarasaṃyogo variṣṭhaś ceti vidyate 13,134.057d@015_3096 tāsām ubhayataḥ kūlaṃ yatra tatra maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15109: 13,134.057d@015_3097 devair vā sevitaṃ devi tat tīrthaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam 13,134.057d@015_3098 samudraś ca mahātīrthaṃ pāvanaṃ paramaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:15110: 13,134.057d@015_3099 tasya kūlagatās tīrthā mahadbhiś ca samāplutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15111: 13,134.057d@015_3100 srotasāṃ parvatānāṃ ca joṣitānāṃ maharṣibhiḥ 13,134.057d@015_3101 api kūpataṭākaṃ vā munibhiḥ sevitaṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:15112: 13,134.057d@015_3102 tat tu tīrtham iti jñeyaṃ prabhāvāt tu tapasvinām 13,134.057d@015_3103 tadāprabhṛti tīrthatvaṃ lebhe lokahitāya vai 13,134.057d@015_3104 evaṃ tīrthodbhavaṃ viddhi tasya snānavidhiṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:15114: 13,134.057d@015_3106 upavāsatrayaṃ kuryād ekaṃ vā niyamānvitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3107 puṇyamāsayute kāle paurṇamāsyāṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:15115: 13,134.057d@015_3108 bahir eva śucir bhūtvā tat tīrthaṃ tanmanāviśet
GE07mbh_13_u:15116: 13,134.057d@015_3109 trir āplutya jalābhyāśe dattvā brāhmaṇadakṣiṇām 13,134.057d@015_3110 abhyarcya devāyatanaṃ tataḥ prāyād yathāgatam 13,134.057d@015_3111 etad vidhānaṃ sarveṣāṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ prati priye
GE07mbh_13_u:15118: 13,134.057d@015_3113 ādiprabhṛti śuddhasya tīrthasnānaṃ śubhaṃ bhavet 13,134.057d@015_3114 taporthaṃ pāpanāśārthaṃ śaucārthaṃ tīrthagāhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:15119: 13,134.057d@015_3115 evaṃ puṇyeṣu māseṣu tīrthasnānaṃ śubhaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:15121: 13,134.057d@015_3116 etan naiyamikaṃ sarvaṃ sukṛtaṃ kathitaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:15122: 13,134.057d@015_3117 dānāni devapūjāṃ ca pitṛpūjāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15124: 13,134.057d@015_3119 tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu kalyāṇi prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:15125: 13,134.057d@015_3120 cetanācetanair yuktaṃ yal loke vidyate dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:15127: 13,134.057d@015_3121 etad artham avāpnoti naraḥ pretya śubhekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:15128: 13,134.057d@015_3122 lokasiddhaṃ tu yad dravyaṃ sarvasādhāraṇaṃ bhavet

GE07mbh_13_u:15133: 13,134.057d@015_3127 dātā pratigrahītā ca deyaṃ sopakramaṃ tathā

GE07mbh_13_u:15136: 13,134.057d@015_3131 satyavādī jitakrodhas tv alubdho nānasūyakaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3132 śraddhāvān āstikaś caiva evaṃ dātā praśasyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15140: 13,134.057d@015_3136 etān pātraguṇān viddhi tādṛk pātraṃ praśasyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15141: 13,134.057d@015_3137 pitṛdevāgnikāryeṣu tasya dattaṃ mahat phalam 13,134.057d@015_3138 yad yad arhati yo loke pātraṃ tasya bhavec ca saḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:15155: 13,134.057d@015_3155 pūrvaṃ ca pātratāṃ jñātvā samāhūya nivedya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15160: 13,134.057d@015_3160 pātrāṇi saṃparīkṣyaiva dātā vai dānamātrayoḥ 13,134.057d@015_3161 atiśaktyā paraṃ dānaṃ yathāśakti tu madhyamam
GE07mbh_13_u:15161: 13,134.057d@015_3162 tṛtīyaṃ cāparaṃ dānaṃ nānurūpam ivātmanaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3163 yathāsaṃbhāvitaṃ pūrvaṃ dātavyaṃ tat tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15162: 13,134.057d@015_3164 puṇyakṣetreṣu yad dattaṃ puṇyakāleṣu vā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15164: 13,134.057d@015_3165 tac chobhanataraṃ viddhi gauravād deśakālayoḥ 13,134.057d@015_3166 yaś ca puṇyatamo deśas tathā kālaś ca śaṃsa me

GE07mbh_13_u:15167: 13,134.057d@015_3169 grahītur īpsito yaś ca tatra dattaṃ mahat phalam 13,134.057d@015_3170 śaradvasantakālaś ca puṇyamāsas tathaiva ca 13,134.057d@015_3171 śuklapakṣaś ca pakṣāṇāṃ paurṇamāsī ca parvasu

GE07mbh_13_u:15180: 13,134.057d@015_3186 kṛtvā tu dharmaṃ vidhivat paścāttāpaṃ karoti cet
GE07mbh_13_u:15181: 13,134.057d@015_3187 ślāghayā vā yadi brūyād vṛthā saṃsadi yat kṛtam 13,134.057d@015_3188 prakalpayec ca manasā tatphalaṃ pretyabhāvataḥ 13,134.057d@015_3189 dharmakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ yac ca satataṃ phalakāṅkṣayā
GE07mbh_13_u:15182: 13,134.057d@015_3190 evaṃ kṛtaṃ vā dattaṃ vā paratra viphalaṃ bhavet 13,134.057d@015_3191 ete doṣā vivarjyāś ca dātṛbhiḥ puṇyakāṅkṣibhiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:15339: 13,134.057d@015_3417 pretyabhāve śṛṇu phalaṃ dattasya ca kṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15340: 13,134.057d@015_3418 dānaṃ vā ṣaḍguṇayutaṃ tadarhāya yathāvidhi 13,134.057d@015_3419 yathāvibhavato dānaṃ dātavyam iti mānavaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_3420 buddhim āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ kulaṃ bhāgyaṃ tathāgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:15341: 13,134.057d@015_3421 rūpeṇa saptadhā bhūtvā mānuṣyaṃ phalati dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:15342: 13,134.057d@015_3422 idaṃ dattam idaṃ me syād ity evaṃ phalakāṅkṣayā 13,134.057d@015_3423 yad dattaṃ tat tad eva syān na tu kiṃ cana labhyate 13,134.057d@015_3424 dhruvaṃ devy uttame dāne madhyame tv adhame phalam 13,134.057d@015_3424 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:15343: 13,134.057d@015_3425 bhagavan devadeveśa viśiṣṭaṃ yajñam ucyate 13,134.057d@015_3426 maheśvaraḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:15346: 13,134.057d@015_3428 yajñā vedeṣv adhīnāś ca vedā brāhmaṇasaṃyutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15347: 13,134.057d@015_3429 idaṃ tu sakalaṃ dravyaṃ divi vā bhuvi vā priye
GE07mbh_13_u:15348: 13,134.057d@015_3430 yajñārthaṃ viddhi tat sṛṣṭaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā

GE07mbh_13_u:15354: 13,134.057d@015_3438 suśuddhair yajamānaiś ca ṛtvigbhiś ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:15355: 13,134.057d@015_3439 śuddhair dravyopakaraṇair yaṣṭavyam iti niścayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3440 tathā kṛteṣu yajñeṣu devānāṃ toṣaṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:15356: 13,134.057d@015_3441 tuṣṭeṣu devasaṃgheṣu yajvā yajñaphalaṃ labhet 13,134.057d@015_3442 devāḥ saṃtoṣitā yajñair lokān saṃvardhayanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:15357: 13,134.057d@015_3443 ubhayor lokayor bhūtir devi yajñaiḥ pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15358: 13,134.057d@015_3444 tasmād yajvā divaṃ gatvā amaraiḥ saha modate
GE07mbh_13_u:15359: 13,134.057d@015_3445 nāsti yajñasamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti yajñasamo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15361: 13,134.057d@015_3447 eṣā yajñakṛtā pūjā laukikīm aparāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:15363: 13,134.057d@015_3449 devagoṣṭhān hi saṃskṛtya cotsavaṃ yaḥ karoti vai

GE07mbh_13_u:15365: 13,134.057d@015_3451 devān saṃtoṣayitvā sa devi dharmam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15366: 13,134.057d@015_3452 gandhamālyaiś ca vividhaiḥ paramānnena dhūpanaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_3453 bahubhiḥ stutibhiś caiva stuvantaḥ prayatā narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15367: 13,134.057d@015_3454 nṛttair vādyaiś ca gāndharvair anyair dṛṣṭivilobhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15368: 13,134.057d@015_3455 devasatkāram uddiśya kurvate ye narā bhuvi

GE07mbh_13_u:15372: 13,134.057d@015_3461 prayataiḥ śuddhagātrais tu śuddhadeśe supūjitāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3462 saṃtoṣaṃ yānti vai devā bhaktaiḥ saṃpūjitās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15374: 13,134.057d@015_3463 devān saṃtoṣayitvaiva devi dharmam avāpnuyāt 13,134.057d@015_3464 triviṣṭapasthā vai devā bhūmau mānuṣaceṣṭitam 13,134.057d@015_3465 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15375: 13,134.057d@015_3465 kathaṃ jñāsyanti vividhaṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:15376: 13,134.057d@015_3466 tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yathā tair vidyate priye 13,134.057d@015_3467 prāṇināṃ tu śarīreṣu antarātmā vyavasthitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3468 ātmānaṃ paramaṃ devam iti viddhi śubhekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:15377: 13,134.057d@015_3469 ātmā manovyavasthānāt sarvaṃ vetti śubhāśubham 13,134.057d@015_3470 ātmaiva devās tad vidyur avyagramanasaḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:15378: 13,134.057d@015_3471 satāṃ manovyavasthānāc chubhaṃ bhavati vai nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:15379: 13,134.057d@015_3472 tasmād devābhisaṃpūjā pitṛpūjā tathaiva ca 13,134.057d@015_3473 yajñāś ca dharmakāryāṇi gurupūjāś ca śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:15381: 13,134.057d@015_3475 evaṃ vyavasthitair nityaṃ kartavyam iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15382: 13,134.057d@015_3476 evaṃ kṛtvā śubhākāṅkṣī paratreha ca modate
GE07mbh_13_u:15383: 13,134.057d@015_3477 anyathā mana āveśya kṛtaṃ na phalati priye
GE07mbh_13_u:15385: 13,134.057d@015_3478 ṛte 'pi tu mano devi aśubhaṃ phalati dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:15386: 13,134.057d@015_3479 pitṛmedhaḥ kathaṃ deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:15389: 13,134.057d@015_3481 pitṛmedhaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat tanmanāḥ śṛṇu 13,134.057d@015_3482 deśakālau vidhānaṃ ca tatkriyāyāḥ śubhāśubham 13,134.057d@015_3483 lokeṣu pitaraḥ pūjyā devatānāṃ ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15390: 13,134.057d@015_3484 śucayo nirmalāḥ puṇyā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15391: 13,134.057d@015_3485 yathā vṛṣṭiṃ pratīkṣante bhūmiṣṭhāḥ sarvajantavaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3486 pitaraś ca tathā loke pitṛmedhaṃ śubhekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:15392: 13,134.057d@015_3487 tasya deśāḥ kurukṣetraṃ gayā gaṅgā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:15393: 13,134.057d@015_3488 prabhāsaṃ puṣkaraṃ ceti teṣu dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:15394: 13,134.057d@015_3489 tīrthāni saritaḥ puṇyā viviktāni vanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15395: 13,134.057d@015_3490 nadīnāṃ pulinānīti deśāḥ śrāddhasya pūjitāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3491 maghāprauṣṭhapadau māsau śrāddhakarmaṇi pūjitau
GE07mbh_13_u:15396: 13,134.057d@015_3492 pakṣayoḥ kṛṣṇapakṣaś ca pūrvapakṣāt praśasyate 13,134.057d@015_3493 amāvāsyāṃ trayodaśyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipatsu ca 13,134.057d@015_3494 tithiṣv etāsu tuṣyanti datteneha pitāmahāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3495 pūrvāhṇe śuklapakṣe vā rātrau janmadineṣu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:15397: 13,134.057d@015_3496 yugmeṣv ahaḥsu ca śrāddhaṃ na ca kurvīta paṇḍitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3497 eṣa kālo mayā proktaḥ pitṛmedhasya pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15398: 13,134.057d@015_3498 yasmin vā brāhmaṇaṃ pātraṃ paśyet kālaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15399: 13,134.057d@015_3499 apāṅkteyā dvijā varjyā grāhyās te paṅktipāvanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15400: 13,134.057d@015_3500 pūjayed yadi pāpiṣṭhāñ śrāddheṣu narakaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:15402: 13,134.057d@015_3502 tadarhāñ śrotriyān viddhi brāhmaṇān ayujaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:15403: 13,134.057d@015_3503 etān nimantrayed vidvān pūrvedyuḥ prātar eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:15404: 13,134.057d@015_3504 tatra śrāddhakriyāṃ paścād ārabheta yathāvidhi 13,134.057d@015_3505 trīṇi śrāddhe pavitrāṇi dauhitraḥ kutapas tilāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15405: 13,134.057d@015_3506 trīṇi cātra praśaṃsanti śaucam akrodham atvarām
GE07mbh_13_u:15406: 13,134.057d@015_3507 kutapasya ca lomāni kuśā darbhās tilā madhu
GE07mbh_13_u:15408: 13,134.057d@015_3509 tilān avakiret tatra nānāvarṇān samantataḥ 13,134.057d@015_3510 aśuddhaṃ pitṛyajñeṣu tilaiḥ śudhyati śobhane 13,134.057d@015_3511 nīlakāṣāyavastraṃ ca bhinnakarṇaṃ navavraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:15409: 13,134.057d@015_3512 hīnāṅgam aśuciṃ vāpi varjayet tatra dūrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15410: 13,134.057d@015_3513 kukkuṭāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca nagnaṃ klībaṃ rajasvalām
GE07mbh_13_u:15411: 13,134.057d@015_3514 āyasaṃ trapu sīsaṃ ca śrāddhakarmaṇi varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:15412: 13,134.057d@015_3515 māṃsaiḥ prīṇanti pitaro mudgamāṣayavair iha 13,134.057d@015_3516 śaśarauravamāṃsena ṣaṇmāsaṃ tṛptir iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15413: 13,134.057d@015_3517 saṃvatsaraṃ ca gavyena haviṣā pāyasena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15415: 13,134.057d@015_3519 ānantyāya bhaved dattaṃ khaḍgamāṃsaṃ pitṛkṣaye 13,134.057d@015_3520 pāyasaṃ satilaṃ kṣaudraṃ khaḍgamāṃsena saṃmitam 13,134.057d@015_3521 mahāśaphariṇo matsyāś chāgo vā sarvalohitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3522 kālaśākakam ity eva tadānantyaṃ prakīrtitam 13,134.057d@015_3523 sāpūpaṃ sāmiṣaṃ snigdham āhāram upakalpayet 13,134.057d@015_3524 upakalpya tadāhāraṃ brāhmaṇān arcayet tataḥ 13,134.057d@015_3525 śmaśrukarmaśiraḥsnātān samāropyāsanaṃ kramāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15418: 13,134.057d@015_3528 tataḥ prastīrya darbhāṇāṃ prastaraṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3529 tatsamīpe 'gnibhiddhvā ca svadhāṃ ca juhuyāt tataḥ 13,134.057d@015_3530 samīpe tv agnīṣomābhyāṃ pitṛbhyo juhuyāt tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15419: 13,134.057d@015_3531 tato darbheṣu piṇḍāṃs trīn nivaped dakṣiṇāmukham
GE07mbh_13_u:15421: 13,134.057d@015_3533 etena vidhinā dattaṃ pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:15422: 13,134.057d@015_3534 tato viprān yathākāmaṃ pūjayen niyataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15423: 13,134.057d@015_3535 sadakṣiṇaṃ sasaṃbhāraṃ yathā tuṣyanti te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15424: 13,134.057d@015_3536 yatra tat kriyate karma paitṛke brāhmaṇān prati
GE07mbh_13_u:15425: 13,134.057d@015_3537 tat sarvam akhilaṃ kuryād vaiśvadevasya pūrvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:15426: 13,134.057d@015_3538 aśrūn na pātayet tatra na jalpen na japen mithaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15427: 13,134.057d@015_3539 niyamya vācaṃ dehaṃ ca śrāddhakarma samārabhet
GE07mbh_13_u:15428: 13,134.057d@015_3540 tato nirvapaṇe vṛtte tān piṇḍāṃs tadantaram
GE07mbh_13_u:15429: 13,134.057d@015_3541 brāhmaṇo 'gnirajo gaur vā bhakṣayed apsu vā kṣipet
GE07mbh_13_u:15430: 13,134.057d@015_3542 patnīṃ vā madhyamaṃ piṇḍaṃ putrakāmo hi prāśayet
GE07mbh_13_u:15431: 13,134.057d@015_3543 ādhatta pitaro garbhaṃ kumāraṃ puṣkarasrajam 13,134.057d@015_3544 tṛptān utthāpya tān viprān annaśeṣaṃ nivedayet
GE07mbh_13_u:15432: 13,134.057d@015_3545 taccheṣaṃ bahubhiḥ paścāt sabhṛtyo bhakṣayen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15433: 13,134.057d@015_3546 eṣa proktaḥ samāsena pitṛyajñaḥ sanātanaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3547 pitaras tena tuṣyanti kartā ca phalam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15434: 13,134.057d@015_3548 ahany ahani vā kuryān māse māse 'tha vā punaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3549 saṃvatsarasya dviḥ kuryāc catur vāpi ca śaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15435: 13,134.057d@015_3550 dīrghāyuś ca bhavet svasthaḥ pitṛmedhena mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15437: 13,134.057d@015_3552 śrāddhadaḥ svargam āpnoti nirmalaṃ vividhādbhutam 13,134.057d@015_3553 apsarogaṇasaṃghuṣṭaṃ virajaskam anantakam
GE07mbh_13_u:15438: 13,134.057d@015_3554 śrāddhāni puṣṭikāmā ye prakurvanti ca paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15439: 13,134.057d@015_3555 teṣāṃ puṣṭiṃ prajāś caiva dāsyanti pitaraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:15441: 13,134.057d@015_3557 kulasaṃdhāraṇaṃ ceti śrāddham āhur manīṣiṇaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3558 bhagavan devadeveśa mṛtās te bhuvi jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15442: 13,134.057d@015_3559 nānājātiṣu jāyante śīghraṃ karmavaśāt punaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3560 pitaras tv iti te tatra kathaṃ tiṣṭhanti devavat 13,134.057d@015_3561 pitṝṇāṃ katamo deśaḥ piṇḍān aśnanti te katham
GE07mbh_13_u:15443: 13,134.057d@015_3562 anne datte mṛtānāṃ tu katham āpyāyanaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:15445: 13,134.057d@015_3563 evaṃ mayā saṃśayitaṃ bhagavañ chettum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:15446: 13,134.057d@015_3564 etad viruddhaṃ rudrāṇyāṃ pṛcchantyāṃ pariṣad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:15448: 13,134.057d@015_3565 babhūva sarvā muditā śrotuṃ paramakaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_13_u:15449: 13,134.057d@015_3566 sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu kalyāṇi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15450: 13,134.057d@015_3567 guhyānāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ khilānāṃ paramaṃ khilam
GE07mbh_13_u:15451: 13,134.057d@015_3568 yathā devagaṇā devi tathā pitṛgaṇāḥ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:15452: 13,134.057d@015_3569 dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhe sarve pitṛgaṇāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15453: 13,134.057d@015_3570 pretān uddiśya yā pūjā kriyate mānuṣair iha
GE07mbh_13_u:15454: 13,134.057d@015_3571 tena tuṣyanti pitaro na pretāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15455: 13,134.057d@015_3572 uttarasyāṃ yathā devā ramante yajñakarmabhiḥ 13,134.057d@015_3573 dakṣiṇasyāṃ tathā te ca tuṣyanti vividhair makhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15457: 13,134.057d@015_3575 tayor havyakriyā devān kavyam āpyāyayet pitṝn
GE07mbh_13_u:15458: 13,134.057d@015_3576 prasavyaṃ maṅgalair dravyair havyakarma vidhīyate 13,134.057d@015_3577 apasavyam amaṅgalyaiḥ kavyaṃ cāpi vidhīyate 13,134.057d@015_3578 sadevāsuragandharvāḥ pitṝn abhyarcayanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15459: 13,134.057d@015_3579 āpyāyitāś ca te śrāddhaiḥ punar āpyāyayanti tān
GE07mbh_13_u:15460: 13,134.057d@015_3580 aniṣṭvā ca pitṝn pūrvaṃ yaḥ kriyāṃ prakaroti cet 13,134.057d@015_3581 rakṣāṃsi ca piśācāś ca phalaṃ bhokṣyanti tasya tat 13,134.057d@015_3582 havyakavyakriyā tasmāt kartavyā bhuvi mānavaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_3583 karmakṣetraṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ tad anyatra na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15461: 13,134.057d@015_3584 kavyena saṃtatir dṛṣṭā havye bhūtiḥ pṛthagvidhā
GE07mbh_13_u:15463: 13,134.057d@015_3585 iti te kathitaṃ devi devaguhyaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:15464: 13,134.057d@015_3586 evaṃ kṛtasya dharmasya śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:15466: 13,134.057d@015_3587 pramāṇaṃ phalamānānāṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:15467: 13,134.057d@015_3588 pramāṇakalpanāṃ devi dānasya śṛṇu bhāmini 13,134.057d@015_3589 yatsāras tu naro loke tad dānaṃ cottamaṃ smṛtam 13,134.057d@015_3590 sarvadānavidhiṃ prāhus tad eva bhuvi śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:15468: 13,134.057d@015_3591 prasthaṃ sāraṃ daridrasya śataṃ koṭidhanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15469: 13,134.057d@015_3592 prasthasāras tu tat prasthaṃ dadan mahad avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15470: 13,134.057d@015_3593 koṭisāras tu tāṃ koṭiṃ dadan mahad avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15471: 13,134.057d@015_3594 ubhayaṃ tan mahat tac ca phalenaiva samaṃ smṛtam 13,134.057d@015_3595 dharmārthakāmabhogeṣu śakyabhāvaṃ tu madhyamam
GE07mbh_13_u:15472: 13,134.057d@015_3596 svadravyād atihīnaṃ tu tad dānam adhamaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:15473: 13,134.057d@015_3597 śṛṇu dattasya vai devi pañcadhā phalakalpanam
GE07mbh_13_u:15474: 13,134.057d@015_3598 ānantyaṃ ca mahac caiva samaṃ hīnaṃ ca pātakam 13,134.057d@015_3599 teṣāṃ viśeṣān vakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:15475: 13,134.057d@015_3600 dustyajasya ca vai dānaṃ pātra ānantyam ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15476: 13,134.057d@015_3601 dānaṃ ṣaḍguṇayuktaṃ tu mahad ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15477: 13,134.057d@015_3602 yathāśraddhaṃ tu vai dānaṃ yathārhaṃ samam ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15478: 13,134.057d@015_3603 guṇatas tu tathā hīnaṃ dānaṃ hīnam iti smṛtam 13,134.057d@015_3604 dānaṃ pātakam ity āhuḥ ṣaḍguṇānāṃ viparyaye
GE07mbh_13_u:15479: 13,134.057d@015_3605 devaloke mahat kālam ānantyasya phalaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15480: 13,134.057d@015_3606 mahatas tu tathā dānaṃ svargaloke tu pūjyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15481: 13,134.057d@015_3607 samasya tu tathā dānaṃ mānuṣaṃ bhogam āvahet
GE07mbh_13_u:15482: 13,134.057d@015_3608 dānaṃ niṣphalam ity āhur vihīnaṃ kriyayā śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:15483: 13,134.057d@015_3609 atha vā mlecchadeśeṣu tatra tatphalatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:15486: 13,134.057d@015_3611 aśubhasyāpi dānasya śubhaṃ syāc ca phalaṃ katham
GE07mbh_13_u:15488: 13,134.057d@015_3613 prītyā tu sarvadānāni dattvā phalam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15489: 13,134.057d@015_3614 rahasyaṃ sarvadānānām etad viddhi śubhekṣaṇe 13,134.057d@015_3615 anyāni sarvakāryāṇi śṛṇu sadbhiḥ kṛtāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15490: 13,134.057d@015_3616 ārāmaṃ devagoṣṭhāni saṃkramāḥ kūpa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15491: 13,134.057d@015_3617 govāṭaṃ ca taṭākaṃ ca sabhāḥ śālāś ca sarvaśaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3618 bhikṣukāvasathāś caiva pānīyaṃ gotṛṇāni ca 13,134.057d@015_3619 vyādhitānāṃ ca bhaiṣajyam anāthānāṃ ca bhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:15492: 13,134.057d@015_3620 anāthaśavasaṃskāras tīrthamārgaviśodhanam 13,134.057d@015_3621 vyasanābhyavapattiś ca sarveṣāṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3622 etat sarvaṃ samāsena dharmakāryam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:15493: 13,134.057d@015_3623 tat kartavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa svaśaktyā śraddhayā śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:15494: 13,134.057d@015_3624 pretyabhāve labhet puṇyaṃ nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:15495: 13,134.057d@015_3625 rūpaṃ saubhāgyam ārogyaṃ balaṃ saukhyaṃ labhen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15497: 13,134.057d@015_3626 svarge vā mānuṣe vāpi tais tair āpyāyate hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15498: 13,134.057d@015_3627 bhagavaṃl lokapāleśa dharmas tu katibhedakaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3628 dṛśyate caritaḥ sadbhis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:15500: 13,134.057d@015_3629 śṛṇu devi samuddeśān nānātvaṃ dharmasaṃkaṭe 13,134.057d@015_3630 dharmā bahuvidhā loke śrutā vedamukhodbhavāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3631 smṛtidharmaś ca bahudhā sadbhir ācāra iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15501: 13,134.057d@015_3632 deśadharmāś ca dṛśyante kuladharmās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15502: 13,134.057d@015_3633 jātidharmāś ca vai dharmā gaṇadharmāś ca śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:15504: 13,134.057d@015_3635 etad dharmasya nānātvaṃ kriyate lokavāsibhiḥ 13,134.057d@015_3636 kāraṇāt tatra tatraiva phalaṃ dharmasya ceṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15505: 13,134.057d@015_3637 tatkāraṇasamāyoge labhet kurvan phalaṃ naraḥ 13,134.057d@015_3638 anyathā na labhet puṇyam atadarhaḥ samādiśan
GE07mbh_13_u:15506: 13,134.057d@015_3639 evaṃ dharmasya nānātvaṃ phalaṃ kurvaṃl labhen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15507: 13,134.057d@015_3640 śrautaḥ smārtas tu dharmāṇāṃ prākṛto dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15509: 13,134.057d@015_3641 iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi 13,134.057d@015_3642 bhagavan sarvabhūteśa tripurārdana śaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:15510: 13,134.057d@015_3643 śrutaṃ pāpakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ yamaloke varaprada 13,134.057d@015_3644 śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva nṛṇāṃ sukṛtakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:15511: 13,134.057d@015_3645 kathaṃ te bhuñjate lokān svargaloke maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:15512: 13,134.057d@015_3646 kathitāḥ kīdṛśā lokā nṛṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇām 13,134.057d@015_3647 maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15513: 13,134.057d@015_3647 etan me vada deveśa śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me 13,134.057d@015_3648 śṛṇu kalyāṇi tat sarvaṃ yat tvam icchasi bhāmini 13,134.057d@015_3649 vividhāḥ puṇyalokās te karmākarmaṇyatāṃ gatāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3650 meruṃ hi kanakātmānaṃ paritaḥ sarvatodiśam 13,134.057d@015_3651 bhadrāśvaḥ ketumālaś ca uttarāḥ kuravas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15514: 13,134.057d@015_3652 jambūvanādayaḥ svargā ity ete karmavarjitāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3653 teṣu bhogāḥ svayaṃbhūtāḥ pradṛśyante yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15515: 13,134.057d@015_3654 yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ tu ekaikaṃ mānamātrayā 13,134.057d@015_3655 nityapuṣpaphalopetās tatra vṛkṣāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15518: 13,134.057d@015_3658 vicitrāś ca manojñāś ca kūjitaiḥ śobhayanti tān
GE07mbh_13_u:15519: 13,134.057d@015_3659 kuśeśayavanaiś channā nalinyaś ca manoramāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3660 tatra vānty anilā nityaṃ divyagandhāḥ sukhāvahāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15521: 13,134.057d@015_3662 evaṃ bahuvidhā devi divi bhogāḥ sukhāvahāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15522: 13,134.057d@015_3663 striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva sarve sukṛtakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15524: 13,134.057d@015_3665 divyabhūṣaṇasaṃyuktā divyagandhasamanvitāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3666 manoramā mahābhāgāḥ sarve lalitakuṇḍalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15525: 13,134.057d@015_3667 evaṃ tatragatā martyāḥ pramadāḥ priyadarśanāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3668 nānābhāvasamāyuktā yauvanasthāḥ sadaiva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:15526: 13,134.057d@015_3669 kamanīyāḥ kāmayutāḥ kāmajñā lalitās tathā 13,134.057d@015_3670 manonukūlā madhurā bhoginām upakalpitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15527: 13,134.057d@015_3671 pramadāś codbhavanty eva svargaloke yathā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15528: 13,134.057d@015_3672 evaṃvidhāḥ striyaś cātra puruṣāś ca parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:15529: 13,134.057d@015_3673 ramante cendriyaiḥ svasthaiḥ śarīrair bhogasaṃskṛtaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_3674 kāmaharṣau guṇāv āstāṃ nānye krodhādayaḥ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:15530: 13,134.057d@015_3675 kṣut pipāsā na cāsty atra gātrakleśāś ca śobhane 13,134.057d@015_3676 sarvato ramaṇīyaś ca sarvartukusumānvitam
GE07mbh_13_u:15531: 13,134.057d@015_3677 yāvat puṇyaphalaṃ tāvad ramante tatra saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15533: 13,134.057d@015_3679 tatra bhogān yathāyogaṃ bhuktvā puṇyakṣayāt punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15534: 13,134.057d@015_3680 naśyanti jāyamānās te śarīraiḥ sahasā priye
GE07mbh_13_u:15535: 13,134.057d@015_3681 svargalokāt paribhraṣṭā jāyante mānuṣe punaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3682 pūrvapuṇyāvaśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭāḥ saṃbhavanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:15536: 13,134.057d@015_3683 eṣā svargagatiḥ proktā pṛcchantyās tava bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:15537: 13,134.057d@015_3684 ata ūrdhvaṃ padāny aṣṭau karmaṇyāni śṛṇu priye
GE07mbh_13_u:15540: 13,134.057d@015_3687 apsaro dānavā devā yathākramam udāhṛtāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3688 teṣu sthāneṣu jāyante prāṇinaḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3689 teṣām api ca ye lokāḥ svargalokopamāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15541: 13,134.057d@015_3690 svargavat tatra te bhogān bhuñjate ca ramanti ca 13,134.057d@015_3691 rūpasattvabalopetāḥ sarve dīrghāyuṣas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15542: 13,134.057d@015_3692 teṣāṃ sarvakriyārambho mānuṣeṣv eva dṛśyate 13,134.057d@015_3693 atimānuṣam āścaryam astramāyābalātkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:15544: 13,134.057d@015_3695 guṇadoṣāś ca santy atra ākāśagamanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15545: 13,134.057d@015_3696 antardhānaṃ balaṃ sarvam āyuś ca cirajīvanam
GE07mbh_13_u:15546: 13,134.057d@015_3697 tapoviśeṣāj jāyante teṣāṃ karmāṇi bhāmini 13,134.057d@015_3698 devalokapravṛttis tu teṣām eva vidhīyate 13,134.057d@015_3699 na tathā devaloko hi tadviśiṣṭāḥ surāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15547: 13,134.057d@015_3700 tatra bhogam anirdeśyam amṛtatvaṃ ca vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15549: 13,134.057d@015_3702 evam anyac ca tat karma daivatebhyo viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15550: 13,134.057d@015_3703 pratyakṣaṃ tava tat sarvaṃ devalokapravartanam 13,134.057d@015_3704 tasmān na varṇaye devi viditaṃ hi tvayā śubhe 13,134.057d@015_3705 umā
GE07mbh_13_u:15551: 13,134.057d@015_3705 tat sarvaṃ sukṛtenaiva prāpyate cottamaṃ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:15552: 13,134.057d@015_3706 mānuṣeṣv eva jīvatsu gatir vijñāyate na vā
GE07mbh_13_u:15553: 13,134.057d@015_3707 ayaṃ śubhagatir jīvann asau tv aśubhabhāg iti
GE07mbh_13_u:15555: 13,134.057d@015_3708 etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi 13,134.057d@015_3709 tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi jīvatāṃ vidyate yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15557: 13,134.057d@015_3711 manasā karmaṇā vācā pratikūlā bhavanti ye
GE07mbh_13_u:15558: 13,134.057d@015_3712 tādṛśān āsurān viddhi martyās te narakālayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15559: 13,134.057d@015_3713 rāgadveṣayutā ye tu nirlajjā nirapatrapāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3714 darpāhaṃkārasaṃyuktā narā narakagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15560: 13,134.057d@015_3715 nāstikāś ca śaṭhā ghorāḥ pareṣām upatāpinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15562: 13,134.057d@015_3717 duṣpratītamanā yas tu calacitto nirākṛtiḥ 13,134.057d@015_3718 śiśnodararatir mūḍho nirayaṃ yāti so 'dhamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15564: 13,134.057d@015_3720 tādṛśān āsurān viddhi sarve te narakālayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15565: 13,134.057d@015_3721 hiṃsāvihārā ye nityaṃ nirdayāḥ prāṇināśane 13,134.057d@015_3722 svadharmavimukhāś caiva parasveṣv abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15566: 13,134.057d@015_3723 yuddhamātsaryasaṃyuktā grāmyabhogaparāyaṇāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3724 tādṛśān āsurān viddhi narān narakagāminaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3725 darpotsekasamāyuktā mūrkhās tattvabahiṣkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15567: 13,134.057d@015_3726 śrutividveṣiṇo nityaṃ te narā narakālayāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3727 nityaṃ vadanti ye mohād anṛtaṃ kaṭukaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15568: 13,134.057d@015_3728 kṛtaghnāḥ piśunā ghorā bhavanti narakālayāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3729 hiṃsrāś corāś ca dhūrtāś ca paradārābhimarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15572: 13,134.057d@015_3733 lokodvegakarāś cānye paśavaś ca sarīsṛpāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3734 vṛkṣāḥ kaṇṭakino rūkṣās tādṛśān viddhi cāsurān
GE07mbh_13_u:15573: 13,134.057d@015_3735 aparān devapakṣāṃs tu śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:15574: 13,134.057d@015_3736 manovākkarmabhir nityam anukūlā bhavanti ye 13,134.057d@015_3737 tādṛśān amarān viddhi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15575: 13,134.057d@015_3738 śaucārjavaparādhīnāḥ parārthaṃ na haranti ye 13,134.057d@015_3739 ye samāḥ sarvabhūteṣu te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15576: 13,134.057d@015_3740 bhayād vā vṛttihetor vā anṛtaṃ na bruvanti ye 13,134.057d@015_3741 satyaṃ vadanti satataṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15578: 13,134.057d@015_3743 nākāryaṃ manasecchanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3744 daridrā api ye ke cid yācitāḥ prītipūrvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:15579: 13,134.057d@015_3745 dadaty eva ca yat kiṃ cit te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15581: 13,134.057d@015_3747 puṇyakarmaparā nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3748 svaduḥkham iva manyante pareṣāṃ duḥkhavedanām 13,134.057d@015_3749 śaktyā cābhyavapadyante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3750 vratino dānaśīlāś ca sukhaśīlāś ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15582: 13,134.057d@015_3751 ṛjavo mṛdavo nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15583: 13,134.057d@015_3752 guruśuśrūṣaṇaparā devabrāhmaṇapūjakāḥ 13,134.057d@015_3753 kṛtajñāḥ kṛtavidyāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15585: 13,134.057d@015_3755 lobhamātsaryahīnā ye te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3756 nirmamā nirahaṃkārāḥ svānukrośāḥ svabandhuṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:15586: 13,134.057d@015_3757 dīnānukampino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3758 aihikena tu vṛttena pāratram anumīyate 13,134.057d@015_3759 evaṃvidhā narā loke jīvantaḥ svargagāminaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3760 yad anyac ca śubhaṃ loke prajānugrahakāri ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15587: 13,134.057d@015_3761 paśavaś caiva vṛkṣāś ca prajānāṃ hitakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15588: 13,134.057d@015_3762 tādṛśān devapakṣasthān iti viddhi śubhānane 13,134.057d@015_3763 śubhāśubhamayaṃ loke sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:15590: 13,134.057d@015_3764 daivaṃ śubham iti prāhur āsuraṃ hy aśubhaṃ priye 13,134.057d@015_3765 bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit kāladharmam upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15591: 13,134.057d@015_3766 prāṇamokṣaṃ kathaṃ kṛtvā paratra hitam āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15593: 13,134.057d@015_3767 hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:15594: 13,134.057d@015_3768 dvividhaṃ maraṇaṃ loke svabhāvād yatnatas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15595: 13,134.057d@015_3769 tayoḥ svabhāvaṃ nopāyaṃ yatnajaṃ kāraṇodbhavam 13,134.057d@015_3770 etayor ubhayor devi vidhānaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:15597: 13,134.057d@015_3772 yatnajaṃ nāma maraṇam ātmatyāgo mumūrṣayā 13,134.057d@015_3773 tatrākalyaśarīrasya jarā vyādhiś ca kāraṇam 13,134.057d@015_3774 mahāprasthānagamanaṃ tathā prāyopaveśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:15599: 13,134.057d@015_3776 evaṃ caturvidhaḥ prokta ātmatyāgo mumūrṣatām 13,134.057d@015_3777 eteṣāṃ kramayogena vidhānaṃ śṛṇu śobhane 13,134.057d@015_3778 svadharmayuktaṃ gārhasthyaṃ ciram ūḍhvā vidhānataḥ 13,134.057d@015_3779 tatrānṛṇyaṃ ca saṃprāpya vṛddho vā vyādhito 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:15600: 13,134.057d@015_3780 darśayitvā svadaurbalyaṃ sarvān evānumānya ca 13,134.057d@015_3781 saṃvidhāya svabandhūṃś ca karmaṇāṃ bharaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15601: 13,134.057d@015_3782 dānāni vidhivat kṛtvā dharmakāryārtham ātmanaḥ 13,134.057d@015_3783 anujñāpya janaṃ sarvaṃ vācā madhurayā bruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:15602: 13,134.057d@015_3784 ahataṃ vastram ācchādya baddhvā tat kuśarajjunā
GE07mbh_13_u:15604: 13,134.057d@015_3786 parityajya tato grāmaṃ paścāt kuryād yathepsitam
GE07mbh_13_u:15605: 13,134.057d@015_3787 mahāprasthānam icchec cet pratiṣṭhetottarāṃ diśam 13,134.057d@015_3788 bhūtvā tāvan nirāhāro yāvat prāṇavimokṣaṇam 13,134.057d@015_3789 ceṣṭāhānau śayitvāpi tanmanāḥ prāṇam utsṛjet 13,134.057d@015_3790 evaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān amalān pratipadyate 13,134.057d@015_3791 prāyopaveśanaṃ cecchet tenaiva vidhinā naraḥ 13,134.057d@015_3792 deśe puṇyatame śreṣṭhe nirāhāras tu saṃviśet
GE07mbh_13_u:15606: 13,134.057d@015_3793 āprāṇāntaṃ śucir bhūtvā kurvan dānaṃ svaśaktitaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:15737: 13,134.057d@015_3994 evaṃ sarvopabhogeṣu svalpam asya prayojanam 13,134.057d@015_3995 taṇḍulaprasthamātreṇa yātrā syāt sarvadehinām
GE07mbh_13_u:15738: 13,134.057d@015_3996 tato bhūyastaro bhāgo duḥkhāya patanāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15739: 13,134.057d@015_3997 nāsti tṛṣṇāsamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:15740: 13,134.057d@015_3998 sarvān kāmān parityajya brahmabhūyāya kalpate 13,134.057d@015_3999 yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15741: 13,134.057d@015_4000 yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:15742: 13,134.057d@015_4001 na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati
GE07mbh_13_u:15744: 13,134.057d@015_4003 alābheneha kāmānāṃ kāmāṃs tyajati paṇḍitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4004 āyāsavikaṭas tīvraḥ kāmāgnis tarṣaṇāraṇiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15745: 13,134.057d@015_4005 indriyārtheṣu saṃmohāt pacaty akuśalaṃ janam 13,134.057d@015_4006 yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15746: 13,134.057d@015_4007 nālam ekasya paryāptam iti paśyan na muhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:15747: 13,134.057d@015_4008 yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:15750: 13,134.057d@015_4011 manaḥṣaṣṭhāni saṃyamya nityam ātmani yojayet 13,134.057d@015_4012 indriyāṇāṃ visargeṇa doṣam ṛcchaty asaṃśayam 13,134.057d@015_4013 saṃniyamya tu tāny eva tataḥ siddhim avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15752: 13,134.057d@015_4015 na sa pāpair na cānarthaiḥ saṃyujyeta vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15753: 13,134.057d@015_4016 apramattaḥ sadā rakṣed indriyāṇi vicakṣaṇaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4017 arakṣiteṣu teṣv āśu naro narakam eti hi
GE07mbh_13_u:15756: 13,134.057d@015_4020 roṣalobhamahāskandhaḥ purāduṣkṛtasāravān 13,134.057d@015_4021 āyāsaviṭapas tīvraḥ śokapuṣpo bhayāṅkuraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15757: 13,134.057d@015_4022 nānāsaṃkalpapatrāḍhyaḥ pramādaparivardhitaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4023 mahatībhiḥ pipāsābhiḥ samantāt parivardhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15759: 13,134.057d@015_4025 naiva rohati tattvajñe rūḍho vā chidyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15760: 13,134.057d@015_4026 kṛcchropāyeṣv anityeṣu niḥsāreṣu caleṣu ca 13,134.057d@015_4027 duḥkhādiṣu duranteṣu kāmabhogeṣu kā ratiḥ 13,134.057d@015_4028 yena saṃvatsaro dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt kāmaś ca sevitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15761: 13,134.057d@015_4029 tena sarvam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ punarāvartakaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:15762: 13,134.057d@015_4030 bhogā bhuktā manuṣyeṇa svapnā iva bhavanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:15764: 13,134.057d@015_4032 indriyeṣu ca jīryatsu chidyamāne tathāyuṣi 13,134.057d@015_4033 purastāc ca sthite mṛtyau kiṃ sukhaṃ paśyataḥ śubhe 13,134.057d@015_4034 vyādhibhiḥ pīḍyamānasya nityaṃ śārīramānasaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15765: 13,134.057d@015_4035 narasyākṛtakṛtyasya kiṃ sukhaṃ bhavati priye 13,134.057d@015_4036 saṃcinvānakam evārthaṃ kāmānām avitṛptakam
GE07mbh_13_u:15766: 13,134.057d@015_4037 vyāghraḥ paśum ivāraṇye mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:15769: 13,134.057d@015_4039 saṃsāre pacyamānas tu pāpān nodvijate janaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15771: 13,134.057d@015_4041 yady asti bhagavan mahyam etad ācakṣva māciram
GE07mbh_13_u:15772: 13,134.057d@015_4042 tapasā vā sumahatā karmaṇā vā śrutena vā
GE07mbh_13_u:15776: 13,134.057d@015_4045 sarvalokeṣu jānīhi mokṣād anyatra bhāmini 13,134.057d@015_4046 na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasāpi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:15777: 13,134.057d@015_4047 maraṇaṃ nātivartante vinā muktyā śarīriṇaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4048 aśvamedhasahasreṇa vājapeyaśatena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15778: 13,134.057d@015_4049 na taranti jarāmṛtyū nirvāṇādhigamād vinā 13,134.057d@015_4050 aiśvaryaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ ca vidyā lābhas tapas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15779: 13,134.057d@015_4051 rasāyanaprayogaś ca na taranti jarāntakau 13,134.057d@015_4052 dānayajñatapaḥśīlā rasāyanavido 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:15780: 13,134.057d@015_4053 svādhyāyaniratā vāpi na taranti jarāntakau 13,134.057d@015_4054 devadānavagandharvakiṃnaroragarākṣasān
GE07mbh_13_u:15781: 13,134.057d@015_4055 svavaśe kurute kālo na kālasyāsty agocaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15782: 13,134.057d@015_4056 na hy ahāni nivartante na māsā na punaḥ kṣapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15784: 13,134.057d@015_4058 sravanti na nivartante srotāṃsi saritām iva
GE07mbh_13_u:15785: 13,134.057d@015_4059 āyur ādāya martyānām ahorātrāṇi saṃtatam 13,134.057d@015_4060 jīvitaṃ sarvabhūtānām akṣayaḥ kṣapayann asau 13,134.057d@015_4061 ādityo hy astam abhyeti punaḥ punar udeti ca 13,134.057d@015_4062 yasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām āyur alpataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:15786: 13,134.057d@015_4063 gādhodake matsya iva kiṃ nu tasya kumāratā
GE07mbh_13_u:15787: 13,134.057d@015_4064 maraṇaṃ hi śarīrasya niyataṃ dhruvam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15788: 13,134.057d@015_4065 tiṣṭhann eva kṣaṇaṃ sarvaḥ kālasyaiti vaśaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15789: 13,134.057d@015_4066 na mriyeran na jīryeran yadi syuḥ sarvadehinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15790: 13,134.057d@015_4067 na cāniṣṭaṃ pravarteta śoko vā prāṇināṃ kva cit 13,134.057d@015_4068 apramattaḥ pramatteṣu kālo bhūteṣu tiṣṭhati 13,134.057d@015_4069 apramattasya kālasya kṣayaṃ prāpto na mucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15791: 13,134.057d@015_4070 śvaḥ kāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikam
GE07mbh_13_u:15792: 13,134.057d@015_4071 ko hi tad veda yatrāsau mṛtyunā nābhivīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15793: 13,134.057d@015_4072 varṣāsv idaṃ kariṣyāmi idaṃ grīṣmavasantayoḥ 13,134.057d@015_4073 iti bālaś cintayati antarāyaṃ na budhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15794: 13,134.057d@015_4074 idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād ity evaṃmanaso narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15795: 13,134.057d@015_4075 anavāpteṣu kāmeṣu hriyante maraṇaṃ prati 13,134.057d@015_4076 kālapāśena baddhānām ahany ahani jīryatām 13,134.057d@015_4077 kā śraddhā prāṇināṃ mārge viṣame bhramatāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:15796: 13,134.057d@015_4078 yuvaiva dharmaśīlaḥ syād animittaṃ hi jīvitam
GE07mbh_13_u:15797: 13,134.057d@015_4079 phalānām iva pakvānāṃ sadā hi patanād bhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:15798: 13,134.057d@015_4080 martyasya kim u tair dāraiḥ putrair bhogaiḥ priyair api
GE07mbh_13_u:15799: 13,134.057d@015_4081 ekāhnā sarvam utsṛjya mṛtyor hi vaśam eyivān
GE07mbh_13_u:15800: 13,134.057d@015_4082 jāyamānāṃś ca saṃprekṣya mriyamāṇāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:15801: 13,134.057d@015_4083 na saṃvego 'sti cet puṃsaḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamo hi saḥ 13,134.057d@015_4084 vināśino hy adhruvajīvitasya
GE07mbh_13_u:15803: 13,134.057d@015_4086 vihāya yad gacchati sarvam eva 13,134.057d@015_4087 kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate ca 13,134.057d@015_4088 evaṃ cintayato nityaṃ sarvārthānām anityatām 13,134.057d@015_4089 udvego jāyate nityaṃ nirvāṇasya puraḥsaraḥ 13,134.057d@015_4090 tenodvegena cāpy asya vimarśo jāyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15805: 13,134.057d@015_4092 vairāgyeṇa parāṃ śāntiṃ labhante mānavāḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:15806: 13,134.057d@015_4093 mokṣasyopaniṣad devi vairāgyam iti kīrtitam 13,134.057d@015_4094 etat te kathitaṃ devi vairāgyotpādanaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15808: 13,134.057d@015_4095 etat sarvaṃ hi saṃcintya mucyante hi mumukṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15809: 13,134.057d@015_4096 sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat te śucismite 13,134.057d@015_4097 yaj jñātvā na punar martyaḥ saṃsāreṣu pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:15810: 13,134.057d@015_4098 jñānenaiva vimuktās te sāṃkhyāḥ saṃnyāsakovidāḥ 13,134.057d@015_4099 śārīraṃ tu tapo ghoraṃ sāṃkhyāḥ prāhur nirarthakam
GE07mbh_13_u:15811: 13,134.057d@015_4100 pañcaviṃśatikaṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ jñānam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:15812: 13,134.057d@015_4101 mūlaprakṛtir avyaktam avyaktāj jāyate mahān 13,134.057d@015_4102 mahato 'bhūd ahaṃkāras tasmāt tanmātrapañcakam
GE07mbh_13_u:15813: 13,134.057d@015_4103 indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca tanmātrebhyo bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:15814: 13,134.057d@015_4104 tebhyo bhūtāni pañca syur iti kṣetrasamuccayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15815: 13,134.057d@015_4105 asya kṣetrasya saṃkṣepaś caturviṃśatir iṣyate 13,134.057d@015_4106 pañcaviṃśatir ity āhuḥ puruṣeṇeha saṃkhyayā 13,134.057d@015_4107 sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15816: 13,134.057d@015_4108 taiḥ sṛjaty akhilaṃ lokaṃ prakṛtiḥ svātmajair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15817: 13,134.057d@015_4109 icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15818: 13,134.057d@015_4110 vikārāḥ prakṛteś caite veditavyā manīṣibhiḥ 13,134.057d@015_4111 lakṣaṇaṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ vikalpaṃ cāditaḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_13_u:15819: 13,134.057d@015_4112 vistareṇa pravakṣyāmi tasya vyākhyām imāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:15820: 13,134.057d@015_4113 nityam ekam aṇu vyāpi kriyāhīnam ahetukam
GE07mbh_13_u:15821: 13,134.057d@015_4114 agrāhyam indriyaiḥ sarvair etad avyaktalakṣaṇam 13,134.057d@015_4115 avyaktaṃ prakṛtir mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ yonir avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:15823: 13,134.057d@015_4117 tat sūkṣmatvād anirdeśyaṃ tat sad ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15824: 13,134.057d@015_4118 tanmūlaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ tanmūlā sṛṣṭir iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15825: 13,134.057d@015_4119 sattvādayaḥ prakṛtijā guṇās tān prabravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:15826: 13,134.057d@015_4120 sukhaṃ tuṣṭiḥ prakāśaś ca trayas te sāttvikā guṇāḥ 13,134.057d@015_4121 rāgadveṣau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ stambhaś ca rajaso guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15827: 13,134.057d@015_4122 aprakāśo bhayaṃ mohas tandrī ca tamaso guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15828: 13,134.057d@015_4123 śraddhā praharṣo vijñānam asaṃmoho dayā dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15829: 13,134.057d@015_4124 sattve pravṛddhe vardhante viparīte viparyayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4125 kāmaḥ krodho manastāpo droho lobhas tathā tṛṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:15830: 13,134.057d@015_4126 pravṛddhe parivardhante rajasy etāni nityaśaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4127 viṣādaḥ saṃśayo mohas tandrī nidrā bhayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15831: 13,134.057d@015_4128 tamasy etāni vardhante pravṛddhe hetvahetubhiḥ 13,134.057d@015_4129 evam anyonyam etāni vardhante ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15832: 13,134.057d@015_4130 hīyante ca tathā nityam abhibhūtāni bhūribhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15833: 13,134.057d@015_4131 tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:15834: 13,134.057d@015_4132 vartate sāttviko bhāva ity upekṣeta tat tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15836: 13,134.057d@015_4134 vartate raja ity evaṃ tadā tad abhicintayet
GE07mbh_13_u:15837: 13,134.057d@015_4135 yadā saṃmohasaṃyuktaṃ yad viṣādakaraṃ bhavet 13,134.057d@015_4136 apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayet 13,134.057d@015_4137 samāsāt sāttviko dharmaḥ samāsād rājasaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:15838: 13,134.057d@015_4138 samāsāt tāmasaḥ kāmas trivarge triguṇakramāt 13,134.057d@015_4139 brahmādidevasṛṣṭir yā sāttvikīti prakīrtyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15839: 13,134.057d@015_4140 rājasī mānuṣī sṛṣṭis tiryagyonis tu tāmasī
GE07mbh_13_u:15840: 13,134.057d@015_4141 ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15843: 13,134.057d@015_4144 ādiprabhṛti saṃyuktaṃ vyāptam ebhis tribhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15844: 13,134.057d@015_4145 ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi mahadādīni liṅgataḥ 13,134.057d@015_4146 vijñānaṃ ca vivekaś ca mahato lakṣaṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:15845: 13,134.057d@015_4147 mahān buddhir matiḥ prajñā nāmāni mahato viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15847: 13,134.057d@015_4149 abhimānaḥ punas tatra mahato vaikṛtād bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:15848: 13,134.057d@015_4150 ahaṃkāraḥ sa vijñeyo lakṣaṇena samāsataḥ 13,134.057d@015_4151 ahaṃkāreṇa bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayau
GE07mbh_13_u:15850: 13,134.057d@015_4153 khaṃ vāyur agniḥ salilaṃ pṛthivī ceti pañcamī
GE07mbh_13_u:15852: 13,134.057d@015_4155 śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:15853: 13,134.057d@015_4156 sparśas tvak prāṇināṃ ceṣṭā pavanasya guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15854: 13,134.057d@015_4157 rūpaṃ pāko 'kṣiṇī jyotiś catvāras tejaso guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15855: 13,134.057d@015_4158 rasaḥ snehas tathā jihvā śaityaṃ ca jalajā guṇāḥ 13,134.057d@015_4159 gandho ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivyās te guṇās trayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4160 iti sarvaguṇā devi vyākhyātāḥ pāñcabhautikāḥ 13,134.057d@015_4161 guṇān pūrvasya pūrvasya prāpnuvanty uttarāṇi tu
GE07mbh_13_u:15856: 13,134.057d@015_4162 tasmān naikaguṇāś ceha dṛśyante bhūtasṛṣṭayaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4163 upalabhyāpsu ye gandhaṃ ke cid brūyur anaipuṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15857: 13,134.057d@015_4164 apāṃ gandhaguṇaṃ prājñā necchanti kamalekṣaṇe 13,134.057d@015_4165 tad gandhatvam apāṃ nāsti pṛthivyā eva tadguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15858: 13,134.057d@015_4166 bhūmer gandho rase sneho jyotiś cakṣuṣi saṃsthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:15859: 13,134.057d@015_4167 prāṇāpānāśrayo vāyuḥ kheṣv ākāśaḥ śarīriṇām 13,134.057d@015_4168 keśāsthinakhadantatvakpāṇipādaśirāṃsi ca 13,134.057d@015_4169 pṛṣṭhodarakaṭigrīvāḥ sarvaṃ bhūmyātmakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:15860: 13,134.057d@015_4170 yat kiṃ cid api kāye 'smin dhātudoṣamalāśritam
GE07mbh_13_u:15861: 13,134.057d@015_4171 tat sarvaṃ bhautikaṃ viddhi dehe naivāsty abhautikam
GE07mbh_13_u:15862: 13,134.057d@015_4172 buddhīndriyāṇi karṇas tvag akṣi jihvātha nāsikā
GE07mbh_13_u:15863: 13,134.057d@015_4173 karmendriyāṇi vāk pāṇiḥ pādo meḍhraṃ gudaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15864: 13,134.057d@015_4174 śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15865: 13,134.057d@015_4175 buddhīndriyārthāñ jānīyād bhūtebhyas tv abhiniḥsṛtān 13,134.057d@015_4176 vākyaṃ kriyā gatiḥ prītir utsargaś ceti pañcadhā
GE07mbh_13_u:15866: 13,134.057d@015_4177 karmendriyārthāñ jānīyāt te ca bhūtodbhavā matāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15867: 13,134.057d@015_4178 indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣām īśvaraṃ mana ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15868: 13,134.057d@015_4179 prārthanālakṣaṇaṃ tac ca indriyaṃ tu manaḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:15869: 13,134.057d@015_4180 niyuṅkte ca sadā tāni bhūtātmā manasā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:15870: 13,134.057d@015_4181 niyame ca visarge ca manasaḥ kāraṇaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15871: 13,134.057d@015_4182 indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca svabhāvaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ 13,134.057d@015_4183 bhūtābhūtavikāraś ca śarīram iti saṃjñitam 13,134.057d@015_4184 śarīrāc ca paro dehī śarīraṃ ca vyapāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15872: 13,134.057d@015_4185 śarīriṇaḥ śarīrasya yo 'ntaraṃ vetti vai muniḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:15881: 13,134.057d@015_4199 bahudhā sarvabhūtāni vyāpya tiṣṭhati śāśvataḥ 13,134.057d@015_4200 kṣetrajñam ekataḥ kṛtvā sarvaṃ kṣetram athaikataḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:15886: 13,134.057d@015_4205 puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyate 13,134.057d@015_4206 ajaro 'yam acintyo 'yam avyakto 'yaṃ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15887: 13,134.057d@015_4207 dehe tejomayo dehī tiṣṭhatīty apare viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15888: 13,134.057d@015_4208 jñānam ūṣmā ca vāyuś ca śarīre jīvasaṃjñitaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:15891: 13,134.057d@015_4211 bruvate ke cid atraiva tile tailavad āsthitam

GE07mbh_13_u:15894: 13,134.057d@015_4215 ūhavān brāhmaṇo loke nityam avyayam akṣaram

GE07mbh_13_u:15901: 13,134.057d@015_4222 sāṃkhyajñānena yuktānāṃ tad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:15902: 13,134.057d@015_4223 yogadharmaṃ punaḥ kṛtsnaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:15903: 13,134.057d@015_4224 sa ca yogo dvidhā bhinno brahmadevarṣisevitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15905: 13,134.057d@015_4226 sa cāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryam adhikṛtya vidhīyate 13,134.057d@015_4227 sāyujyaṃ sarvadevānāṃ yogadharmaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4228 jñānaṃ sarvasya yogasya mūlam ity avadhāraya
GE07mbh_13_u:15906: 13,134.057d@015_4229 vratopavāsaniyamais tais tais tat paribṛṃhayet 13,134.057d@015_4230 aikātmyaṃ buddhimanasor indriyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4231 ātmany avyayini prājñe jñānam etat tu yoginām
GE07mbh_13_u:15907: 13,134.057d@015_4232 arcayed brāhmaṇān agnīn devatāyatanāni ca 13,134.057d@015_4233 varjayed aśivāṃ vācaṃ bhavet sattvam upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15908: 13,134.057d@015_4234 dānam adhyayanaṃ śraddhā vratāni niyamās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15909: 13,134.057d@015_4235 samyag āhāraśuddhiś ca śaucam indriyanigrahaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4236 etais tu vardhate tejaḥ pāpaṃ cāpy avadhūyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15910: 13,134.057d@015_4237 dhūtapāpmā ca tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4238 niḥśoko nirmalo dāntaḥ paścād yogaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:15911: 13,134.057d@015_4239 avadadhyān manaḥ pūrvaṃ matsyaghāta ivāmiṣam 13,134.057d@015_4240 ekānte vijane deśe sarvataḥ saṃvṛte śucau
GE07mbh_13_u:15912: 13,134.057d@015_4241 kalpayed āsanaṃ tatra svāstīrṇaṃ mṛdubhiḥ kuśaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15914: 13,134.057d@015_4243 avyagraḥ sukham āsīnaḥ svāṅgāni na vikampayet
GE07mbh_13_u:15915: 13,134.057d@015_4244 saṃprekṣya nāsikāgraṃ svaṃ diśaś cānavalokayan 13,134.057d@015_4245 bhruvor madhye manaḥ kṛtvā cintayitvā śarīriṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:15916: 13,134.057d@015_4246 yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram
GE07mbh_13_u:15917: 13,134.057d@015_4247 tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet
GE07mbh_13_u:15920: 13,134.057d@015_4250 tvak śrotraṃ ca tato jihvāṃ ghrāṇaṃ cakṣuś ca saṃharet
GE07mbh_13_u:15921: 13,134.057d@015_4251 pañcendriyāṇi saṃdhāya manasi sthāpayed budhaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4252 sarvaṃ cāpohya saṃkalpam ātmani sthāpayen manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15923: 13,134.057d@015_4254 prāṇāpānau tadā tasya yugapat tiṣṭhato vaśe
GE07mbh_13_u:15924: 13,134.057d@015_4255 prāṇe hi vaśam āpanne yogasiddhir dhruvā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:15925: 13,134.057d@015_4256 śarīraṃ cintayet sarvaṃ vipāṭya ca samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15927: 13,134.057d@015_4258 tato mūrdhānam agniṃ ca śārīraṃ paripālayan
GE07mbh_13_u:15928: 13,134.057d@015_4259 prāṇo mūrdhani cāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate
GE07mbh_13_u:15929: 13,134.057d@015_4260 sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15930: 13,134.057d@015_4261 mano buddhir ahaṃkāro bhūtāni viṣayāṃś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15931: 13,134.057d@015_4262 bastimūlaṃ gudaṃ caiva pāvakaṃ ca samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15932: 13,134.057d@015_4263 vahan mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ cāpy apānaḥ parivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:15933: 13,134.057d@015_4264 adhaḥpravṛttir deheṣu karmāpānasya tan matam 13,134.057d@015_4265 udīrayan sarvadhātūn ata ūrdhvaṃ pravartate 13,134.057d@015_4266 udāna iti taṃ vidyur adhyātmakuśalā janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15935: 13,134.057d@015_4268 śarīreṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ vyāna ity upadiśyate 13,134.057d@015_4269 dhātuṣv agnau ca vitataḥ samāno 'gniḥ samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15936: 13,134.057d@015_4270 sa eva sarvaceṣṭānām antakāle nivartakaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4271 prāṇānāṃ saṃnipāteṣu saṃsargād yaḥ prajāyate 13,134.057d@015_4272 ūṣmā so 'gnir iti jñeyaḥ so 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām 13,134.057d@015_4273 apānaprāṇayor madhye prāṇāpānasamāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15937: 13,134.057d@015_4274 samanvitaḥ samānena samyak pacati pāvakaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4275 adhas tv agnir apānena prāṇena paripālyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15938: 13,134.057d@015_4276 pṛṣṭhatas tu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15939: 13,134.057d@015_4277 śarīramadhye nābhiḥ syān nābhyām agniḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15940: 13,134.057d@015_4278 agnau prāṇāś ca saṃsaktāḥ prāṇeṣv ātmā vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15941: 13,134.057d@015_4279 pakvāśayas tv adho nābher ūrdhvam āmāśayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15942: 13,134.057d@015_4280 nābhir madhye śarīrasya sarvaprāṇās tam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15943: 13,134.057d@015_4281 sthitāḥ prāṇādayaḥ sarve tiryag ūrdhvam adhaścarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15944: 13,134.057d@015_4282 vahanty annarasān nāḍyo daśa prāṇapracoditāḥ 13,134.057d@015_4283 yoginām eṣa mārgas tu pañcasv eteṣu tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:15945: 13,134.057d@015_4284 jitaśramaḥ samāsīno mūrdhany ātmānam ādadhet 13,134.057d@015_4285 mūrdhany ātmānam ādhāya bhruvor madhye manas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15946: 13,134.057d@015_4286 saṃnirudhya tataḥ prāṇān ātmānaṃ cintayet param
GE07mbh_13_u:15947: 13,134.057d@015_4287 prāṇe tv apānaṃ yuñjīta prāṇāṃś cāpānakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:15949: 13,134.057d@015_4289 evam antaḥ prayuñjīta pañca prāṇān parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:15950: 13,134.057d@015_4290 vijane saṃmitāhāro munis tūṣṇīṃ nirucchvasan 13,134.057d@015_4291 aśrāntaś cintayed yogam utthāya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15951: 13,134.057d@015_4292 tiṣṭhan gacchan svapan vāpi yuñjītaivam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15952: 13,134.057d@015_4293 evaṃ niyuñjatas tasya yogino yuktacetasaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4294 prasīdati manaḥ kṣipraṃ prasanne dṛśyate paraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15953: 13,134.057d@015_4295 vidhūma iva dīpto 'gnir āditya iva raśmimān
GE07mbh_13_u:15955: 13,134.057d@015_4297 dṛṣṭvā tad ātmāno jyotir aiśvaryāṣṭaguṇair yutam
GE07mbh_13_u:15956: 13,134.057d@015_4298 prāpnoti paramaṃ sthānaṃ spṛhaṇīyaṃ surair api
GE07mbh_13_u:15957: 13,134.057d@015_4299 imān yogasya doṣāṃś ca daśaiva paricakṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:15958: 13,134.057d@015_4300 doṣair vighno varārohe yogināṃ kavibhiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15959: 13,134.057d@015_4301 kāmaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ svapnaṃ sneham atyaśanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15960: 13,134.057d@015_4302 vaicityaṃ vyādhim ālasyaṃ lobhaṃ ca daśamaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:15961: 13,134.057d@015_4303 etais teṣāṃ bhaved vighno daśabhir devakāritaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15962: 13,134.057d@015_4304 tasmād etān apāsyādau yuñjīta capalaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15963: 13,134.057d@015_4305 imān api guṇān aṣṭau yogasya paricakṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:15964: 13,134.057d@015_4306 guṇais tair aṣṭabhir dravyam aiśvaryam adhigamyate
GE07mbh_13_u:15965: 13,134.057d@015_4307 aṇimā mahimā caiva prāptiḥ prākāśyalāghave 13,134.057d@015_4308 īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca yatrakāmāvasāyitā 13,134.057d@015_4309 etān aṣṭau guṇān prāpya kathaṃ cid yogināṃ varāḥ 13,134.057d@015_4310 īśāḥ sarvasya lokasya devān apy atiśerate
GE07mbh_13_u:15973: 13,134.057d@015_4318 sāyujyaṃ prāpyate devair yatnena mahatā cirāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15974: 13,134.057d@015_4319 havibhir arcanair homaiḥ praṇāmair nityacintayā 13,134.057d@015_4320 arcayitvā yathāśakti svakaṃ devaṃ viśanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:15975: 13,134.057d@015_4321 sāyujyānāṃ viśiṣṭe dve māmakaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:15976: 13,134.057d@015_4322 māṃ prāpya na nivartante viṣṇuṃ vā śubhalocane
GE07mbh_13_u:15977: 13,134.057d@015_4323 iti te kathito devi yogadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15979: 13,134.057d@015_4324 na śakyaṃ praṣṭum apy anyair yogadharmas tvayā vinā 13,134.057d@015_4325 triyakṣa tridaśaśreṣṭha tryambaka tridaśādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:15982: 13,134.057d@015_4328 namas te lokapāleśa lokapāla varaprada 13,134.057d@015_4329 naikaśākham aparyantam adhyātmajñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:15984: 13,134.057d@015_4331 bhavatā parituṣṭena śṛṇvantyā mama bhāṣitam 13,134.057d@015_4332 idānīṃ śrotum icchāmi sāyujyaṃ tvadgataṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:15985: 13,134.057d@015_4333 kathaṃ paricaranty ete bhaktās tvāṃ parameṣṭhinam
GE07mbh_13_u:15986: 13,134.057d@015_4334 ācāraḥ kīdṛśas teṣāṃ kena tuṣṭo bhaved bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:15988: 13,134.057d@015_4335 varṇyamānaṃ tvayā sākṣāt prīṇayaty adhikaṃ hi mām
GE07mbh_13_u:15989: 13,134.057d@015_4336 hanta te kathayiṣyāmi mama sāyujyam adbhutam
GE07mbh_13_u:15990: 13,134.057d@015_4337 yena tena nivartante yuktāḥ paramayoginaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4338 avyakto 'ham acintyo 'haṃ pūrvair api maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15991: 13,134.057d@015_4339 sāṃkhyayogau mayā sṛṣṭau sarvaṃ cāpi carācaram
GE07mbh_13_u:15993: 13,134.057d@015_4341 ahaṃ prasanno bhaktānāṃ dadāmy amaratām api
GE07mbh_13_u:15994: 13,134.057d@015_4342 na māṃ viduḥ suragaṇā munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:15995: 13,134.057d@015_4343 tvatpriyārtham ahaṃ devi madvibhūtiṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:15997: 13,134.057d@015_4345 madbhaktān nirmalān puṇyān samānīya tapasvinaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4346 vyācakhye 'haṃ tadā devi yogaṃ pāśupataṃ mahat 13,134.057d@015_4347 gṛhītaṃ tac ca taiḥ sarvaṃ mukhāc ca mama dakṣiṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:15998: 13,134.057d@015_4348 śrutvā ca triṣu lokeṣu sthāpitaṃ cāpi taiḥ punaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4349 idānīṃ ca tvayā pṛṣṭas tvatpriyārtham anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:15999: 13,134.057d@015_4350 tat sarvaṃ kathayiṣyāmi tat tvam ekamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:16000: 13,134.057d@015_4351 ahaṃ paśupatir nāma madbhaktā ye ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16002: 13,134.057d@015_4353 rakṣārthaṃ maṅgalārthaṃ ca pavitrārthaṃ ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:16003: 13,134.057d@015_4354 liṅgārthaṃ caiva bhaktānāṃ bhasma dattaṃ mayā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:16006: 13,134.057d@015_4357 vikṛtāḥ piṅgalābhāś ca nagnā nānāprahāriṇaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4358 bhaikṣaṃ carantaḥ sarvatra niḥspṛhā niṣparigrahāḥ 13,134.057d@015_4359 kapālahastā madbhaktā manniveśitabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16007: 13,134.057d@015_4360 caranto nikhilaṃ lokaṃ mama harṣavivardhanāḥ 13,134.057d@015_4361 mama pāśupataṃ divyaṃ yogaśāstram anuttamam 13,134.057d@015_4362 sūkṣmaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu vimṛśantaś caranti te
GE07mbh_13_u:16009: 13,134.057d@015_4364 upāyaṃ cintayāmy āśu yena mām upayānti te
GE07mbh_13_u:16010: 13,134.057d@015_4365 sthāpitaṃ triṣu lokeṣu śivaliṅgaṃ mayā priye
GE07mbh_13_u:16011: 13,134.057d@015_4366 namaskāreṇa vā tasya mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ 13,134.057d@015_4367 iṣṭaṃ dattam adhītaṃ ca yajñāś ca sahadakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16013: 13,134.057d@015_4369 arcayā śivaliṅgasya parituṣyāmy ahaṃ priye 13,134.057d@015_4370 śivaliṅgārcanāyāṃ tu vidhānam api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:16014: 13,134.057d@015_4371 gokṣīranavanītābhyām arcayed yaḥ śivaṃ mama 13,134.057d@015_4372 iṣṭasya hayamedhasya yat phalaṃ tasya tad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:16015: 13,134.057d@015_4373 ghṛtamaṇḍena yo nityam arcayed dhi śivaṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:16016: 13,134.057d@015_4374 sa phalaṃ prāpnuyān martyo brāhmaṇasyāgnihotriṇaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4375 kevalenāpi toyena snāpayed yaḥ śivaṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:16017: 13,134.057d@015_4376 sa cāpi labhate puṇyaṃ matpriyaś ca bhaven naraḥ 13,134.057d@015_4377 saghṛtaṃ gugguluṃ samyag dhūpayed yaḥ śivāntike
GE07mbh_13_u:16018: 13,134.057d@015_4378 gosavasya tu yajñasya yat phalaṃ tasya tad bhavet 13,134.057d@015_4379 yas tu guggulupiṇḍena kevalenāpi dhūpayet 13,134.057d@015_4380 tasya rukmapradānasya yat phalaṃ tasya tad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:16019: 13,134.057d@015_4381 yas tu nānāvidhaiḥ puṣpair mama liṅgaṃ samarcayet
GE07mbh_13_u:16020: 13,134.057d@015_4382 sa hi dhenusahasrasya dattasya phalam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:16021: 13,134.057d@015_4383 yas tu deśāntaraṃ gatvā śivaliṅgaṃ samarcayet
GE07mbh_13_u:16022: 13,134.057d@015_4384 tasmāt sarvamanuṣyeṣu nāsti me priyakṛttamaḥ 13,134.057d@015_4385 evaṃ nānāvidhair dravyaiḥ śivaliṅgaṃ samarcayet 13,134.057d@015_4386 matprasādān manuṣyeṣu na punar jāyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16023: 13,134.057d@015_4387 arcanābhir namaskārair upahāraiḥ stavair api 13,134.057d@015_4388 bhakto mām arcayen nityaṃ śivaliṅgeṣv atandritaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:16310: 13,134.057d@016_0080 tasya kīrtir jayaś caiva svargaś caiva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:16311: 13,134.057d@016_0081 dharmāṇāṃ deśikaḥ sākṣāt sa bhaviṣyati dharmabhāk
GE07mbh_13_u:16312: 13,134.057d@016_0082 dharmavidbhiḥ sa deveśo namaskāryaḥ sadodyataiḥ 13,134.057d@016_0083 dharma eva paro hi syāt tasminn abhyarcite vibhau 13,134.057d@016_0084 sa hi devo mahātejāḥ prajāhitacikīrṣayā 13,134.057d@016_0085 dharmārthaṃ puruṣavyāghra ṛṣikoṭīḥ sasarja ha 13,134.057d@016_0086 tāḥ sṛṣṭās tena vibhunā parvate gandhamādane
GE07mbh_13_u:16314: 13,134.057d@016_0088 tasmāt sa vāgmī dharmajño namasyo dvijapuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16315: 13,134.057d@016_0089 vandito hi sa vandeta mānito mānayeta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:16316: 13,134.057d@016_0090 arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ pūjitaḥ pratipūjayet 13,134.057d@016_0091 dṛṣṭaḥ paśyed aharahaḥ saṃśritaḥ pratisaṃśrayet 13,134.057d@016_0092 arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ sa devo dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16317: 13,134.057d@016_0093 etat tasyānavadyasya viṣṇor vai paramaṃ vratam
GE07mbh_13_u:16321: 13,134.057d@016_0097 karmaṇā manasā vācā namasyaḥ sa dvijaiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:16323: 13,134.057d@016_0099 eṣa vo 'bhihito mārgo mayā vai munisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16324: 13,134.057d@016_0100 taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvaśo devā dṛṣṭāḥ syur munisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16326: 13,134.057d@016_0102 ahaṃ caiva namasyāmi nityam eva jagatpatim
GE07mbh_13_u:16327: 13,134.057d@016_0103 tatra vas tritayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16328: 13,134.057d@016_0104 samastā hi vayaṃ devās tasya dehe vasāmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:16330: 13,134.057d@016_0106 halī bala iti khyāto bhaviṣyati dharādharaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16331: 13,134.057d@016_0107 triśirās tasya devasya śātakaumbhamayo drumaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0108 dhvajas tṛṇendro devasya bhaviṣyati rathāśritaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0109 śiro nāgair mahābhogaiḥ parikīrṇaṃ mahātmanaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0110 bhaviṣyati mahābāhoḥ sarvalokeśvarasya hi
GE07mbh_13_u:16332: 13,134.057d@016_0111 cintitāni sameṣyanti śastrāṇy astrāṇi caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:16333: 13,134.057d@016_0112 anantaś ca sa evokto bhagavān harir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16334: 13,134.057d@016_0113 samādiṣṭaḥ sa vibudhair darśayantam iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:16335: 13,134.057d@016_0114 suparṇo yasya vīryeṇa kaśyapasyātmajo balī 13,134.057d@016_0115 antaṃ naivāśakad draṣṭuṃ devasya paramātmanaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0116 sa ca śeṣe vicarate parayā vai mudā yutaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0117 antar vasati bhogena parirabhya vasuṃdharām 13,134.057d@016_0118 sa eṣa viṣṇuḥ so 'nanto bhagavān vasudhādharaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0119 yo rāmaḥ sa hṛṣīkeśo yo 'cyutaḥ sa dharādharaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0120 tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau divyau divyavapurdharau 13,134.057d@016_0121 draṣṭavyau mānanīyau ca cakralāṅgaladhāriṇau
GE07mbh_13_u:16336: 13,134.057d@016_0122 eṣa yo 'nugrahaḥ prokto mayā puṇyas tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16338: 13,134.057d@016_0123 yaṃ bhavanto dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pūjayeyuḥ prayatnataḥ 13,134.057d@016_0124 atha vyomni mahāñ śabdaḥ savidyut stanayitnumān
GE07mbh_13_u:16339: 13,134.057d@016_0125 meghaiś ca gaganaṃ nīlaiḥ saṃruddham abhavad ghanaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16340: 13,134.057d@016_0126 prāvṛṣīva ca parjanyo vavṛṣe nirmalaṃ payaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16341: 13,134.057d@016_0127 nabhaś caivābhavad ghoraṃ diśaś ca na cakāśire
GE07mbh_13_u:16342: 13,134.057d@016_0128 tato devagirau tasmin ramye puṇye sanātane
GE07mbh_13_u:16343: 13,134.057d@016_0129 na śarvaṃ bhūtasaṃghaṃ vā dadṛśur munayas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:16344: 13,134.057d@016_0130 vyabhraṃ ca gaganaṃ sadyaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata
GE07mbh_13_u:16345: 13,134.057d@016_0131 tīrthayātrāṃ tato viprā jagmuś cānye yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:16346: 13,134.057d@016_0132 tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā te vismitābhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:16349: 13,134.057d@016_0135 yadartham anuśiṣṭāḥ smo giripṛṣṭhe mahātmanā 13,134.057d@016_0136 dvitīyam adbhutam idaṃ tvattejaḥkṛtam adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:16350: 13,134.057d@016_0137 dṛṣṭvātivismitāḥ kṛṣṇa sā ca naḥ smṛtir āgatā
GE07mbh_13_u:16351: 13,134.057d@016_0138 etat te devadevasya māhātmyaṃ kathitaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:16353: 13,134.057d@016_0140 ity uktaḥ sa tadā kṛṣṇas tapovananivāsibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16354: 13,134.057d@016_0141 mānayām āsa tān sarvān ṛṣīn devakinandanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16355: 13,134.057d@016_0142 atharṣayaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ punas te kṛṣṇam abruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:16357: 13,134.057d@016_0144 na hi naḥ sā ratiḥ svarge yā ca tvaddarśane vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:16358: 13,134.057d@016_0145 tādṛśaṃ ca mahābāho yathāha bhagavān bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16359: 13,134.057d@016_0146 etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ rahasyam arikarśana
GE07mbh_13_u:16360: 13,134.057d@016_0147 tvam eva hy arthatattvajñaḥ pṛṣṭo 'smān pṛcchase sadā 13,134.057d@016_0148 tad asmābhir idaṃ guhyaṃ tvatpriyārtham udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:16361: 13,134.057d@016_0149 na ca te 'viditaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate 13,134.057d@016_0150 janma caiva prasūtiś ca yac cānyat kāraṇaṃ bhuvi 13,134.057d@016_0151 vayaṃ tu baṭucāpalyād aśaktā guhyadhāraṇe 13,134.057d@016_0152 tataḥ sthite tvayi vibho laghutvāt pralapāmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:16362: 13,134.057d@016_0153 na hi kiṃ cit tad āścaryaṃ yan na vetti bhavān iha 13,134.057d@016_0154 divi vā bhuvi vā deva sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:16363: 13,134.057d@016_0155 sādhayāma vayaṃ deva vṛddhiṃ puṣṭim avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_13_u:16364: 13,134.057d@016_0156 putras te sadṛśas tāta viśiṣṭo vā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:16367: 13,134.057d@016_0158 tataḥ praṇamya deveśaṃ yādavaṃ puruṣottamam 13,134.057d@016_0159 pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya prajagmus te maharṣayaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0160 so 'yaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān dīptyā paramayā yutaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0161 vrataṃ yathāvat tac cīrtvā dvārakāṃ punar āgamat
GE07mbh_13_u:16368: 13,134.057d@016_0162 pūrṇe ca daśame māsi putro 'sya paramādbhutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16369: 13,134.057d@016_0163 rukmiṇyāṃ saṃmato jajñe śūro vaṃśadharaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:16370: 13,134.057d@016_0164 sa kāmaḥ sarvajantūnāṃ sarvabhāgavato nṛpa 13,134.057d@016_0165 surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca caraty antargataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:16372: 13,134.057d@016_0167 saṃśritaḥ pāṇḍavān premṇā bhavantaś cainam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16373: 13,134.057d@016_0168 kīrtir lakṣmīr dhṛtiś caiva svargamārgas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:16374: 13,134.057d@016_0169 yatraiṣa saṃsthitas tatra devo viṣṇus trivikramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16375: 13,134.057d@016_0170 sendrā devās trayastriṃśat sthitā nātra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:16376: 13,134.057d@016_0171 ādidevo mahādevo bhūtānāṃ ca pratiśrayaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0172 anādinidhano 'vyakto mahātmā madhusūdanaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0173 svayaṃjāto mahātejāḥ surāṇām arthasiddhaye
GE07mbh_13_u:16377: 13,134.057d@016_0174 sudustarārthatattvasya vaktā kartā ca mādhavaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0175 tava pārtha jayaḥ kṛtsnas tava kīrtis tathātulā
GE07mbh_13_u:16379: 13,134.057d@016_0177 ayaṃ nāthas tavācintyo yasya nārāyaṇo hṛdi
GE07mbh_13_u:16380: 13,134.057d@016_0178 sa bhavān bhūmipādhvaryū raṇāgnau hutavān nṛpān
GE07mbh_13_u:16381: 13,134.057d@016_0179 kṛṣṇaḥ sruveṇa mahatā yugāntāgnisamena vai 13,134.057d@016_0180 duryodhanas tu śocyo 'sau saputrabhrātṛbāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16382: 13,134.057d@016_0181 kṛtavān yo 'budhaḥ kopād dharigāṇḍīvavigraham 13,134.057d@016_0182 daiteyā dānavendrāś ca mahākāyā mahābalāḥ 13,134.057d@016_0183 cakrāgnau kṣayam āpannā dāvāgnau śalabhā iva
GE07mbh_13_u:16383: 13,134.057d@016_0184 pratiyoddhuṃ na śakyo hi mānuṣair eṣa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_13_u:16386: 13,134.057d@016_0187 tejasā hatavān sarvaṃ suyodhanabalaṃ nṛpa 13,134.057d@016_0188 yat tu vai vṛṣabhāṅkena munibhyaḥ samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:16387: 13,134.057d@016_0189 purāṇaṃ himavatpṛṣṭhe tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:16388: 13,134.057d@016_0190 yāvad asyodbhavas tuṣṭis tejo vīryaṃ parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16389: 13,134.057d@016_0191 prabhāvaḥ sannatir janma kṛṣṇe tat tritayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:16390: 13,134.057d@016_0192 na śakyam anyathā kartuṃ tad yadi syāt tathāpy aṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:16391: 13,134.057d@016_0193 yatra kṛṣṇo hi bhagavāṃs tatra tuṣṭir anuttamā
GE07mbh_13_u:16392: 13,134.057d@016_0194 vayaṃ hi bālamatayaḥ paranetrāḥ suviklavāḥ 13,134.057d@016_0195 jñānapūrvaṃ prapannāḥ smo mṛtyoḥ panthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:16393: 13,134.057d@016_0196 bhavāṃś cāpy ārjavaparaḥ sarvaṃ kṛtvā pratiśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:16394: 13,134.057d@016_0197 rājavṛttān na calate pratijñāpālane rataḥ 13,134.057d@016_0198 apy evātmavadhaṃ loke rājaṃs tvaṃ bahu manyase
GE07mbh_13_u:16395: 13,134.057d@016_0199 na hi pratijñayā dattaṃ taṃ prahātum ariṃdama
GE07mbh_13_u:16396: 13,134.057d@016_0200 kālenāyaṃ janaḥ sarvo nihato raṇamūrdhani 13,134.057d@016_0201 vayaṃ ca kālena hatāḥ kālo hi parameśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16397: 13,134.057d@016_0202 na hi kālena kālajña spṛṣṭaḥ śocitum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:16398: 13,134.057d@016_0203 kālo lohitaraktākṣaḥ kṛṣṇo daṇḍī sanātanaḥ 13,134.057d@016_0204 tasmāt kuntīsuta jñātīn neha śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:16399: 13,134.057d@016_0205 vyapetamanyur nityaṃ tvaṃ bhava kauravanandana 13,134.057d@016_0206 mādhavasya ca māhātmyaṃ śrutaṃ yat kathitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:16400: 13,134.057d@016_0207 tad eva tava paryāptaṃ sajjanasya nidarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:16401: 13,134.057d@016_0208 vyāsasya vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16402: 13,134.057d@016_0209 svayaṃ caiva mahārāja kṛṣṇasyārhattamasya vai 13,134.057d@016_0210 prabhāvaś carṣipūgasya kathitaḥ sumahān mayā 13,134.057d@016_0211 maheśvarasya saṃvādaḥ śailaputryāś ca bhārata 13,134.057d@016_0212 dhārayiṣyati yaś cemaṃ mahāpuruṣasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:16403: 13,134.057d@016_0213 śṛṇuyāt kathayed vā yaḥ sa vai śreyo labhet param
GE07mbh_13_u:16404: 13,134.057d@016_0214 bhavitāraś ca tasyātha sarve kāmā yathepsitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16405: 13,134.057d@016_0215 pretya māheśvaraṃ lokaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16407: 13,134.057d@016_0217 eṣa vai cākṣayo vipraiḥ smṛto rājañ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16408: 13,134.057d@016_0218 maheśvaramukhotsṛṣṭā ye ca dharmaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ 13,134.057d@016_0219 te tvayā manasā dhāryāḥ kururāja divāniśam
GE07mbh_13_u:16409: 13,134.057d@016_0220 evaṃ te vartamānasya samyagdaṇḍadharasya ca 13,134.057d@016_0221 prajāpālanadakṣasya svargaloko bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:16410: 13,134.057d@016_0222 dharmeṇa hi sadā rājā prajā rakṣitum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:16411: 13,134.057d@016_0223 yas tasya vipulo daṇḍaḥ samyag dharmaḥ sa kīrtyate 13,134.057d@016_0224 sa eṣa kathito rājan mayā sajjanasaṃnidhau
GE07mbh_13_u:16413: 13,134.057d@016_0226 śrutvā vā śrotukāmo vāpy arcayed vṛṣabhadhvajam
GE07mbh_13_u:16414: 13,134.057d@016_0227 viśuddhena hi bhāvena ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16416: 13,134.057d@016_0229 saṃdeśo devapūjārthaṃ taṃ tathā kuru pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_13_u:16417: 13,134.057d@016_0230 etad atyadbhutaṃ vṛttaṃ puṇyaṃ haimavate girau
GE07mbh_13_u:16418: 13,134.057d@016_0231 vāsudevasya kaunteya sthāṇoś caiva svabhāvajam 13,134.057d@016_0232 daśa varṣasahasrāṇi badaryām eṣa sātvataḥ 13,134.057d@016_0233 tapaś cacāra vipulaṃ saha gāṇḍīvadhanvanā 13,134.057d@016_0234 triyugau puṇḍarīkākṣau vāsudevadhanaṃjayau
GE07mbh_13_u:16419: 13,134.057d@016_0235 viditau nāradād etau mama vyāsāc ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:16420: 13,134.057d@016_0236 bāla eva mahābāhuś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:16422: 13,134.057d@016_0238 karmaṇām asya kaunteya nāntaṃ saṃkhyātum utsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:16424: 13,134.057d@016_0240 dhruvaṃ śreyaḥ paraṃ tāta bhaviṣyati tavottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:16427: 13,134.057d@016_0243 yatkṛte pṛthivī sarvā vinaṣṭā sahayadvipā 13,134.057d@016_0244 duryodhanāparādhena karṇasya śakunes tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:16430: 13,134.057d@016_0246 evaṃ prabhāṣamāṇe tu gāṅgeye puruṣarṣabhe 13,134.057d@016_0247 tūṣṇīṃ babhūva kauravyo madhye teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:16431: 13,134.057d@016_0248 tac chrutvā vismayaṃ jagmur dhṛtarāṣṭrādayo nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16433: 13,134.057d@016_0250 ṛṣayaś cāpi te sarve nāradapramukhās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:16434: 13,134.057d@016_0251 pratigṛhyābhyanandanta tad vākyaṃ pratipūjya ca 13,134.057d@016_0252 ity etad akhilaṃ sarvaṃ pāṇḍavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:16435: 13,134.057d@016_0253 śrutavān sumahac citraṃ puṇyaṃ bhīṣmānuśāsanam 13,134.057d@016_0254 yudhiṣṭhiras tu gāṅgeyaṃ viśrāntaṃ bhūridakṣiṇam 13,134.057d@016_0255 punar eva mahābuddhiḥ paryapṛcchan mahīpatiḥ 13,134.057d@017_0000 yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16436: 13,134.057d@017_0001 ka upāyo varaprāptau sarveṣāṃ pāpakarmaṇām 13,134.057d@017_0002 bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16437: 13,134.057d@017_0002 jñānasya ca parasyeha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:16439: 13,134.057d@017_0004 nārāyaṇasya tu dhyānam arcanaṃ yajanaṃ stutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16440: 13,134.057d@017_0005 śravaṇaṃ tatkathānāṃ ca vidvatsaṃrakṣaṇaṃ tathā 13,134.057d@017_0006 vidvacchuśrūṣaṇaprītir upadeśānupālanam 13,134.057d@017_0007 saṃdhyānena japenāśu mucyate prākṛto 'pi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:16441: 13,134.057d@017_0008 japaś caturvidhaḥ prokto vaidikas tāntriko 'pi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:16442: 13,134.057d@017_0009 paurāṇiko 'tha vidvadbhiḥ kathitaḥ smārta eva ca 13,134.057d@017_0010 dvijaśuśrūṣayā jñānaṃ vidvatsaṃrakṣaṇena vā
GE07mbh_13_u:16443: 13,134.057d@017_0011 nāsādhyaṃ jñānināṃ kiṃ cit tasmād rakṣyā dvijās tvayā 13,134.057d@017_0012 suvratā bandhuhīnaikā vane pūrvaṃ yamena tu
GE07mbh_13_u:16445: 13,134.057d@017_0014 viprasya maraṇe hetus tatpatnī pitṛśokadā 13,134.057d@017_0015 vaiśyā tvam abhilāṣeyaṃ viprakanyeti sāṃpratam 13,134.057d@017_0016 ity uktāśvāsitāpṛcchat kenaivaṃ pāpasaṃyutā
GE07mbh_13_u:16447: 13,134.057d@017_0017 jātā viprakule samyak śreyaś cāpi bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:16451: 13,134.057d@017_0021 yamenānugṛhītābhūt puṇyalokanivāsinī 13,134.057d@017_0022 tan nityaṃ viduṣāṃ rakṣātatparo bhava bhūpate
GE07mbh_13_u:16452: 13,134.057d@017_0023 teṣāṃ saṃrakṣaṇāt tuṣṭaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate 13,135.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 13,135.001a śrutvā dharmān aśeṣeṇa pāvanāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16454: 13,135.002a kim ekaṃ daivataṃ loke kiṃ vāpy ekaṃ parāyaṇam 13,135.002c stuvantaḥ kaṃ kam arcantaḥ prāpnuyur mānavāḥ śubham

GE07mbh_13_u:16768: 13,136.004c dhanatyāgābhirāmāś ca vāksaṃyamaratāś ca ye 13,136.005a ramaṇīyāś ca bhūtānāṃ nidhānaṃ ca dhṛtavratāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:16770: 13,136.006a tapo yeṣāṃ dhanaṃ nityaṃ vāk caiva vipulaṃ balam 13,136.006b*0641_01 mahātmanāṃ jñānavidāṃ tapa eva dhanaṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:16771: 13,136.006c prabhavaś cāpi dharmāṇāṃ dharmajñāḥ sūkṣmadarśinaḥ 13,136.007a dharmakāmāḥ sthitā dharme sukṛtair dharmasetavaḥ 13,136.007c yān upāśritya jīvanti prajāḥ sarvāś caturvidhāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:16775: 13,136.010c dīpāḥ sarvasya lokasya cakṣuś cakṣuṣmatām api
GE07mbh_13_u:16781: 13,136.013c mānārhā mānitā nityaṃ jñānavidbhir mahātmabhiḥ 13,136.014a candane malapaṅke ca bhojane 'bhojane samāḥ
