GE07mbh_13_u:16783: 13,136.015a tiṣṭheyur apy abhuñjānā bahūni divasāny api
GE07mbh_13_u:16784: 13,136.015c śoṣayeyuś ca gātrāṇi svādhyāyaiḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ 13,136.016a adaivaṃ daivataṃ kuryur daivataṃ cāpy adaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:16785: 13,136.016c lokān anyān sṛjeyuś ca lokapālāṃś ca kopitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16786: 13,136.017a apeyaḥ sāgaro yeṣām abhiśāpān mahātmanām 13,136.017c yeṣāṃ kopāgnir adyāpi daṇḍake nopaśāmyati 13,136.018a devānām api ye devāḥ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:16787: 13,136.018c pramāṇasya pramāṇaṃ ca kas tān abhibhaved budhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16788: 13,136.019a yeṣāṃ vṛddhaś ca bālaś ca sarvaḥ saṃmānam arhati 13,136.019b*0642_01 teṣāṃ vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca sarve sanmārgadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16790: 13,136.020a avidvān brāhmaṇo devaḥ pātraṃ vai pāvanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:16792: 13,136.021a avidvāṃś caiva vidvāṃś ca brāhmaṇo daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:16793: 13,136.021c praṇītaś cāpraṇītaś ca yathāgnir daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:16794: 13,136.022a śmaśāne hy api tejasvī pāvako naiva duṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:16795: 13,136.022c havir yajñeṣu ca vahan bhūya evābhiśobhate
GE07mbh_13_u:16796: 13,136.023a evaṃ yady apy aniṣṭeṣu vartate sarvakarmasu
GE07mbh_13_u:16797: 13,136.023c sarvathā brāhmaṇo mānyo daivataṃ viddhi tat param
GE07mbh_13_u:16798: 13,137.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,137.001a kāṃ tu brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:16799: 13,137.001c kaṃ vā karmodayaṃ matvā tān arcasi mahāmate
GE07mbh_13_u:16800: 13,137.002 bhīṣma uvāca 13,137.002a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:16801: 13,137.002c pavanasya ca saṃvādam arjunasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:16803: 13,137.003c asya lokasya sarvasya māhiṣmatyāṃ mahābalaḥ 13,137.004a sa tu ratnākaravatīṃ sadvīpāṃ sāgarāmbarām 13,137.004c śaśāsa sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ haihayaḥ satyavikramaḥ 13,137.005a svavittaṃ tena dattaṃ tu dattātreyāya kāraṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:16804: 13,137.005c kṣatradharmaṃ puraskṛtya vinayaṃ śrutam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:16805: 13,137.006a ārādhayām āsa ca taṃ kṛtavīryātmajo munim
GE07mbh_13_u:16806: 13,137.006c nyamantrayata saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa dvijaś ca varais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16807: 13,137.007a sa varaiś chanditas tena nṛpo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:16809: 13,137.008a mama bāhusahasraṃ tu paśyantāṃ sainikā raṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:16810: 13,137.008c vikrameṇa mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jayeyaṃ vipulavrata 13,137.008e tāṃ ca dharmeṇa saṃprāpya pālayeyam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16811: 13,137.009a caturthaṃ tu varaṃ yāce tvām ahaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:16812: 13,137.009c taṃ mamānugrahakṛte dātum arhasy anindita 13,137.009e anuśāsantu māṃ santo mithyāvṛttaṃ tadāśrayam 13,137.010a ity uktaḥ sa dvijaḥ prāha tathāstv iti narādhipam 13,137.010c evaṃ samabhavaṃs tasya varās te dīptatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16813: 13,137.011a tataḥ sa ratham āsthāya jvalanārkasamadyutiḥ 13,137.011c abravīd vīryasaṃmohāt ko nv asti sadṛśo mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:16816: 13,137.012c na tvaṃ mūḍha vijānīṣe brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyād varam
GE07mbh_13_u:16817: 13,137.012e sahito brāhmaṇeneha kṣatriyo rakṣati prajāḥ 13,137.013 arjuna uvāca 13,137.013a kuryāṃ bhūtāni tuṣṭo 'haṃ kruddho nāśaṃ tathā naye
GE07mbh_13_u:16818: 13,137.013c karmaṇā manasā vācā na matto 'sti varo dvijaḥ 13,137.014a pūrvo brahmottaro vādo dvitīyaḥ kṣatriyottaraḥ 13,137.014c tvayoktau yau tu tau hetū viśeṣas tv atra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:16819: 13,137.015a brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśritāḥ kṣatraṃ na kṣatraṃ brāhmaṇāśritam
GE07mbh_13_u:16820: 13,137.015c śritān brahmopadhā viprāḥ khādanti kṣatriyān bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:16821: 13,137.016a kṣatriyeṣv āśrito dharmaḥ prajānāṃ paripālanam 13,137.016c kṣatrād vṛttir brāhmaṇānāṃ taiḥ kathaṃ brāhmaṇo varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16822: 13,137.017a sarvabhūtapradhānāṃs tān bhaikṣavṛttīn ahaṃ sadā 13,137.017c ātmasaṃbhāvitān viprān sthāpayāmy ātmano vaśe 13,137.018a kathitaṃ hy anayā satyaṃ gāyatryā kanyayā divi
GE07mbh_13_u:16823: 13,137.018c vijeṣyāmy avaśān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃś carmavāsasaḥ 13,137.019a na ca māṃ cyāvayed rāṣṭrāt triṣu lokeṣu kaś cana
GE07mbh_13_u:16824: 13,137.019c devo vā mānuṣo vāpi tasmāj jyeṣṭho dvijād aham 13,137.020a adya brahmottaraṃ lokaṃ kariṣye kṣatriyottaram 13,137.020c na hi me saṃyuge kaś cit soḍhum utsahate balam
GE07mbh_13_u:16825: 13,137.021a arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā vitrastābhūn niśācarī 13,137.021c athainam antarikṣasthas tato vāyur abhāṣata 13,137.022a tyajainaṃ kaluṣaṃ bhāvaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo namaskuru 13,137.022c eteṣāṃ kurvataḥ pāpaṃ rāṣṭrakṣobho hi te bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:16826: 13,137.023a atha vā tvāṃ mahīpāla śamayiṣyanti vai dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16827: 13,137.023c nirasiṣyanti vā rāṣṭrād dhatotsāhaṃ mahābalāḥ 13,137.024a taṃ rājā kas tvam ity āha tatas taṃ prāha mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16828: 13,137.024c vāyur vai devadūto 'smi hitaṃ tvāṃ prabravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:16829: 13,137.025 arjuna uvāca 13,137.025a aho tvayādya vipreṣu bhaktirāgaḥ pradarśitaḥ 13,137.025c yādṛśaṃ pṛthivī bhūtaṃ tādṛśaṃ brūhi vai dvijam
GE07mbh_13_u:16830: 13,137.026a vāyor vā sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cid brūhi tvaṃ brāhmaṇottamam 13,137.026c apāṃ vai sadṛśaṃ brūhi sūryasya nabhaso 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:16831: 13,138.001 vāyur uvāca 13,138.001a śṛṇu mūḍha guṇān kāṃś cid brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:16832: 13,138.001c ye tvayā kīrtitā rājaṃs tebhyo 'tha brāhmaṇo varaḥ 13,138.002a tyaktvā mahītvaṃ bhūmis tu spardhayāṅganṛpasya ha
GE07mbh_13_u:16833: 13,138.002c nāśaṃ jagāma tāṃ vipro vyaṣṭambhayata kaśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16834: 13,138.003a akṣayā brāhmaṇā rājan divi ceha ca nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:16835: 13,138.003c apibat tejasā hy āpaḥ svayam evāṅgirāḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:16836: 13,138.004a sa tāḥ piban kṣīram iva nātṛpyata mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16837: 13,138.004c apūrayan mahaughena mahīṃ sarvāṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:16838: 13,138.005a tasminn ahaṃ ca kruddhe vai jagat tyaktvā tato gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16839: 13,138.005c vyatiṣṭham agnihotre ca ciram aṅgiraso bhayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:16840: 13,138.006a abhiśaptaś ca bhagavān gautamena puraṃdaraḥ 13,138.006c ahalyāṃ kāmayāno vai dharmārthaṃ ca na hiṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16841: 13,138.007a tathā samudro nṛpate pūrṇo mṛṣṭena vāriṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:16842: 13,138.007c brāhmaṇair abhiśaptaḥ saṃl lavaṇodaḥ kṛto vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:16844: 13,138.008c kruddhenāṅgirasā śapto guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ 13,138.009a marutaś cūrṇitān paśya ye 'hasanta mahodadhim
GE07mbh_13_u:16846: 13,138.010a samo na tvaṃ dvijātibhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ viddhi narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:16847: 13,138.010c garbhasthān brāhmaṇān samyaṅ namasyati kila prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16848: 13,138.011a daṇḍakānāṃ mahad rājyaṃ brāhmaṇena vināśitam 13,138.011c tālajaṅghaṃ mahat kṣatram aurveṇaikena nāśitam 13,138.012a tvayā ca vipulaṃ rājyaṃ balaṃ dharmaḥ śrutaṃ tathā 13,138.012c dattātreyaprasādena prāptaṃ paramadurlabham
GE07mbh_13_u:16849: 13,138.013a agniṃ tvaṃ yajase nityaṃ kasmād arjuna brāhmaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:16850: 13,138.013c sa hi sarvasya lokasya havyavāṭ kiṃ na vetsi tam
GE07mbh_13_u:16851: 13,138.014a atha vā brāhmaṇaśreṣṭham anu bhūtānupālakam 13,138.014c kartāraṃ jīvalokasya kasmāj jānan vimuhyase 13,138.015a tathā prajāpatir brahmā avyaktaḥ prabhavāpyayaḥ 13,138.015c yenedaṃ nikhilaṃ viśvaṃ janitaṃ sthāvaraṃ caram
GE07mbh_13_u:16852: 13,138.016a aṇḍajātaṃ tu brahmāṇaṃ ke cid icchanty apaṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16853: 13,138.016c aṇḍād bhinnād babhuḥ śailā diśo 'mbhaḥ pṛthivī divam 13,138.017a draṣṭavyaṃ naitad evaṃ hi kathaṃ jyāyastamo hi saḥ 13,138.017c smṛtam ākāśam aṇḍaṃ tu tasmāj jātaḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16854: 13,138.018a tiṣṭhet katham iti brūhi na kiṃ cid dhi tadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:16855: 13,138.018c ahaṃkāra iti proktaḥ sarvatejogataḥ prabhuḥ 13,138.019a nāsty aṇḍam asti tu brahmā sa rājaṃl lokabhāvanaḥ 13,138.019c ity uktaḥ sa tadā tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:16856: 13,139.001 vāyur uvāca 13,139.001a imāṃ bhūmiṃ brāhmaṇebhyo ditsur vai dakṣiṇāṃ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:16857: 13,139.001c aṅgo nāma nṛpo rājaṃs tataś cintāṃ mahī yayau 13,139.002a dhāraṇīṃ sarvabhūtānām ayaṃ prāpya varo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16858: 13,139.002c katham icchati māṃ dātuṃ dvijebhyo brahmaṇaḥ sutām
GE07mbh_13_u:16859: 13,139.003a sāhaṃ tyaktvā gamiṣyāmi bhūmitvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:16860: 13,139.003c ayaṃ sarāṣṭro nṛpatir mā bhūd iti tato 'gamat
GE07mbh_13_u:16861: 13,139.004a tatas tāṃ kaśyapo dṛṣṭvā vrajantīṃ pṛthivīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:16862: 13,139.004c praviveśa mahīṃ sadyo muktvātmānaṃ samāhitaḥ 13,139.005a ruddhā sā sarvato jajñe tṛṇauṣadhisamanvitā 13,139.005c dharmottarā naṣṭabhayā bhūmir āsīt tato nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:16864: 13,139.006c triṃśataṃ kaśyapo rājan bhūmir āsīd atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16865: 13,139.007a athāgamya mahārāja namaskṛtya ca kaśyapam 13,139.007c pṛthivī kāśyapī jajñe sutā tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16866: 13,139.008a eṣa rājann īdṛśo vai brāhmaṇaḥ kaśyapo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:16867: 13,139.008c anyaṃ prabrūhi vāpi tvaṃ kaśyapāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:16868: 13,139.009a tūṣṇīṃ babhūva nṛpatiḥ pavanas tv abravīt punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16869: 13,139.009c śṛṇu rājann utathyasya jātasyāṅgirase kule 13,139.010a bhadrā somasya duhitā rūpeṇa paramā matā
GE07mbh_13_u:16870: 13,139.010c tasyās tulyaṃ patiṃ soma utathyaṃ samapaśyata
GE07mbh_13_u:16871: 13,139.011a sā ca tīvraṃ tapas tepe mahābhāgā yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:16873: 13,139.011d*0643_01 utathyārthe tu cārvaṅgī paraṃ niyamam āsthitā
GE07mbh_13_u:16874: 13,139.012a tata āhūya sotathyaṃ dadāv atra yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:16875: 13,139.012c bhāryārthe sa ca jagrāha vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇa
GE07mbh_13_u:16876: 13,139.013a tāṃ tv akāmayata śrīmān varuṇaḥ pūrvam eva ha 13,139.013c sa cāgamya vanaprasthaṃ yamunāyāṃ jahāra tām
GE07mbh_13_u:16877: 13,139.014a jaleśvaras tu hṛtvā tām anayat svapuraṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:16878: 13,139.014c paramādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ ṣaṭsahasraśatahradam 13,139.015a na hi ramyataraṃ kiṃ cit tasmād anyat purottamam 13,139.015c prāsādair apsarobhiś ca divyaiḥ kāmaiś ca śobhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:16879: 13,139.015e tatra devas tayā sārdhaṃ reme rājañ jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16881: 13,139.017a tac chrutvā nāradāt sarvam utathyo nāradaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:16882: 13,139.017c provāca gaccha brūhi tvaṃ varuṇaṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16883: 13,139.017e madvākyān muñca me bhāryāṃ kasmād vā hṛtavān asi 13,139.018a lokapālo 'si lokānāṃ na lokasya vilopakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16884: 13,139.018c somena dattā bhāryā me tvayā cāpahṛtādya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:16885: 13,139.019a ity ukto vacanāt tasya nāradena jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16886: 13,139.019c muñca bhāryām utathyasyety atha taṃ varuṇo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:16889: 13,139.019e mamaiṣā supriyā bhāryā nainām utsraṣṭum utsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:16890: 13,139.020a ity ukto varuṇenātha nāradaḥ prāpya taṃ munim
GE07mbh_13_u:16891: 13,139.020c utathyam abravīd vākyaṃ nātihṛṣṭamanā iva 13,139.021a gale gṛhītvā kṣipto 'smi varuṇena mahāmune 13,139.021c na prayacchati te bhāryāṃ yat te kāryaṃ kuruṣva tat
GE07mbh_13_u:16892: 13,139.022a nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhaḥ prājvalad aṅgirāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16893: 13,139.022c apibat tejasā vāri viṣṭabhya sumahātapāḥ 13,139.023a pīyamāne ca sarvasmiṃs toye vai salileśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16897: 13,139.025a tatas tad iriṇaṃ jātaṃ samudraś cāpasarpitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16898: 13,139.025c tasmād deśān nadīṃ caiva provācāsau dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16899: 13,139.026a adṛśyā gaccha bhīru tvaṃ sarasvati maruṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:16900: 13,139.026c apuṇya eṣa bhavatu deśas tyaktas tvayā śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:16901: 13,139.027a tasmin saṃcūrṇite deśe bhadrām ādāya vāripaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16902: 13,139.027c adadāc charaṇaṃ gatvā bhāryām āṅgirasāya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:16903: 13,139.028a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ bhāryām utathyaḥ sumanābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:16904: 13,139.028c mumoca ca jagad duḥkhād varuṇaṃ caiva haihaya

GE07mbh_13_u:16939: 13,140.020a abhyadravanta devāṃs te sahasrāṇi daśaiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:16940: 13,140.020c tatas tair arditā devāḥ śaraṇaṃ vāsavaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16941: 13,140.021a sa ca tair vyathitaḥ śakro vasiṣṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayau 13,140.021c tato 'bhayaṃ dadau tebhyo vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ 13,140.022a tathā tān duḥkhitāñ jānann ānṛśaṃsyaparo muniḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:16943: 13,140.023c ānayat tat saro divyaṃ tayā bhinnaṃ ca tat saraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:16944: 13,140.024a saro bhinnaṃ tayā nadyā sarayūḥ sā tato 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:16945: 13,140.024c hatāś ca khalino yatra sa deśaḥ khalino 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:16946: 13,140.025a evaṃ sendrā vasiṣṭhena rakṣitās tridivaukasaḥ 13,140.025c brahmadattavarāś caiva hatā daityā mahātmanā 13,140.026a etat karma vasiṣṭhasya kathitaṃ te mayānagha

GE07mbh_13_u:16948: 13,141.001c śṛṇu me haihayaśreṣṭha karmātreḥ sumahātmanaḥ 13,141.002a ghore tamasy ayudhyanta sahitā devadānavāḥ 13,141.002c avidhyata śarais tatra svarbhānuḥ somabhāskarau 13,141.003a atha te tamasā grastā nihanyante sma dānavaiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:16960: 13,141.012c atriṇā tv atha somatvaṃ kṛtam uttamatejasā

GE07mbh_13_u:16963: 13,141.014c bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam atritaḥ kṣatriyaṃ varam 13,141.014d*0648_01 evam atrer mahārāja kathitaṃ karma cādbhutam
GE07mbh_13_u:16964: 13,141.015a ity uktas tv arjunas tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:16965: 13,141.015c śṛṇu rājan mahat karma cyavanasya mahātmanaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:16968: 13,141.016d*0649_01 cyavanasya mahārāja śṛṇu māhātmyam uttamam 13,141.016d*0649_02 iṣṭvā yajñaṃ mahābhāga cyavanaḥ sumahātapāḥ 13,141.016d*0649_03 nāsatyau balinau rājaṃś cakre vai somapīthinau
GE07mbh_13_u:16969: 13,141.017 indra uvāca 13,141.017a asmābhir varjitāv etau bhavetāṃ somapau katham
GE07mbh_13_u:16970: 13,141.017c devair na saṃmitāv etau tasmān maivaṃ vadasva naḥ 13,141.018a aśvibhyāṃ saha necchāmaḥ pātuṃ somaṃ mahāvrata
GE07mbh_13_u:16971: 13,141.018b*0650_01 cyavana uvāca 13,141.018b*0650_01 yad anyad vakṣyase vipra tat kariṣyāma te vacaḥ 13,141.018b*0650_02 pibetām aśvinau somaṃ bhavadbhiḥ sahitāv imau

GE07mbh_13_u:16976: 13,141.018c pibantv anye yathākāmaṃ nāhaṃ pātum ihotsahe

GE07mbh_13_u:16981: 13,141.022a tam āpatantaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva cyavanas tapasānvitaḥ 13,141.022c adbhiḥ siktvāstambhayat taṃ savajraṃ sahaparvatam 13,141.023a athendrasya mahāghoraṃ so 'sṛjac chatrum eva ha

GE07mbh_13_u:16989: 13,141.027a tataḥ sa praṇataḥ śakraś cakāra cyavanasya tat

GE07mbh_13_u:16993: 13,141.028c akṣeṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca pāne strīṣu ca vīryavān

GE07mbh_13_u:16995: 13,141.030a etat te cyavanasyāpi karma rājan prakīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:16996: 13,141.030c bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvaṃ cyavanāt kṣatriyaṃ varam 13,142.001 bhīṣma uvāca 13,142.001a tūṣṇīm āsīd arjunas tu pavanas tv abravīt punaḥ 13,142.001c śṛṇu me brāhmaṇeṣv eva mukhyaṃ karma janādhipa

GE07mbh_13_u:17002: 13,142.005a gacchadhvaṃ śaraṇaṃ viprān āśu sendrā divaukasaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:17006: 13,142.008a sa ca tān brāhmaṇān āha dhanī kapavaco yathā 13,142.008c bhavadbhiḥ sadṛśāḥ sarve kapāḥ kim iha vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:17007: 13,142.009a sarve vedavidaḥ prājñāḥ sarve ca kratuyājinaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:17012: 13,142.012b*0652_01 sugatiṃ caiva gacchanti tathaiva śubhakarmiṇaḥ 13,142.012c abhuktavatsu nāśnanti divā caiva na śerate

GE07mbh_13_u:17037: 13,143.004a balaṃ śrotre vāṅ manaś cakṣuṣī ca; jñānaṃ tathā na viśuddhaṃ mamādya 13,143.004c dehanyāso nāticirān mato me; na cātitūrṇaṃ savitādya yāti
GE07mbh_13_u:17038: 13,143.005a uktā dharmā ye purāṇe mahānto; brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:17040: 13,143.005c paurāṇaṃ ye daṇḍam upāsate ca; śeṣaṃ kṛṣṇād upaśikṣasva pārtha
GE07mbh_13_u:17041: 13,143.006a ahaṃ hy enaṃ vedmi tattvena kṛṣṇaṃ; yo 'yaṃ hi yac cāsya balaṃ purāṇam 13,143.006c ameyātmā keśavaḥ kauravendra; so 'yaṃ dharmaṃ vakṣyati saṃśayeṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:17042: 13,143.007a kṛṣṇaḥ pṛthvīm asṛjat khaṃ divaṃ ca; varāho 'yaṃ bhīmabalaḥ purāṇaḥ 13,143.007a*0655_01 kṛṣṇasya dehān medinī saṃbabhūva
GE07mbh_13_u:17043: 13,143.007a*0656_01 kṛtsnam etat sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ ca 13,143.007b*0657_01 sa parvatān vyasṛjad vai diśaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:17044: 13,143.007c asya cādho 'thāntarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca; diśaś catasraḥ pradiśaś
GE07mbh_13_u:17046: 13,143.007e sṛṣṭis tathaiveyam anuprasūtā; sa nirmame viśvam idaṃ purāṇam 13,143.008a asya nābhyāṃ puṣkaraṃ saṃprasūtaṃ; yatrotpannaḥ svayam evāmitaujāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17047: 13,143.008c yenācchinnaṃ tat tamaḥ pārtha ghoraṃ; yat tat tiṣṭhaty arṇavaṃ tarjayānam 13,143.009a kṛte yuge dharma āsīt samagras; tretākāle jñānam anuprapannaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17048: 13,143.009c balaṃ tv āsīd dvāpare pārtha kṛṣṇaḥ; kalāv adharmaḥ kṣitim
GE07mbh_13_u:17050: 13,143.010a sa pūrvadevo nijaghāna daityān; sa pūrvadevaś ca babhūva samrāṭ 13,143.010c sa bhūtānāṃ bhāvano bhūtabhavyaḥ; sa viśvasyāsya jagataś cāpi goptā 13,143.011a yadā dharmo glāyati vai surāṇāṃ; tadā kṛṣṇo jāyate mānuṣeṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:17051: 13,143.011c dharme sthitvā sa tu vai bhāvitātmā; parāṃś ca lokān aparāṃś ca yāti
GE07mbh_13_u:17052: 13,143.012a tyājyāṃs tyaktvāthāsurāṇāṃ vadhāya; kāryākārye kāraṇaṃ caiva
GE07mbh_13_u:17054: 13,143.012c kṛtaṃ kariṣyat kriyate ca devo; muhuḥ somaṃ viddhi ca śakram etam
GE07mbh_13_u:17055: 13,143.013a sa viśvakarmā sa ca viśvarūpaḥ; sa viśvabhṛd viśvasṛg viśvajic ca 13,143.013b*0658_01 śatakratuṃ jitya sa viśvakarmā
GE07mbh_13_u:17056: 13,143.013b*0658_02 sa viśvasṛk pārtha sa viśvarūpaḥ 13,143.013b*0658_03 sa viśvabhug viśvadhṛg viśvajic ca 13,143.013c sa śūlabhṛc choṇitabhṛt karālas; taṃ karmabhir viditaṃ vai stuvanti 13,143.014a taṃ gandharvā apsarasaś ca nityam; upatiṣṭhante vibudhānāṃ śatāni
GE07mbh_13_u:17057: 13,143.014c taṃ rākṣasāś ca parisaṃvahante; rāyaspoṣaḥ sa vijigīṣur ekaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17058: 13,143.015a tam adhvare śaṃsitāraḥ stuvanti; rathaṃtare sāmagāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:17060: 13,143.015c taṃ brāhmaṇā brahmamantraiḥ stuvanti; tasmai havir adhvaryavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17062: 13,143.016a sa paurāṇīṃ brahmaguhāṃ praviṣṭo; mahīsatraṃ bhāratāgre dadarśa
GE07mbh_13_u:17063: 13,143.016c sa caiva gām uddadhārāgryakarmā; vikṣobhya daityān uragān
GE07mbh_13_u:17064: dānavāṃś ca 13,143.016d*0659_01 taṃ ghoṣārthe gīrbhir indrāḥ stuvanti 13,143.016d*0659_02 sa cāpīśo bhārataikaḥ paśūnām
GE07mbh_13_u:17065: 13,143.017a tasya bhakṣān vividhān vedayanti; tam evājau vāhanaṃ vedayanti
GE07mbh_13_u:17066: 13,143.017c tasyāntarikṣaṃ pṛthivī divaṃ ca; sarvaṃ vaśe tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:17068: 13,143.018a sa kumbharetāḥ sasṛje purāṇaṃ; yatrotpannam ṛṣim āhur
GE07mbh_13_u:17070: 13,143.018c sa mātariśvā vibhur aśvavājī; sa raśmimān savitā cādidevaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17071: 13,143.019a tenāsurā vijitāḥ sarva eva; tasya vikrāntair vijitānīha trīṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:17072: 13,143.019c sa devānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ; tam evāhur yajñavidāṃ vitānam
GE07mbh_13_u:17073: 13,143.020a sa eva kālaṃ vibhajann udeti; tasyottaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ cāyane dve
GE07mbh_13_u:17074: 13,143.020c tasyaivordhvaṃ tiryag adhaś caranti; gabhastayo medinīṃ tāpayantaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17075: 13,143.021a taṃ brāhmaṇā vedavido juṣanti; tasyādityo bhām upayujya bhāti
GE07mbh_13_u:17076: 13,143.021c sa māsi māsy adhvarakṛd vidhatte; tam adhvare vedavidaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17078: 13,143.022a sa ekayuk cakram idaṃ trinābhi; saptāśvayuktaṃ vahate vai
GE07mbh_13_u:17080: 13,143.022c mahātejāḥ sarvagaḥ sarvasiṃhaḥ; kṛṣṇo lokān dhārayate
GE07mbh_13_u:17084: 13,143.022e aśnann anaśnaṃś ca tathaiva dhīraḥ; kṛṣṇaṃ sadā pārtha
GE07mbh_13_u:17085: kartāram ehi 13,143.023a sa ekadā kakṣagato mahātmā; tṛpto vibhuḥ khāṇḍave dhūmaketuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17086: 13,143.023c sa rākṣasān uragāṃś cāvajitya; sarvatragaḥ sarvam agnau juhoti
GE07mbh_13_u:17087: 13,143.024a sa evāśvaḥ śvetam aśvaṃ prayacchat; sa evāśvān atha sarvāṃś cakāra 13,143.024c trivandhuras tasya rathas tricakras; trivṛcchirāś caturasraś ca tasya 13,143.025a sa vihāyo vyadadhāt pañcanābhiḥ; sa nirmame gāṃ divam antarikṣam 13,143.025c evaṃ ramyān asṛjat parvatāṃś ca; hṛṣīkeśo 'mitadīptāgnitejāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17088: 13,143.026a sa laṅghayan vai sarito jighāṃsan; sa taṃ vajraṃ praharantaṃ nirāsa 13,143.026c sa mahendraḥ stūyate vai mahādhvare; viprair eko ṛksahasraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17092: 13,143.027a durvāsā vai tena nānyena śakyo; gṛhe rājan vāsayituṃ mahaujāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:17094: 13,143.028a vedāṃś ca yo vedayate 'dhidevo; vidhīṃś ca yaś cāśrayate purāṇān 13,143.028c kāme vede laukike yat phalaṃ ca; viṣvaksene sarvam etat

GE07mbh_13_u:17097: 13,143.030a saṃvatsaraḥ sa ṛtuḥ so 'rdhamāsaḥ; so 'horātraḥ sa kalā vai sa kāṣṭhāḥ 13,143.030c mātrā muhūrtāś ca lavāḥ kṣaṇāś ca; viṣvaksene sarvam etat
GE07mbh_13_u:17101: 13,143.031c nakṣatrayogā ṛtavaś ca pārtha; viṣvaksenāt sarvam etat

GE07mbh_13_u:17106: 13,143.033c āpo bhūtvā majjayate ca sarvaṃ; brahmā bhūtvā sṛjate
GE07mbh_13_u:17108: 13,143.034a vedyaṃ ca yad vedayate ca vedān; vidhiś ca yaś cāśrayate vidheyān 13,143.034c dharme ca vede ca bale ca sarvaṃ; carācaraṃ keśavaṃ tvaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:17111: 13,143.035a jyotirbhūtaḥ paramo 'sau purastāt; prakāśayan prabhayā viśvarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17112: 13,143.035c apaḥ sṛṣṭvā hy ātmabhūr ātmayoniḥ; purākarot sarvam evātha
GE07mbh_13_u:17114: 13,143.036a ṛtūn utpātān vividhāny adbhutāni; meghān vidyut sarvam
GE07mbh_13_u:17115: airāvataṃ ca 13,143.036b*0663_01 ṛtūn māsān vividhaṃ kāryajātaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:17117: 13,143.036c sarvaṃ kṛṣṇāt sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca; viśvākhyātād viṣṇum enaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:17119: 13,143.037a viśvāvāsaṃ nirguṇaṃ vāsudevaṃ; saṃkarṣaṇaṃ jīvabhūtaṃ vadanti
GE07mbh_13_u:17120: 13,143.037c tataḥ pradyumnam aniruddhaṃ caturtham; ājñāpayaty ātmayonir mahātmā
GE07mbh_13_u:17121: 13,143.038a sa pañcadhā pañcajanopapannaṃ; saṃcodayan viśvam idaṃ sisṛkṣuḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:17125: 13,143.039c tato bhūmiṃ vyadadhāt pañcabījāṃ; dyauḥ pṛthivyāṃ dhāsyati
GE07mbh_13_u:17126: bhūri vāri 13,143.039e tena viśvaṃ kṛtam etad dhi rājan; sa jīvayaty ātmanaivātmayoniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17127: 13,143.040a tato devān asurān mānuṣāṃś ca; lokān ṛṣīṃś cātha pitṝn prajāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:17128: 13,143.040c samāsena vividhān prāṇilokān; sarvān sadā bhūtapatiḥ sisṛkṣuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17129: 13,143.041a śubhāśubhaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca; viṣvaksenāt sarvam etat
GE07mbh_13_u:17131: 13,143.041c yad vartate yac ca bhaviṣyatīha; sarvam etat keśavaṃ tvaṃ pratīhi 13,143.042a mṛtyuś caiva prāṇinām antakāle; sākṣāt kṛṣṇaḥ śāśvato
GE07mbh_13_u:17133: 13,143.042c bhūtaṃ ca yac ceha na vidma kiṃ cid; viṣvaksenāt sarvam etat

GE07mbh_13_u:17136: 13,143.044a etādṛśaḥ keśavo 'yaṃ svayaṃbhūr; nārāyaṇaḥ paramaś cāvyayaś ca

GE07mbh_13_u:17138: 13,143.044d*0665_01 tādṛśaḥ keśavo devo bhūyo nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17139: 13,143.044d*0665_02 ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ ca deśataḥ kālato hariḥ 13,143.044d*0665_03 jagatāṃ tasthuṣāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ 13,144.000*0666_00 vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17140: 13,144.000*0666_01 pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā rājaṃs te prapitāmahaḥ 13,144.000*0666_02 praṇamya puṇḍarīkākṣam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 13,144.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 13,144.001a brūhi brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ tvaṃ madhusūdana 13,144.001c vettā tvam asya cārthasya veda tvāṃ hi pitāmahaḥ 13,144.002 vāsudeva uvāca 13,144.002a śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan dvijānāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:17141: 13,144.002c yathātattvena vadato guṇān me kurusattama 13,144.002d*0667_01 dvāravatyāṃ samāsīnaṃ purā māṃ kurunandana 13,144.003a pradyumnaḥ paripapraccha brāhmaṇaiḥ parikopitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:17142: 13,144.003c kiṃ phalaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv asti pūjāyāṃ madhusūdana

GE07mbh_13_u:17148: 13,144.006a vyuṣṭiṃ brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ raukmiṇeya nibodha me 13,144.006b*0668_01 trivarge cāpavarge ca yaśaḥśrīrogaśāntiṣu

GE07mbh_13_u:17154: 13,144.011a anyān api sṛjeyuś ca lokāṃl lokeśvarāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:17155: 13,144.011c kathaṃ teṣu na varteya samyag jñānāt sutejasaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:17157: 13,144.012e dīrghebhyaś ca manuṣyebhyaḥ pramāṇād adhiko bhuvi

GE07mbh_13_u:17159: 13,144.013c imā gāthā gāyamānaś catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:17160: 13,144.014a durvāsasaṃ vāsayet ko brāhmaṇaṃ satkṛtaṃ gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:17161: 13,144.014b*0669_01 roṣaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sūkṣme 'py apakṛte kṛte 13,144.014c paribhāṣāṃ ca me śrutvā ko nu dadyāt pratiśrayam 13,144.014e yo māṃ kaś cid vāsayeta na sa māṃ kopayed iha
GE07mbh_13_u:17162: 13,144.015a taṃ sma nādriyate kaś cit tato 'haṃ tam avāsayam 13,144.016a sa sma bhuṅkte sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnām annam ekadā

GE07mbh_13_u:17168: 13,144.019c kṛṣṇa pāyasam icchāmi bhoktum ity eva satvaraḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:17171: 13,144.021c tad bhuktvaiva tu sa kṣipraṃ tato vacanam abravīt 13,144.021e kṣipram aṅgāni limpasva pāyaseneti sa sma ha

GE07mbh_13_u:17175: 13,144.023c tām api smayamānaḥ sa pāyasenābhyalepayat 13,144.024a muniḥ pāyasadigdhāṅgīṃ rathe tūrṇam ayojayat 13,144.024c tam āruhya rathaṃ caiva niryayau sa gṛhān mama 13,144.025a agnivarṇo jvalan dhīmān sa dvijo rathadhuryavat

GE07mbh_13_u:17180: 13,144.028a brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran nānyo varṇaḥ kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_13_u:17182: 13,144.029a āśīviṣaviṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tatas tīkṣṇataraṃ viṣam 13,144.029c brahmāśīviṣadagdhasya nāsti kaś cic cikitsakaḥ 13,144.030a tasmin vrajati durdharṣe prāskhalad rukmiṇī pathi
